item.text: rgyagar skad du/ Ar+yasarba tathA ga ta a d+hiSh+Than hrid yA gus+yAd+hA tu ka ratamu dA
nAm d+hAr NimahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang b.ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzus/ theg pa chen
po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+han drim med pa'i kun dga' ra
bu dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzingan/ byang chub sems dpa'i drage 'dun chen po drung/ nyan thos kyi
ge 'dun chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lham yinadang/ nam
mkha' ldang dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ man ngan pa bye ba mang po rnams dang/ yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma
rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nasathabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po
lta bu makhas pa/ mdzangasapa/ gsa'ab/ yade gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/ dri med
legs snang zhes bya bzhag yod de/ de'ang gcig tung kon mchog gsum la dad cing gus phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib
mo brtags pa/ sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ las spyodache ba/ phyugapa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum
tshogs pa lano// de nas bram ze chen po dromid legs snang bcom ldan 'dasagapa bde de ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das lam tog dang bdug pos mngon par mchod do// na bza' ni'abum ra ba'ang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lamu tig gi doshal
'bum ra ba'ang gsol nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyisunasngar 'duganas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol
do bcom ldan 'das sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi sdum par gadugs tshod spyan 'drenan/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bar
mdzad pa bcaganang/ denas bcom ldan 'adas kyis bram ze chenapo mdalegs snang gis spyanas par thugs su chudanas/ ci'ong ma gsung bar gyur par
gnang ngo// de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi phye nasnganas cang mi gsung bas gnang ba rage nas/ des ris pa nges par rang gi khyim du

song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshanamo 'das pa dang/ zhal zas dang/ yo byad dang/ zhal zas ro brgya pa ma dpe bshamasanas/ bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med chen po dang/ gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs/

dang : me tog dang/ bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dang/ sil snyan dang/ pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/

bram ze chen po dri'i da legs snang gis 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ga shegs pa 'i dus tshod la baban/ bdag la snang ba mdzad pa ci gnang/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dAmod legasasnangadabugs phyung nas/ nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/ denas bcom

ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams

cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigasanas gshegs par shes so// de nas bram ze chen po legs snang gsemachod pa dang/ bkur sti chen posamachod cing/ bcom ldan

'das kyi gshegs shulamadzes pacher byas so// 'khor mang po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnodasbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/

tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ dbang phyug chen pa dang/ sridamed kyi budang/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gashegs shulamadzes par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nga ha cang mi ring ba'i

[D• ]lam gyi ba gyin zhaganaskyed mosatshal bde byed ces bya bzhig yod de/ skyed mosatshal de ni namachodarten ring pachen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ rams gab/ rtsa dang/ shang dang/ rtsomos kun tu gang ba phyag dar

gyipung po lta bu zhig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung dugashegs pa dang/ mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de'i kun tu 'bar 'od zera'abarab kha dog snatshogs pa dag byung ngo// phyag dar gyi phung pod

las kyang legasaso zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thubapa legs so legasaso// dnganagashegs pa'i ltas bzang pa'o// bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pan yang khyod legs so//

deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten nas phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdanas 1 nyid kyi sku las na bza' bsal nas

mchod rtenarAng pa phyagadar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchim byungab chen po phyung bas bshums pamadzadanas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstanapa des phyogs

bcu'adi bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lagamathalanabazhugs pa bzhin mthong ngo// de bzhinagashegs pa thams cad kyang spyanamachi mas gang zhibazhugs so// de bzhinegashegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer

bkye ste/ mchod rten rung nga'i phung po chen po der bzhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur cing/ yi chad de 'khod par gyur te// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag rdo las
na'adar zhing snyingan 'gul/ dz+dzanagasor zhing ris pa rangs par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bshumasapa 'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na/ bcom ldan 'das kya spyan mchi mas gang bar bstan pa'i ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas/ ci'i slad du/

bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag rdordzogs ring bsrel

gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'amachod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gi ngas kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye btul gyi gong bu sud gnas shang/ de bzhin ga shegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya bsnyad kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi

chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi spyi bo'ang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rog nga na chos kyi rnam gras/
'di gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten du lung bstan te// lagan de chos kyi rnam grangs 'dan 'di ltar lan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rjechos kyi
rnam grangs 'di'i phanayon ba yin no// 'gan rdorjechos kyi rnam grangs 'dani bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no// denas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po'i sa pa de dag gis chos kyi

rnam gras 'di thosanas chos rnams lachos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bralal/ denas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ kha cig gso ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig gsan dgra bcom
pa nyid thob bo// kha cig gsan rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gsen phyir ma 'ong ba 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis na phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu'o// kha cig gson byang chub sems dpa'as la gnas
so// kha cigagasan byang chugatu lung bstan pa thob bo// kha cig gsanas dang po'o// kha cig gis sa gnyis pa'o// kha cigagazhigasum pa'o// kha cigs nas bzhapi'o// kha cig gis nas
lnga pa'o// kha cig gsanas drug pa'o// kha ci'i gsos bdunapa'o// kha cig gsanas brgyadapa'o// kha cig gis nas dgu pa'o// kha cig gsanas bcul gnas par gyur to// kha cig gsan pha

phol tu phyin pa drug yongasasu rdzogs so// bram ze chen po de'ang mngonapa shes lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang/ ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje cho 'phrul chen

pa 'di lta bu mthong nas ngomatshar dngarmadadu byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'adasal 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyis brgyan pa 'dulta bu thob na/

bcom ldan 'das gang gasmad du phud dud dang bkur stishani dumang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'adas de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu 'angamathengabar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa: laganango khyod nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge stonanam/ dge snyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje

sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyuranang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyisarjes su gzung

bar 'gyur ro// gapazhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsus pa'i mdo snga rnams bcangs pa 'gyur ro// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de

bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig tal gru gang ba snyad dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar

'gyurazhing/ nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchodapa byed pa dang/ khong du chud par byed pa dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dradang/ ma tog 'phrang rgyu dang/
byug pa dang/ nabaza' dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan gyis mchod pa byedang 'a'i rigs kyi bu lam/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyenam/ dge bsnyanam des/ phyogs bcudang phyogs re re'i

dbazhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrige til gyi gang bu nyid dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi mi tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dang/ me tog 'phreng rgyudang/ byug pa dang/ na bza' dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyun

gyis mchod par 'gyur ro// phyogasare re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i na rinapo che sna bdunalas byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsom gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro//

denas lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba dang/ lha ma yinadang/ nam mkha' ldang dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lte'aphyo chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa de rnams dang/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po da rnamA

kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang gye mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabasanas/ 'dini rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul chen po ston pas
mthu che ba yin nozhes zer ro// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rini/
ba ma'i mchod rten du gda' ba bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag rdo 'di phyag dar gyi phung bo ma yan gyis/ 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rtenachen po

yan no/ lag na rdorje 'onakyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa stonapas nub par gyurakyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i michod rten rnams
ni'ajig pa 'am 'gyes par ma 'gyur te/ dobazhin gshegs pa'i rdorje'i snying po'i sku rigs ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems cananams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snayab 'as kyang nub par
gyur to// lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyin 'tsho sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang/ sdig pa canadang/ dmyal ba la gzhol ba shAn tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyasam yan/ chos
ma yazhi/ dge 'dun 'tshol ba ma yinazhung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang skyidapar ma byed de/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rjede'i phyir pa'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo// ma pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta byin nub par 'gyur gyis/ debazhade gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs/
pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyurayo// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnams

grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'gan dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skyo bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rdzo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad bros te mchod rten gyi nang du
dbazhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang
ngas byin gyis brlabs pa mchod rten du 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang
na spyi'i tshod naya ngan gyis yangs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyananam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nad du 'dzeg par byedan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
b.rAnaraMn pa tshasna bdun gyi rang bzhin du na rgyas pa rlobs pa pa 'gyur ro// 'khor le'i 'phrang pa dang/ dril bu g.yeraga' dri ba sprul ba dang bcas pa dang/ bkra shis dang/ char khab kyi gzug/
dang dril bur bcas pa 'an po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang/ byin gyis rlabs dang/

a bden pa dang/ dam tshig bas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phud dud dang bas stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir ma ldag/
par 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// phyuga'atshal ba gcig dang/ skor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sog
pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing/ banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// gnas gangamachod rtenanam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i
sa phyogs de'ang de nga zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyisabarlabs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der klum bsrunapas kyang ma tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur//
gnas der srog chags ma bsrun pa dang gdug pas kyang ma tshugs par 'gyur/ gcanagazan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi bsrun pa dang/ ne tso dang/ ri skegs dang/ bya ba dang/
su mo dang/ sha sbyang dang/ sbyang bu dang/ bye ba dang/ sbrang ma mchugasum pa dang/ mtshurangs dang/ rta bla'i 'jigs pa'ang ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par
'gyur/ phyogs der yams kyi nad dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa'ang ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung pa dang/ yi dgos dang/ 'dre dang/ brjed
byed kyi 'jig pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mtshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang ma tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang/ 'bras dang//
phel mag dang/ lhog pa dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ rkangashudang/ g.yanapa dang/ mdzes kyang ma tshugs par 'gyur zhing/ mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro//
phyogs der ba lang gnad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gnang dang/ skyes pa dang/ bdu med dang/ khye'u dang bu mo nad kyis kyang nam
ya nga ma tshugs par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yanapar 'chi bar ma 'gyur/ dug gas ma yani/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing/ mo dang rus kyang nam yang ma tshugs par 'gyur/ sa rol
gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'tshigs nga sa kyang ma yin 'anyis kya'i tshags pas kyang nam yang na tshogs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 'demag gi 'jigs pa'ang ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po

bzhi'i nga rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad de ra sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su slong bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyishu rtsa brgyad pa de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/

sdud par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyud dang/ zla nga dang/ nyi ma dang/ mjug rangs chen pa 'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal pa tham sa cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par

tsha: mdangs ma 'phrog cing/ legs pa ngonar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bkur ste bya ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnasaM sum cu rtsa

gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo// yul duganas po thams cad kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan de'i drung du sa gsum du 'ong ngo// bstod par byed/ sor ba byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya

0 byin yang lha'i bu mo dang/ lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtag tu rgyun ma 'a chad par mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa la 'ong ngo// de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgos pa dang/ byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so// mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa sa' 'am/rdo'i ma/ shinge gi 'am/ dngul gyi lam/ gsar

gyi 'am/ zas kyi byed pa dang/ chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di'ang bris te de'inang du bzhagan/ bzhagam thag tsam gyis rinapomasna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'phang dag

them skas dang/ kha sran dang/ 'khor lo'i'i phreng ba dang/ bkra shis dang/ gdugs dang/ dril bu 'phyang ba dang/ ba dan dang/ dril bu g.yer ga'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du
'gyurago/ phyogs bzhi'i kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar gnas par 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis khyon gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po tshadang/
sku gdung ga sang po'i mchod rten dang/ mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// sa gzugs dang/ mchod rten de logamin gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang/ mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasachos kyi rnam gras 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par lta bu r 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
dbaka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gya rnyebs kyi snying bo gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ga phyag rgya'i gzungs yan te/ lag na rdo rje des nam thu 'ad na yon tan gyi

khyad par 'di lta bu r byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin nga tsho'i bram tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagan do tshe 'on cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa dang/ mkhyen pa dang/ de ltar byung ba dang/ gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring srel gyi za ma/

tog gi phyag rgyu'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// nam sbi ya d+hI kA nAn/ sam+b+hA ta thA ga tAnAn/ o d+hu bi bAn ba ra ba tsa re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+hur d+hare/ sad+ma ta thA ga ta/ d+hA tu rU re/ pad+mam
b+ha ti/ dza ya bar/ a tshule/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+harma tsakra/ pra bane badzra/ bo d+ha ma hA a la kAr/ a laM kr-ite/ saN+Da ta thA ga ta/ a d+hat+ti/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bon po rgyun/

bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ saM bod+ha na saM bo d+ha ya/ tsal tsa la/ tsa lan san+d+ha A ba ra Nani/ saT+TapA pa bog te/ shur shur/ sarbasheka bi gte/ saN+Dita thA ga ta mA da ya/ badzra Ni/ saM b+ha bas b+ha ba/ ta thA ga te

gu rgyu/ dar Ni ma dri/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiT+Thite/ d+hatu gan+d+he swAhA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thate swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ d+hAtu mu tresAhA/ su pra titi/ sU pa ta thA ga ta a

tiT+Thiti/ hUM hU~MAhA/ oM sarba ta thAg ta ub d+hAtumu dra NasAhA/ sarba ta thA ga tAn sA d+ha chu ba b+hu ta ad+hiT+Thitahur dur/ hUM hUM swAhA/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgyu'i

gakhrungs 'di boshad ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshags pa 'bum phrag byab khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyidadagu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la

shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang/ ring bsrel gyi snye nga po'i mechod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs so zhes
bya ba byin no// 'a nade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig dang byin gyis rlabs pa nin// gang naring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/
gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ dbazhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyunam 'a chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i

byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// denas gzungs bshad pa dang/ jitsam na mchod rtenang pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi lam la yang rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon/
par 'phags shing/ 'phang dang/ legs par rnam par 'dres pa dang/ 'khor 'di'i 'phrang ba dang/ bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dgyes te de
skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a ga na rdo dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drizadang/ nam mkha' ldingadang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lce'aphya
chen po de dag dang/ lha dang mar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs de mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ringabasrel gyi

za ma tog ces bya ba'ago khrus theg pa chen po'i med rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'du ka dpra b+hadang zhu chen gyi 'tsho ba ban d+he btsangs de ben dra rakI tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabs
[]@#// rgya gar skad du/ bod+higats+tshaladar lak+Sha d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ songs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dang 'a thamasacad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi la ba dal kany+tsanod kyi/ pra b+he sa ke tu muyi/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ya/ ta thA

ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ bod+hibidz+ha bo d+hanibi d+hani/ sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra har pra ha ra/ ma hU~M bo d+hi tsit+tid+ma re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta smi

sats+tsedate/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+hu lo ke te/ gu tshe gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+hasubasgyu se/ ma la ma la/ ga gan tale/ pra tiT+ThitaM/ sarba ta g+ha ga ta a d+ha[Q]to/ na b+ho sta le/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/

sarba pA paM phrasha man/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+han/ hu lu hu lu hU~M/ ma hA badz+hamArga saM pra ti sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tati shud+d+hes hA/ mAl man/ osarba tu thag tabya ba tshekati/ dza ya dza ya swAhA/ hrad yaM/
o tu ru ra/ dza ya mu khe swAhA/ u pa hri da yaM/ oM badzra A yu dzesahA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhag gzus 'di bros te mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten de'inang du gzungs 'ad bcugan des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas pa 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi ma tog dang dradang/
'phrong ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yan gyi/
sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la'ang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro// dga' bongs mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams
zhan pa dang/ ma dad pa dang/ lta ba log pa dang/ the tsom za ba dang/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ tshe thung ba dang/ sems canangamyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/
mtshams med par 'gro ba sems can de lta bu dag ga phyi'i gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang/ dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'ang klog

[Di ]pa dang/ ma chod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'dis pas

mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stongo rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// stong pas brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton
paN+NaM dubyas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du'ang zhugs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so//[–]
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya drud sha bud+d+hakan nA ma ma hAyAn sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mngo//
sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya
lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'am pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stongag byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang
thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal ba/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing

bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyisas rgyas kyi zhing 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbal dri med rdulasol rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog bad+ma bi cha rma'i dazer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod
pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags

chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhesal chos kyang ston to// su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzinab de bskal pa chen 'dzam bu'i glang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal
par 'khor ba las ldog ge/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal
prayod rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma bai DUrma'i 'od zer rin poche'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ sa mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug
tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ga med zla 'od smon lam gyis nga rgyan pa/ rab snga bkod pa chen pa chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phag chag med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das

pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa

dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu zla gzhonan zhim 'a sgron

ma zla ba'i ma teg pad+ma gsar stag nam mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dikyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed teg gi rgyal mtshan rgyal

pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkodapa dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// tshig 'don te//

bskra phyag bya'o// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyal la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gsheg

pa dri mang bla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// phyag bya'o//

shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya'amtshan yang gzungango// phyag bya'o// lha chub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchogag tigs grags ldan zhes bya'i mtshan

yang gzung ngo// phyag bya'o// nub byungag phyogs mtshams kyi dbazhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzigs zhes bya pa'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// phyag smra// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs/
ba'ajigs bral khag tsham mnga' sa zam byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// phyag bya'o/ 'ogag phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sang ge bskyis pa'imadi pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gazung ngo//
phyag bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjidi 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo// phyag bya'o// byams pa dang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu ram/
rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/ nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa
bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su ya rang bar bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'on tang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa 'ba'athob bo// ting nge 'dzani phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob go/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dge ba'i ngashas gnyen phun sum tshogs pa'ang myur du yongs su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lasanyams par ma 'gyupanang
yongs su nyams par yang ma 'gyur ro// 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tsho'ang kun tu mdzes pa dang/ de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rigs na sum tshogs pa dang/ skye bo bun
sumatshogs pa dang/ rus phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rigs 'dra ba'i skya bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// de la yas pa
'di skad ces bya ste// gang dang gang du skyes pa/ tshor bas tshe rabs thams cad du// mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dag/ 'od byed pa dang mthu che dang// 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/
gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyang brjod par bya'o tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe sa maM tumu khaM/ si tiluk+ti/ ne'uk+ta pra b+he/ sa ma yo ga/ tsat+ti tsati/ a khe ma khe/ mdane/
ba bste/ sa man+tA mu Na/ sad skyu ram/ yulte pra yuk+ti/ ha lam sel/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsam/ a tsi a tsaNi/ tse/ a ra he/ ba dud tshe/ mA yu gra he/ he ma ba ti//
ti ba ti/ d+harmatsit+taM/ ts+tsatib+higo/ a bka ber kAm/ saM b+hib ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang sngags
kyagazhi rnams grubab gyur cig/ de la 'di skadaces bya ste// gzungs 'di dag na bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag nagangabazhugs pa'i/bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams // de dag del/
dgongs par 'gyur// skye ba dag ni kun tu yang// dge ba'i bshes gnyenarnyed par 'gyur// cung zad dge ba gang yin pa// donanams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad+ma'i snying por
bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams mngon du mthong// gzungs 'di dagan 'dzani byed nga/ mkhas nga dpal ldan s te skye// dran dang blo gros rtag pa dang// mos dang shes rab rab tu
'bol// thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// thos pa rnams kyis yongs ma nyams// 'jig rten mgon 'di dag gi/ mtshana rnams su zhig brjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad
spangs nas// bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog/ dedagade la mngon du 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing na byi ba phrag stong
dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi// bsod nams phung po de ches mang// rtag tu tshe rabs
dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i// ma khem thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzesad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na
med pa 'thob// sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthongonas ston la ragazhu dad// 'jig rten sgron
! mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// byang chub myur du
'tshang yang rgyu// nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar na// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gong gas 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i// rgyu chen mgan sbyangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon
a bo de dag gi/ mtshan rnams ma gapa'adzin byed na// skye ba gang dang gang skyes bar/ de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas
su bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal pa du maran// lha rnams bas stang byed par 'gyur//
byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgyu/ mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// mos med shes rab 'chal ma 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par sangs// rtag tu sangs rgyus rnams kyang mthong/
mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang// mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa// rtag tu de la srung bar byed// gzugs dang mtshanan phunasum tshogs// nor chakhyim du skye
bar 'gyur// sems can kun las+sa par byed// dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med// bskal pa bye ba rgyu mang por// lha yatsan dan dmar po dang// shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi// spos ngad
de yi kha nas 'byung// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba sgra skad 'ad// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur// rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// mtshan rnams
'di dag 'dzin byed nga// rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab// bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de na pha ma spyan sdug
dang// skye bo dag gi tshigs rnams dang// 'bral bar 'gyur ba ma mthong ngo// drang srong chen po rnams kyimtshan// bud med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud mo da lus la ma chags nas/ skyes
pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur// mi yi lus thob gyur nas// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// 'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams sa 'di dgas
ga/ 'dzin pa// de ya lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang// g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ya soms la
[D]/ nams kyang na// dpung dang bzhinapar bcas pa yi// bdud kyis glags rnyed ma 'gyur ro// 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams // mi gang 'dzan par byed pa de// zhingan bye ba bsam yas par// nam
mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan ba rnams mchod nas// 'jigs pa med par zhu bzhu// dedag de la bsamamakhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon
bodi dag las// lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas/ den shan tu yi rangs ste// rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom mad// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byedab// 'jig rtenamagon po rnams las ni//
zab mo'i chos natsos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// denas pha rol phyin pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams // ma lus
rgyu bar na rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kun// ganga gzhonge du 'dongo'agyur pa// de na mdayang dag rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa 'am na bung med/
gang// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'a dzan pa ya/ yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang// sangs rgyas bskal pa rgyun du gsung// bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas//
0 rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag mtshan rnams 'dzan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po// sprin gyi rgyal po ma yi mchog/ 'jig rten mgon pa 'di dag gi/
mtshanan bskal par gang nyan dang// gang dag 'di rnams mtshaganyan cing// thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rab che// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// drang
srong chen podi dag gi/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la// shes rab ldan masum yig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa'achenapo byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'kherade dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/
dri za bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bsu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
kargya gar gyi mkhan po dzan ma tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi 'khotsa ba ban de yoshes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yasapa bud+d+hAkan nAm mahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phagasapasangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ta saM' ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drong

srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen
po byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nam mkha'i snying po dang/ kun tu bzang bo dang/ mtha' yas me tog dang/ kun nas me tog dang/ de dag la sogs pa skye
ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na/ dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos
med la lag pa bsgong ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
ma btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasanam mkha'i dkya'i na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin
pa 'di dang/ dge slong gcer bu shes ma mchis la/ lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di'i nga su zhig lags/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po nam
mkha' sAng po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// nam mkha' snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yaneno// cig shos 'di'i nga nad kyis btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang/ 'byung po bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis
bstan du gsol// bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo// bdun pa nasangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigis stong gnam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad lo phan pa'i don dang/ nad thams
cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyi'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hAya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH saM g+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/
ha la ha la/ na mo dza ga na ma tsanA ya/ na mo nam sAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'ad skad ces
bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'da'achang ngam/ klog gam 3 kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mchon gyis ma tshugs/ chu dang sdug bsngal ba nad kyis 'chi
ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// dus ma yan pa'i 'chi bas 'tshaba' dus byed par ma 'gyur ro// des dug zes kyang bras bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan
bdun bzlas brjod byas te zes na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo// nad thams cad kyis btagi par ma 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thes pa 'dzanapar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan btab pa'i na bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/ sna ma'i mar dang/ ut+tha
ge la sngon po dang/ u ti dang/ nye'u gang pa rnams bsres pa'i bar byas na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// denas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can
stong gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka'
mkhastsal te// na mo bud+d+hAya/ na mo d+hamal/ na ma saM g+ha ya/ opa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa// sarba b+ha ta naM/ tsan+tiya/ kA lA ya/ ba ra ba ngu naM su tA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams

cad la phan pa'i donodang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'gom nyes pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa thoms cad bzlog pa dang/ dus ma yan bar 'tshe ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig/

brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing/ ngas kyang da ltar bshang pa'i snying pa' da zung zhig/ nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung
bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis lag pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthongabar 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'chi bar ma 'gyur ro/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa
dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyesapa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'da'i cho ga gzhanan nad thams cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o// 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no//
chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag bsrung ngo// byis pa rnams kyis gdon dag laskad pa sngon po gdags so// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag
la'angarang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gnam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la zhi ba'i don dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/
'byung bo thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhu 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hAya/ na mo d+harmam/ nam saM g+hA ya// oka la ka la/ ka la ki'i/ kulu ku lu//
ku 'ad sA da naM/ ku ru sarba gra hANaM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying bo gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni u0f38skal pa bzang po 'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ nga ltar byung ba
thams cad kyis gsungs nge [u0f10]sa kyang da ltar bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngagasakyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ gang la la zhag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/
kun chub par byed na/ de la lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs// dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gas ma tshugs/ mas nad kyis ma 'debs shing/ chu dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang/
gshas ngan du 'chibaram 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnamAni'i gtogos so// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par las
nas mgo bkrus te de bzhin ga gas pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjodAn/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de la sams can snang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra
bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jig pathamasacad kyi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thob pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa thams cad du
skud pa dkar pos gdags so// mag nang la shang 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna b.lagadags so// dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsngags pa'i 'bras yos lan brgya
rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rA dzAnaMrA dzAm Dam khA yA kAr tu kAme na/ 'o ma can gyi shang gaspur shang ga ma bus la bsreg bya til dag la lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams
cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ sdig pa sbyangs shing dpal chen po dang/ nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shingagasal bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin
srog khya'o// sdig pa jisnyad pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang/ rig sngags thams cad sgrib par 'dod pa dang/ bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang/ na lad dang/ khre dang/ shir
sha dang/ rgya sos dang/ gur kum dang/ bla sgang dang/ in+d+ra b.ru na dang/ byang chub kyi shing dang/ a ma'amago thogs dang/ 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spun
sngar nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bya zhing bum pa la mkhas pa pa gsar ba gzhag ste/zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs yin sngar sAng po la lan stong brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug ma gdug
par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ldeng gi phur ma spyi bor bsnyags 'khargya rtsa brgyad mang nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro// gdon dang/ bsrung ba dang/
'byung pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad la'angaHsbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa 'phog par dud sol stong gi nam mkha'al bzhugs te/
sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlogang 'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/
na mo d+ha ya/ na maH saM g+ha ya/ na ma kra ku ts+tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ oka Ta ka Ta/ ka Na ka Na/ ki To TaM/ ki Ni//
ka pas na maswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas log par dad sol ces bya ba gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing
rjes su ya nga ba'i snying po 'di khyed kyis zung zhig blangs gang bzung ste kun chub pa byas na/ phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon
mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/
tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi nang du lha'atshe ba nyid thob par 'gyur go yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur go yang na tshog bzhin du bsgrubs na
de mar skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'das shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur te/ tsho'ad la'ang rtag tu brjod dond thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// so pa
'dzanapar 'gyur ro// zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zes 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// ci stoskom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa
0 ]brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// ldeg rgal bcad n zangs khab kyis bya'o// 'thapa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lanabadun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag
tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyuraro/ ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dodan/ des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi
'khero sar dkyil 'khor thabs dam bskus la a ka rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlasang rjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
na tho bar 'gyur ro// yid la ci smos pa thams cad ston te// tshe 'am/ stobs sam/ 'pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser grub steng
gnam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sams can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na ma saMg+ha ya/ na ma ka ka mu na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te samyag saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ so sa ra sa ra
sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa 'o) sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya/ d+ha ma d+ho ma/ d+ha dz+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+hu ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ya/ na mo na ma ka na ka mu na yaM/ ta thA ga tA ya/[wE/ ]
te samuka saM bud+d+ha yasu shu/ de nas bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis/ byang nubasam sa dpa' nam mkha'i snying bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung/ me dang/ chu dang/ lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma
'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byedang ra ma 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'bar 'gyur/ tshe ring par 'gyur/
longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na ston gyi las
kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// ci ste pha rol nad las thar par byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing bog gam/ a ka ru 'i ba dug pas bdugs la/ gza' thams cad
la khrus bya'o/ dmadzadang/ skas nad dang/ mchin skrun la shu dag 'jam pa brtags la sbrang tsadang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyud bsngags la
bskus na mdzend thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// zhag nga zhi ba lasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma' mo tog gi 'phrang ba la la ni stong rtsa brgyado bsngags te/ mi'i mgo la bcinges na
nya0 zhag bzhi pa'i nas sos par 'gyur// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjod byed las tha par 'gyur ro// lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyus la phul ba'i teg gis
bdug go/ de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs stong gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan/
pa'i don dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'phying gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya namo d+harmAya/ namasaMg+ha ya/ o ha'
ha raha ra ha ra/ ha ha ! na ma kA shu pA ya/ ta thA ga tA yaM/ alha te samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ sats+tshan+taman+ta pA da pA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// nam mkha' stong pa snying po 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/
namamakha'i snying po khyed kyis kyang snying po 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam ! klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas

brjod byed na/ mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa khamathar kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las na ma togs so// las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//
mdze dang shag la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i ma tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shang bskus nasos par 'gyur ro// kud pa na
bal sangs rgyas la phul ba'im tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag sta/ sa rab zhag rgyu/ sangs rgyas kyin nga la skyong rtsa brgyang bas bdago/ thams cad du'ang sAbar ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha'al bzhugs te/ sams can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyirarig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hAya/ na mo d+harma ya/ nam saM g+ha
yan/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+ha ma gyu// mahA g+ham/ ta 'ata la/ ma hA ta la/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsal/ nga de rgyu re/ mahA d+ha re/ tir tu ra/ ma hA ti/ ka ka la/ ma hA ka la/ tsu ru su
ru/ ma hA nu'u/ ma li mi lo/ ma hAm lo/ ti la ta la/ ma hA ta la/ d+ham d+hu ma/ ma hAd+hum/ tsa le tsa le/ mahA tsal/ kha ra la/ ma hA khir/ rtsa la la/ ma hA tsa la/ sA hA/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen ponamamakha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthal gyis bya'o//
srin bzlog na shing ka ra wA ra'i lcag mas so// dug spo na chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// tshog thams cad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po nam mkha'i snying po yalangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa
sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chenapa'i mdo rdzogs so/// @#// rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+yasarba bud+d+hasaM ga ba tin ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/
'phags pa sangs rgyas thamakhan kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung chen po'i 'graman/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal te// rgyal po chen po dag skyes padang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi 'di dag 'byung ngo// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste//
grwa ba drang na ba dang/ rgud pa dang/ 'ba'o// de la'ang 'jigs pa chenapagacag ste/ 'di ltar 'chab dag ga 'jigs pa chen po ste/ bcam po med pa/ gnyen po med pa// rtag tu
phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o// rgyal po chen po gdel 'jigs pa chen po gcig pa de'i gnyen pongs 'dir brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'daskad ces gsol to//
dbcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi srog rab tu stsal bas skye dgu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par red do// de nas bcom
ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ sa gol gyi sgras de bshade gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod
cig des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yan par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o// sngon ma bskor ba'i
tshes kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa'ang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ bya dang/ stong dang/ 'og ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskabate/ 'di skad
lta ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dgasems can rnams la thugs brtsi ba'i don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su'ang 'di skad ces/ gang gi phyi'i 'ad dag tshe dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa
longs su grub cing/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba/sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo// de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed
sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par
zhal gyis bzhesanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo// tad+ya thA/ tsa la tsa la tsa le/ ba na te/ sras ki/ tsakra a ga te/ pra gam du/ sarba ra ga a na te/
kuN+Da kuN+Da ma hA kuN+Di/ tsa le tsa re'i/ hi ma/ ha ma gor/ he ma ni shun+ti/ he ma sas/ kor pa kir ba pe/ he ku ra ste ku ra de/ ku ma te/ ba sa ma Ni/ sha 'u hUM/ tsa le tsa le/ ba
le nA ba laM ba du mu du mu sAdA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyid pa thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa// hU~M hU~M/ si sa swAhA
de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das bdag gas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyon gyi rlu bas kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// tang gA/ shrI te shwa te shI te/ le la la/ 'phags
skyes pos kyang sbas pa/ ma taM ge ma taM gi/ mA taM ga ) shu mA shu mA/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang snyas pa/ tsa le tsa re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang sbas pa/ ba laM
ba pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rgyal po chen po gang la la zhagasangs rgyus thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rigs sngags 'ad nyin ri la lan re 'donan/rigs kyi bu
'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'i du shes bskyod nga ra bya// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dis sems can thams cad kyi
srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sams can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshageg tu 'don pa dang/ gang yong 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chiba'i
'jigs pa mad do// de'i lus la nad nganang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mos ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yani/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab
sa ma yin no// gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'di'i donapa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o do/ yi ger 'drib rim 'dir
'jug ba des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ sams can rnams la'am gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa la na
0 no/ zhes de nga zhin gshegs pa rnams gsung pa'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor de dag dang/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zarab cas pa 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngonopa bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi na lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gablus rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shul
dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//1 @#// rgya gar skad du/

Ar+ya bud+d+had ya nA ma d+ha ra Ni d+harmapar ya// bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'gazungs kyi chos[”]nemathus/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa 'a 'khor gyi khyams/ ya shes kyis rnam par spyad// sngon/
gyis sa rgyus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngonapar bstod po/ byang chub sems dang 'chenapo'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cang mnyam pa
nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa/ kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzangs kyi dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung

bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thamacad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang tingange 'dzan sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis
yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'kher rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye ba mang

pa la phan pa dang/ rgyu ba mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten thugs brtse ba dang/ lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa

rdzogs pa 'a sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la sangs rgyas
kyisang pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'achang ngam/ 'dzan tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/
lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzinang dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom
0 ldan 'das rnams dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi
'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir sal bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par
'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin
dang/ drizadang/ lha ma la ni dang/ namamakha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lce 'phyargan po dang/ mdang/ mam yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyisam tshugs par
'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha sngangab dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis klogs/
rnyed par ma 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs[︽]dparam 'gyur te/ gang du yud la byas pa der bdud kyiris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cingadangs la/ dngangs bar 'gyur zhing/ phyogs
banur khres pa 'gyur// de la 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi tshig go/ sangs rgyas kyi chag chen po'i// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chog chen po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no// tad+ya thA/ buSh+Thasu bud+d+he/ ma hA bud+de/ a bud+d+he/ ta rba bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ but+tA ma te bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+hA/ a nu ma te/

kyi sat+'a bud+d+he/ a nu don to/ bud+d+he/ puSh+Tha bud+d+hA/ bud+d+hA/ bud+d+hA/ bud+d+hA/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+haM/ bud+d+haM/ bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa'ang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu
yid la bya ba na mdo'i ni chos bsgom pa'o// gzungs 'di sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yanano/ tad+ya thu shud
d+ha su shudad+he/ su shud d+he/ sho d+hani) saMshed+hani/ nirma le ma la ab ga te/ ga te sa mA d+hi taM ti/ ka me sam sa re/ sa sa ra pa ra a sho ka/ ba sho ke/ ba ka sha ma ni/ hU~Mte/ u pa
ti/ pra ti/ a ba b+ha sa/ san+d+ra pa spyi pa rim te// sazla d+harma pra timaN+Date/ ha ra ha ra/ na la ha ra/ tsa jatsar/ saMtsar/ tsa la tsa saM tsa la/ ta la ta la ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ni pa

tsha Ni: su ra Ni/ sam ri NaM/ ra Nam te lika d+ha re/ laka d+ha raN/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ (ka ra Da ra/ ro da d+ha/ ma hA ba dzaya/ bA hi// han han/ sam+ba bud+d+he: he phra ba tra sa/ sarba dzA pa ji/ sarba dzA pa

ra mitaM/ ma hA pra ti b+ha na/ saM pan+te/ saman+ta/ A la ki khud+d+ho/ ba lo/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti kiti/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ ba sa ra bas ra/ pra sa ra sam+b+ha she ka a ba ga te swA hA/
0 bcom ldan 'das kyis sas rgyas kyisAng gzus kyi tshes kyi rnam gras 'di bshad ma thag tu ridang gnas su bcas pa dang/ tshal rnamapa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyis 'ang g.yos/ ratu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po nga 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ra'i rgyal po ra rab ldog cing 'gul to//
bdud kyi gnas thams cad skug nas/ bdud kyisaMsakyi lha rnams dang/ bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid ma bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go/ sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par
mthong ba de dgags/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
lo zhes ched dang rjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par
gter nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad ragatu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig
yudag pa la// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dgan rib tu bshad pa las// skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos// rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang
rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi rigs rnamasan// lha dab rab tu dngangs shang 'khrugs par gyur// bdud pad ma bde sdug bsngal mya ngananon// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos
[I ]nas 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// nam mkhar gnas sa ma tog mnad 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngonod da gzhan rnams kyis// se mo de dang do shal sbos rnams dang// phyem

dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang// rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rang tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sams

mi brjedapa'i rgyan dang/ thos pa thams cad yongs su 'tshol bas mi ngoms pa'argyan dang/ chos zab mo rnam panges pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang

pa'i mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang/ ji ltar thos padang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams latshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyodapa'i rgyan dang ! sems can yongs su smin pa ra bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad

mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang/ rgyan de'ang sangs rgyus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang/ gzungs thob pa'i rgyun te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yonagyi rgyun du 'gyur ro//
gzungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun du yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi gzhi'i rig rnams yade la byas n/ las kyi sgribapa thams cad yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro/

pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan kyang thob bo// nad thams cad dang na nga thams cad la 'a ga nga sa byab par bya'o// bzlos brjod kyang dpag tu mad pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyus kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya puT+Ta ku Ta nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dasamatsho chen po ma dros pa na/ klu'i rgyal ba ma dros pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang sgrubs gcig tu bzhug
te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ skyo ba
gcig gis thogos pa/ sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ go chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshomamad pa sha stag
dang thabs cig go/ de'atshon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posang ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba/
btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyid cig
zlo/skud par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'am//
rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyid cig skyed par 'gyur zhes sang garnam par rtse ba khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ 3 ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa// shes rab dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol pa 'a ya shes mthong ba dpag tu
med pa ste/ song ge rnam par rtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod pa'i
rnam par smin pa de 'ang dpag tu med par shes bar bya'o// seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung/ longs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa
de dag thams cad na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi thog pa 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ brag pa chenapo 'am/ theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
'gyur ro// seng ge rnam par rtse ba dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthonganasasemAd bar gyur la/ dadaba' sems kyis rnyed pa dang/
na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad dang/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas shing/ ri mor byus te/ mchod cing
rjod la/ rim gror byas pa dang/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsral yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam
bar shes par bya ste/ bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba med do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yin patsho'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul khar phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas/ kar sha pa Na gcig
[#/ ]/tsam dbul bar phul la/ phulanas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang
nye bar 'gro/ stong gi cha dang/ 'bum gyi tshadang/ grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ bskrunapa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpa' bar du'ang ma bzod do// seng ge rnam
par rtse ba gang zhig gso de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/ brgya 'am/ la stongaya rung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
bsnyen bkur byas pa dang/ gang zhig gso de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la byang chub sems kyis yang dag par zin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
pa'i phyi ma tog 'ga' 'bul lam/ rlu snyam pa gang tsam 'thoraram/ phyug pa'i thig le si'am/ mi tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/ byug pa 'bul lam/ sos 'bul lam/ me tog
'a 'bul lam/ bdug spos 'bul lam/ 'phreng ba 'bul lam/ rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/ dugs 'bul lam/ dra 'bul lam/ dpyas pa 'bulalam/ rgyal mtshan 'bul/
lam ba dan 'bul lam/ das 'bul lam/ mar me 'bul zhing/ phul nas dga' ba'i soms kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag
'tshal lo/ zhes skya ba de dgan so ge rnam par rtse ba bskal par ram/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong du 'am/ bskal pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'grobar 'gyur ba de'i
gnas med de/ 'di la dogs pa'am/ yang gnyisasam the tsom 'bar ma bya'o// sang ge rnam par rtsi ba ma tog brtsegs ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa

dang/ skyo ba mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lha dang ma'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o// sang ge rnam par rtsa ba gang la la
zhig me tog brtsigs pa'i gzungs 'du 'dzan tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mde la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dag/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs
dran par 'gyuraro// de ngan 'gro log par ltungabar 'grobar ma'agyur/ dal brnyed par 'gyur/ nam du'ang dkon mchog gsum dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur ) nam du'ang sangs rgyus rjes su dran pa dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang byang chub kyi sems dang ma'abras
bar 'gyur ro/zhamadu'ang dab ngapo ma tshang bar ma'igyur/ nam du'ang rigs dma' bar skyabar ma 'gyur ) sbobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phunasum tshogs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams grangs med pa dag gisas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tad+yathA/ bla' Ni/ d+ha ran/ mun g+ha sa re/ sid+d+ho/ tsats+tshaN/ nam tsani ha re
a rog gti/ bud+d+ha ma tid+hare/ oM ra te/ ga ga ra te rA dza ba rta/ bshu la bud d+ho/ d+harma a ba b+has/ akA yakal/ kal bti ( am ko l+li hU~MkAsha no/ te dzo ba taM/ ni ngasaMhiti/
te dze gru ba/ tin dri yi bud d+has// seng gernam par rtsa ba gang la la zhag gis me tog btsugs pa'i gzungs 'di'i ming dang/ ya gi dang/ tshig mtha' dag shes te kun chub par byed pa des/
zlo/dpyid zla tha chung dang/ dbyar zla ra ba dang/ ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo'itshes brgyadanas bzungal/ bco lnga'i bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
gsum bsam zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la sposadang/ ma tog dang/ mar ma dang/ bdug spos kyis mchod nas ngas rgyas bcom
lta ldan 'das bad+ma'asnying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing/ chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs rab tu thebapar 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan par
'gyur/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// thos pa thams cad dang/ bstan bcos thams cad
dang/ bzo thams cad dang/ las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa 'a bden pa bzhi nas gtogs so// de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa 'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pasang ge rnam par brtsi ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' de dag dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'a'ajig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngonab ra bstod de//
'phags pa ma tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bam la nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma
med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i
ra la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsalapa/ blo gros rnam par dgang/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin ga shegs
pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dgapa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ phan pa'i dngos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// byams pa yongs su
kyi dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgage/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// sAng rje yongs su dag pa dang/ dga' yongs su dag pa dang/ btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
yongs su dag ge/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yongashesamathong ba yongs su dag nga sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'o ngos su dug go/ blo gros rnam
par dag pa/ stobs yongs su dag pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa sa de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgupa la/ su zhigam tog dang/
tshal 'phreng ba dang/ sbos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyu mtshan la sogs pa dang/ la mo'i sgra dang/ byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de 'a bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par zhus te/
de'i mtha' ni sdig pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par/ bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyi zhen/
blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dam pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba'ang tshad mdado// mtha'anas so// bsam
gyis mi khyab bo// mtshungs pa med de// grangs med do// dpag gsam langago brjod du med de/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te

'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bas stang du byed pa dang/ bla mar byed ba dang/ ri mor byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ rjed pa dang/ phyi ma 'tsho phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gsheg pa yos
su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsral lus 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ ri mor byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ yang dag par sems mnyam
par bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ phyag byed pa dang/ bsti stang byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ ri mor byed pa dang/ rjed nga ra byed
pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ ga sol ba dang/ bsngags pa dang/ skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shesang rabyasto/ lnga gang zhin/ dran po dang ldan ng ra 'gyur
ba dang/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ ngo tsha shes shang khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ mthong nas kyang dadapo
spyod par 'gyur ste/ ban bon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o/ de nas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang/ de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi bo de dag yongs su 'dzan par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanon/ bdud dang bdud
kyi sa kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na// sa che ba dang/ btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang/ phyi ma'i dus na
dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pasangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur bsta/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/
byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dgapa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thig pa la
yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa brgyud de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha ngasal btsugasanas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs
ba snyan bu chen ngo 'o tshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sa skya legs bar brgyan ba de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus theb par gyur cig ces de ltar mos ba ba skyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa//
bsod nams kyi phung po ra'amatha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid
dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zadapar byar mi nus so//
re ci' ra zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab ba yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam
par dag pa// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong du 'jug gam/ gtsug la ga khang ngam/
grong khyer du 'jug kyang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu'arung/ 'chag byung rung/ 'greng yang rung/ 'dug kyang rung/ chos ston kyang rung/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can rtsa 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri ba 'am/ lha ma yan nam/ mamakha' ldang ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen/
dpe'am/ mi'am/ min yan pa las/ shang ngan/ ri'am/ khung bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
legs su 'dud pa dang/ rab tu 'dud pa dang/ kun tu 'dud par ma byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhinagashegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thums cad dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/ grong khyeraram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na sgrub la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud//
kun tu 'dudabar 'gyu'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tsha' la// a ma ma te dra b+he/ ma hA pra b+he/ pra b+ha ba ti[Y]prab+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba te/
pra b+ha ba ti/ bra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ prab+ha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das mgrus bstan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma
chag ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ tsati ti/ ti/ smani/ smra ti/ ti/ sgo ti/ ti ti/ ts+tshati ma hAn+titi/ ma hA smiM ti/ ma sU ti/ ma yA[']
chags pa ma mnga' ba gti mug bsal du gsol/ som/ so ma/ so mo/ somo/ som/ som/ so ma/ so mi/ som/ so ma/ so ma/ so mi so ma na skya mu pa sna ka/
so ma na su mu pa nam/ gom nas mu pa na ya/ so ma na rgya mu pa na ya/ so ma na sumu pa na ya/ som na sa mu pa yi// som nas chu pan ya/ so ma na su chu pa na ya/ so man bya mu pa na
ya/ som nas mu pan ya/ go kha na kha/ sha la yi sha la/ ga ba ga laM/ na ba sha la/ shi kha ga la/ zhi bar gyur cig/ nad medabar gyur cig/ bgegs med par gyur cig/
prab+ha ba ti/ ma hAm skye/ ra[à ]/ ra/ ra/ ra gli/ ra:/ ra/ ra[à ]/ rat+thaM/ rasmiM/ rahUM/ ra/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang
gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang/ bcom ldan
bzhi chen 'khrigs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen ma tog dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chenam gru dang/ bco ldan 'das ma 'khrugs pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang/ bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang/ bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang/ bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang/ bcom ldan
'das rin chen 'od dang/ bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang/ bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang/ bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang/ bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral
@#/ ]ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das zla bdakar dang/ bcom ldan 'das mang 'od dang/ bcon ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang/ bcom ldan
('das 'od dbag med dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chenamatha' yas dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang/ bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang/
