ba com ldan 'das pad+ma'i sdodang/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang/ bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang/ bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang//
sgyu bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ bcom ldan 'das gsar lta bu r snang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po
dang ! bcom ldan 'dasam rtog dang/ bcom ldan 'das spros thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'phrang ba'i rgyal po dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpa'i bstan pa'i sdo dang
bcom ldan 'dasamatshon cha grong dang ! bcom ldan 'das dang la gyi snying po nor bu rin tshanasnang dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang/ bcom ldan 'das song ge sgra dang/
bcom ldan 'das sang ge dbang phyug rgyal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang/ bcom ldan 'das snying pas zil gnonadang/ bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i
rgyal po dang/ bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgronam dang/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das/
sgug byed dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang/ bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag
mong sprul 'od dang/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das phyug rin chen mchog dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang//
bcom ldan 'das byar ma ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang/ bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa rnyes pa dang/ bcos ldan 'das nyi zla sgron
ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das lhun po dang ! bcom ldan 'das lhun po chon pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang/ ba com ldan 'das shan tu lhun po dang/ bcom ldan
'dasar lta bu 'o// tad+ya thA/ pa ta pa tu ) da ma da ma )lha ma g+ha ma swA hA/ shar phyogs legs nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa
gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gas kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang/ zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ lho phyogs legs na sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal la// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang/ zhi bar srung du gsol/ nub
phyog logs nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nang med pa dang/ zha bar sung du gsol/ byung
phyogs lags na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs 'dren dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad mang pa dang/ zhi bar srung du gsolo/ 'og gi phyogs
logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang/ zhi bar srung ngu gse la/ stong gi
phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad mad pa dang/ zhi bar bsrung du gsol/
phyogs 'tshams legs na sangs rgyus ldan 'das gangadag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nang me da pa dang/ zhi bar srung du
gsol/ tad+ya thA/ nga ma le ba ma lA/ ka ro bi ma la saM b+ha be sa// bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bim le/ bim le/ bi ma le/ ba sa le/ ba ma la//
bi ma le/ bi ma le/ ba ma lA ka re/ ba ma mA ka sbe/ bi ma la ka de/ ba ma lA ka re/ ba ma lA ka re/ bam lA ka de/ bi ma la ka'o// bam lA ka ri/ pim la/
sa mung+ga te/ bam la sa mung+ga te/ ba ma la sa mung+ga te/ bam lA sa mung+ga te/ ba ma lA sa mung+gate/ bum lA sa mung+ga te/ bam lA sa mung+ga te/ bam la sa mung+ga te/
ba ma lA sa mung+ga te/ rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags tshe// lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na// nang rnams las ni yongs su thar//
mi ma yin gyis gang byas dung// sdig pa gang dug sbyor byas sgrol// de dag dran pa brjed ma 'gyur// gzung ba rnams kyang chud ma za// de dag skye ba rnams su yang// rtag
tu sangs rgyas 'bral ma 'gyur// su zhig drim mdapa'i gzungs// 'di ni dug bas 'dzin par byed// zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba rnams // dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por
'byung// mtshan rnams kyis na legs par brgyan// yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung// tad+ya thA/ ku Ta ku Ti/ ku ta tsa lo// a la e la/ mut+ta/ kong g+ha la/
a rari/ ram ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang/ lha dang/
mdang/ lha ma yan dang/ dra zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dri
med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsanadan saM ga nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tsan
don gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pa rab tu mang/
pa dang/ gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham ma/ lhan n/
lhang nger bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po snga na ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i phyi ma snyed 'das pa na/
tsan dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar mang bzhugs
te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'isams can de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asas rgyus tsan nag yin lag nges/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzud kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs/
pa'ad thos nas phyir mi ldog ste/ sdig pa dang bral bzhin byang chub kyi sems dang ma 'bral lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang/ de bzhin gshegs/
pa mar ma mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ gzhan yang 'angs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te ngas
kyang da khyed rnams la bshad kyis/ sams can thams cad rjes su gzungaba'aphying legs par rab tu yid la zung zhig dang/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos
rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mchod rten 'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la rku
phrog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas che ba/ slob dpon dang mkhan po sing nga dag 'byung ste/ de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir tsan dan gyi yan
]lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhisangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nga la nyonacig/ de nas byang chub sems/
dpa'i spyan ras gzags dbang phyug dang/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
soms dpa' chen pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang sams can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams la thugs brtse ba dang/ sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i sud du/ bcom ldan 'das
bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi a khas gzhi de dag gzung bar
bgyi ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshadapar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tsirA
te/ ma rI tsAke/ dur dam/ dur dAn ti/ dur ra na/ pra bi'i/ tsan da naM ga dze/ sa man par sho d+hani/ bi shud+d+ha shA le ! tsa rat+tA ba ti/ a na tsar+ya pra ti b+hA ne/
sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi te/ b+ha ga nga// pA pakA ye/ Ang+gashAm/ pa ra pA ra ya swA hA: rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'di
dag 'dzinaMtam/ klog gam/ ston tam/ kun chub par byengan/ de'i tshe 'ong nyid la mo rna4 par dag par 'gyur ro// thos ma thag tu sdug pa'i las las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlangs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba byed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug dang/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshams rtse da pa lta'i sdig pa byas pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ skye pa dran par 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang
du skye bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag chen po skyed pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams rbad dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ltar sa chen pa ma lus pa 'di ni grum par 'gyur yang srid/ rgya mtsho ni bsam

yang srid/ de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur ya nga sring/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang sring/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa'i snying du ltung yang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pa gnyis kyis
mnan du rung yang sring/ man chur 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gaMzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas
gab// gsus shing byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ma srid do// sus kyang bskyod pa 'am bsgul bar mi nus so// 'du lo nibadud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par ma 'gyur
ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo sAmaras gzigs dbang phyug gas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'adus bdag gis
kyang gzungs 'di'i tshog bshad par bgyi'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa 'am/ sangs rgyus kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
(bgyis te/ me togasalam gtor la/ tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ zla ba tshes nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing/ gos kyang 'a na gsum
du brjes te/ kha zas bsrag bya 'tshal zhing gso sbyong dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad lasams snyoms pa dang/ zla ba lta'anyin par zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis te/ rtswa bam gyi stong du
la mchis shing/ rtswa bam btang ba'i stong du nyal lasems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing/ ma tog dri zhim pa lan brgya stong du gter nas sa g.yo b.ra'agyur/ bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa 'og dpag med dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/ gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/ thos pa 'dzan par yang 'gyur/
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byung ba'agyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'astsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang nubasams dpa' de dag dang/ thams cad dang
ldan ba'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa
tsanadan gyi ban lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yapra ti tus mud+ma dba' sdod a rA ga Ni: bod skad du/
'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub semasadapa'athams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ [u0f7c]/chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni// rgyu la 'gog
ba gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba dge sbyong/ tshig 'di sgrub pa'i chogani/ sems can rnams la phan byed nga/ las kun grub nga ra
byed pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir// dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan la// gus shing dang ba'i sems bsrung nas// bcom ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rten 'brel zab mo chog bshad// thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs// dang po 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa// 'di ltaralas dang nyon mongs yod
rgyun// sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la// las dang nyon mongs med na'akhorab las kyang ldog/ bdonapa 'di yas bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig/
po sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lego/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal go/ rang
sangs rgyasa rnams la phyag 'tshal go dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa 'byung chub sems
dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal la// brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams gyi smanapa rnams la phyag 'tshal lako/ nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal la/

'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA[']a/ o yid+harma he tu prab+ha bA he tun+te nAn wA ga te rgyab data/ te ShAny+tsa yo naro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH A hA/ las rnams kun gyi tshog la// tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag brjod// bsamasgyu rang gi lag ma thal la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras// ma yi
khams bzhugs pa bsgoms/ do'i lha dag rjes su dran// de ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de// rim po bzhin du so sor bstan// rims kyis btab nas na ba dang/ klad pan dang mig nad dang// kho
nad la sogs nad rnamasal// tshigs bcad 'di dang sAng po 'di// mang por bzlas shing langs nas na/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbyung ba'i thabs su byab par bya/
nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyan gsum dang/ nyin bzhi rtag pa'i rims rnams la// bu mo gzhononus bkal ba ya// skud pa dkar po sum
bsil la// bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul du btags na bde bar 'amo/ nad la phan pa'i smanA rnams la// gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlus shing gtang// skung
nang rtsib logs na ba dang// khongon nad rnams ci yod// chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas// blung na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur// nad la phanapa'i sman rnams la// bzlas shing
btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur// g.yan pa da na'i khrum bu dang// thol mig dang nimarengs lag/ grego tshang sa la snying po 'di// mang du bzlas te btab na 'tsho// gzhang 'brum gzhang nad/
zagu dang// mtshan skungasashing nab la// skyor pa'i kha d+ha ril bu 'am// byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la// nyi shu bzlas shang bskus na phan// nad kyi rnam pa gang na yang//
nad tshabs che chung tshod brtags nas// tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la// mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas su/ lus la khyab cing bzlasan ban// 'khru bag nad kyi sa btab pa la/
'a @#// smananam la bu kha zas la// bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang// khong du btang na phan par 'gyur// de ya bzlas brjod snga ma ste// 'di dag rab tu bzlas par

[D] bya na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ya d+hamahe tu bra b+ha bA he tun+tewan thA ga te bya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH sAhA/ de dag bzlas na nang rnams 'tsho// de na nang rnams 'tsho/
ba 'o// de nasal nga ni bka' stsal pa// nas dang gro dang sran ma dang// 'bras dang sran chung mon srin dang// shing thog rgun 'brum a ru ra// de dag kun la za ba yi// srin bu sdur bu phyo/
ma leb// bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang// lo tog za ba kha bcing na// zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang// bye ma sa dang thal ba la// bzlas brjod brgyu ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// zhing dang shing thog
gtor byas na// de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur// ha cang char pa ches pa na// bcom ldan 'das la phul baya// ma tog dman ma re re la// bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byu/
ba gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu// bum pa gang ba'i stong dag tu// kham bor gtsang ma'i nang du yang// ma rtog gtsang ma bzlas pa de// bsregs na char
pa chad par 'gyur// sor ba drag po 'ong ba na// sa banying phrag lcag ma la// bzlas brjod brgyani rtsa brgyad bzlas/ gser ba gang nas g.yo nges su// klangal bsor zhing byabs na 'chad//
yang na thal chen yungs kar la// bzlas brjod brgya na rtsa brgyad bya// thum po byas te lcag ma la// btags te btsugs na ser ba chad// 'byung po sha za yi dgas dang// brjed byed
gdon gyis zinapa la//dkyil 'kher 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa gtsangam la bzhag ste// gu guladud pas bdugs nas kyang// yungs kar ga nga bur tsan dan dang// glo rtsa la sogs sman
sbyar te// bzlas brjod brgyu ni rtse brgya bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar// ngakyil 'khor de yan du bzhug/ bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sangs rgyas sku bsal byas
po'i chus// bkru 'ang byung na rab tu phan// rang dang gnod pa kun las tharo// 'byung po brjed byed sha za yas// grags kyang rod par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa
la/ ga'i wang lan sngags bzlasanas// sangapo stobs chen 'di bris gdags// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la// ha nang hapa tsa brnyanas ya dza NaM/ laM po da ra/ uts+tshaklu kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA
gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags// de bzhinayungs kar dag la yang// bzlas brjod byas te gtums la gdags// mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pan// yungs kar dang ni
gu gul la// sngags gnyis lan na bdun bdun bzlas// dud pas bdug na 'tsho bar 'gyur// de la the tsomam za'o// bus pa gan dang nang las thar// bud med bun thogs gyur
na// chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas// bludan legs par btsa' bar 'gyur// bud mad mo gsham bu med la// sangs rgyas sku bsal byas pa'i chu// de
la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya// khrus byas lus n gtsang ma la// chu de byung na bu tsha'aphar// rigs brgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// sung pa dang na bas kyi rgyu
grwar// bzlas brjod bdun bzlas ma dud pa bdun// mdung cing bzlas te song ba na// bde ba'agrozhing don yang 'grub// dgra dang ltazhi mid par 'gyur// yid ni gzhungs par 'dod
pa na shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la// mar srang sum brgya drug cu la// bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang// bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrug/ zhim re re la gcig tu/ shudag
zlog na dum re dang/ dmarasrang dgana'i ri la// bzlas brjod re re bzhang bza'// de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur// de bzhin ba'i sor sku ma'i// mar dang 'o ma dag las nga// bkas
dbalta brjod rgyun rtsa brgyad du// bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'// yid gzhungs pa yimchog tu 'gyur// mi dang 'grogs shing mdza' 'dodon// gang dag yod dang 'thad pa 'a ma
tog dang ni rtswa shing ngam// 'bras bu 'am ni 'ji ba dag lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug/ bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab// gang gi lag tu byon pa// de dang rtag tu mdza' bar
'gyur// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun/ 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na// chu dang yus kar bcas pa la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// de la gtor na sos par
'gyur// yang na yus kar ba brgyad la// bzlas pa'athum po mgul du gdags// de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na// yus kar la na bzlas brjod
byang/ thum po byas te mgo la gdags// bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas// mnad dang na phyugs nad kun// ma yang mad cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni//

'di dag kun tu rgya cheragasungs// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM yaM d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thAgato ba data/ te Shany+tsayo ni ro d+ha o babA dI mahA shra ma Na sA/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/
na bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gnod pas cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dam chos yongasasu gzung bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
ngas ma ma khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la ngang pas yid ches na// 'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'agrub
pa ra 'gyur// ston pa shAkya thugs rje 'di// dge slong zer ba rak+Sha tes// tho gar yul nas)dang ste// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar// 'phagasapa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying
po choga'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/ Ats+tshapra ti t+ya sa mud+mad na mam hAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du//
'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhes bya ba theg pa chen nge 'a mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa sadapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na/ ar mo ni ka lta bu'i rdo leb la tshodang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang/ 'phags pa byams pa dang/
'phags pa nas gzigs dbang phyug dang/ phyag na rdo rje lasogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang/ mamadzod kyi
bdag po tshangasaM pa chen po dang/ srod mod kyi bu dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ dri za'i rgyal bo zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang thabs cig
tubazhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sanas/gzig dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lcang ra rab kyi
mo la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag na mchod
rten bgyid par 'tshal bsha stag ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'daremachisan/ ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang/ lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa// tshangs pa/
dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa skya dgu las/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shani
chu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su

bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ oM ya d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na/ chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gog gang
yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka'astsal te// dag sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yan te/ sus rkyen cing 'brel par 'byung bamathong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'as/ rigs
kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhag gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni skya ru ra'i 'brutsam/ srog shing na khabatsam/ gdugasan ba ku la'i mi rtog tsam zhig byas la/ rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad panang du bcug na/ des tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas sha'i thos shange 'chi ba'i/
dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/
thams cad d ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
sgyu de/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// @#// rgya garaskad du/ Ar+ya dzAnolta nA ma d+hAr
thoNi sarba ga te pa ra go na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzus/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su slong ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sos
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshol la// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsigs/
snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpalagazus kyidabang phyug rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpar lag na rdo rje/
dadang ! byang chub sems dpar bzhi po de dag dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga
la bzhugs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas/ de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rinapa tshabakod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa rnams dang/ khang pa
brtsags pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan btsugs pa de dag ga nang na byang chub sems dpa'ade dag 'khod pa'ang mthong ngo// de nas lha'i bu zlub dang nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig soms te//
ji ltar byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ byang nubasems dpa' 'di rnams las sams can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang/ mun pa mun gnag bsal ba'i phyir/
shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus/ bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang ba byedapa thob par 'gyur zhig ga snyam mo// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang
chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa// myud ya the dan/ tsakAshur dad/ tsaklu kAb+ha/ rU la ma thA/ ka lad grwa/
ad tid thA nas/ su da tA/ su rad tra/ sung thA ya/ id thanas/ de lA de ma Ni/ tsa ru mAtani/ A ra Ni/ A ra Ni/ kA lu pa Ni 3 kA la pa Ni/ tu ru du sa/ tu ru nga si/

d+hu su taM/ b+hu su taM/ d+hi ro d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hur/ kA la kA la/ sad b+ha sa/ gI la gA lagAl pa ya/gi la pa u0f38/d+hu su d+hu su/ sun d+hu sunang+g+ha/ sid thAs/ yang tha su/ i bA su !/ oM shA swa ba ni/
tshulu dza re d+he/ su d+ha pe/ ka ra ka ra/ ka kA/ ku ru ku ru/ kurma ku[& ]/ ku rma pA Ni kurma Ni/ ke lu ke lu/ ke lu ban/ ke'ong ni/ kanAraM/ kacha ri/ lA bung dz+he/ d+hu ru d+he/ d+hu ru
d+he/ ma hA d+hu ru d+ho/ ka ra ka ra/ ka ra ka ri/ pa shus/ padu sa/ d+ha sa ng+ha su/ ha su tha su/ hasA pa ni sA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ lha'i bu zla ba dang lha mo/
rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 'di na soms can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa 'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs pa yin te/
rigs kyi bu ngag su dum b.ra'i me tog ni chos redapar sa'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba de lta ma yin no do/ rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches
rnyedabar sa'i / 'di dag na 'chang ba 'am klog pa ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba na chos rnyed par sa'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta
ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar med pana'akhod ba bskal par gnas pa/ mtshams med pa la byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa' sems can de dag gi phyir//
gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjong na/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gamathus/ sems can ngamyal ba chen po
mnar mang pa kha brgyar 'gyes par 'agyur la/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar par 'gyur na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/ gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag
gis na/ bdag cagan de bzhin gshegasapa bzhi po rnams dung/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no snyam du yongs su shes pa kho
nAr bya sta/ 'di la som nyi 'am yid gnyis bskyod par mi bya'o// tad+ya thA/ d+hu na Ni/ d+hu na Ni/ ma hA dUn Di/ su ru su ru su dA/ 'u klu bi sho d+hani/ ta ra tA ra swA hA/ d+d+ho tidi

pa/ tu ru tu ru spu da/ pad+ma mA la ni/ sang skya ta ra bud+d+haM/ gu ru shu ru swA hA/ sad tu bud+d+haM/ sad r+ya a ba loki na/ ka ra ka ra/ ki'i ki ri sa ha/ d+ha nga na bu Ta a pra ti ha ta/ bud+d+haM/ tsu ngu tsu ru swA hA//
lakA Na tsati shu ma pa/ ga re duru ra/ khu ru lu ru sAmA/ 'ad+mar/ mar/ d+mar d+har/ d+har yan+tiya swA hA/ subra/ su mde/ a pra ti ha ti/
[I ]bud+d+haM d+har d+ha ra/ d+harayaniyaM sa ! bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar gyi 'ong brtsegs snang ba laphyag 'tshal la'o/
de bzhin gshegs pa bdenagasung la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sa sogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// snga shu/ 'phags pa ya shes ta la la zhes bya ba gzus
rgyu'agrob thams cad yongasas sdong ba rdzogs so// rgyu ga= skabadu/ AranAhIn hin+danAnA ma d+hA ra Ni: bong sang du/ 'phags pa
sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzus ) sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'athums cad laphyag 'tshal lo// 'ang skad bangag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od: bram zesa'i dbang po dposhangs la chen po lta bu 'aganas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la
chen po lta bu s/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'ong ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu
'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shangasA la chen ba lta bu s/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa
rdzogs pa 'dis ngas rgyas kun tu 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus bdag ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon 'a ma btab lags na/ gang gis bdag
su ba dran par 'gyur/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par ma 'gyur ba'i thabs de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad/
du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis/ bram zesa'i dbapo tshor g.yel chen po lta bu la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smonan/ de'i phyir kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shag dkun chub par
gyis shig/ kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ tad+yathA/ a mongan/ phramod na/ ba mo dan/ sam mo da na/ pra yA ka ra Ni shul kar Ni/
bo d+hika ra Na/ a nut+tar/ s+yan samyaka saM bud+d+haka ra Ni/ a nut+tar Ar+ya karaNi/ anut+tar pradzA ka ra Ni/ a nut+tar ba shAka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra bshA ka ra Ni/ a nutu seh+pha kre shapa ke sha
ba d+ha ra Ni daa ba ngu na d+ha ka ra b+ha d+ha ma ni/ a nut+tar badz+dzu sha lokongadang/ anuts+tsha rab kas bang tsa ra Na/ ba martag pa ga Na/ saM b+ha d+ha naM/ a nut+tA ra sa ku sha la/mu
'ad+d+han+d+ha na/ anur la b+ham mu lan/ anut+ta rA ga nga 'a mo hon mA lan/ anut+tar sho kA ma Na a bad+d+ha en kare bid+ham Ni/ a nut+ta rA si a pa taha ta ba la tsaka/ anut+ta ra sam+balA ra ba

dmanI/ tAM hipA dI a nut+tarA bal b+ha dra su b+ha dra'u b+ha dre anut+tar b+ha dro/ sa man+ta b+ha dra/ a sa ma sam b+hang a nut+ta ra ma hApa ru kha b+ha dra/ anut+ta ra ma hA pu ra bas b+hikA/ anut+tar mahApa
ru ShA a nu brtan/ anut+tar ma pa ra 'am de sha ka/ an skyur ma hA pu ra 'a/ d+harma ko ShA/ sa phyi kA/ anut+taram hApa ra Tani Na/ a nut+ta pra tA ra sha ga/ taha b+ha d+he saMg sa ta pak+Sha/

samyaka saM bud+d+he/ a sa ba b+habataju ba phul kro d+has ta so mi ta bi NA tu pra shasku/ bu 'di ni kun tu 'ong kyi 'ogi sngags kyi sung pa yin te/ de bas na bu khyod kyis kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying
pa 'di 'gro ba dang/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dul pa dang la ba na'i nga yi nga la gyis shag bu gang la la zhig kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po'ang ming dang/ rigs dang/ rigs kyi bye brag pa
la byed dus/ skyes pa 'am/ bung mang ngam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am lha 'am lhamo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ dri ba 'am/ dri zamo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma ra ni mo 'am/
0/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'am/ lto 'phya chen po 'ag/ lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ yi dgas sum/ yi dgas mo 'am/ sha za 'om/ sha za mo 'am/ grul bum mam/ gru
bum mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi sung po 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ lung 'bog gam/ ston tam/ 'chang na de tshe rabs
bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi marjod par 'gyur ro// lhar gyur kyang rung/ mir gyur
kyang rung ste/ de mtshonama'am/ dug gam/ chu 'am/ mas bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rgyal 'ad/
sungs kyi rigs dang bcasapa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba'i 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus 'od chen rgyu la ba 'od sungs kyi rogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
lo bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ra rdzogs nga 'a sangs rgyas 'ongamanyam pa med pa rgyal ba'od srangs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dasayapa/

kyi: dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ongam mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang 'dab ma rgyal ba 'ong sangs kyi 'gas dang bcas pa la phyagaM 'tshal la// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po yod/
sras kyi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
[– ]skang cesangaka' stsalanas/ bram zesa'i dbang patshonapo shangs la chen po lta bu yarangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sa'i dbang pa
chen po zhes bya ba'i gzus rdzogs so @#// bod skad du/ 'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// 'di skad bdag gis shes
azla pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ba sha la' snga'u rdzong gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa/ de'i tshe brgya byi'i lha'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
bcom ldan 'das bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te/ bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyuran )bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun
ring por pan ba dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka'/
stsal to// de'i phyir ko'u shi ka khyed kyis nga'i snying pa gdon ma za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di long zhig tad+ya thA u rtsapa/ nadra sa/ urupar/ hu le pUme/ da khu ma/ pra
ga ma A gats+tsha mam yu ra nA ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang/'tshe ba thams cad dang// 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa la sus shig srungs shig @#/sadra kA yo bgo ma no @ra te sA
ba com ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang/ ba rgya byin lha'i dbang po yid dga' sto/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la rjes su Arangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la mge bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// rdzogs so/// @#// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadang
bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra dang 'dzugs pa kun las brgal// rnam par gzigs na gzi brjidi tshe// rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor re// thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang/
leg dad sal ba'i stobs nyid dang// gser thub kyin bslab pa dang// 'dasungasakyi ni yon tan dang// shAkya thubapa brtson 'grus kyis// bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog tang thu/
dza yan+ti/ bi dza yin dza ye bi dza ye/ dza tits+tsha ti/ a ba ra dza ti/ par son mdzanI yo sA/ gzhan gyis ma thug pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so//
rgya gar skang ngu ar+ya a nan+ta ma kha ni hAr nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo ma tha2yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs saTas rgyas dang byang chub sems
du do' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can/ tshal chen po' khang pa btsugs pa'i khang bzang na/ dge slong brgyad stong
tshi[]ga dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems ngapa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'ang deg 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing/ mkhyen bzhin du tsha'i 'du byed rnams gtang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen be khyod song la/ stong ge'ajig rten gyi khams na dge slong ji skad gnas pa de dag thams cad tshul chen po'i khang pa brtsigs
pa 'a khang bzangs 'dir sdus shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'angs kyi ltar mnyan nas/ skad cig de
nyidal rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'jug ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/ bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag/ 'jig rten khams
'dir gnas pa kun nyon cikA/ deng 'dir ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs kyis// gang dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir gshegs shag/ de'i tshe rgyal chen pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang
bzangs su dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ! sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ bangag gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
bya ba gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thug pa can nam/ thog pa chen po'ang dung

ste/ ngage song ji srung gnas pa de ngag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzangs su 'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya gor mchag snyamago//de nas tshe/
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'as byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams na nyan thos kyi thig pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyus kyi thog ba cananam/ theg pa chen po canamang 'du ste/ dge slong nga nyid gnas pa de dag thams cad
tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzas su 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nga byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig de nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
la bka' stsalapa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang 1 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems
dpa'achon po ngan song tham sa cing song ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa'achen pa mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'dzoms pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pa
tsha sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dracan gyi 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mun pa nges par
'joms pa'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mthu chen thob dang/ byang chub
sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang/ byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen ngo spros kyi glang po che dang/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sams dpa' chenapo dpa' bo dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od/
dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po yu shes tog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyu
mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po rdo rje snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
mkha'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rludang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsalapa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed deng la/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyus kyi zhing
gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dban/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dang/ skya ba gcig gis thogs pa dang/ phyir ma ldog pa 'am/ ma skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'am/ dad pas
mos pa ji snyang gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'akhang pa bdugs pa'i 'ang zangs 'dir sras shig/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' so mas dpa' chen bo de dag
gas bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar ma nyan te/ bcom ldan 'das legs se legs so zhes gsol nas/ skad cig de nyid lo ltas lta ba byas te/ ltas de byas pas tshal chen po'i khang pa bcug
pa'i khang ba zangs su byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pabyab khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa 'i brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag lhagasapar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' so
) ba gcig gis thogs pa byi ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu stong phrag dgu bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cudang/ byang chu ba
sa mas ngang 'a sems dba' chen po ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag kha sum cu dang/ byang chub sems dpa'as mas dba' chen po dang
tshalus pas mos ba phye lAg TAg 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag brgyud lhags par gyur to// de dag thams cad lhags te bcom ldan 'das mtheng nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bas
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mthong
nas/ skad cig de 'dul 'di snyam du sems te/ zhus pa lung bstan pa ji lta bu s/ byang chub sems dparasams dpa' chen po 'di dag gis som nyi thams cad stong bar 'gyur ba dang/

sgrib pa mang pa'i ye shes stobA pa myur du thob par 'gyur bdang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus thams cad/
la chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing/ ban med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du ba nga par
mi 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub nyams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sbyong pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur bste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'ang lta ste/
sems can yongs su dag pa dang/ chos yongs su dag pa dang/ smon 'a ma yo ngas su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag ba ste/ de dag rjes su thob pa
'gyur ba dang gya nom pa yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi rjesu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gong zha na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yid du 'ong ba dang/ ngag yid du 'ong ba dang sems
yid du 'ong bdang/ skye ba yid du 'ong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bsha 'thob par 'gyur ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgom bezad pas bsgrubs
ga/ pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po la mkhas pa'agazungs kyi sgor 'jugapadang/ las dang rnam pa smin pa 'tshamakhas pa 'dus ma byas
kyigazungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang/ chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rjesasu thob par 'gyus de lta bu zhu ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas la/
bdagags zhu gor ma chag snyam mo// denas tshadang ldan ng bar dwa ti'i bus zhu badziskadasmosapa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltarayang 'byas pa/ nga lta kun chub par byas pa de dag/ sas rgyas bcom
lce ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to// 'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das zhu ba ji yang sgosapa/ ji ltarab zub/ ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/ ji ltar kun chub bar bgyis
zla 'di dug gis/ byang chub sems dpasoms dpa'achen 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'u la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
ba la don 'di zhu b.rasams pa khyed la dang legs so// shA ra'i bu de phyiro khyod legs par rab tu nyon layang la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bus
bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// de bzhin no zhes gsogate/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyanabang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'dasad ces bka' su to/ shA 'bu
'a 'khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an po gang chos thams cad khas ma yinacing 'dzin pa'amubyed pa des/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyis ya mtshan mkhas kha tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o/
tad+yatha/ o la chem Ne/ akhe mkhe mu khe/ sumananu'i/ rdzogatisoms sa rgya mu/ so to yut+taM/ niruk+ta/ nar kyi bya ste/ hol 'akal/ kalngasasu su wa/ hi yige
la ha/ hu le he le hi le/ hil shul/ ha la/ ma hA lo/ de la tu tsaN+NaM/ tsawano/ tsar tsar Ne/ a tsam tsale/ a nan/ an ga te/ danan mu khe/ a ra
napaNe/ narbapaNe/ nir tshan/ nad+ha na/ d+ha ma d+han/ nihA re/ hAre/ bi ma la/ ba 'od// lo khogod+han pa gti/ dIb na/ byA wa/ na phyu ba/ bib+ha na !/ sa sad+d+haM/ as/
re nga ma/ sham/ bamalo/ bamal pany+tsa/ tsanAkor Ni/ d+hi'i d+hi d+hi ri/ mahA d+hi d+hi/ yabye mgowa taM/ tsale/ a tsal/ ma la/ sam tsal pad sanas su wa ra//
a sang+ga/ a sang+ga ba tA re/ a sang+ganihAr/ ni dzA re ba ma le/ nad ra shod+ha ne/ drin so mi/ sbra'i sbra ma/ sbrum wa ti/ mahA pra ste/ sa man+ta pra b+he/ b.rul pra b+he/ bopa sIsam+b+ha wa
mu le saza rku nu ga te/ ane/ anats+li r+ya pra tits+tshan/ rU ra Ni d+har ni/ d+harmani d+ha ne/ d+harman d+han go lnga saman+tab+ha dre/ sarA Na bu ga ta shrI da ya/ a d+hi' na a d+hiT+Thi ti
swahA A ra'i bu byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chenapa gzungs 'a de dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rnyomasams su mi byed/ dmigs par mi bying
smong par s khyed btang snyoms su mid/ 'dzin par mi byed/ rtsom par ma byed/ de dag thob par bya ba dang/ spang par bya bdang/ bsgom par bya ba dang/ rnam par 'phakhar byu
ba'i ram byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mkhyed/ mtshungs par ldan pa'ichos rnams kyang ma mthong/ ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong [. ]chosa rnams kyi rgyu ba'ang mi
mthong/ 'gog pa'ang ma mthong/ 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthobam 'ongs pa'ichos rnams kyang mi mthong/ da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong/ chos rnams
kyi 'thal ba dang 'grigapa'ang mi mtheng/ chos gang yang sogs par yang ma byed/ 'grib pa mang mkhyad/ rnam par rig par yang mi byedapar sangs rgyus rjesasu dran pa 'ba'azhig
sgom sta de sgom pan gzugs su ma yin/ gzugs mad par mayan/ mtshan ma yin/ mtshan med par ma yan dpe byad bzang bor ma mAni/ dpe byang bzang ngam du
par ma yin/ rnam par shes par ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/ nyon mos par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/ tshul khrims su ma yin/ tshul khrims med
pa ma yan/ tang de'adzin du ma yani/ ting 'dzin med par ma ya ni/ shes rab tu ma yin/ shes rab mad par ma yin/ rnam par grol bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba mdapa
yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yan/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mad pa ma yin/ skyo bar ma yin/ skyo ba mod par ma yan/ rigs su ma yin/ rigasamang
pa ma yin/ ris su ma yin/ rasumad par ma yan/ 'khor du ma yin/ 'khor mdapang ma yin/ gnas pa ma yin/ gnas mad pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ thob pa mad
pa ra ma yan/ mngon par rtogs par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pamed pa ma yani/ nyon mongs zad pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa ma zad pa ma yin/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ sumached
du ma yani/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ stsamang mod bar yan/ shes par ma yan/ shes pa mdapar ma yani/ chos ston par n yan chosam stonabar mayin/ bdag
rnam par dag par bya ba yin/ gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba ma yAn ! sems can rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ sems can med par rnam par dag bar bya ba ma yin/ bdag gi don du
ma yin/ gzhan gyi don du ma ya na/ chos sum yin/ 'dul bag yan/ lus rnam par dag par ma yani/ ngag rnam par dag pa ma yani/ yid rnam par
dag par ma na/ spyod pa rnam par dag pa ya ni/ sngon gyi mtha'i sod pa rnamapar dag pa ma yin/ ma'amatha'ispyod rnam pa dag par ma yin/ daltar byung ba'i sbyong pa rnamapar
rag par ma yin/ bdag gi rnam pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi rnam par ma yin pa 'ad ni shu ri'u byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'atshos thams cad mi'adzame la 'jug pa zhes
bya ba'i sangasargyus rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ drenadamamakhasgrub bas chos thams cad yang dag bar 'du ba lam 'jigs pa thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// gcig tu nges pa
theb ngas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byedapa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad gzhan la rag ma las pa'i yi shes sgrub pas chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byang
bzang po'i 'ogs zil gyis mnan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// dam pa yongs su 'tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag paro'ang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungasaso/
shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang bsgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i din thob pa de dag ni phyi ma ldog cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad kyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro// dmages pa chod
pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyidalas/ byang chub sems dpa'isrid nga thams cad kyi bye brag mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir red/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// chosarnamasastong par dogs med cing/ byang chub chod du spros ma byed// chos rnams
'khrugs par ma byed na// de phyir gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// mdo snga'adi ni mnyan par bya// 'di la gzungs 'ad zad pa med// ye shes sbyor 'di 'ad la[W]// des na byung/
thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigasamad pa// gzungs 'darebatu bzung byas na// phyogabasudag gi sangs rgyas kyi/ tshes bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur//
don dang tshage 'brus bskyod kun gyi// mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes// nyi ma'i 'od zer risnyadapa// desnyad tshig rnams shes par 'gyur// gang dag chos kyimchog 'gyur ba/
rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzan de la// thams cad rtag tu mngon du'agyur// gal te sams can thams cad kyis// de la bskal par dogs dris te
shratshom thams cad chad gyur kyang// de ya ye shes ma zad do// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// byang chub mchog la bstu
yang brtan gyur dang chos 'dzan pa'o// gzungs 'da' dzan par su byed pa// de la sems can thams cad dga'// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes// grags pa 'jigarten 'byung bar
'gyur// su zhig mad sngo 'di 'dzin pa// de ni ramiba'i dus byed tshe/ sangs rgyus bye ba brgyad cu mthong// lag pa de la nye bar 'jog/ gzungs 'ang 'dzan bar byed pa ni/ bskal pa bye
ba stong rnams su/ sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa// zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang/ bskal pa bye bar sgrub pa kun// gzungs 'di 'dzin
bar byed pa yis// zla ba gcig gas bral gnon 'gyur// khams gsum sems can jisnyad pa// gal te thams cad bdudagyur kyang// mdo sde 'di ni gong 'dzani pa// nge la bar chad
byed mi nus/ byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du de// dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur// gzungs kyi dam pa gangayanang// de ma ya'i rtse mor gnas// ji ltar mde sngo bstan 'di la/
gzungs ni so sor nges pa bzhin// 'dilas tham sa cad mkhyen pastan// 'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang// mar me zhes bya nga lung bstan/
00 skad cig de la sangs rgyasan// gang+gA'i klung gi snyid mthong// gang zhig sasargyas thams cang kyis bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing// / mdo sde 'di la bstan pa des/
thamasacad myur du phyobapa nga 'gyur// saMs rgyusazhing na rnam dag dang// nyan thos phunasum tshogs pa dang// 'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag la// mdo sde 'dis ni khyed bar 'gyur/debs
bag yod gyur la// zhag bdun bar du 'dims pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yas/ de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur// bsam bya soms par ma bsams//
bsam bya man pa'ang ma bsamamo// soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig/ de yi 'og tu gzus thob 'gyur// dpor na rgya mtshor phyin pa' ma// nor la som nyi med pa ltar//
de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas// bden bsam la yang som nyi med/ 'ad las rdzogs pa'i byang chub te// de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/ zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas// rdzogs
pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang/ tshadang ldan b ra'i bu la bka' stsal ba/ ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen ba chos bzhi dang
ldan n gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ 'dodapa rnams la lhag par chags pa mang pa yin/ sams can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/ bdog
pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod bamed par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/ nyin mtshanangu 'dod ci tshos kyi kun dgaral dgarab yin te/ nyin mtshan du chos la/
dga' zhang chos 'dod pa yin te// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis tshugs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba// 'dod pa dri nga spang bar byos// de dag sems can ngumyal ba'i rkyen ngan song rnams kyi rgyu
yang yin// shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang gragasapa'i phyir// phra rol dag la phrag dog ma bye ste// dga' ba'i migagi sal can bltas byas na// mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par
'gyur// sems can gang dag kha cigartsoda'agyur ba// de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa so// de ltas gang 'asrogapar 'gyur bsdongs// srid pa sang ba byas nagazungasasu'agyur
lagal te byang chub 'dod na gzhanam sems// nyin dang mtshan du chos btsalab byos// chos tshig 'di 'dra'adidegaston byed na// de la gzungs namangonang 'gyur bar 'ong/ sha ri'i bu
gzhanaya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po chos bzhidang ldan n gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhon/ 'di lta ste dgen ba dang dben pa la gnas pa dang ( chos
zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyad pa nyid dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshagisasu bcad pa la lhag par chags pa med pa dang/ sdig pa'i dngos po thams cad la ma lta zhange/
than lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/ nAri'i bum chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas pa gyis// de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyasam bya// zab mo'i bzod la 'dun pa
bskyang nas su// bag yod mgo la'abarab zhin gnas par gyis// de ltaratshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa'i// shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed// bya dang 'dra bar
ngan ngon dag gis chog byas te// mar gyur pa yi 'bras bu yodapar byos// kye masas rgyas bstan legs par rnyed// sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyimayang spros// lus dang/
ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis// rnyed 'dod dranapa ma yin shes rab mani// dad dang tshul khrims ma yine chos sems min// de na bying
chub dang staganams bzhin// de ltas rnyedapa yongs su spang bar bya// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan n gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro//
@#/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'ang lta ste/ yi ge 'bru brgyud kyi don khong du chud par bya'o// brgyud pa de dag gang zhe na 'ang sku ste/ panyis bya ba don dam pa chos thams
cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang/ bzhes bya bamtshan dang dab byung bgrang pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ches kyi sa la 'a[E ] pa kheng rgyud
padang ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams nga lta ba bzhin du gnyis su mang pa la 'jug pa kheng du chud pa dang/ dza nas klu bskyo ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ 'chi ba[<]nga/
skabad/ rgo ba dang/ 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba ma skyo mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang/ ka zhes bya ba las dang rnam par sminapa dang/ las dang rnam par smyani pa med pa la
'jug pa kheng du chud pa dang/ d+ha zhes bya bgazungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mang pa dang chos kyi dbyings 'jug pa kheng nga chu
pa dang shazhes bya ba'i gnas dang lhag mthong dang/ lhag mtheng med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nying khong du chud pa dang/ klu zhes bya bachos thams cad skad cigapa ste gzer
ma nasazhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa dang rgyu mang pa dang/ chos thams cad mya ngan las 'angs par 'jug par khong du chud pa ste/ (de ltar ma ge 'bru brgyud pa de dag
gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don kheng du chud pa dang po'o// gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'de legs par bris te gzung bar bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o// zla ba

phyud phyed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o// gzungs kyi ris kyi rnam grangs 'di la
mchod pa mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang/ yang dag par 'dzan du gzhug pa dang/
yang dag par gzengs bstod pa gzung pa'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chu du ba bzhi pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
na gzus 'ang thubapar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho tshages su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ya ge 'bru brgyud 'dedag bsam pa byu ]mde snga
'di na bris nas bcang bar bya// zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya// sems can rnams kyang 'du 'dzan gzhug par bya// shes rab rgya chen byang chub te bsta/ shis
rab rgya ya che bas// phyogs bcu rnamun sangs rgyas gang su dag/ bzhugs pa thams cang des ni mdun du mthong// de phyir 'dun pa bskyang nge 'ang la bslab// shA ra'i bu
bas// bzhi po 'di dag gzungs 'ad la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i samasadapa' chen po'i panayon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste//
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang/ de la bdud kyi sa ba 'byung bdang/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung ba dang ! spobs pa rgyun ma 'chad
pamyur du 'thob paste/ shA ri'i bi ba' po de dag gozus 'di la mngon par btson ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yani// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad// de la bdud kyis grugs ni redama'agyur// de yi las kyi sbrang pa myur du
'byung// spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par 'gyur/ shar bu sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa yang ches grangs mang pa yongs
a pa rgya cher gyur pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa de 'tshe de'i duson/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrang ces pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rinachen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyalapo ltabu
zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtanamakhyen ba/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyang bo blan mang pa lha dang sa rnams kyi ston pa sangs
[2 ]bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ shur bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogasapa'asangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po snang ba'adzan ces bya ba/ mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo// de'i bu yon tan rinapo tsho
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de skyes nas lo bcu drug len pa dang/ des sgomatha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam gras 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjing rgyal po lta bu de las thos te ! des gzungs 'di thosam thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur
te de lo bdunakhrir rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis ma brten te// don ngangam gyur to// de lan 'ga'ayang lasi cad ga' ba'am/ nor la dgar ba'am/ bdag la dga' bar ma
gyur to// nga lo bdun khrir lana'aga'ayangs 'gros ma phab ste/ gcig tungos ba nang du yang dag 'jog 'ganasaso// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu las ches bstan ba phyes te/
thos nas kyang nyam su bru saso// thams cad bzung ngo/ gzungs nyams saMblangs nasakyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas rin chen
ukla// dang 'gyigazabarjid rgyal lta bu de nyid la rab tu byung ngo// de rab tu byung nas lo dgu khri 'das pa dang/ des sgomatha' yas pasgrung nga gzungs 'dabasgrubs te/ bas bas

nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag pa rab shad do// desatshe ga cig pu de nyid 'asems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad nu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag ra
'dzanatu btsud cing/ phyir ma ldog ba'i sa la bkod par gyur te/ shAri'a'i 'khoraden tshong dpon gyi bu bla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrubapa'i gzungs
kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos sgruba'i dge slong de las zhes so// thos nas kyang rjes su yang bar gyur te/ de rjes su sa rang ba'amodalas skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba
phragadagu bcu las chos bstan pa shes so// thos nas kyang nyams su blangs so// thams cad bzung ngo// thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa thams cad kyi mchog dang tsheg/
btsun pa dang/ gzungs su bzungaba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyimchog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun ma chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to
nges bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so// mnyes par byas nas bskal pa gsum 'das nas/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shA ra'i bu de'i tsho de 'dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/
khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar gyuran/ shAra'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mabalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus mar ma mdzad de'i tshade'i dusan tshong dpon gyi ba zuba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// shAra'i bu de nga tsho de'i dusan yon tan rin po tshabasam gyis mi khyab pa'adapal
zhes bya ba chos sla bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pasnyam du khyod som nyi dang/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za ba gyuran/ shAri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ be ma ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus tshodapagamed de de'i tshod 'dus na dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po tsho bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur te// shA[@]/
ba ngadang bskal pa bzang po'abying chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi chos kyirnam grangs 'di thosaso// thos nas kyang rjes suyirangaba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge
ba'i rtsa ba des/ ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrare 'khor ba phyire bstsal to// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstanapa'ang thos te/ thams cad du'ang
gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang/ tshage btsun pa bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang/ byang chub semasadapalasen sa dang 'a chen po slobs pa rgyan/
ma gcod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla namadang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'dod pas/ tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad la rjes su yaring bar yang brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'abyung chub kyi ched du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang/ chos smra ba rnams mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ gang ya gir 'dri ba dang/ lung 'be
pa dang ) 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yade la byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te//
[– 1:/:]bsod nams kyi phung po de'atshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ soms can thams cad kyis kye shes pa 'am bsam par minus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'tshi
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dagabaka' stsal to// mdo sde bsanas rjes su ya ring dang// ya gi'abras dang bzung dang bklags pa yis// bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyod pa na// sems
can kun gyis shes par yongs mi nus// des na tshorabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong// de dag la yang dad pa bsam yas red/ mdo sde zabamo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur// den myur du
byang chub mchog 'tshang rgyu// bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang// de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang// gzungs rnams dang na gzugs dang longs spyod dang// sangs rgyas mthong
las nyams par yongs ma 'gyur// rjes su dran pas sngon gyi tshe rabs na// tshong dpon bus gzungs 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas gang+ga' byi stong mthong gyur te// des ni 'dod
bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ mar memadzad pa de tshe tshong dpon du// sngon gyi tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur// de tshe chos sgra sangs rgyas tshe dpag med// ngan bskal pa bzang
dang bcasaya rang// byang chub myur du reg par su 'dong dang// bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang// bsod nams brgyu yamtshan bzang su 'dod pa/ 'di la brtson na
rnyingapar dka' ma 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams// gangegs rin chen bkang stasbyin byin yang// bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa// de la sbyin pa 5
dper yang ma 'gyur ro// de ltas thos nas rtse gcig bag yod par// byang chub sems dpa'amakhas pas 'di bzung ngam// gzungs 'di bris shing sems ba de dag ni byango chub
@#/ d+hAredapa dka' ba med par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shAr 'bu sgomathal las bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la
mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus l/ gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyadagazi byinamadangs 'jug cing/ nyin mtshan du srung ba dang/ skyob pa
dang/ sbrad par byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang/ brtan dang/ bdag po dang/ srod mdakya bu'i stobs dang/ spyod pa'i blo gros
ngang/ thub ka dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ gnod spyin lag bzangazhes bya bste/ gnod sbyin brgyudang dengag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shan du khrus bya ba dang/ gos shin tu gtsang ma bge ba
dang/ 'chag sar 'gro bdang/ sams can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i goms su bya/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'anga'ang yod la bu ste/ de ltar byas na de la gnongasbyin brgyad/
bodi dgamyur ngu bzhin ston bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa' lta rnams kyi nang du sus pa brgyud pa 'ad dag kyang de 'asams pa 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na
'ad lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang/ snang byedadang/ shes rab 'od dang ! nyi ma'i 'od dang/ yang dag par sku la byeng dang/ bsam pa
thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang/ skar ma'i rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po srodapa' blogros zhes bya ba sta/ byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chenab brgyud pa
de dag nges gzungs thob par bya ba'aphyor mngon par brtson par 'agyur ro// gzungs 'ad la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapos kyang bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o//
byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa tshor ba canadang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ chos la dga' ba dang/ zab mo'i chos la bzodapa mngon par brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtsonapas kun 'byed/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul du bya ste/ des ji ltar chung ba dang/ ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byan/
mang pa la sa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma sum
cusan sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/ bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par gyur to// lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon/
sems bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag drug cusan bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
0 gnas gtsang ma'i stong gnam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa// rin po che sna bdun rab tu phye bas rnam par spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'aphyir sgodrug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
'ang zung zhig/ de 'di lta ste/ bdag 'khor ba 'khor ba'i tshe sngag bsngal gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis/

'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang la la myong ba de sems can thamos cad dang thunamong du yongs su spyadapar gyur cig/ bangag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang la la yod pa de/
so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag la bdud kyi las gang dag yod pa do dag yongs su shes pas bla na med pas dngos su ma shes par ma gyur cig/
bdag gi dge ba'i rtse ba pha rol tuphyin pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung gang ca yod pa de bla na med pa'i yi shes kya'abras bur gyur cig/ bdag gi
rnam par grol bgang yAn pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig/ 'kherob dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig/ tad+yathA/ o klu mo
pa bu pa'i bus nang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'da' mnge cilags/ 'di ltar gzung bar bgyi/ ban+te mi smana'angs
kyis bka' stsalang/ shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes byabar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'agacig tu nges par sngonapar
'thags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhage bdud thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gcig tu nges pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyang shar tu/
thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yan dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lamangonapar bstod de/ 'phags pa sgom bya2
mas pa sgrub pa'i gzus zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya laT mu khe nam d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phagasapa sgo
drug pa zhes byuba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas thes ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khong khams
kam/ kAn+te kAn+ti/ nga ma dam/ dan+te dan+te/ b+hango b+ha de su b+ha dre su b+ha de/ su byud=/ sAtsani/ su tsarjes tsan+ti/ tsan ka ri Ni/
tsan ba ti/ te rdzob ti/ d+hamagate/ ya shob ti/ braskyagati/ sa= sha bi sho d+hanaM/ sarba argya sa d+han/ sarba aNA pA sha man pa rimaN+Dasu d+ha ni/ kwa ya ba d+hane/ bAg
bkod+ha ne/ nam saM sho d+hani sa/ rigs kyi bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las sgo drug nga gzungs 'di lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjodan/ de las kyi sgrib pa
thams cad byung nas myur du bun mdang yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu mngonaparatshogs pa 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang
chub sems dang semaMs dpa' chen po de dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de 'a phags pa sgo
drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso//// @#// rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+yasarba d+harma gu Na ba har dzanAmamahAyAn sA tA bod skad du//
'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chenapo'ani// sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'angaskad bdag gis shesang/
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pan/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
stong nyis brgya thams cung kyang gazungs bapa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ spyod yul chags pa med pa// thabs mkhas pa/ khams gsum thams cad la sems snyoms
pa/ phanapa dang snying brtse ba'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam 'dra ba sha stag la/ 'dilta ste/ byang nubasams dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomanyamapa nyid la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa'achen po ma g.yo ba dang/ byang chusems dpa'asoms dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poslobs pa mtha' yas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gnon blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snga
ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ de dag la sogs nga 'byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang/ klu'i rgyal pa
rnams dang/ srin po'i bdagu bathoms cad dang/ gnod sbyin sum brgya dang/ gzhanamu stags can sbyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu pa drug/
stong dang/ nam mkha' ldangeg rgyal bdunadang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchodapa'i las bya ba'i
phyir lha ma tog gi char mngon par phabago/ tsanadan gyi phyama'i cha yang mngon par phabab// lca'asil snyanadang pheg rdob pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
phyir bsgragasaso// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanapa la mngonapatshadadapa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs legs so legs so//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa rab gyid pa 'danordzu 'phrul tshe sa legasao lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams
cad rnam par 'joms pajul dpa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'ating nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dza/de'i mthus sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dme'abar byas te/ 'gul//
rag tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun turab tugayos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rabs tu 'khrug/
kun tu rab tu'akhrugs/ 'ar 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chemamo/ da tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i char yang
phab bo// lha'i ma tog gi charayang phab bo// lca'i 'od staba'ang byung// stong gsum gyi stong chenaba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sams canagangasudagangan song du sus pa de dag thams cad
kyang ngan song rnam las yongs su grol bar gyur to// lha'i dbang po dang/ klu'i dbang po dang/ gnong sAn gyidabang po dang/ sArapo'i dbang po dang/ ma'i dbang po de dag thams cad gnas kyang

snang bar gyur to// lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag kyang grag go/ lha'i 'od dgakyong snang bar gyur to/ dolta'ispos kyi ngang kyang ldang bar gyur to// de nas de dag thams cad cho 'phrul chen po de mthong
nas ya mtshanangu gyur te 'ang sum ngu sems so// gnas 'di dag snang bar gyur 'du dang/ cho 'phrul chen po snang bar gyur pa 'di dang/ sacher g.yos pa 'ang deng mi tog gachar chen po
bab pa 'di su'i mthu yin/ su'i byade'i mthus yin zhag gu snyam nas/ de dag thang cig cangamazerab r sims nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//
'danore bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yi nozhes skyasaso// de nas rgyu pon po bzhi 'dasamadu sems te/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa tsapalta ba dang phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang//
chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'adas ga la ba der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbangabodang/ klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang/ srin pa'i dbang
bo 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag thams cad kyis lha'i ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ kuchungadang/ pad+madakar po dang/ dramchogadang/ mnadarab dang ]man dar ba chen nga dag khyer nas/
'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'adas la mngon par mchod de phyag byas so// ma tog gi char chen po des kyang sa chen
po 'di dus monub pa tsam du khyab par 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bodi dag thams cad chosamanyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
gcig tu'akhod do// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen polagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'abye ba phrag du mas bskor cing/ lha bye baphrag du mas bskor te/ rig sngags 'chang brgya
la phrag du mas bdun du bdar bas rdzu 'phrul dang/ mthu chen dang/ bkod ba chen bodang/ ma tog dang/ sbosadang/ ma tog 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sa'i
snyan dang/ phog rdob ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogAdang bcas pa la mngon par mchod do// de nas de'i tsho byang chub sems dpa'
bkong ba'i rgyal pos lha'i bkod pa dang/ bkodapa' mthudang/ ma tog gachar chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
gas 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas chos 'bel ba'i gtam 'dod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'ade dag gi sems shugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu song la sa chen po 'di ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos/ sa chen ngo la bltas so//
bltas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gsas chinapal bltas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad
la bde ba'i 'dus pa chen po mdzad pa mthongalags so// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkod pa'i rgyal po srog chags drug khribazhi stong ba na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu deng
khon lungabastan par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo lagan rdo rjes bcom ldan 'angs kyi zhabasaganyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
te bcom ldan 'das lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ ma dang/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu mang po 'dus lags so// bde bar gshegs pa sems can mang
[n ]@#// po 'dus lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos mnyan pa'i dus na'ang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa chos ma nyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan
[DI ]'das cang ma gsung bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dang 'gan rdo rjes la gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bde
bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub par madzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'angs 'gyod pa bsal ba dang/ sems can thams cad l sman pa dang/ bde
ba'i slad du chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkodapa'i rgyal bo zhes bgyi ba'i mdo/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ bdud thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad
par bgyid pa/ sems can ma dang pa rnams dad par bgyid pa/ mu ge'i gnod pa 'borab gyidang/ nadathams cad zhibar bgyid pa/ dusam lags par 'chib thams cad zlog ba/ bdag
gas de bzhin gshegs ba glog snang ba las thos nas/ thos pa'i modal chos thams cad mangonasumadu gyur cing/ ngan song thams cad yang dag pa chad de/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par
chad pa gang lags pa de bstan par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rdzola'adiskang ci bka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu phyi ma'adus phyi ma'i tshe/ sems
cananga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde la mngon par m dad cing yadim chesal/ tshig 'di skad du 'ang nade bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mde sde ma
yin no// 'di la ni legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ci'ang med do zhes zer bdag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non nas/ mchod
pa'ang mngon par 'du byed par m 'gyural/ chos sna de dag la'ang mchod pa byed par ma 'gyur te/ de dgan tsho'ang de la'ang 'khrug pa mang po'abyung bar 'gyur la/ phyis kyang sems can dmyal
b rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhinagashigs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba las thams cad zad par byed pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chenapo mnyan pa'i dus ma yin te/ ga'am
stags can sbyod pa ba dang/ kun tu rgyu de dag dang/ sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'ong ngo// rigs kyi bu de dag ni mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la dad par ma 'gyur te/ 'dodapar
ldongs pa'i yid kyis khyim yongs su skyob byed cing/ rmo mo dang/ tshong dang/ g.yul 'gyod pa dang/ 'thab pa la dpar 'gyur ro// de nas sha'aphos nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po
brgyad po dag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dad pa
bgyid lags so// mngon par mchod par bgyid lags so// rgyas par yabagyang lags so// 'dIb dang/ klog pa dang/ nyan du stsal ba dang/ 'don ba la spro bar bgyid
lags so// sung kyis chos ma lags pa'i dus de la bababan/ spo ba dang/ brgyud bkagapa dang/ bsdigs pa bzodapar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag na bka'adrin gzo bar
bgying kyi bka'adranam gzo b.ram brgyud de/ bdag cagasang kyis 'gyod par 'gyur bar ma bgyidalags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'am
bstanadu gsol/ 'di naslad ma'i dus slang ma'i tsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di
tsha skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji ltar yongs su btsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun ma chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bar 'dod pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ bsam gtan yongs su dag pa dang/ chos 'dod par bya ste/
chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapos dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya'o// byang chub semasadapa' lagan rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa'i dgon pa la gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ khyim naganas pa yongs su spang ba dang/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du 'dzi
yongs su spang ba dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas na gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan song du mchibar 'gyur ba de ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang/

la 'chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang/ 'ad la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags na/ gang yigang 'dra ba dang/ ya ger 'dAre stsol ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gdugs
