dang rgyal mtshanadang/ ba dana rnams kyis mchod pa bgyid pa dang/ chos smra ba de la'ang gos dang rgyan rnams kyisamachod pa lta smos kyang ca'atshal te/ de nasangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
pa lags so// de na de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstanang khon lags so// chos lcabade ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ legasaso legs so// chos sla bde lan nges kyang mchod par bgyi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du'ang lung bstan par bya'o// gang
de bzhin gshegs pa blama'i sri zhu byed cing/ che tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ ma tog 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang rgyun rnams dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan/
dang bduna rnams kyis mchodapa byed pa de ni dus ma yin par 'tshibarami 'gyur ro// pharel gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa'ang med/ mu ge'i gnod pa 'dzags pa'ang med/ bu las gyur
pa'i yang m bde ba'ang med/ chung ma la sa gyur pa'i yi de ma bde ba'ang medal/ bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bdang/
mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par dka' 'o// rigs kyi ba grong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal 'bam/ khyimanam/ dgon ba'i gnas gang la lar chos kyi rnam grus 'dasod pa'i phyogasade na de
bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung baya nano// de nas bcom ldan 'adzamal/ byang chub semasadapa' lagan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug
spunaras gzigasangabang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/ bka' stsalapa/ gang gaphyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta bar byed/ rtog par byed/ tsham par byed/ yongs
su myong bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed cing/ snying rje'i sems dang/ bde ba'asaMms dang/ byams pa'isoms dang/ snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan l/ bsam pa thams cad yos
su rdzogs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'angasasan ras gzigs/
dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog ba gang lags pa de'ang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyuran/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pamangon par mchod pa dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang la mngon par dad
padung/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yi sheng 'dra ba dang/ yi ger 'drari sol bdang/ gos dang rgyan gyi mchodapa chen pa dag gsamachod pa bgyid pa dang/ rgyun gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri ba dang//
ma gir 'dri'i stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di namathu cha ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkol stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de na nga

byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te thob pa'i mod la'anges bcu thob par gyur la/ srog chagasastong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungasamathu chen po bstan bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya ga la bang ka'i sgra dang gdangs/
sgrogs pas gzungs 'dabaka' stsalapa/ tad+yathA/ dzaya dza ya/ dza ya ba ha/ dza ya baha/ khab ) hu lu lu/ pad+ma be/ A ba na ba ma/ sa ra sa ra Ned+hi ri d+hi de ba
tA a nu pA lAne/ yung d+hong tA ra NA/ pa ra tsakranar Na/ par ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba AshAn/ ma masarba karma kApa ya/ bud+d+he a d+hiSh+Thanan sA/ rigs kyi bu 'di norgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i
gzungs yin te/ sngag pa thams cad zad par byedapa/ nor dang 'bru rnam nga ra 'phel bar byed pa pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlogapar byed pa/ ma go'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa tsho nur bar byed
pa ste// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// rigs kyi bu la la zhig gas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig
rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bsam pa yongs su dag pas mchod par byed de/ ya gir 'dra ba 'am/ yi ger 'dza?ri 'jug pa dang/ mchod pachenapos chos smra bde lamachod pa byed pa de ni las kyi sgrib
pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// dus ma yanang 'a'i 'chibs 'chi bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'ang nying la'ang bde bamyong bar 'gyur te/ bus yad bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ chung mas yid bde
bar 'gyur ba dang/ khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ rgyal srid kyis yid bde bar 'gyur la/ bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngonas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang
chub samasadapa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos smra ba de dag dang/ chos kyi rnam gras 'ad yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang/ 'ang
b rnams dang/ klog pa rnams la'ang mchod par 'tshal lo// gang la la chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di la mchod pa dang/ chos smra ba de dga'i ges dang/ rgyun rnams dang/ gdugs dang/ bzhon ba rnams kyis
mchod pa de dag gsan/ de bzhin gshegasapa thams cad la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de na bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang ma chod pa'i mchog gis mchod babagyad
pa lags so// rgyal srang thamasacad la'ang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'i// rgyal srang thams cad la'ang mchodapar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// bcom
ldan 'das bdag gas kyang chos nyanapa de dag gi don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams rjes su btsal bar 'tshal lo// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sAng sus su'ang
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don gyi phyi'i smyos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// na
ma: sarba ta thA ga tAnAn ! na mo a ma ta b+hu ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ nam: sarba bo d+hisitAnAm/ nam sajamahA ra ha ki byA: tad+ya thA/ hu hu he he/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hAm tib/ badzram ti/ dro
zla badzra ma ti/ ta thA ga ta/ a nu pa pa lar/ sa rasar/ g.yo mu le/ b+ha ku Ti/ blo kuT/ mu kha ) kapi kr-i pa lu ke/ sa skyabatsan/ mnu slar/ b+ha ga ban badzra
daN sarba karma A ba ra Nan/ klu pa ya sarba A hApa ri pU ra ya/ de ham b.raM/ bud d+ha sarkyen/ bo d+hisatusacan sa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'tshal ba dang
de bzhin gshegs pabalta bdang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skya bo dang/ rgyal srid dang longs spyod 'tshol ba dang/ yul gru'atshal ba dang/ nor 'tshalab dang 'bru 'tshal ba de ni chos kyi rnam grangs
'di dang chos sna ba de lamachod pa chen posamachod par bgyi'o// gangayagir 'drib dang/ 'chongab dang/ klog pa de la'ang spros dang/ me tog 'phrongadang/ byug pa dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ gos
dang/ rgyuna rnams dang/ gdugs dang/ bzhon pa rnams kyisamachod par bgyi sta/ bcom ldan 'das de la na bdag gis bsrung b.rab gyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang ches mchod par 'gyur bar
bgyi'o// ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang yid bde bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang b.rab gyi'o// gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang/ stobs kyis 'khor los
sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang/ thos pa 'dzan par 'gyur ba dang/ khamasarnamapar smin par 'gyur ba dang/ lus m snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ nam mkha' las mchi bar 'tshal ba
des na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar bgyis la gzugs bgyid du stsal te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i
tshul canasku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o// dbus su do bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyi'o// g.yas logs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa//
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanab/ sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go/ g.yas g.yon dag tu rgyal potshon pa bzhi mchodapar bgyid pa gzhag ga/ sgrub pa po'i rogs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sba bgyi ba dang/
dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang/ dus gsum du gos brje ba dang/ sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems su bgyi'o// khrub yar gyi ngo tshes brgyang nas brtsams te/
zla ba phyi ma nya ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bdug pa na a ka ru dung/ tsananganadang/ lce pagadang/ gu gul
dbul lo// lan gsum gyi b.radu bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de ni sngar bsnyen par bgyi ba lags so// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rtenanas/ dgon pa'i gnas spos dang/ bdug pa dang/
ma togasna tshogs dang/ bdan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o// dkar bag ga lha bshos kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ngaya gir 'drari sul cing gos dang/
rgyanadang/ lhab lhub dang/ gdugasadang/ bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyisamachod par bgyi'o// de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshos khatsolnga'abar du sems can thams cad
lasnying rje soms dang ldan pa/ dus gsumaMdu khrus bgyi ba dang/ dus gsum du gos babar bgyi ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhipab langag lci bas khaskus la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis
khebs par bgyis te/ bum pa gang bcu drug dang/ mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogasade brgyan par
bgyi'o// gosna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chenapozab la/ spos chab kyis phyogs deng chag chagabatab nas/ nam sku gzugs dang/ sa gzhi 'gul ba dang/ bdag nyid kyang dga' bar gyur
pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// denasades 'di gcig tu ngesapar 'grub par 'gyur ro snyamadu shes bar bgyi// donas de'a'og tubadag gis rmi lam du bstanapar bgyi'i 'brelaba'i gtam
bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang b.rab gyi'o// dam pa ci'atshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
la mdad cing spong bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalapa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skang smras ba legs so legasaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
'phagasalaphranas gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub semasadabal lag na rdo rdzala'askad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam gras 'dasems can bsod namasachungang rnams kyi
yul na spyod por ma 'gyur ro// 'di sams can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yagi 'dri ba 'am/ yagir 'drar 'jug pa 'am/ 'chang ba'am/ klog par ma nus te/ de dag la bdud kyi bar/
chad byed por 'gyur// rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di rigan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri'i dang/ klogab dang/ nyanadu 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ le yodapa
mdad padang/ bla ma las zhu mang ba dang/ chos smra ba'i sems ma brtanang ste/ gas kyi bu des de la 'don bdud kyi las yin nosAm du shes par bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod
du/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dgaba'abashes gnyen la 'dunapa mdapa dang/ yid lamabyed pa dang/ khengs pa'i tshig slab dang/ 'jig rten 'ad la sems pa ste/ 'di snyam du 'jig
'di la'ang 'jig pa med do// 'jig rtenapha rol la'ang 'jigs ba med do// sdig pa'i lasa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa'ang med do// bdag la tshig ma gsal ba'ang med do//
'di tshul ba'ang med do// bdag ni mdzes pa yin no// bdag ni de bang phyug dang ldan no snyam du ma soms shing khyim dang bu smad rnams la zhen to// de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
@#/ te/ bzhi pod dgan do dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par balta bar bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nor la brkam
pa de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ de dag mdage ba'i bshes gnyen dang dgod cing bdang/ chums yang bde ba dang/ chos nyanapa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par
byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ blon po dang 'khor rnams de dag gi thad du lhags nas/ 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par sman ba med do// chos smra ba 'di ni sdug pa byedapa/ dbang gis rgyags pas
myos pa 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa/ phra ma la dga' ba yan te/ 'di ni khyod kyi srog ga bar chad byed par 'gyur la/ khyongan chos la gnas pa ste/ khyod kyis chos mang du byas so// khyod
ni mdo sde klogapa dang 'drir 'jug pa yin no zhes 'ate/ de dag mdo sde'ang ya gira'adrira'ajugapa ma byed/ mchod pa ma byed do/ de dag la ni 'di nyid la'ang bar chad mang ba 'byung
lu bgar gyural/ byim la'angasemasacan dmyal bar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de'ags kyi bu des bdud kyi las yanebang rag par byas la/ de'ajibang du 'gyur bar ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka'astsal pa/ grogs podog ngas lanaganyis lan gsum du tshig gsebasgo ste/ bag yod par gyis shig/ byis sems canangamyal bdag tu btsobar gyur na'abyed par gyur ta re/ de nas bcom
0 ldan 'das kyis de 'tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dgabaka' stsal to// ngas na mdo sde'i rgyal po bstan// byang chub lanisams can ma bkod// sangs rgyas tshul yang de yas bstan par gyur/
desbos nas ni bag kyang yodapar gyis// khyed rnams phyi dus rab tu'ajigapa'atshi// log par ltung bar 'grobar gyur ta re// mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dad pa// de ni nges par ngaya bu yang yin//
mdo 'di la ni rtag tu'angamachod pa// den sangs rgyas zhing du skye bar 'gyur// gang phyogs mdosde'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa// der na 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang// ya ngogs grul bum ste/
'thachen po dang// gsheng byed byang snyamAnamakyis yong mi tshugs// denibasam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing// de ni bde bar byang chub 'tshangayang rgya// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ chos kyi shugs kyis mtshim blags te/ lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ba/sol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chenapo bzhis chos skya ba de la mchod par bgyi'o// chos nyanapa de dag la'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ya gir 'dri
ba dang/ yi ger 'dri stsol ba dang/ gzungs 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ chos smra ba de la gsadang rgyan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la rang bdag cag gis bsrung bar
bgyi'o// de'i yul yang yongs su bskyang ba bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// g.yul
'gyed pa thams cad du'ang mdunang mchi bar bgyi'o// rgyal sridi thams cad du'ang ches bkur stabagyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/ bdag cagan de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid
kyi/ bka' dAnam gab mo bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gangal la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mched par ma bgyid pa dang/ chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchodapar ma bgyid pa de lan bdag
cagagasasems ma bde bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhibod dug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legasaso// rgyal po chen po
khyed legs kyis// rtag tu khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ de nas dri za'i bdag pochen po yul 'khor srungags bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
bcom ldan 'dasaslad ma'i dus sad ma'i tshe sems can ma dge bsod pa dang/ de bzhinagashegasapa la ma dad cing glo bar ma chud pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dgan chos kyi rnam grangs
'di lta bu 'tshani pam bgyid/ klog par ma bgyudi/ ya gir 'drir stsolo bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'a'abras bu rnam par smin pa la yade ma chos shing/ 'jig rten 'di'i
bde ba la lta bar bgyid de/ sems can de lta bu dgag don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'amado sde'i rgyal po chen po 'ad bka'astsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rigs kyi bu
chos gnyis kyis sems can ngamyal bar ltung bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can ngamyal bar ltung bar byed do//
rigs kyi bu chos 'dabazhis ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byed de// bzhigang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par ng/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang/ bdeg pa/
thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ tshangs par spyod pa la gnasapa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshagasasu bcad pa 'di dag bka'astsal to// rgya chen sbyin pa 'di ni tshe 'phrul che//
ngan song ngan 'gro kun las rab grong byed// rmongs pa'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags// chags pa sna tshogs brgya yas de dag byos// mdo sde 'di la dad par mkhyen cing// sas rgyas bstan
la sbyin pa sbyin m byed// sems can de 'dra ba dag ngan songasar// myosanas tshor bdag kyang skyo bar 'gyur// sems can de dag la ni phan pa'i phyir// de ltar mad sde mthu chen rab tu bstan//
mdo sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gang// de la bshad byed med cing sdig byed mod/ 'byung po grul bum lta 'phyachen po med// rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med// legasa'adro nyin du 'jug dang mchod
padang// legasapar 'dzani babasod nams gang yin pa// sangs rgyas ye shes kyisan bsngags pa de// sems can kun gyis bskal mang brjod ma nus//
gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub rnams // brjod cing mchod pa byed pa de dgadang/ la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las// ya gi 'brugacig tsam yang legs bris na// de la
bsod namasasnga ma de yis ni// de yakhirgya stong charayang ma phod do// de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad de/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sros dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa
dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bden rnams kyis mngon bar mchod pa dang/ chos smra ba de dag dang/ 'dra ba rnams dang/ 'dzin pa rnams la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byed pa de dag na/
'i smra tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yonamangang thob par 'gyur te/ de'i lus la mgand dang/ rna ba'anang dang/ snand dang/ lcenang dang/ rimasanang dang/ dug dang/ mtshon dang/ mesamatshugs
lags so// de dag la pha mas yid bde bdang/ budang chung mas yid bde ba dang/ khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur ro//

bas 'gum pa 'tsho'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ kyen khyod tshur shog/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ skyes bu chen po khyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba/
'barab dang ldan te/ gang du 'dodapa'i gnas rnamasasu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pos 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa ni di bzhin gshegs pa'aphrin las bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags che namo 'di ni
las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'ji ni sems can bsod nams chungangu dag gi yul na spyod par ma 'gyur// sems
can sod namAnung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur ro// lag tu 'ong b.rama'agyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gang ga lag tu 'ongasasam/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/ des phyes pa'i
mod khon la bri bar bya// ya gi 'du gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangasa'ang mi mgos na'ang ngan 'gros 'jigs
par ma 'gyur ro// la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dalas yig 'bru gcig tsam mam/ mang tsamanyan du bcug gam/ phyogs sam/ yul 'ga' zhig tu lung 'bog par byed na/
de bzhin gshegasapa bdun bo rnams kyis bsrungasas// byang chub sems dpa'athams cad kyisarjesasu yarang ngo// lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzungango// mo ngas//
subaskyangs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ byang chub sems dpa' lag rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tsho chos kyi rnam gras 'dirtag tu rgyunama'achadabar sngamasacad rdzogs par gang du spyod par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i gnas dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnasasu thams cad rdzogs par ganas par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su'ang spyod par
'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling du ni nyung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te// gnas kha cig kha cig du spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byung chub sems dpa' 'gan rdo la
ska 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya ba dang/ bkrug par bya ba dang mchodapa bya dang/ nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do// de bzhin
gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di nub par gyur ta re/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa lagan ro tshos 'di skad ces
mtsha gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang/ bklag par bgying dang/ mchod par bgyi ba dang/ nyanadu gzhug par bgyapa'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so//
chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchodaparab gyi/ rjedapar bgyi'o/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/ chosasmra ba de dag la mchod babagyid pa de nabangagala'angamachodapa bgyid pa lags te/ de bdag
gas bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ bdaganadabazhin gshegs pa la bka'adranagazaborab gyid do// des bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub samasadapa' lag rdo rjel legasaso/
zhes bya ba byin nas/ laganadzotsho legs so legasaso// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'adusal/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigasadabang phyug gis 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasachos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyan pa de dag dang/ yi ger 'drib rnams dang/ 'dzinapa rnams dngo klog ba rnams dang/ nyan du 'jug pa rnams
la'angamanapar mchodabarab gyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod namasachungadudag galul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dibyungam/ gal te rgyal po chos dang ma ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi rnam
grangasa'ang byung staskyodaban/ sa kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal mchodabar bgyid/ dadabaoM bgyidal/ chos smra ba de dgadang/ yi ger 'dra ba rnams dang/ 'dzin pa rnams dang/ klog pa rnams dang/
nyan du gzhug pa rnams dang/ lung dbog pa rnams la'ang mchodapar ma bgyid bla ma'i 'du shes skyed par ma bgyid na/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par 'gyur lags
so de'ul du sgrig pa'i chos nang bodang/ yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ desan rgyal rigs rgyal yongs bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du'atshalabar bgyi ste/ des chos sbyong par
brgya'o/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsalapa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legasaso// denadabazhin te/ rigs kyi bu dper na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhag gis/

de bzhin gshegru padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad la lo brgya 'am/ lo stong gi bar du bla na med pa' mchod pas mched pa byed la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'diri ran pa
ches yongs su gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dngar sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang/ bdag nyid yongs su gtong bgangayan pa dang/ chung ma dang/ bu ngang bu mo yongs su
cha gtong ba gang yinab dang/ gang gas chos kyi rnam grangasa'adi mchodapa'am/ ya gir 'driba'am/ ya gira'adra'i 'jug ba'am/ klog pa'am/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sros dang//

me tog 'phranga rnams kyis mchod de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir/ zhe'i brgyad cha gcig tsam sbyin pa byin na/ de na de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyod par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma shes

de ni brgya'achar yang nye bar ma phod na/ gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ ba dana rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing/ chos smra ba de dag la 'ang
gos sam/ rgyananam/ gdugasasam/ bzhon pa 'am/ grong khyer ram/ sa gzhi ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'da' phyir sbyin pa byed la/ lus 'di ni sung pa
med pa'o snyam du shesashang rma lam lta bu 'o// sgyu ma lta bu dang/ chu'i chu bur lta bu 'osnyam du shes te/ lus 'di la ni sing po med do// chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na//
denade bzhin gshegs pas lung bstanapa kho na yano/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no// des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad machodapa yin no// phyis kyang mthar
gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bor 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha'i dbang po rnams
dang/ klu'i dbang po rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding gdabang po rnams dang/ ma'adebang pa rnams kyis tshig
mthun par/ bcom ldan 'dasal legs so zhes khyab gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// 'di'i chos kyi'akhorale'i naganyis bskor bar gyur to// bcom ldan
'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu mthun bar bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dalamachod par bgyi'o// yul de'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos skya ba de la'ang mchod
par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ lung bstanapa bgyi dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// gang la la chos sgrub dang/ yi gera'adra ba dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog bde la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed
pa dang/ pa'i'adu shes dang/ bu'i 'du shes bskyod de lan/ bdag cag gis wa'i 'du shes bskyedapebagyi'o// gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rungs par bgyingan ni/ de'i yul
thams cad du bu dang/ mchis bradang/ pha mas yang ma bde bar 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu sems canangamyal bar skyabar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa'ade dag dang lha'i dbang po nas/ ma'adabang pe'i bar de dag la legs so legs sozhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar
gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyed la gtad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyirnam grangs 'di myur du nub par gyur ta re/ la
la zhig gis spangs te ya la sems can dmyalabar lhung// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan padang/ skye bo mang la bde bar 'gyur ba'o// khyod kyis 'gyod par gyur te/
'i: chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad bstan pa nasachen po 'dang g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ srog chags drug stong na len pa med par brag pa rnams las son sa rnam par grol lo// dems/
bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasagasal chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad yi ger 'dri ba dang//
ma gir 'dir stsol ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyus par yang dag par stonapadang/ ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ ma tog
'bradang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyul mtshan ngang/ bdan rnams kyis mchod par bgyidan/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
bsod nams ji snyid cig skyed par 'gyur lags/ gang du na skyo bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub samasadapa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
legs so zhes bya ba byin to/ rigs kyi bu legs so legasaso// khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di zhus pan lags so// rigs kyi bu de'iphyiri legos par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
zhig dang/ sa khyod la bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mogang la latshes kyi rnam grangs 'di ya gir 'dra ba dang/ ya gir 'drir 'jug pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang//
kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyasapar yang dag par ston pa dang/ me togadung/ bdug pa dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/
gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshanadang/ bdun rnams kyisamachod pa byed pa de ni/ 'danas sha 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang la las/
stong gsumagyi stong chenapo'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'diranapas yongasasu gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyasa rnams la sbyin b byinang bsani/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzani
pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ ya gir 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'dring 'ag pa dang/ chos sgrub de dag la'ang me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sngos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa la sogs
bas mchod pa 'ad rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu sngam gang yan pa de ni de snyed bsags pa ma ya na no// rigs kyi ba
tsha 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mag dang//
mgo bo yings su gtong ba bsan/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yi gera'adra ba 'am/ ma gir 'drar 'jug gam/ klog gam/ dad par byed pa 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin ba desanadi snyadabasags pa ma yin no// chos sa ba'i rigs kyi bu de nade bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngonapar 'du byabar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ byang chub semasadapa'asamasadapa' chenApa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yan dngabacas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// chos sa bde laphyogabagyi ba dang/
mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// bcom ldan 'dus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di naN+Di 'phrul che ba lags te/ de bsanArags kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
la gus par bgyi sta mnyan par bgyi'o// gus par bgyi stod labagyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gungan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin
gyis brlabs pa lags so// sa phyogs de ni mchod rten du gyur par blta bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs den lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yinadang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas
lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// gos kyi bu de de bzhinan// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu saphyogs de ni lha dang/ ma deng/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten/
gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas yano// de nas bcom ldan 'adusal ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa bran gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang mchod pa bgyidal/ 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sta la brtson pa'i soms kyis sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam stsalan/
de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur la ) bskal pa dgu khri'i bar du longs spyod che ba'i rigs rnams su skyo bar 'gyur ro// bskal ba brgyad khri'ibarang 'khor las sgyur
ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag pa rnamasasu skyobar 'gyur ro// gshas ngan du 'gumapar ma 'gyur ro// ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// bas na pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// denas btsem ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sims dpa' sems dpa'achenapo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//
rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegasapa chos kyi yoshesamatha' yas po chags pa med cing rdul^adang bral ba'i rgyalapo'i tog ces bya ba
byung sto/ der ngas bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// zhes nas kyang soms na rnams la bshad do// de ngasarnyedapa mod la chos bzodopa thob ste/ chos rnams la chos kyi
sa mge rnam par dag go/ sems can gang dgags thos pa de dag thamasacad kyang ngan song thams cad las yos su grol te/ nams kyang nganasong du ma 'grob 'gyur la/ chos rnams la chos
kyi mig rnam par dag/ sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngonapar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur// rigs kyi bu ngas kyang lamang bo/ le brgya phrag mang po/ pe stong phrag mang po/ lo 'bum phragam bar sems can 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gis dkris pa
rnams kyi phyir nor dang/ 'brudang/ 'gron bu dang/ gsar yongs su gtong babs nas/ mAThar gyis lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig dang/ mge bo dang/ sdug pa'abu dang/ chung
mdang/ bu mo 'bar du yongs su gtong bcasaso// skung dang sapa yosasu gtong ba dang ! khyim dang/ gro dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dngo/ rgyal po'i pho
bang yongs su gtong ba byas// la'abum phrag dumar tshangs par spyod pa sbyang do/ khyim pa dang sapa ma byas/ rgyal srid la dga' bo dang/ nor la dga' ba dang/ yul 'khor dang
brab 'akhor la dga' ba dang/ bu dang bu mo la dga' ba dang/ chungam lo dga'i bar ma byas so// gcig tu nges par tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bstan te// gcig tu nges par sbyin pa bya'i
na gcig tu nges pa sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun rnams la nad pa dang bsnyen bkur byas so// gcig tu nges par yang chos smra b rnams la ma tog
dang bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ ma tog 'brang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mer byas/ rimor byas
mchod par byas so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po'angs bsnyanabakur byas so// de'angs 'khor ba la skyo ba'i lugs kyis lus rnams byin la/ mag rnams dang/ rang gi yig rnams dang/
kang dang rusapa rnams dang/ rang gapags pa rnams kyang byin na/ phyi rol gyidas po gzhan dag lta ci smos// nga'agyod par gyur pa'ang med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha'i
dbang po rnams dang/ klu'i dbang po rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yAn gyi dbang bo rnams dang/ ma'idabangapo rnams dang/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu ba
gas rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi tshul 'di thos nas/ chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blugs te/ de dag thams cad kyis bzodab thob par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa/ grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ 'di nasams can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'ibya ba byed ba yanin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sanas dpa' 'phags
baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang/ mchod par bgyadapa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub
parobagyid pa'i soms can de dag dkon lags so// gang dag gsugapa mchis pa de dag sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
rigs kyi bu lags so legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa dang/ yi gir 'drib dang/ ya gir 'dra
'jug pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ chosasmra ba de dag la'ang ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'brangadang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ ges dang gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dana rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de dag ni dkon te/ de dgan de bzhin gshegs padang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi sgo/ rigs kyi bu sams can gang dag chos kyi rnam
grangs 'dalamachod bar ma byed pa dang/ 'dzin par mi byed pa dang/ klog par mi byed pa dang/ sbyin pa ma byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag bskal pa du ma dang/ bskal pa brgya dang/
bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba 'khobar 'gyur te/sdug bsngalamang posdug bsngal brgyadag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na bud med sbrum ma zhig yod la/ bud med sbrum mde'i
sa[@{ ]/ dalten bu chags pa de'ang/ khyebu'am bu mo zhig tu gyur na bung mad de 'a bu de gang gi tshe zla ba gcig lonanam/ zla ba gnyis lan nam/ zla ba gsum 'di nam 3

zla ba lnga lenanam/ zla ba tshang ba'i b.radu gyur pa de tsam du bud med de'i lus non par gyur te/ tshigs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/ ste'ong chung bar 'gyur/ skad kyi bcom 5 nga chung bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba de

ngag gis yongs su gzir ba'i lus kyis de tsam gyi sngag bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzinapar byedade/ bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can ngamyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo// de 'ang snyam
dusams te/ gang gi tshi bdag gi bu btsa' bar gyur pa de 'tsho bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na/ de'i tshatshangs par s+yAd par bya'osAmamo//de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur na/
sdug bsngal de dag phyis madran te/ bde ba'i 'dushis skyod par byed do// de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshophyi ma dusan/ sems can 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dang pa ra mabyed/
mchod pa ra mid/ 'dzan par ma byed kegang nga ma byed/ de dag sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam sas skyo bar 'gyur ro// de dgo
kyang 'dod chags kyis myos nas tshor bde dag bzed par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gis khyimadang bu smad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// chung ma dang/ bu dang bu ma yongs su bskyang bar bya'o snyam
mo gang ga tsho'ang soms can dmyal bar nye ba de'i tshe na 'gyod par 'gyur ro// gang ga tsho phyir thapar gyur pa de tsho ni/ 'dod chags kyis chags nas sems canangamaba' sngag bsngal
brjed par 'gyur te/ snyan pa'ang sbyin par mi byed/ tshul khrims kyang srung bar mi byed do// 'ad lta ste/ dperanamachang gsar ro zhing myos te tshabasacher ro zhing myos la/ gtulum par
gyur nas/ mingesams kyis kyang khyim 'tshol mi nus/ lam ya nga mi 'tshol/ pha mdang/ chung mdang/ bu dang/ bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun
yang mi dran te/ de chang gis myos pa de'i mthus dur khrodon 'dugana'ang 'jigs pa med la/ 'dasnyam du sems te/ lha 'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyan nga sag par byed nus pa su zhig yong sum
mo// de bong ba dang/ shing dang rtswa dang/ tshoma'amal gzhan dag la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyodapa las lus sorachud cing/ ratsho ba de sangs nas gang gi tshe dran pa rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'byed
par byed de/ bdagan srog la thug kyang bu/ bdag gis chang ni btung bar bya'o snyam mo// de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags kyis brgyagasashing khyim na gnas pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis/
sems myos pa rnams kyis// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun yang yongs su 'tshol bar mkhyid/ sbyin pa'ang madran/ mtho ris su skye ba dang/ rgyal por 'gyur ba dang//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba'ang yongs su 'tshol bar ma byed de/ 'khor ba de nying na 'khor zhing sems can dmyal ba dang/ dung 'gro'i phyogasadang/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten rnams su skyes pa'i sngag bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/ 'di snyam du 'dzin te/ bdag gi lus n bde sngo/ sdug bsngal ba med desnyamamo// gang gang sems canangamyal ba dang/
'a dung 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dedag nas thar to/ brgyal brgya lam na mi lus thob par gyur pa de'atshe/ mngal na gnas pas lus yongs su gzir cing mun nag gas
kyang yongs su skyo/ mngal du skye bar gyur pa lus bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ ldan ldan dang/ khrag dang/ phyi sasabartags pas skyo bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag
lo brgya 'am/ bsal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor bana'akhor zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad cing yang du ma 'ong ba'i
sdug bsngal myong la/ gang du'ang bdag cag gis skyabs med ba 'di las gang dag gi 'bras bu rnam par sminapa yin zhig gu/ bdag cag gis kyang sngon sdig pa mang du byas so snyam ste/ de ltar
mngonaganasanas sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra bar 'gyod pa skyed par byed de/ gang gi tshe bdag cag mngalan gnas ba'i sems can ngamal ba 'ad las thar par gyur pa de'i tshon sangs rgyas dang//
00 chos dang/ dge 'dun la mkhyad pa'i dad pas sgrub pa dngabatsal bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang bdag phyin chad mal gyisoms can dmyal bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de dag phyis mngal gyi gnas
nas thar nas bag med par byed de/ de dgaya'adoms canangamyal ba rnamasasu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas nanams kyang bag med par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mong tsa lags/ 'di ji ltar gzubar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sams can thams cad kyis bsabyed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam pa
'phrul pargyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogasapar byang chub pa zhes byabar yang zung zhig/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar
yang chung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dgadang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten stong
bde dag thams cad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lha ma yanadang/ dri zir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo
mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan popA[]barmadang/ su re ba tshu dang/ zhu chen gyi la tsab ban ng+ha ya shes sde la sogs pas bskyar cing zhus te gtan la phab/
gar skad du/ Ar+ya a gra pra dA pa d+ha ra Ni bi ra dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rigs sngags gyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gagazus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
la//'disnyad bdag gas thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'adasamanyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi lamagon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lngabacu'i dge slong ga
dge 'dun chen po dang/ lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs to/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltasanas chos ston to// sangs

a (rgyus kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi 'ong bya ba phrag stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
sgronam mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la tshes kyang ston pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang/ 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi
[62 ]khams mi mjed 'dar btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyakhyed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasang
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga lab der song staphyinanas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus sgron ma'i
mchog ces bgyi bang ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des
bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'amchog des/ bcom ldan 'das
la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchisapa la reg par gnas sam zhes bsun gsol la// de skad
ces kyang gsung ngo// 'di na ma bam/ mam lags pa 'am/ 'byung bo ram sha za 'om/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin pa 'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi sdo dpon nam/
rgyal po 'am/ blun pachanape 'am/ chom rkun nam/ sbrul lam/ sran bu 'am/ srin bu lu tu 'am/ sbrang bu lcags phu 'am/ nuba'anyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba bdag la 'tshabar bgyid pa
'ga' yang mamachas sam zhes gsung ngo// sems cano rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba dang// mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ grags pa/
dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ mngog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyab nga 'asad du bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dzA li []le/ dzA log te/ huk+ku/
muk+ta/ sa ma te/ ma saMm te/ mahAdzule/ dzub lam/ sahe sa pe/ mahAdzAle/ uke muke/ sha me/ saM mahe/ ma saMm te/ ma yA sham sdu/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/
tshe da ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dodogazung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cige/ kun ngaga' gosangs rgyas 'byungabarnyedapar dka' 'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dog rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi
gsang sngags kyi gzhi'od dug 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang/ len pa/
dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klogapa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu stonapa de ni tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dranapar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las
mgatogs bar gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da'ab dang/ 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthunapar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi ga'i 'di dag ni
sas rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdunagyis gsungs te/ gang gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed le zhi de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chenapa ma pham pa stan las langs/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzanganas/ pusamogayasapa' lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasasu thal mo
sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba
dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ mdog dang ldan par
bgyi ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ sra ba dang/ bskyab pa'i sladang gzus kyi gsang sngags kyagasha 'od rnamasabarjodapar bgyi'o// 'dultas/ ak+ti bat+te/ naSh+Tha/ kun/ pu kas/ ku nga
kasogs/ a nakos/ nAm ka sa/ a nu tu/ pra na te/ 'dze/ ma hA khadze/ sudapa thata2/ tur be/ du rale/ hi la mi la/ dal sa'/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyisagasang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig/ lang zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
gzhan dag la'ang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bosangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// gzud kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ad dag 'dzan pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo ragos kya bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ad dag 'dzan pa dang/
len pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byedapa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de na tshorabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nying la'ang
sngon gyi lasamagatogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad rjes su mthun par 'gyur// kun dga' bogazungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las yang 'da' bar byen de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sams can rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mdangs dang ldan
par bgyi ba dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi bdwang/ grogasapa da ldan par bgyi ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang/ mdog dang ldan par
ba bdung/ bsrung bdang/ sba ba dang/ bskyabapa'isladadu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzha'ada rnams brjodapar bgyi'o// 'di ltaso/ ag khi/ bag khe/ 'dzati/ nA gas re/ nAhI la/
dza ha la/ dzaha la bo hi/ tsa ri la ba te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun ngaga' labaka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'od
ngag zu zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya che rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba red par dka' 'o//
gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dog rnyed par dka'a'o// kun dga' bo gzus kyi gsang sngags kyu gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'a'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la lasagakrungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzani ba dang/ lenapa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu
ston pa de na cha bsabacu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bdang/ 'gro ba thams
cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bogazus kyigs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag na sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ad:
dag las 'da' bar byed pare ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi
donadang/ phanapa dang/ bde ba dang/ mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang/ grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang/
stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang/ mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ srab dang/ bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di/ pa sto[/]
ba=/ na[/ ]kun tsA/ Take e raka/ tu tape/ tuT be/ raTiki/ lol/ dule (li ma leti laM le/ la/ a b+he/ ban+d+he/ naT+The/ kun d+d+he/ a Na ba ti
ba che btI kas ka se sa phaso bas pasam hA yis pha sa sA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsa5pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyisogazungs
kyigasangasngags kyi gzhi 'gag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas
'byung brnyed par dka'a'o/ gzungs kyigasang sngags kyi gzhi 'di deganod par dka' 'o// kun daga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa'ang shin tu rid par daka' 'o// kun
dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la lagazungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzan pa dang/ lenapa dang/ 'chang ba dang keg bdang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/
gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de tshe rabs bcu bzharitshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tsho'ang nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan bya gnod pa thams cad las 'dar bdang/
'gro ba thams cad dang rjesasu mthunapar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ang deganasangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs te/
gang gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag las 'da' bar byedapa da de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags/
kyigazhi 'od ngag shadri skam pa ga sher bag med pa la bsrung ba bya ste/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ bcing ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas
na/ shing de la lcag gu dang lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ ma tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang mngonapar 'grub par 'gyur na/ mar gyur pa lta ci smos/ nam: sarba bud+d+he b+h+ya/ sid+d+ha
d+har Ni/ man pa dani hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sems can rnams kyi donodang/ phan pa dang/ bde bdang/ mdangasaM
dang ldan par bya bdang/ gzi brjid dang ldan par byab dang/ grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par bya bdang/ stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang/ mdog dang ldan par bya/
bdang/ bsrung ba dang ! snga ba dang/ bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyigasang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o// 'ad lta ste/ an+te de maN+Do/ pa kepA ra ke/ pa ge =/ dra ma
0 turakyi/ 'u (ma/ Tu Da ma rje/ tu ma 'o TA Na re/ su re ha lamu la ti la swA/ de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun daga' mol bka' stsapa/ kun dga' bo/
khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dgazung zhig/ langazhag/ tshungasashig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhanadag la'ang rgya cher rab tunyon cig/ kun
ngaga' bosas rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'a'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi dag redapar dka'a'o// kun dga' bogazud kyi gsang sngag kyigazhi ga 'dzanema'angashan tu rnyed par dka' 'o//
kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bamagangal lagazungs kyi gsang sngags kyigazhayid dga' n pa dang/ len pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog padang/ kun chub par
byedapa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tustonapa de ni tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rabs dranang ra 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa
thams cad las 'da'abadang/ 'grob thamasacud dang rjes su mthunapar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas n de la'ang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lha dang/
kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lhamamin dang/ namamakho' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phyochen podang/ mdang/ mim yin pa thams cad kyis ma tshugs so//
sbrul dang/ srin bu dang/ srin bu lu tudang/ sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'ams rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/
'dus pa dang/ dus tshigs 'gyur b.las byung ba thams cad kyisam tshugs so// zhag gcig pa 'am/zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum pa 'am/ zhag bzhi pa 'am ]zhag
bdun pa 'am/ zla ba phyedapa 'am/ zla ba gcig pa 'am/ la gcigapa 'am/ nad rgyun ras sam/ skad cig pa rnams kyis ma tshugasaso// 'bras sam/ phol mgagam/
rkang bu 'am/ lhug pa 'am/ mdabal lam/ shu ba'am/ khyi rdzo'am/ g.yanang 'am/ mdzathams cad dam lhag pa thams cad dam/ gshing byed thams cad dam/ bsgyur ba'i las thamA
cad dam/ byang thams cad dam/ rolangs thams cad kyis kyang ma tshugs so// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngagasakyigs 'dingaganasangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsung
te/ gang gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhu 'od dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin na/ kun dga' gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang na
'dug na'ang yod la bya'o// chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na'ang yod la bya'o// srin po'i nang na 'dug na'ang yade la bya'o// gcan gzan khro bo'i ning na 'dugana'ang yade la bya'o// 'brog dgon
panangana'adugana'angayade la bya'o// klangasadangabagrodadaka' ban 'dugana'ang yade lakhya'o// ma'i nang na 'dugana' ya de la bya'o/ chu'i nang na 'dug na'angayid la bya'o// de yang la/
byas pa de rnams 'jigasab de dag thamasacod mi 'byung// des dug zos pa thams cad kyang 'bras nyid du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzanepa ni
'byung bo thams cad kyis mtshigasaso// ya dgas thams cad dang/ srulapa thams cad dang/ gshang byed thams cad dang/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad dang/ byad thams cad dang//
mdang mam yanipa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bomador na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyisami tshugs so// kun dgor bogasad pa'i rig pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro//
chadabs gcad pa'i rigs pa nibarjegasapas/ brdegs pa'ariges pa ni brgyud pas/ brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsngags pas/ bsngags pa'i rigs pa ni mgo tshugs su bltas pas thor
par 'gyur ro// kun dga' gcus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang labasrung ba byas pa 'am/ yongs su bskyab pa 'am/ yongs su bzung bas bcings pa 'am/ zhi ba dang bde
legasasu 'gyur byas pa gzhan du 'gyurab de gnasamodade/ lhadang bcas/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcasapa'i 'jig rten dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i sku dgu
dang/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lham yan gyi nang na'ang ngas ma mthong ngo// de ci'aphya zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dgan gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang//
[D] 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis babs pa'i phyir ro// de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'du rdzogs lca chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad rdzogs pa'i rjesal/ rgyal po chen po bzhes/
gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasabadag cag gi kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi bdang/ chos smra ba de dag rjes su yos su gzung ba dang/ dam pa'i chos ci nas yun ring du gnas pa dang/
bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngagasakyi gzhi 'di rnams ts+tshesasu stsal bar 'tshel na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'dogs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzadang gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen pobazhil thugs brtse ba'aphyir cang ma'i gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'dasakyis cang migasung bar
gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pached du brjod do// de'ang lta sta danad+d+ho/ den/ mahAn: dzab+han/ saMb+han/ DA Di Na Ta ni/ maNA Na ni/ kuN+NaM kA ku khA ne/ ma hA ku ni/
d+harma le/ tsarma le sA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bu r ganga' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi
'di daga'adzin dang/ bzlas te bton nas 'chang bde sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi le nod pa mas cad las 'da' ba dang/ 'gro bathams cad dang rjes su mthunapar 'gyur ro//
de lanadam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la'ang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag khyed bstan pa
yunaring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legasaso zhes bya babyin no// de nasabcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshongang sngon kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag
rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur bdang/ phan yon che bdang/ byin che bar 'gyur ba'aphur gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub
bar gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasargyusapar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
don de nying rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'atshi tshigs subacad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste// sems can rnams /
laphan pa'i phyir// de nas kyang bshad pa yin// gang zhig gzung sngags mdo sde 'ad// 'dzanotakhaye naklog byedape// tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcigatu// de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//
gzung sngags 'di rjod byed de la// ma mi gang yang rungabadang// gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag/ nams kyang bar chad mi byed do// gzus sngags 'di rjod de lan/
'dod khams dbang phyug gang yanapa// sdig canabadud de nam du yang// bar chad byedapar mi 'gyuraro// gzung sngags 'di 'dzin byed de ya// phamadang ni phu nu dang// sring mo
mdza' shes gnyen dag kyang// log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir gzung sngags mdo sde 'di// 'jigasamang gang gis thos gyur nas// gzus sngags 'di rjod byed pa des//
nams kyapa'ajigs par mi bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de ya/ bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sgrib pa'i lasan gang byosang// zhag bdun gyis na byang bar 'gyur// byang
chub sems dpa' bsod nams gang// bskal pa byebar bsgrubs pa kun// gzung sngags 'di 'dzanibyed pa des// zhag bdun gyis na zol gyis non// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba
'kha po rgyalapon pobazhi po dag/ lus ngan dang na yul 'khor srung// migamabazadaba'aphags skyes ngo// kha dog ldan 'ang grags dang ldan// 'khor bcas byonabacas de dag kyang//
dgazung sngags 'din rjod byed pa// de la rtag tu srung bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skad cesabaka' nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bodang/ nyan thosachen po de dag dang//
'phags pa byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chenapo rnams dang/ rgyalapo rman po bzhi dang/ lhadang mdang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za'/
bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lamangon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rkyal pa sgron ma mchog gi gzus rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hAd+har Ti/ bang skad du/ 'phagasapa gzungs chen mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cang la phyag 'tshal 'de//
'di skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgen med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i rig stong gi dge
'dun chen podang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshi/tshongang ldan pa kun dga' bogrong khyer gnas bsasu dubyar gnas nas dbyar zlab gsum 'das pa dang chosags byas te/ chos gos zin nas
lhung bzedadang chos gos thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'duganas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyisasems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ stobs
dang/ gzi brjid kyi phyi'i gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dareg zungazhag/ chongs shig/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shag/ ya nga la
zung zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ kun dga' bogazungs chen pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhirnamasan skyod par dka' zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasang 'isangs rgyas rnams
'jig rten du 'byung ba'ang rnyedapar dka' ba'i phyir te/ dper na u dum ba ra'am tog lta bu yinagyis/ zung zhig/ chongs shagi/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ yid la zung zhig kun
chub par gyis shog/ kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakya bamo gang la lagazungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'phrin tum/ klog gam/yid la 'dzin dam
kun chub ng ra byedan/ de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma 'gyur/ dug gsam yani/ mes ma yani/ rgyus ma yani/ rgyalape'i chad pas ma yan te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed
par mi 'gyur ro// de lhadang/ lha ma yan dang/ klu dang/ rlung lha dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri zadang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/
ya dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ byung po dang ) brjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ gnon pa dang/ grib gnonadang/ ga sheng byed dang
gnod byed dang/ byad kyisamatshugs/ de la ma dang ma ma yin pa rnam kyis ma tshugs/ de la rig pa'i las dang/ ngag ga las dang/ yid kyi las kyis mtshugs/ de la rims nyen gcig pa
dang nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin pa dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ 'byung po'i rimasadang/ yungatsamadang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa
dang bang kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dusang las gyur pas ma tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chenapa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thu/ dzAle/ mahAdzul
dzA la ne/ ma hAdzA lan/ tApa ni/ ma hA tapa ne/ dzul te/ uk+ti/ buke/ saMb+ha de/ ma hA saM b+hade/ tsakri mahA tsakra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/
gnod pa dang/ nango'ago ba thams cad las srungs shig srungasashig su hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs cheme'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun
cu rtsa bdun gyisagasungs te/ 'ang da ltar 'chad cing rjes su yar ngo// kun dga' bo dadapa gis kya bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
ngag 'dzin tam/ 'chapangam/ klog gam/ yidil byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyisoms las ma ldeg par 'gyur
ro//de la gzungs chen pa'i gnas gsang sngags kyi gan ni 'od rnams yin no// tad+ya thu/ an+te/ bano/ klu me/ klum mo/ d+ha naso/ bad ne/ a ngan/ a da ne/
hul/ ma le/ ka re saMb+hi'i/ du sa te/ bdag dang sams can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig su

kun dga' bo gzungs chen pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/ nga'ang da ldan 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo// kun
k+Sha ngaga' bo dad pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen pa'i gsang sngags kyi gna' 'chang ngam/ 'dzinatam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na//
de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems lasam ldog par 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/
an+d+he/ ban+de/ ak+She/ ban+d+he/ Thage// d+ha ke/ dar d+hak+Sha Ta ke Na ra ke/ a kas/ sa ka sa/ ma kasi/ sa lam la/ ti lam la/ rir be/ ma hA rer be/ b+ha taMg mo b+ha tu
pa rA ya Ne/ ti ma ma gas/ ma hA ti masaM/ saM b+ha bi/ ma sa b+hi ba/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad lasaM
0 srungs shig srungasashagasAdA/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ang degan yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ rangang lta na 'chang
cing rjes su ya nga ngo/ kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang bdang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ yid la
byed pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa de tsho rabs u rtsa gcig gi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par ma 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang
sngags kyi ga' na 'od rnams yin no// tad+ya thu/ ru le/ ma ru la/ hipe'i/ mad tar/ dzaM b+han ! saMb+han/ kun daga'akhe dad pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
gzungs chen pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po bsrung ba 'am/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongasasu gzung ba dang/ yongasasu bskyang bdang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs sa
'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang bdang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsod pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ nam mkha' bcing ba dang/ sa bcing ba byas te/ de la sradabus bcings na de'i
ba'ang skyo bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ lhug ma dang[） ]me tog dang/ 'brasabu'ang skye bar 'gyuran/ rnamapar shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dgas
bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa na ma gtogs so// kun ngaga' bo nyazla 'di ltar 'phrulatshab/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni

[D ]sa la ltung yang srid do// kun dga' bo pa'i rgyal phe ribaganasanas g.yo 'ang sridad// kun dga' ba rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zabab/ 'di ltar rgya che la/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhingamathu che ba
bzhi po 'di dag bsams shang yongs su zad de mthar thug par 'gyur yang sridi do// kun dga' bo sa chen po 'di ni rnam ba stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni gsher banying 'dor yong sridi/ me ni
tsha ba 'dor yang srid/ rlung na grang ba 'dir yang srid kyi/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag na su mi srid do// kun ngaga' bo lha 'am/ klu 'am// lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha'
ldang ngam/ rlung lha 'am/ dra rnga 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum mam 3 srol po 'am/ lus
tshal srul pa'am/ 'byung pa'am/ bram ze 'am/ srin pa 'am/ grib gnonanam/ mi dang mi ma yin pagang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chon po'i gsang
sngags 'di ngag las 'gal bar byedan/ tad+ya thA/ ag+nili/ tsag+ga'i/ bal le/ mal le/ o hAn/ mo hAn []b+han/ sto b+hani/ bdag dang sems can thams cad las
srungs shig srungs shig/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo'abarab/ rab tu 'barab/ kun tub tu mched cing 'bar ba/ ma lcegacig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa
bdun du 'gemasaso// rgyal po 'phags skyes dang/ mag mi bzang dang/ rnam thos kyi burang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab mched cing 'bar
ba/ me lce gcigatu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// lha'i dbang brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phan to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje'ang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/
kun tu rab tu mchod stong 'barab/ ma gcig tu gyur pas de 'amago tshal pa bdun du 'gemasaso// de rgyalapa'aphobrang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/ de'i ma gosaN+Daka'i dog pa bzhin
du tshal pa bdun du 'gasaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun ngagabodang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yinangang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig/
rten ma rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pA la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogasaso///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan ma tra dang/ dAn shI la dang/
zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcosanasagatan la phabapa'o///rgya gar skad du//
Ar+yaAyab ar pradzAbar mnAmamahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha 'otu phyin yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub semasadapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'daskang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban bya rgod phung po'i 'o la/ dge slong khri
nyis stong lnga brgya'adegaso gi dge 'dun nadang/ byang nusems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bumaphrag du ma thabs gcig tu bzhugs te// brgya byinadang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten
skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khragakhriga'abum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo 'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yasapa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
thAlatshosbyang babatudonas 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldanu'as shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las bsonganams che ba gang thos pa tsam
gyisasams can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur dang/ byang chub langesapar gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegasam mchis par gsang sngag
sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gab+bags dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu
byed yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so// de'i phyi'i rigs kyi bu legs par b tu nyonal yid la zung zhig dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las

bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub langes par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag
bgegs mad par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bas/ bcom ldan 'angs la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ sems can thams cad lasman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ra tsho sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par
zhugs so// mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phraganas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung sta/ 'od zer de ngagags sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur te// soms
can gang dag 'od zer des rig pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla namadab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam
dpajug tu g.yogaso/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsanAn gyi phyi ma'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis de'atsho/ shes rab kyiya
latubya ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'amanyam pa'asamasarung/ byams pa'i sems dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang sngage ba thams cad dang bral ba'isoms su bya'o//
shes rab kyis 'das pas mkhas parol tu phyin pa'i snying bo'aja'ang gdon bar bya'o/ de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thubapa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/
rgyu o 'a ne mu ne ma hAmu na ye swAhA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'anyid pas banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'abyeng chub thob go/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo//
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chenalas khyod kyis 'di nying thobabs/ ri'aphyir byang chub sems dpasems dpa'achen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa ngag bcom
tshan/ ba yang dag par rdzogs ba yisangs rgyus 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa gshegs pa'i dpalabartsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lu yang bstan to// gang dag khyod kyi mang
nan pa dang/ 'jigapa dang/ klog bdang/ gzhanadag la'ang rgya cher stonapa dang/ glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par
'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dzaya/ pad a b+he/ a ba mis ra sa' Ne/ b+har so/ d+haro d+hir/ de btA/ anu pA lan/ budad+ho ta tA ran/ pu raya pa ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba AhUMm ma pa ni/

pA ra ya sa pa ri bA ra byas rba satwA nAny+tsa/ sarba karma a ba ra NA ni ma ngesho ng+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya bud+d+ha a d+ha'i nan sA/ don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyod pa/ byang chub
soms dang 'i yum/ 'phral du sreg pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar ya sangs rgyus thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par ma nus so// 'di
bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pasan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sulapa/ thabs so ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ ya gor 'du ba dang/ ya gi 'drir 'jug pa de dag
thams cad thabs su bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyiri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsalapa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po 'phags
ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang
[D] sems can bsod nams chung rnams kyi denadang/ smonapa dang/ bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtsha ra to/ khade bar gshegs pa ngo
mtshar to// bcom ldan 'angs kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems bsems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ ngage slong de dag dang/
byang chub sems dang 'a de dgadang/ lhadang/ mdeng lham yanadang/ drakhrir bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rengs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amed rdzogs so//(@#// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pa ra ma tAhAd ya// bod skad du/
bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das rgya la po'i khab bya rgod phungapor ri la/ dge slongag rige 'dun chen bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcomaldan 'angs zab mo snab
zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzani lasoms par zhugs so// yang de'atsho byang chub sems dpa' sems ngang 'a chen po 'phags pa ras gzigs dbang phyug/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing/ phung po lnga po de dag la'ang drang bzhan gyis stong bar rnam par lta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// 'ges kyabu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa sbyad
par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas/ tshong ldan pa shA pa'i bu la 'ang
skad ces smras so// shA ra'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha tshol tu phyin pa'abamo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/ 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung pa
lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin rgyas stong par yang dgapar rjes su blta'o// gzugs stongapa'o// stongapa nying gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa nying gzhanam yin no// stong pa nyid
las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bsan chos thams cad stong pa
zhi de/ mtshan nyid med ba/ mgyos pa/ ma 'gags ba/ drim chedapa/ dri ma dngabral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med pa'o// shAri'i bu de lta bas na stong pa
nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam pa shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ mad/ lus med/ yid mod/ gzugs med/
sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med/ chosazhed do// mag gi khams med pa nas/yang kyi khams med/ mde kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang med do// ma rig pa
med ma 'gapa zad pa med pa nas/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du'ang yod do// sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung bdang/ 'gogabadang/ lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ mthob
ba'ang med do// shAra'i bu de ltabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyinab zab mo la rtenacing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/
phyin ci log las shani tu 'dasazhasamya ngan las 'das pa'imadzar phyin to// dusagasum du rnamapar bzhugs pa 'isangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtenanas/ bla na
mor ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyasaso// de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig ba chen pa'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags//
0 ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byedapa'i sngags/ ma brdzun pas na bder shes par bya ste/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ smras pa//

tad+ya thA/ oM ga te ga te pA ra ga te/ pA rasaM ga te/ b+ho d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'asoms dang 'chanapos de ltar shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa zabamo la bslab par bya'o//
renas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byas nas/ legs so/
legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyang rjes su ya rangang// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'astsal nas/ tshedangaldan pahAri'i bu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyanaras gzigs dbang phyugadang/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dwang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yinadang/ drizer bcas pa'i 'jigarten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bastod do// bcom ldan
das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so///sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs
sngagasadang bcasapa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad mkhyenapa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan

kyi las snying rje'i tsan dan dri zhim po'i sbyos chus byugs pa 'a// zhebasapad+ma dang lha ma yan gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phanang ra mdzad pa/ ston pa
ngobazhin gshegasapa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhiba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzabarjid can/ sku ngo byad kyis brgyanab/ yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzog
pa la phyag 'tshal la/ pad+margyas pa ltar zhal bzhud de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyu sashang snang la nor bu dromad pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ spazhing gsal ba la
ma 'od zer stong 'bar bamang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'amchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dud do// oMb+ho/ hU~M/ A A/ hIhi/ ga ba
gab/ AtipahItaM/ sha masham sham pa ya/ ta thA ga ta/ anug tu/ sA ba/ ab+hA ba/ sa chud tA ya/ gas ma bal/ a bar lab la/ a ma tab la/ a ta ba la/ hra hUMg+haM/ d+hId+d+ho/ b+he b+ho/
b+heng lce du/ hAyA/ b+ha ga dzA/ b+hadaM ta ka su ra ta b+ho bamar/ nAti kar/ brab ko'o ka na ka pa// de nas dang khyad mtshan gsal bas// yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing// nyi ma bzhin du
gsal ba'o// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyun ma'ab// grags shing dras rab sangasal// drimad skyon bral chos kyi blo// khyab bdag chen po stobasabacur ldan// rdul bral dpal dang
ldan pang// rin chenas gzhi chen bor// pho brang rtse mo rdo rtsi// rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa// nor bu du ma rab 'brozhing/ 'od zer dri med gsal bkodapa'i rdo rje'i ngakyil
'khor pho brang na// thub pa'i las spyod sagazhi la// seng ge'i khri chen gsal bzhugs// nor bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang// khri chen rab snga de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen
gyi phun sumatshogs pa rgyun bkodalta// thub pa ma zlanor bu'i 'od// nyi ze non pa'i 'odoldan pa// bde blag shan tung kra shis tshul// 'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas// sku 'od
'bar ba'idagyila'akhor can// 'od gsal rgyasapa thub dbang gas// dri med 'od zer bkye ba// mgayo rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs ng ya/ rdo rje canadagarab 'dul
ba gang mAde kun dag byas nas// dkyil 'khor dramod skor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dra makun// legs par shan tu dag byas so// srid gsum dkyil 'kher rgyu che la// rnam pa du
mar 'od gsal ba// 'gre dang ma 'grom lus pa// bkong nas bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de// cod panam g.yosanang du zhugs// de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis//
'gengs shang mgo na glog ltar 'gyu// rig sngags pa zhes sgrogrung po// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed bag/ bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan// sdig mang mig rtsa
[D] rgod gyur cing// stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas// legs par mchod byas smras bzhi// kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing// bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel// rig sngags yon/
tan sgrubabyedapa// thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// nge gzigs dge bdu mngaris// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyusapar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu
spyod pas kyang// brgyudamarasangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing// spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi// yon tana'adi yis spos ldan 'di// thob pas so bar nusaso// longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can// byang chub

spyodatsab khul gyis phyusomasamchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnams kyisadabang bskur b.lI/ phyir mi ldog pa 'chos chen ldan/ 'dis saargyasaspyod pa yis// samasacana'an ga nan pa du maza mdakaragams// ma las ba/
iya tubasal nas ni// blo gros dris med par 'gyur// zhing dag byed bkra shis la// rngul med rgyun te zhi bar byed// dge zhange myang nathams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'tshems// dad
byengagasang sngags dam pa ste// sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel// masmad 'bras bu nges par sbyin// bstanapa yin te sdang ba'adul// nyes pa byas pa sil ba ya// gzungs 'di gang gis thes gyur
