0 resangasangs rgyus rnyed par dka' ba yang// ring por ma thogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing// khyababadag nyon mongs kun sal ba// gang zhige nyon mongs zhi byed pa// gzus
'da'achang bar byed pa yis// kun tu bzang ponying dngan/ lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thog/ rig sngags 'chang ga bdagayang// 'di thos bsan thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la lham
ma// bcom ldan rnam par snang na dzad kyi// dkyil 'khor dam pa gting mdapa// 'angan ji srid ma gsan pas// rab zhanyon mongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'phang brnyes te// rnam par
dag phyir gsan gyur nas// gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ de phyir phunasumatshogs pa dang// legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas// thub pa kun
gyisagabs po// 'khor ba 'dazhirimadu yang bdud kyi las dang 'khrugamongadang// mya nganamed cing 'thabamong pa// gzungs la gnas pasa'athobapar 'gyur// gnas kyi dam pa thes
nas kyang// thub pa dIm med pa'i blo// gzigasapa bzang rnamasagar gshegs pa'i// bzang 'gro der na'agro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis// tshig gi mdo 'amanyin par
gyis// nyon mongs zad par bya ba la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dus chog/ sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang// sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa// gang gis phyes nas des srong ba/
nga yisamangonasum 'byor par 'gyur// sdig pa gzhan yang mabya zhing// snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mgag ni mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa
[”]thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// tshorabs gzhanan stong dag dang/ tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang// sdig pas ge ga byas pa// ngag 'gyur 'ad la thetsos mod// yar gyi ngo yi tshes
brgyad dang/ de bzhin tshes bco lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs te// cho ga bzhunang sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med par yang// nyon mongs dgran rib 'joms
shing/gan tu thub dka'adapamed pa// nyesapa zlogapa'igazusabarjodan// thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bag nges par mthong ngar 'gyur// rtenas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yang// rgyal/
ba'asrasapa nyid du 'gyur// 'od dpag med lamanga' bayagi/ yon tan mtha' yasarab brgyanapa/ bskal pa bye ba stong du yang// mtha' mi rtogs pa thobapar 'gyur// de nas jorje 'chang
gatshig/ dkyil 'khor dgun gnas rnams kyis// thos nas rgyan rnamasasna tshogasang// bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed// rdo rjel ba la sogs pa// lha bdagagasal ba thams cad
dang/ ri bo tas ri rab la// gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang// de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen pon// 'khodapa' rige sngags 'chang rnams dang// ma la ya yi ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan/
'bar thegs rnams dang/ khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// lha mi dag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la sogasapa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams // nor bu'i dpung rgyan/
rnachadang// rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bskyed de langs nasan// sdig bral ma 'a dag rgyalabal// phyag 'tshal phal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyi sa ya dbang phyug ge/ thub/
mchog dam pa de la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyidi// shin tu rtogs pa lhamamag/ dul babastan pa dri masel// dris med ba skyon bral ba//
thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul ba bsal ba// stonapa ston mdzad brtan pa ste//
sngag pa med parnguladang bral// 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhib zas gtsang sras// nyonamos rab bcom phan 'dogs pa// ston pa bod drimasal// spyod tshul dri yod/
tshul bzakha// zab parnamapar gnon pa brtan// btsanapo thugasakhaco rnam par rgyug/ mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa los
grol ngesapar grol// 'jig rten kun mchog 'khru ba'is// bdag gir mi 'dzani dri mamed// nyon mongasasel ba dang la dang ldan// dpal mdzad de bzhan phan mdzad pa// mnyam
pamed pa dpomad pa// khyab bdaganyon mongs las rnams sbyong// khengs pa mdapa dman pa med// mnyamapa de bzhin ma mnyamamanyam// snang ba mnyes pa snang
byed med// 'jig rten snang mdzad sngagamad pa// sgrib pa thams cad sus pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi ba'amadzadab// nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par
mdzad// mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs ba// soms can kun gyi 'khris lags// donayong redadaka' byedang ldan// rdo dkya'i 'khor thub par dka'// skyobs pa 'gas sel
tshas pa ste// de bzhinasangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dpa' be nApo'ajigs pa med// gzugs bzangamatsha rnams gsal bas// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi lo
sbyong rgyumatsho lags// rab byad bzang pobakongapa'as// sasapa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston// dkab med pa'iston pa po// de bzhin des pa bde snyan pa// mthu chen yas pa rgya chab// bdu
brgya bzhi'i stobs rnams sel ma mdzad pa// brtson chen slob che ba stso// dgyes pa chen po stobs po che// mthu b.resabastanab chen po ste/ gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags// gsal bgasung
ldan dapa med pa// dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhib mun pa med// blo gros chen po chosa'adzan te// phun sumatshogs ldan chen brnyes// 'dodapa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal
mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyi longs sbyong shin tu rgyas// bcom ldan legs bgo bgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bakra shas rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nying mnyam pa nyid mkhyen
pa// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med// rab tu dgyis la los spyod gsal// gzhi bcasaselab mnyamapa lags// blo ngag blo ldan dri ma spangs// gnas chen brten pa ldan pa ste//
rgyal ba longs spyod dram med// thub pa thugs rje rgyunam ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral longs spyod can//
snatshogs 'od ljonadakyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dge ba rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dmapa lags// chos kyi rgyusta yon tan gnas//
rjed 'os mchog gnas las spyod che// nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa// khyu mchog che spyanab rdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can// shes
rag thabasadang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rtenam dge kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang// sad stobs dngayishes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/
ting 'dzan mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnamapar bgo la mngon sumapa// stong pasasangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyen/
[~ ]@#// pa yul las 'das// spyod yul sgrub pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don de tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag
la/sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// nechen mthupar skyes ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyamasangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//
sgyu don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongasabral ba thub par dka'// dge sbyong sngagapa sbyong mdzad pa// gnod pa dang ra bde bar 'byin// blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshon
cha ma lus gasan// dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pakhyadaparayuladang ldan// 'jig rtenathams cad dar mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsam gyis
ma khyab bsam yasayul// dpa med pa stadapar byab/ 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsung blo yastobs kyis 'byung// mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes
'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung ba chen po shes che// gnas chen bkAshisachen pas// mchod par gyur pa yulalas 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po/ sangs rgyas yul du
skyes pa ste// shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mkhas thunasumatshogs
ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan bsajamadzadang// spyod pam lus 'adud par mdzad// yosasu rdzogs pa rnam par dag/
sangs rgyas spyod yul rnamasangs rgyas// bgegs med ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi drigs pa sel bor mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dang 'a bo tshonapo thub med stobs//
theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs// blo chen brgal bar dka' ba ya// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rolagashegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg nga mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos
'dasapa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyalalasakyang 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyasapa yi 'bras bu gnas// gong nas gong du khyadapar na khyen// khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde
'byung sa dang zhinge rnams kyi// mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang rgyus la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha tshogs tshogasa rnams kyis/ phyag
byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khong// de nas dkyil 'khor chen pon// gnas pa ma lus chemamar 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'chang zhing// las nas cod panarab tu g.yos// dkyil
'khor mthon po thams cad du// skad ber chenapar yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i rgyanarnamagayo zhing// had drag po'i sgra grogs ste/ dkyem sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal ba grangs
med gsum bsags pa// byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya
rtsa brgyud thos nas kyang// gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// btsem ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/ sgrib
dang kun nas nyon mongs dang// sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog btonan// sgrib pa kun las nges grol nang// nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs/
shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur// de na longs spyod chen po dang// bde ba las kyang nyams ma 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje bod
'chang ba// yon tan mtha' yasasras de la// bcom ldan badud las rgyal ba yas// mngonasum gzigasanas bka' stsalapa// rgyal ba'i sa 'ad zhi ba ste/ nga rgyal la sogs/
nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs bden du phyogs// gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyung nyan byed pa// de dag
rnamadag bdag nyid de// sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang// de dgas chen 'bras bur 'gyur// rang por ma thogs dga' 'gyur na// 'chang sogs la la ci'ig smos//
de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la// gtan du bde ba 'dod pa ya si// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa ga zungs// mnyan bar bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis
kyang btonan ni// de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod// dge ba phun sumatshogs sbyin b/ kun mkhyen 'bras bu blamed mchog/
bde 'byung thob par byed pa yani// 'bras bu 'byed pa ci yang rung// thob par ma 'gyur dogs pa med// kun mkhyen 'phang khub gyung nas// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni dag
zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyus saya'abras bu sbyin/ yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje dAmi mang sbyin pa// 'di ni ma nyamapa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste//
'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshanabargya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
#/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya shu/ oM mu ni mu ni ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ lan cig bzlas
brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyang khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur go de 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso//
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags parnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag
latshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpya thA/ ka ka la ) ka la ke la/ ba ri ba ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba re tsan rasong te A gats+tsha/

Ar+ya A kA sha gan+d+hamadA kA ru Ni pa ra ya ha shAn/ d+ha ra ya bud+d+habany+tsa yo na/ tsar tsar/ tsi ri tse'i sa shu/ bton pas 'grub sta mtshon mdang/ me dang/ chu dang/ dug dang/ dug sbyar ma dang
byung stomasa rnams kyis ma tshugs so rgyal podang chom rkun lasogs pa thams cad kyis glags ma rnyed do// gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang/ gnod padang/ lage ba'i nang thams cad
tsom 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kya sAng pozhes bya ba'i gzud+hardzogaso//
mang #// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mthar yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'o// tad+ya thA a ma te/ a ma ted b+ha be/ a mi ta
saM b+ha be/ a ma ta ba kInA gA mno/ gag na kAr ti ka re sarba kye na kA yaM ka ri swA pA/ gzungs 'du'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'angalan gsum bzlas pa byas na/

nge rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ nyi shu rtsa gseg chub zlas pa byas n/ rtsa bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdoge pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong ladage ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro// snang
bar tha' yas rjes su dran rdzogs so/// @#// klu ba'i'abade ba'anagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyus la phyag 'tshal//
tad+ya cu/ tsatsan+de su tsan+do/ ma tatsin/ tsan ka ra Na/ sa sa'i bud+d+ha a d+ha ka la ki la/ d+harmaa d+haT+Thiti ka'i la saM g+ha sa d+hi b+hi sa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ lcaba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khri'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur to/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar ma 'gyur ro/ zla ba'i
'od kyi mtshan rjes su dranapas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so///// nam: sarba ta thA ga ta
sde daya/ a nu ga te/ oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA/ 'dalan cig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa su'i sAts+tsha
pa smros su dran pa rdzogs so// @#// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can laphyag 'tshal lo// na mo rata sha kha ni/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ti/
samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+yathu/ raterate rat+na sha len sA/ 'chi'i tshadranan ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ sharas nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum rnams kyi lhar/
skya'o// sangs rgyas ni chen gtsug tor can bya mtshon rjesasu dran pa rdzogs so//// @#// rgya gar skadadu/ pU dza ma g+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad
du ! mchod pa'i spyin ces bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo g+ha ba te/ badzrasA radramarda ni/ ta thA ga tA ya:/ a te samyaki saMbud+d+hA ya/

zlatad+ya thA/ o'adzibadzra/ ma hA badzra/ mahA te dza badze/mahA bid+ya sAhA/ ma hA nga d+hi tsit+tib=/ ma hA bo d+hi mi to pa saM kra ma Na badzaM/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha na badzrasA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho
gan 'di yin te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dganang zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing 'bas phyag byas par 'gyur ro// me
tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phrongadang/ byug pa dang/ bum dang/ chos gos dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ ba dan thams cad dang/ gdan dang/ gding ba dang/ na bza'
dang/ spyan gzigs dang bshes gtsang la sogs pa dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams/
cad dang ldan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thamasacad mthong bas yang dag bar dbugs 'byin bar 'gyur ro// ltadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dwa za dang/
lcam yAnadang/ namamakha' lding dang ma'amacad ng/ lto 'phye chen po thamasacad dang/ lagan rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang bcas rnams dang/ rgyal bo chen pa bzhi rnams
byibazhanayang dag par 'brang zhing/ srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbod par byed de// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag
nim bslabs par lan cig dran pa tsam gyis thob pa ra'agyur ro// mchod pa'i snganAces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//tu dkon mchog gsum
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasapad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achenab sgrib pa thams cad
rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ o ta ra tar/ tA tur/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ byur byu ru b+ha ya b+hu a ku ru

kuru/ sa rba karma A ba ra Nadzan misha dra b+ha ya sA dzal ni bi d+han kho sA dA/ ku ru pany+tsa lag tA/ sA ga ra saM ba ri swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+haT+ThitaM sA dA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te
[un } ]@#// nang sar langasanas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas n zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lonapa'i/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// spun lnga'ang rnam par dag
bar 'gyur ro// de la mig nad 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// lus la nad 'byung bar ma 'gyuraro// yid kyi nyis pa la 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// spyan lnga'ang rnamapar dag par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du yang rnam pa lnga'ang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyus 'byung ba dang phradapar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi sAng po laganas kyi bar dusangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ chos
thosapa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyan bkur byedapa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lus mdzes par 'gyur ro// sems dang bar 'gyur ro//
'phags pa pad+ma'i sbyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//(@#// rgya gar skadadu/ su pan ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ su ru pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// nam su ru pu ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ adz+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oMsu ru su ra/ pra su ru pa su ru/ ta ra ta ra/
b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+har/ slar smar/ san+tar pa ya/ san+tar nga ya/ sarbapra tan ma sAhA/ gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas
sa gol gyi sgra lanagasum du byas nas yi dgas thams cad la dpenapa'as phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing/ 'di skad kyang brjod pa bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shAg//
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i pa dgas rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis spyane par bgyi'o zhes pa'i// zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyan par bya'o// de ltar na yi dgas thams/
cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i brdar ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas n skye ba nas skyo bar yang nyamasachung bar ma 'gyur ro// dbul par mi 'gyur ro// stobs ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/

mthong nadaga' ba dang/ phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang zhing nad med pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tumangonapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
mo sa'aphosanas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasasu skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////@#// rgyagar/
skad du/ Ar+ya a ma hA b+ha yatA ra NinA ma d+har Ni/ bongaskad du/ 'phags pa 'jigasapa chen po brgyadalas sgrol ba zhes bya ba'agazungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang ba thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sbos dri la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i rtsal dang
lda na pa la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs bsgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal la//
de bzhin gshegs bzhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalago/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i blam laphyag 'tshal lago/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rje chen po dang ldan pa 'arlags
bachad par byed pa la phyag 'tshal la// tad+yathA/ d+ha'i ra de/ d+hare d+hareNi/ ra dko ta/ a b+ha yA kalce ka ni/ gte A nanakale/ a mr-i ta kale/ utAsha re/ a nan mu khe/ anan tsakU/
samung+ga te/ o b+ha sA hA/ rigs kyi bgazus kyi gsang sngags 'di dganasams can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi byim snyad dag gis
gsus pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ rjesasu yi rang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de/ 'jigs pa brgyud pa saMms can dmyal
ba'i rigs pa mthar ms pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang/ yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang/
bgrod dka' ba'a'ajigs pa mtha' yas pa dang/ spyi ba'i 'jigasabamatha yas pa dang/ nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang/ 'chab 'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'anga' bar
0 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'asi sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnamapar g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar

'gyur/ zad ma shis pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sngal pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro// na ma: sarba bad+d+ho/ sadi rdzun ma man pA da swA hA/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyud las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i
gzungs rdzogasaso/// @#// rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yab shub tin ma dar/ bedaskad du/ 'phags pa khyadapar can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sas
rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jaskad bdag gis thos padus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba tshes nyi shu la yu la phug ron canan/ grong khyer

sa'i tsozhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tsho brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/ grong khyer gan so zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de ma yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad

brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang/ dge slong des bar dor ma lus chen pa khrun du 'dom sum cu yodapa bzhin 'dom bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dge slong tshabarjodades mdi lta bu
de la 'ang snyam du bsams te/ kyim ma 'dzin las che// 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurang lan du nges so snyam nas/ des bus mo gnyis ka'i lhangs la btsugs te/ ma lus chenapo ga
@#/ lang der legs su thal mo sbyar ba btunganas/ ma lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// cakhyod 'jamadapal gzhonanur gyurapa ste/ 'dir 'khod dam/ 'dzam
dpalagyis smras pa// dge slong de de bzhin no// dge slong des smras pa// 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling
'dare sams can rnams lanang rnam pa sna tshogasal 'byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yanedang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ driza rnams ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des nyi zla'i 'od/
kyang ma mngono/ nyim dang/ zla ba dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu sar rnams kyang nam mkhar bar skabs namasnang ngo// de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyedape g.yul bkye ba dang lha rnams na 'pham/
lham yAna rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tsho'abyung po dang yi dgaso rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nang gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang/ 'brum phran dang/ mo dbal dang
lto bon ba dang/ rims nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi ba dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ bod kanalas gyur pa dang/ 'dus
pa las gyur pa dang/ klad pan ba dang/ phol migadang/ g.yanab dang/ tshadapa dang/ mgo nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrobs bo// 'di lta ste/ char chis pa dang/ than pa dang/ dus ma yin pa'i
char gyis lo tog thunasum tshogs pa'i 'os 'brog sems can rnamasakyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshadang/ stobs dang/ mdog dang/ gzugs 'brog ste/ de'i tshe'adzamabu'i glinge nasems can
thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su rkyen to// gtum po seng gdang/ spyang kadang/ stag dang/ sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyisasams can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i klungeg
sems can rnams la dusam yan nga chud za ba nyabar gnas pas/ sams can rnams nad las thar par bye'angadaka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dirasamAts+tsha rganapa dang/ bar ma dang/ gzhan pa dag las
dkrigs phrag sum cu 'tshabar 'gyur ro// de'aphyir ngadagaso khyod kyi gam du yongs kyis/ khyed kyis 'dzamabu'i gling gsems can thams cad la chos kyi rnamagrongs 'ang sgrogs shig/ de ci'i phyir
zhen/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni' risnyamadu/ bdag cagaji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas na dge slong khyod
kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'disgrogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'phyirinan tan gyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun du dad par gyis shig/ lha rjod
cig/ de bzhin gshegasapa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la sos dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad par can gyi gzungasakyang lcegs shig
'am bdun yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag
'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ba bu lagati/ ba spu las re/ bi bu la yo nisha/ an sa le/ a na la saMb+ha be/ an la te/ sha ta ka ra/ b+hedza lani swA hA/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam+b+hane/ mohane swA hA//

bon tA ri ka yang sA hA/ bo mi d+hamo/ d+ham tsayeswA hA/ d+hare b+hi d+ha re swA hA/ ka ba ka ru tra ye swA hA/ shi ti phanan na'i par+ya sA hA/ byu ru d+har/ bdur d+hi yo sngahA/ ba la mapa tsun d+ha ya swA/ a ba

la ki ra ba le ka tA ye swA hA/ adzAn bi d+ham rtse sa pad+masAri/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ kang ka re/ ha ho kariye swA hA/ sangs rgyasadang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalal// 'di lta ste/

tsan dra pra b+he/ tsan dra na gan+d+he 1 tsan dra tsuN+NaM ) ko la sa pa ti/ sarba bud d+ha/ a deshwa ta a nu mo de taswA hA/ byang chung sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalal/ 'ang lta ste/ tad+ya thA/
dza ye dza ye/ dza ya lab/ []ya na sAm des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'aphags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na sa ra ga gnas mur

ga te/ ga ga na nga kan tA/ bi kAn te/ e dzem jo pad+mo dza swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ho b+ha dre/ ma hA b+hadre/ a ti b+ha dre/ saman+tab+hadre//
ba ga ta rA dzam/ ma hA ba ga ta rA dza sa/ sa ga tung ga te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ mahe ma ha ma nyamasA/ de bzhin gshegs pa
'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a ma tod b+ha be/ a ma ta saM b+ha be/ a ma ta pa kAn+te/ a ma ta ba kareg re/ a mi tag ga ni kArti ka re sArA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung
gnas la phyaga'atshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ga gan a ka re/ ga gnasaM b+ha be/ ga ga na kAn+ti ka re swA hA/ de bzhin ga shegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di lta ste/ sa ma sa me sA hu/
de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i rgyal mtshanastsal gyis 'brugabasgrags gangashegs nga la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste as ma a sam sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag
'tshala'// 'di lta ste/ mA na b+hishud d+he/ pad+mehA/ bad+ma saMb+ha re/ kang ka re/ hi tang kari ya sAhA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ma ti ba ga ra dza sa/ de mag ti/ karma ma hAr dza dza/ sho d+ha ni swA/
byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di lta ste/ mi tra ma naso sA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha' sIng po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta
ste/ gasmyu gany+dzi/ gad+d+hA ba sho d+ha na sA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ad lta ste/ akA ye nu/ a klu ye phu//
akA ya kam ba sho d+han phuswA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ kAn+titwA/ sam+badzani/ a b+hi kAn+to tA/ badzrasat+'a ni/ badzra a
kare/ badzra bi dA ka re swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di lta ste/ sa rma A ba ra Na bi skamab tshisA hA/ d+ha tu bkar Ni swA hA/ me g+ha ma soT
ma sa/ a pA ra dza tu kA ya sA/ ba la da nga byis// dra karma da nga ma swA hA/ kA rmani ba ta kA ya sa tA/ e ka a ra ma yasA hA/ yo gA tsa ra ye swA hA/ sa bud+d+ha a b+hi TIka ta ye swA hA/ pad+me
ba ku te ye swA hA/ sad+ma d+harma a b+hi li ka ta ye swA yuaka kA ye/agagayasnyad/ b+hUta ye swAhA/ asaM b+hu ta ya sAhA/ sats+tshadu bu kho pra sham Ni swA hA/ bla 'od gzhonanur gyur pa la

phyag 'tshal la// 'di lta ste/ saM dra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+ha a kare/ pra b+had ka re/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harma ba shud d+ho/ karma bi shu d+hir/ b+ha ba tu masA/ tshibarjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di
nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byas na/ de'i las kyi sgang pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// ngag song bdun la zas sbyin no// ma las me spel bar bya'o//
mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti stang byas la bskor ba bya'o// dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bkag pa la brtson par bya'o// gal te yams kyi nad cher byungan/ khyim nas khyim dang/ grong
nas grong dang/ grong khyer nas grong khyer du/ khu bdang/ bdug pa dang/ gtor mdang/ lhabashes kyis mchod pa bya'o// nang pa gang yanapa des kyang mo ga'adi bzhin du byas na/ de myur
du nang las tharapar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'jamadabal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'daskad ces smras so// dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos
kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'dzan tam/ klog gam/ ya gir 'dri'am/ ya gira'adrir 'jug gam gzhan dag la'angargya cher yang dag par stonan/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ro// yang 'ajam dbal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshobarjod la 'gad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye ba thams cad kyi rna lam du grags par 'gyur
bal yul nas yul dang/ grong khyer nas grong khyer dang/ grongonas grong du bskur bar bya'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshabarjod la 'ad skad ces smras so// tshe brjod rigs
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan cig bklags de bdag nyid thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar par 'gyur ro//
sus lan gsum bklags n de tsa lag gi tshogs kyi skya bo dang bcas te thar par 'gyur// sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad thar par 'gyur ro// sus/
lan lnga bklags na de nyen kor gyi rgyal po dang thar par 'gyur ro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tsho brjodal 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam gras 'ad myur du yul gzhan
dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang lon tun 'ang dag 'byung bar 'gyura'o// tshabarjod gang gas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la ma'adzanatam ) ma klog gam/ yi gerayaMdri'am/ yi ger
'dAr ma 'jug gam/ kun chub bar mi byed dag/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu ma stonan/ lul gzhan du ma zhitam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mod byas te mi

nyan tum/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su ma sngon/ mtshams med pa la byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba 'dra ba de 'dra bar na ngonapar 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
wa/ dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar byed ba de nas theg mnyid du ngang par bya ba

lano// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ par rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan
dag bya'o// de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ma snang bar gyur to// dge slong tshabarjod kyis kyang 'jamadapal gzhonanur gyur pasangs pa la mngon par bstong de bzung nas
songang// 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso///@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+tsa shra mU la tan+ta/ bod skad du/
'phags pa 'jam dbal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa'athams cad laphyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/ bcom ldan 'das gnas
gtsang ma'i snying ga nam mkha'i dkyilon byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogasasoso tha dad pa )bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ ngomatshar rmad du byung/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma rigs kyi lha'i bu rnamasal bka' stsal pa/ lha'abu dag khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpasems
dpa' chen pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ ngamatshar rmadadu byung ba/ ting nge 'dzan gyi bye bragadang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnamapar 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nyo bar 'tshob/ tshadang/ nang med pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ yang bsams pa yongs su rdzogs
par byedapa'i sngags kyi gzhi gsams can rnamasalaphanapa'i spyir bshad par bya ste/ deshan tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs sozhes gsol te/ byang chub semasadapa'a rnams kyi sbyong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyadapar dang sa
chen po thob par bya ba dang/ rdo rje'i gdan gnonapadang/ bdud gdul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi ngesabar 'byung bdang/ lha rnams dang
ma rnams su skye bar byab dang/ sdug bsngaladang/ dbul ba dang/ nang rnams zhi bar byedang/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byedang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das ba'i sngags kyi sbyong/
pas 'phongs par ma byed pa/ re bathams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yinab/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thug
dang phan pa'i thugasadang/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtsa ba nye bar bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bshadadu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'angasashAkya thub pas thams cad
skadang ldan pa'i 'khor dang gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'ong rnam par sos te/ yula rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bar bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'dabye ba' phrug

brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar phyogs su brgya stong gi gang+gA'i klung gi 'jig rten
khams 'dasanas/ mi tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugate/gang na me tog kun tu rgyas pa rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs por ro// der yang
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub semasadapalasams dpa' chen po spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
bas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ byang chub sems pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di ni nge la sa nga dag par bskul ba'i
phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cagagayeng ba mngapar gyis shig ces snasaso// donas byang chub sems dang lasems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba mag ma 'dzums shing la bu
bas 'od gangan ba de logs su mngon du bltas nasa'adug go/ de nas bsku'aba'od desam tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen po sa snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu sbyos
[9g ]pa rgyalapo'i dbang por bzhag dekas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpachenapo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i spyi bor nub par gyur to/
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ btsamaldan 'dasam tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyug
'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyesapa rgyal pa'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gsheg
zlakha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang//
sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang/ sgrub thabs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chog dang/ gsang ba dang/ cho ga zhib mo dang tshoga'i ngo bo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang/
gsang ba dang/ phyagargya dang/ dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang/ somasacan thams cad kyi bsam pa bla mas cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bu mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal/
lato/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das ma te'o kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang pod bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzinagang la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyogs
bzhi mthar yas mu med pa stong dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dang/
bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzan gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/
byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang/ sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs pa ra ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes ba rgyu la pa ra
dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dang la gzhon nu gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po
gsas ban yig gcigapa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ somasacanathams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par canabazang po yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs la yud tsam zhig cang ma gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thamecad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan/
gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongasanas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so/ ]nam: sarba bud+d+hanaMo maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi
snying po mchog yan te las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzanide las lasanas/ dpon skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskums

las bskyang ba dang/ brkyang ba las bsam pa 'am/sa la gtogasapa tsamamam/ mag 'byed 'dzum tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shugs blo tung nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par

'phrul pa zhes bya ba lasnyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jigarten gyi khamasasu rgyas te song ba dang/ stong gi nam mkha'i dkyil nanor bu rin po che ra tu gnas ba'aganas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams
gnas su chas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yin bo che rnamang tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ rin poche'i gdugs dang/ dpag tshang brgya stong phrag du ma rgya chab ' lha'i gis dang//
dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang skad ces bka'astsal to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la babapar shesanas song zhig/
'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyamang bzhung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das ma rtog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhinagashegs pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhan yang gzhon nu gang+gA'i
krungabargya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyis khyed kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang rmog zhib mo dang/ gsang
ba dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ phyag rgya'i tshogs dang/ cho ga dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ bzlas pa dang/ brtul zhugs bs mapa thams cad yongasas rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams
cang dga' bar byedapa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab rang nu'adusapa dang/ nga ltar byungabadang/ ma 'ongs pa shesaMpa/ rgyul po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba yul gyi
mthar 'grobar byed pa// ma snang bar byed pa dang/ dus dang/ dam tshig rab 'byams gyi tshogs thams cad dang/ 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub semasadaba' dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rangasasargyas ris par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungasapadang/ gsung ba dang/ gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar
rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes nasong zhig ! shAkya thub pa'i spyanasngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos por gyur te khyod kyang ston pa
'gyur ro// yang gsungasapa/ nam: sarba[q]ga ta naM/ a tsan tu a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnaM/ oM sma ra smar a pra ti ha ta shAsan ku ma ra ru pa ha ri Na/ e A hUM phaT phaT swA
hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyupa'i rtsa ba'i sngagasaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur

la khyod kyang m mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams susong nas dbye ba dang rnam pa dbye ba rgya che ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su/
gnang bar 'gyur// 'di'i snying pomchog tu gyur pa ni o bA kyed ma/ 'dir ba'osang pano/ ba kyihU~M/ de nas 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'dasam tog yang dag par skyes/

pargya lapo'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyun byang chub sems dpa'i spyodape dang rgyu mthunapa byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i lham tog rnam par bkod pa dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ 'phranganga'i tshogs dang/ rinapo che'i dril bu'i dra bas
'brelab/ snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ phyi ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed// lha'adriding/ byugapa dang/ 'phrengabadang/ phyama'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to// denas

gnas la/tsang ma'igs kyi lta ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhung gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/
ci bdag cag 'byor pa nyams b.ram gyur tamazhes phan tshun du'angs par 'gro'ang skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom bar byed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ shAkyakhrub pa
mongasasu bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a[E]ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nim tog yang dag ba skyes pa'i rgya lab de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la bltabadang/ phyag bya ba dang/

bsnyanabakur bya ba dang/ don chenapo'i spyod pa dang/ sngags kyi tshogadang/ rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongasapa Anano//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ gi ma 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabasaganyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'ang dgagis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa//

skyes bu bskyang pa khyod phyag 'tshal//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo skyes rgyu gtso'i khyod phyag 'tshal/spyod pa thams cad don grub pa// skyes bu sang ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phung krol thams cad zlog byed pa//
dpa' botshonapo khyod phyag 'tshal// ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa// skyesabu pad dkar khyod phyag 'tshal// kun nas bsod nams dra ldan pa// skyes bu pad+ma khyod
kyi phyag 'tshal// srang gsum 'daman rnam dag byed// rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshalal// sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed// zhi gyur khyod laphyag 'tshal lo// thams cad ldan pa legs/
'dul byed// thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshalag/ sngags kyi sodapa'idonasgrub byed// bkra shis khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ bkra shas kun gyi bkra shis pa// sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag
'tshalag/ chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i yang dag par rjesasu zhugs shing stonapar byedapa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
shesabya dang shesakhya'i dngos po brams cad dang/ 'dus byas dang dus ma byas dang/ theg pa gsum rgyalamadang mya ngan las 'das pa 'a lam la 'jog par byedapa dang gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa

tsham khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes/ tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i stod pa'i tshig gis chos ldan dusalamangonasum du stong nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas 'dzinasagang+gAkwang brgya brag stong gi bye
masnyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes ba zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis// den ma tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
khams gang du bcom ldan 'dasam tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal pod bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
gshegasab ! 'jig rten mkhyenam/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i la starab/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/u0f74ra du dge ba mang dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang pa/
ma 'dresapa/ yosan rdzogs pa/ yosas dgapa/ yongs su dkarab/ tshangs por sbyodapa yang dag par sbyodapa yang dag par ston to// de nga ltarab zhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/
sngags kyi spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang/ lan gsum gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang/ gnas dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ bde ba dang//
shan tumathar thug pa dang/ shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston// bcom ldan 'angasade nyid kyi rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs drung 'dare mchis
go/ ba[W]ldan 'dasam tog yang dagu pa rgyas pa rgyal po'i dbang po de'ang bcom ldan 'dis gnodapa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o// 'di
skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu 'asIgasamalnga'i dus su sangs rgyasabcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba na ngo mtshar to zhesaso// de'ang lam gsum dang/ byang grol dang/ mar skye
ba thob pa nyid chos ston par byed do// gang du'ang sems can gyi ris skal ba mad pa dang/ sridab gsumayang dgapa 'joms par byedaba'i lam dang/ gtan du grub
padang/ bde bdang mthun pa'i ma nganalas 'dasapalasems can rnams 'god pa byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa'i rtson 'grus nango mtshar to// bcom ldan 'dasabasam gyis mi khyab ba'o/
sangasargyusabcom ldan 'das kyi thugasan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyisamkhyen pa'a'agyur@#/ bdag gi tsazhig 'tshe ba Do thogs/ dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul bsam gyis ma khyab pa rmad du
byung bsas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa rgyus kyi rnam par 'khrul shes par gyur tamaM/ 'tsha bar ram/ thugs kyi sdud paspyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang spyod pa
'tshabar ram/ mdor na bskal pa bye ba khriphrag brgya stong gi bar du'ang bstan par ma nus so// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzadapa bsngos pa 'am h+pha
dadam lus pa'i ngo bo 'dzin chos 'dus ma byas s bltab bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya b.labartanapa'am/ yon tan nibcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nasamkhyen ng yin gyi/ bdag/
gis na mi lags so// de nas 'jamadapal gzhonanur gyur bsarang gi rdzu 'phrul rnamapar 'phrul pas rin po che'i brla sprulabal bcomaldan 'adas shAkya thubapa labalta zhing 'dug go/ de nas
0 bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapas/ byang chub sems dpasems dpar chenAbo'amadapal gzhon nur gyur pa de nga 'gashegs pa dang rjes su mthunapa'i gtamarnam pa sna tshogs sngonangu 'gro ba mdzad
nas/ chos bstanapadang/ rjes su mthun dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i sbyod pa sgrub dang rjes su mthun pasatshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ ka la bang ka'i skad dang/ 'brug dang/ rlab mi'i
sa skadakyigasung gi dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhononur gyur pa khyodalegs par 'osasam/ sems dpa' chen po'i sodapa sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis byin gyisabarlabs paslabapa/ byang chub semasadapa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang/ gsangab dang bcas pa dang/ dbang bskur bod/
phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ tshogidang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ tshadang/ nang med pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogasapar byed pa sgrub pa'i thubs thams cad dang
ldan b/ rgyud shes dang/ shes bya dang/ dus dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rgyalapa'i zhing du gyurapa/ 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs padang/ da ltar byung ba'ishes par byed pa/ mdor na sems canathams cad
kyi bsamapo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byedapa/ rang gi yon tanadang mthun pa'i sngags kyi spyodang rjes su 'jug pa/ sems can gzhanangaga' bar byed pa/ mi sna bar 'grotha da nam mkha'
[~ ]@#// la 'grob/ chu la ma nub par 'grob/ yad gzhungs par byed pa// 'gugs par byed pa// sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed/
pa/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang/ mngag gzhug pa dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa// byis pa dang/ rgan podang/ gzhon nu gnas Na lta ba bzhin
'jog par byed pa// mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/ ya de 'ge ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa// mngon spyod dang/ rgyas pa dang/ zhib las dag rab tu byed// ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba

de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal pachi bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byama'ar pas kyang rjes suganang zhibs ngas rgyas thams cang kyis kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag pa'i rang gi
sngags spyod pa'i don gyis chos kyi mtshongaskye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ su bo mang po'i bde ba dang/ lhangang ma rnams dang/ sen sa can thams cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyir ro// de nas
'arngam dang la gzhon nur gyur pasangs rgyas thams cad kyis byinagyisabarlabs pa'i 'od kyi snang ba bkodapa'irgyun yang dag par bsal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan lasoms par

zhugs m thag tu ) dag pa'i soms can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang+gA'i klungag bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'og man gyi gnas kyi bar dang/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen
bo'i bar du khyab b.rabus te/ sems can gangasu dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu 'bar gyur to// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'od ng/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas 'od de'anga'ajamo dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// 'dir gang dug shar phyogs na rnam par
gnas pa yisas rgyas kyi zhing des 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor rig pa'i phyobs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bskul te/ de bzhin gshegasang 'od kyi zla ba snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang//
de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bslu'i 'od dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu snang bzhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par 'phagasab zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhanegashegs

bsar 'irgyal po zhes bya ba dang ) de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ reb ni
gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yasadab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa snangaba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa'atshogs kyis yongs su bskor mthar yasam med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/ de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rlogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag
sbrul ma mjed 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas gtsang ma'i khang bzang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasang 'asas rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang/ sngags kyi tshig gdon gyi lelu rab 'byams ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nubadang/ byang g phyogasadang/ phyogs mtshams
dang stong dang/ 'go dang/ thad kathams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cadis bkang bar byas nas byang chub sems
dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs bskor cing nyan thos dge 'dun dang bcasapasamadun gyis bltas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas susangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyidi
chen blta bar 'dod pa dang/ sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang le'u'itshogs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thegos pa med pa gsal bar 'dod pas chas pa
ni 'di lta ste/ lag bza dang/ rin chen bzang padang/ brtul zhugs bar podang/ mtshesadang/ bzang dga' dang/ chos bzang dang/ don thams cad grub pa dang/ thams cad du
'phags pa dang/ chos 'phags dang/ rin chen 'phagasadang/ rin chen dpal dang lhunapo'i dpaladang/ bsam gyisam khyabapa'i dpal dang/ 'od byed dpal dang/ 'od dpal dang/
don thamasacad kyadepaladang/ thams cad phyag na rin po che dang phyag nagatsug ga rin po che dang/ phyagan lhun po'i rgyalamtshan dang/ rnam par snang mdzadasnying po dang/ rin chen snying po dang//
ye shes snying pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi sAng pa dang/ chos 'phags kyisAng po dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang ) tog bzang dang/ mtha' las rtog dang/ dri ma med pa'i tog dang
mtha' dgag tog dang/ nam mkha'i tog dang/ rin po che'i tog dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang/ mthu'am sa bar snangaba'i ya shes kyi rgyal po dang/ mun pa mun nag
thamasacad 'dzoms pa'i rgyal po dang/ gnodapa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang/ srid pa thams cad kyi yu 'ashes pa'i rgyal padang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal bo dang/ mngon par
rtogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal podang/ rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyalapadang/ nges nga ra g.yo bar byed nga 'a rgyal po dang/ nyi ma'i rgyalapodang/ dngos po med pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal
bodang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyidi yang dag par 'phags pa'argyal po dang/ mthunang 'a phyogs med pa'i rgyu'ang dang rang bzhin gyi 'od dang/ bsod nams 'od dang/ 'jig rten 'od dang/
dpag med 'od dang/ mtha' yas 'od dang/ spyan bzang 'od dang/ 'byungamar 'dodang/ don gyi 'od dang/ ma tshugs pa dang/ bzod par dkarab dang/ las med dang ! 'og min dang//
dramod dang/ me dang/ 'od dang/ dang/ rtogs pa dang/ bde nga dang/ bde ba'i mu khyud dang/ mu khyung te'o dang/ 'dod pa'i lha dang/ lha dang/ lha yul yod/
pa dang/ lte ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rten zhi ba dang/ nabar 'dod pa dang rnga ba tshe dang/ grub pa dang/ dkarapo dang/ grags bzang dang/ bzod pard 'badang/ rnyed par dka' ba dang

'tsha gdul bar dka ra ba dang/ bsAnabar da ka ba dang/ ringadu song ba dang/ rang pa'i don dang/ rangeng pa la gnas pa dang/ mtho ba dang/ shin tu ma phyogs bdang/ srin bu me khyer dang/ kun tu snang ba dang
snang med dang/ khyu mchog dang/ kun nas 'od dang/ shin tuyangu 'ong dang/ yid bzang dang/ lha chen po dang/ drimang bzang po dang drimamathar byed dang/ dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang//
zhi ldan dang/ mtshan bzang dang/ rgyal mtshand kar po dang/ tshad ldan dang/ tsa sa dang/ tha chudang/ sa la khyed dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ legs skyes dang/ ngu ba'i tog dang/ rgyal mtshan
tog dang/ dkar ba'i tigadang/ tog bzadang/ nor lha'i tog dang nor lha'i bu dang/ mes po dang/ padang/ mthar byed dang/ 'jig rtenagragasapa dang/ kun nas grags ba dang/ grags
ba chen po dang/ dpal ldan dang/ pham byed dang/ 'od byed dang/ mngag gzhug pa dang/ zhi byed dang/ 'jig rten byed dang/ lta byedadang/ mtho ris byed dang/ ma ra me mdzad dang ) 'byung po
mthar byed dang/ don thams cad mdzad dang/ grubamadzad dang/ gsalamadzad dang/ snang bar mdzad pa dang ) rdzapatshe'i dang/ skad kyi sladang/ sgrasnyan dang/ marnga 'a yas pa'i sgradang//
tagog dang/ nganasbyongagabudang ) gsar thubadang ) 'khor ba 'jig dang/ 'dosrungasadang gtsug tor canadang/ thams cad skyob dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ shAkya thub pa dang//
'di dag dang gzhan yang sangs rgyasabcom ldan 'dasamangabodagags gnas gtsang ma'i gzha'amed khang skabar byas te/ pad+ma'i gdanadag la bzhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dang 'tshogs
kyang de lta bu'i tshuladulhagasapar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ thugan rin chen dang/ phyag na rdo rjidang/ mnyam pa'aphug dang/ namamakha'i phyag dang/ mtha' yas phyagadang/ sa' phyagadang/ snang ba'i
phyag dang/ dri med bzang bodang bzang brtsegasadang/ rab mang ba phyogs dang/ nor bu brtsegs dang/ rin chen brtsegs dang/ rin chen phyag dang/ kun nas phyag dang/ dri ldan brag dang
legs 'grodang/ dri med 'gros dang/ 'jig rten 'gros dang/ mdzes pa'i 'gros dang/ mtha' yas 'gros dang/ grags pa mtha' yas dang 3 grags pa bzang po dang/ gragasang 'i dri/
braladang/ grags pa'i 'grob dang/ grags ba dri ma med dang/ gragasapa dang grags pa 'dren dang mgon po dang/ mgon por gyur pa dang/ kun nas mgon po dang/ rgyunashes kyi
budang/ na tha' yas rgyun shes kyi bu dang/ kun nas rgyun shes kyi bu dang byams ma'abu dang/ byams pa bzang po'i bu dang/ byams pa'i bu ma ya na pa dang/ dus gsum
rgyun shes kyi bu dang/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang/ rgyun shes kyi bu dkon mchog gsumadang/ rgyun shes kyi bu skyabs gsum dang/ rgyun shes kyi bu thog pa gsumadang/ rnamapar 'phrul
ba dang ldan pa dang/ yid 'ong bzang po dang/ gsung snyan ldan dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ dngos med dbang phyug dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ legaM
gzigs dbang phyug dang/ rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang rten mchod 'os dang/ legs mchod dang/ sgra sgrog dbang phyug dang/ rdzachen dbang phyug dang/ sna tshogasasgra'i dbang phyug dang/ rnama'ajig
dbang phyug dang/ mthon ka bzang bo dang/ sku masadang/ grags ldan dang/ nyima'i 'od dang/ khyab 'jug bdag pa dong/ bdag po'i ngang tshulangang/ namamakha' dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/
nathams cad kyi snying pa dang/ thams cad 'byung ba dang/ nasong song ba dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ chosamayan pa gcod par byed pa dang/ de ngagadang gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa'ams
dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cage bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nabazhugs so// gzhan yang byang chub samasadapasems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzugs 'chang
ba rnams te/ spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i don/ 'jig rtenaskub pa'an sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa phyi'i mi sgrog pa' 'am langagod pas bsam gyi mi khyabapa'i rig pa' tshage dang/
sngags kyi tshogadang/ gzungs dang/ sman gyi cha byad 'dzin pa dang/ 'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogasadang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ nor bu dang/ sngags dang/ rin po tsho'i/
rgyalapo dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi grang surjesasu yang dag par 'jug pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sasu'ajug pa dang/ sAmasacan gyi bsams ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du/
byed pa rnamasadang/ dadang rjes su mthunapa'im dang 'brel brnamasarang/ rig pa'i rgyayi'i bar bstan pa dang/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las nges par 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dang/ pad+madang/ rdo rje'i gos dang/ 'jig rtenadapa'adzag rten las 'dasapa'i rigs kyi rjesasu zhugs pa/ dmatshig las ma 'da' zhing tshag gi lam la 'jog par byed
pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun ma gcodapar byedapa yamado/ 'a lta ste/ gtsug tor dang/ mngon par 'phags pa dang/ mngon par mtho ba dang/ gdugs dkar pa dang/ 'dab
mamatha' yas dang/ 'dabam brgyupa dang/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ 'jig rten mthon podang/ rnamabar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ mngonapar 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang/ bad+ma'i
@#/ 'od dang/ ma tog pad+ma'i 'od dang/ ma tog ka ta ka'i 'od dang/ 'od dkar bo dang/ bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang/ gser gyi phung po dang/ karapo'i bung ba dang/ gzi
brjid phung bodang/ nor bu'i phung podang/ kun nas phung po dang/ rnam par grags pa'i phung pod/ 'byung po'i phung po dang/ bden pa'i phung po dang/ dngos po med pa' ri'i phung po dang/
de bo nyid kyi phung podang/ de dag dang gzhan yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chos kyi debyingasamatha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ sams can gyi bsam pa rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi

sAng bodang ldan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rgyalapobaskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du'ang bgrang zhing mthar thugapar minusaso// stobs dang pha rol gnon bsam gyisam khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyang bstan
pa mnusaso// mdor bstan par bya stabarjod pa rig pa'i rgyal mo'i 'dus pa brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdzong spyadang/ sminam dang/ stsanadang/ rdza mngang/ rna bodang/ mgrin pa dang/ mi
u 'jigs padang/ snying rjedang/ byams pa dang/ brtse bdang/ shes rab dang/ 'dozer dang/ semasadapa'adang/ 'dodang/ drim mad padang/ sgrib pa dang/ mchog sbyin thamasacad dang/
dedag dngagazhanayang rig pa'i rgyal mo mtha' yas mu med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'asku las sprosapadagan/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegasapa'i snodadang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor
ladang/ de bzhin gshegasapa'i gzigasamaladang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bdang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal dang de bzhin ga shegs pa'i bar
ngang/ de bzhin gshegasapa'i rgyalamtshan dang/ de bzhin ga shegasapa'i rtog dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags brjod pa rig
pa'i rgyalapo dang/ rgyal mo dang/ mngag gzhug pa dang/ bran phodang/ bran modang/ pho nya dang/ bon mo dang/ gnod spyinadang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ sems canadang/ sems can ma
yin padang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i rgyun gyi gsu'u dbar da 'khor ba stong bye ba khrag khrig dpag tumed padang/ rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi gong
nasagong du yongs su gnas pa de dag kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal medakhang der gnas par gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal po pad+ma'i rigs kyang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu gnyis
pa dang/ phyag drug pa dang/ phyag bzhi pa dang/ lAlA lA dang/ don yod zhags pa dang/ rta mgran dkar po dang/ mgrin pamatha' yas dang/ sbyin sngon dang/ mgrin bzang
dang mgul bzang dang/ mgul dkar dang/ mgulasngon dang/ 'jig rten mgul padang/ rnam par lta ba dang/ ltab dang/ kun tu lta ba dang/ dbang phyug dang/ da
ga nubya// zer stong ldan dang/ yang dang/ yang lasabyang dang/ rnam par grags pa'i yang dung/ pad+madang/ phyag na pad+madang/ yang la bsam pa dang dngabugs 'byi
dang/ rab tu dgod pa dang/ skyabazang bo dang/ samathar byed dang/ rgyu s+sor dang/ rgya gar gyi rgyal pa dang/ zhib dang/ skal ba bzang podang 'dul byengamchog ste/ de dgadang gzhan yang

rig pa'i rgyal po pad+ma'i gtsug tor la sogs pa dang/ sgrub pa mtha' yasapa'i chos kyi tshogs kyi rgyu mthunapa' ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rig pa'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang/ rig pa'i
rgyal mo ngu ma dag dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ska'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba 'di ltasta/ solamadang sgo ma bang padang gar mkhan ma ngang khreganyer mdang/ 'gro ba mtha' yas pa
nganga'ajig rten 'grom dang/ sa thob par 'greb dang dri ma med par 'grib dang/ dkar mo dang/ dkar mdang/ dkar mo chen mo dang gos dkar ma dang/ 'jig rten gnasapa dang/ dram
tshos med pags mdang/ byang chub lam gyig nas ma dang/ pad+ma lagamasamadang/ stobs bcu la gnasamangang/ grags ldan ma dang/ longs spyod ldan mngang longs spyod che ldan
mdang/ 'ag pa ma dang/ 'ag pa mamayin padang/ drimad mtha' yasamadang/ kun nas mthar byed ma dang/ sdug bsngalamathar byeng ma dang/ 'byung po mthar byeng mdang/ dpal byengam
0 dang ! dpal bye chen mo dang/ mchod dpal dang/ mtha' yas dpal dang/ 'jig rten dpal dang/ rnam par grags pa'i dpal dang/ 'jig rtenam dang da kun tu ma dang/ sangs rgyas/
yumadang/ chu bom dang/ shing rta bzang mo dang/ shing rta ldan madang/ glang po 'dul byedam dang/ 'dul byed ma dang/ 'byung pa ldan m dang/ dang la byed ma dang/ 'phrang ba mdang/
'as sbyong 'phrang ma dang/ 'gugs byed mdang/ rmadabyung ma dang/ 'od canam dang/ ra bzang ma dang/ chang ldan m dang/ dga' ldan m dang/ 'od ldan ma dang/ dpa'amo dang/
kun 'gromadang/ zla 'od mdang/ sbrub mdang/ zla ldan ma dang/ rma byam dang/ rma bya chen mo dpa/ nor ldan mdang/ nor sbyin m dang/ lha ldan ma dang 'jig rten ldan pa dang/ me
chenamadang/ chen mo nyid dang/ snyamadzesam dang dga' bzang mo dang/ nor sbyin ma dang/ dpalamo dang/ dang la mon ma dang/ nad mthar byed ma dang/ nang thams cad gso bar byed pa dang/
mnyam med mdang/ lha dang/ grags byed mdang/ dbang du byed ma dang/ myur du byed ma dang/ bde sbyin m dang/ bkra shis ma dang/ bkra shas byed ma dang/ zla bam dang/ zla mdzes
ma dang/ zla ldan m dang/ de ngagadang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal modag lar khrod lo ma gyonam dang/ myang malas skyesam dang/ yid las skyesam la sogs pa grub pa mtha' yas pasachos kyi
dbyangesanam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo dang/ sams can gyi sbyongapa'i rnamapa'aphrulapa gnas pa la byung ba'am de dang/ phonya ngang/ tho nyamo dang/ bran pho dang/ bran mo dang/
mjug gzhug pa dang/ mngag gzhug mdang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ srin podang/ srin mo dang/ sha za [”]dang/ sha zamo dang/ pad+ma'i rigasadam tshig la rjesasu zhugs
shang rjes su spyod pa rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gzhal med khang sems can dag pa gang na 'dug pa der phyin par gyur to// phyi nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la mchod pa'i
las la brtson pa'i yid kyis gnas par gyur to// der gnas pa nabcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'a nye ba na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs rnams la
snas nga/ nga' rig pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rig pa'i rgyal dang rgyal mo/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang phe chonamodang bcas ba khyed cag 'dir 'dusapar gyis shig/ dran pa tsam nying kyis rig pa'i
tshogs thams cad 'dus par gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste/ ga pa mchog dang/ rig pa bzang podang/ grub pa bzang pa dang/ dpung bzangadang/ snga bzang dang/ lhamathar byedadang/ so bzang dang/

gsang ba bzang po dang/ rdo rje sdodang/ rdo rje mthar byed dang/ rdo rje byed pa dang/ rdo rje dpung pa dang/ ro rdzolag pa dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje ba dan dang/ rdorje rtse mo dang/ rdo rje mche ba dang/

dgapa'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje ba sbra dang/ rdodramakhregs pa dang/ rdo rje zhal dang/ rdo gecha dang/ rdo rje mgrin pa dang/ rdorjemathon kadapa/ rdorje lte bdang/ rdo rje rtse mo dang rdordzadra ba dang/ rdo ts+tsha

bdang/ rdo rjematshon chadang/ rdo rje gzhu dang/ jo rjemada' dang/ rdo rje lcagasamada' dang/ rdo rjes ma tshon pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sbreg dang/ rdo rjes 'og dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan dang/ rje Ni

bodang/ chu na spyod dang/ 'byung ba'i nang spyod dang/ 'ching ba'i nang sbyodadang/ khro bo chenape'i nang spyodrud dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i nang spyod dang/ lha mayaragyi dbang po'i nang sbyong dang/ rigapa
thams cad kyi nang spyodadang/ mabazad padang/ shin tu ma bzad pa dang/ 'phanapa dang/ bar 'phan pa dang/ rkangapa 'phanapa dang/ log 'dren gyi nang du 'dzin pa dang/ legs par rnam
par 'jog pa'i 'phen pa dang/ chol par 'phan pa dang/ stobs dang/ stobs po chadang/ ne tso dang/ bung bdang/ b+hang ga ri dang/ khromodang/ khro bo chen po dang/ khro ba thams cadudang/
rga bamad pa dang/ klu chenapa dang/ rims dang/ skam byed dang/ klu mthar byedadang/ ngabagapa dang/ dbyig sngon dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ lus dmar dang/ rdorje dbyig pa dang/ sprin dang/
sprinachenapo dang/ dus dang/ dug dang/ sha zi gu dang/ nad dang/ 'byung po thams cad yang dag par 'khrug par byed pa dang/ gzer nad dang/ gzer nang chen pa dang/ nyam thag pa dang/
nyam thagapa chen podang/ ga gan rje dang/ nyi ma'i bu dang/ dusamathar byed dang/ nag po'i phyogs dang/ mi bzadapa'i gzugs canadang/ pha Tis dang/ mda' bo che
dang/ sgra rnam par 'joms padang/ zabar byed bdang/ tshogs dang/ nyimadang/ dusakyi mtha'i ma dang/ srog 'phrog byed dang/ srog 'joms byed dang/ zhesngang dang/ phrag dog dang/
thabs sbyor canadang/ thabs sbyor bzang po canadang/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor can dang/ mtha' yas thabs sbyor can dang/ thubs sbyor dmar po canadang/ lag pa dang/ lagapa chen podang/
brob chen bo dang/ maras pa dang/ sbrul dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/ mdzadang/ rgyal byed shing rta dang/ 'jigs byed shing rtadang/ rnam par zhu byedadang/ za byed dang/ mngoms pa dang/ 'tshol
pa dang/ bran te/ de dag dang gzhan yang rigs pa'i rgyal po khro bonan pos semasacan malus pa mtha'adag 'dul bar byed pa/ bskang padang/ gzhag pa dang/ mgo'ags par byed pa dang/ 'chi bar

kha byed pa dang/ rnam par nyams par byed pa dang/ gus pa dag lan mchog sbyin par byedapa/ zhi ba dang/ rgyusapa dang/ mngon spyod kyi lasa rnams stonapar byedab/ rig pa'i rgyal bo bya ba khriphrag brgya stong

du mas yongs su bskor ba bcom ldan 'angs shAkya thubapa dang/ 'jamadapala gzhonanur gyur la nges par sems shing/ bdag nyid kyi rig pa'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing bka' rab tu sdod cing

'dug ste/ rang gi rigs dang mthunapa' gnas la 'dug cade/ rang rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to// gang bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje gung yang kho mo'i rig pa'i rgyal bo de dag kyang 'khor brgya stong du
mas bskor ba'ang rang gi chos kyi dbyangesanamamakha'i ring bzhin spros pa med pa la dmigasanas gnas der 'dusapa la 'ad lta ste/ 'og pa gamadang/ 'og pag bzang modang/ lu gu rgyud mdang/ rdo rje 'od

ma dang/ rdo rje lcemadang rdo rje sbyin mamadang/ rdo rje spyanam dang/ rdo rje'i thol gong dang/ rdo rje khro gnyer mdang/ doNi rna bam dang/ rdo rje gi mdang/ rdo rje khabam dang/ rdo rje khu tshur mdang//
ngorje lcags kyu ma dang/ joN+Diral gri ma dang/ rdoN+Di thogo'abab ma dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang/ gnas dang ldan m dang/ gnas ma dang/ rnam par brjod ma dang/ dga' bral ma dang 'dod ldan
mdang/ rdo rje 'dod ldan madang/ 'dod pa'i rdo rjedang ldan madang/ mthong byed ma dang/ mthong ldan mdang/ mthong ldan chen mo dang/ rtse mor gnasam dang/ sdug po ma dang/ phug ldan ma dang/
phug gnas ma dang/ sgor gnas mdang/ yid mgyogs mdang/ rab tumagyogasam dang/ myur mgyogs mdang/ namadzes mdang/ robazang ldan m dang/ bung ba ma dang/ bung ba'i bu ma
dang 'gromadang/ grubamadang/ rlungamadang/ rtse ga mdang/ skra canam dang/ skabazangamadang/ dbyug/mdang/ sdigasamadzubam dang/ phonya mo dang/ phonya mo bzang mo dang/ bdag gi
ma dang/ mi'i thung ma dang/ gzugs ldan ma dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ rgyal mdang/ rnam par rgyal ma dang/ gzhan gyis ma thubamadang/ dpal ldan ma dang//
bzhad ldan m dang/ rdo rje bzhang ldan ma dang/ 'jig rten ldan m dang/ grags ldan ma dang/ rdo rje ldan ma dang/ sbyin mang ma dang/ srid gsum dbang byed ma dang/ dbyugapa ma dang/ dbyug pa/
tshanamom dang/ snyan par smra ba ma dang/ skad bzang ldan ma dang/ don ldan ma dang/ theg chen ma dang/ srog pam dang/ srog pa dkar po ma dang/ dkar mo mdang/ sprul byed bzang mo dang/
dri mid bzang mo dang/ dril bu ma dang/ ral gra mdang/ pas dang/ rgyal byeng mdang/ sba mang mdang/ 'dud mdang/ gsang ldan m dang/ dbugs 'byin ldan mangang/ gtun ma dang/
'byung po thams cad dbang du byed ma dang de dag dang gzhan yang pho nya chen mo dag pho nya'ago'atshogs du mas yongs subasor bdang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dusapar gyur to// ting nge 'dzin gyi

rgyu lanyur bas yongs su bgos pa'i thugs lasu byung ba'i gzungs kyi lha mong ma rnams sems can ma rungs pa tshar gcodapa sgrub par byed pa la 'ad ltasta/ rdoN+Da'i mas btu rmongs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi
rtsomo ngang/ lhun po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i gzungs dang/ rinapo che'i rtse mo'i 'angapa brtsegasapa'i gzungs dang/ 'dzin ma dang/ legs brtsegs ma dang/ lag brtsigs mdang/
ma tog brtsegs mdang/ chadapa'i gzungs ma dang/ tshad sod pa'i gzungasam dang/ 'gugs par byed pa'i gzungs ma dang/ dpung rgyan ma dang/ dpung rgyun ldan ma dang/ rgyal mtshan
mchog gi dpung rgyan ma dang/ rin chenamchog gi dpung rgyun mdang/ 'jig rtenamchog gi rnapung rgyanam dang/ ba dan mchog gi dpung rgyan ma dang/ le'u gsum ma dang/ 'jig rten 'khyil ma dang//
stong 'khyil ma dang/ ga shin rje 'khyil ma dang/ 'byung po thams cad 'khyil ma dang/ rtog ldan ma dang/ rin chen ldan m dang/ nor bu rinapo che'i gtsug ma dang/ byang chub yan lag ma/
dang stobs ldan m dang/ mtha' yas togam dang/ kun tu tog ma dang/ rin chen tog mdang/ rnam grags togam dang/ 'byung po thams cad kyi tog ma dang/ 'khor sa ldan ma dang/ sgra snyan/
ma dang/ dri bral bzang mo dang ! gdong drug mdang/ dri brol ma dang// 'jig rten grags pa ma dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang gzungs kyi lha mo brgya stong du mas yongasasu bskor ba dang/ 'kher kyi dkyil
'khor der 'dusapar gyur to/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'achen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs padang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
gyisangs rgyas yongs su sbas pa'i rangasasargyas bcom ldan 'das bas ru lta bu dang/ tshogasan spyod rnams sems can rnams kyi don madzradapan cang ma gsung ba goms pas chos kyi tshul yang dag
@#/ par ston yanitaM/ 'khor ba'i rjes su 'khor bas rtag tu yang skyo la/ rgyud lasnying rje chen bo sngas sha sams la bag chags bsgos pa khon sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed
pad yongs sukhagos par sems pa ste/ sa gcig dang/ sa gnyis dang/ sa gsum dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyud kyi bar du 'jug pa'i sems dang/ 'khorabs skyo zhi 'jags la
'jigs par byed pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor chenapo der 'dus par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang/ kun nas skye mched dang/ kun tu 'od dang/ dga' godang/ dus dang/ zhiba'i dus dang/
mu khyud dang/ nyeba'amu khyud dang/ 'dod pa dang/ nye ba'i 'dod pa dang/ pha rol phyin rta dang/ legs par pha rol phyinarta dang/ rngabe tsho dang/ naba'i rnga ba dang/ 'jig rten rnam par 'jigapar
byed podang/ rdul mad dang/ rdul dang/ rtoba'i rdul dang/ cha shasadang/ 'ba'icha shas dang/ phyag mtshan dang/ phyag mtshan bzang po dang/ nyin byed dang/ bzang byed dang/ 'od/
ldan dang/ 'od byed dang/ 'jig rten byed dang/ rnam grangasadang/ thosamad dang/ sdugamadzesadang/ dbyas mdzes dang/ dulamadzes dang/ mtha' yas mtha'adang/ rgyu mtha' dang/
tog dkar bo dang/ tog ga phyag mtshan dang/ tog dang/ zheba'i tog dang/ rgyaladang/ pad+madang/ pad+ma 'byung ba dang ra byung dang/ skyes pa dang/ yid du 'ongabadang/ 'di las
0 byung dang/ dbang chen dang/ brtsegs pa'i mtshan dang/ ru tshudang/ ma lus sbyin dang/ bde byed dang/ phan byed dang/ zhi ba dang/ zhiba'i yang dung/ chos dang/ nyiba'i chos dang/ rnam
par snang mdzad dang/ me tog dang/ legs sdodang/ dpal ldan dang// nyon las thag ring byed dang/ bzedapar dka' ba dang/ gser dang ) dri mang tog dang/ zla ba dang/ zla bzangadang/
sde bzang dang/ brtul zhugs legs sbyang dang/ brgya byin dang/ chos sbyin dang/ 'dod pa dang/ nyidabanganor lhadang/ de dag dang gzhan yang rang sas rgyaseb khrag khrig brgya stong bsam

gyisaya khyab gzhal du med pa smonapa med pa'i chos kyi dbyang sanamamakha'i ngo bo sang mang cing 'dus ma byas pa/ theg pa 'brangel rab tu zhugs shing lung bstan te rab tu gnas pa/ rjes su chags pa dang

khong khro bdag dang bral ba dag dang thabs cig tusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur to// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang lhan cig pa la 'di lta ste/
'od srungs chen po'i bu dang/ chu klung 'od srungs kyi bu dang/ lteng rgyas 'dasungs kyi bu dang/ bar datsa'i bu dang/ ba ra dwa tsa bsod snyoms len dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
chen podang/ shA ri'ibudang/ shA ri'i bu chen dang/ rab 'byoradang/ rab 'byor chen po dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ katuyanadang/ ka tu yan chen padang/ nyabar 'khor bzang po dang/ ka nga na dang/ dga'
u@#// bo dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ mdzes dga' bo dang/ tangaga' bo dang/ 'jig rten gyur pa dang/ mtha' yas 'jig rten gyur pa dang/ sAnapa dang/ nga'i snyanapa dang/
dga' ldan dang/ zhi ba'i dga' ldan dang/ ma 'gagasab dang/ gang bdang/ yongasasu gang bdang/ nye ba'i gang ba dang/ rgyal dang/ nam sodang/ ru ra dang/ drag po'abu dang/ ru ru'i bu dang/
kurudang/ lngas rtsenadang/ nyeba'i lngas rtsenadang/ dusadang/ dusabazangadang/ lha 'dzin dang/ sgra gcan 'dzinadang/ ljang sngonadang/ nye ba'i ljang sngon dang/ bsam bya dga' dang/ bsam byed
klo/ dang 'charab dang/ noba'i 'char bdang dpal ldand/ rdzas dang/ gyang kyi bu dang/ nyeN+Dasadang/ dum bu ldand/ rgyaladang/ nyargyal dang/ rgyal chen dang/ kun nas rgyal dang/
'bod byed dang/ grags sbyin dang/ grags ldan dang/ nor canadang/ 'ba'i nor canadang/ pa lanang la'adun pa dang/ pib pa la dang/ kab pa la dang/ zhi ba'i 'bras bu dang/ mtha' yas
'bras bu dang/ 'brasabudang bcas pa dang/ gzhon nu dang/ gzhonan 'od srungs kyi bu dang/ chos sbyin dang/ bcu drug sde pa'i dga' byedadang/ nye dga' dang/ yonabodwang/ lce ldan dang/
rgyalaba'i zhags nga dang/ dbugs 'byin chen bo dang/ be'u'i bu dang/ ku ru ku la dang/ nye ba'i ku ru ku la dang/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye bar dang/ rgyun gyi pha rol mthar byed dang/ gang+gA'i
bu dang/ ri'i rje ba dang/ bye ba'i ze ba dang/ dbyar can dang/ gzi brjid can dang/ gzi bdi bzapa dang/ dpa' sbasadang/ 'jig rten spyas dang/ blam sbas dang/ myur lhung byed dang/ skar
mal dga' badang/ 'byed dang/ byis pa dang/ nya pa'i byis pad sol la nyi shu thadang/ mgon mang sbyor dang/ lhabar gnas dang/ ldeg par gnas dang/ smo byed dang/ 'od ldan dang/
kun tu yod dang/ ma tog kad ma li dang/ legs par bsad dang/ nye bar 'ongs dang/ 'jig rten 'osadang stag bsngalamathar byed dang/ skal bzang yod dang/ skal bzang yod chen po dang/
don spyodadang/ mes bo dang/ 'gro yodadang/ rgyalaskyong dang/ rgyal dang/ yul ka shacanadang/ nyiba'i ka sha cinadang/ sman chen po canadang/ gzi brjing chen pa canadang/ gzi brjid chenapo dang/
lhamatshams dang/ sgrub byed dang/ tshogs can dang/ tshangasapa bzang po dang/ dge bzang dang/ 'jig rtenabazang padang/ mnyam pa dang/ nyams bcas dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang chos kyi
dbyingasamatha' yas parnamaparagrel pa'i ro'i ri skyong ba/ theg pa gsum las nges pa 'byung ba las thegapachung ngu'i lam thob pa 'khor b.las 'jigs pa dag dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi
bsam gtan labasam gtan pa dang/ srod lam bzhir tshangs pa'i gnas bzhilaganas pa dang ldan zhing legs par mnyam par bzhag pa/ legasapar bsnyenapar rdzogasapa/ theg pa chung ngu'i mya ngan
las 'dasapa'i debyings la zhugs shing nges par 'byung ba/ mnyam pa nyid sprosab mdapa de dag dang yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dkonamchog
gsum sabacu 'ganas pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// nyan thos chen po nges par 'byung ba'i mya nganalas 'das pa'i dbyings la yang dag par rjes su zhugs pa du ma dgadang/ 'dusam byas kyi
lam gyi thig pa la dmigs pa dang/ dag bde 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ kun nas snang ba kun tu thob pa dang/ sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur payon tan gyi zhing yon tan skyong par byed cing yongs su sbyong/
ba dag dang/ sems can gyasnying po'i snying po gyur pa 'jig rtenamchog gi bdag po/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyisadang/ rkang bzhudang/ rkang mangs dang/ sems cin
thams cad kyi mchog la 'di lta ste/ grags 'dzinamadang/ grags sbyin m dang/ skya dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang/ legs skyes mdang/ dga' mo dang/ sbomadagu'amo dang/ mdzes dga' mo dang/
sgom pa mo dang/ mdzes mdang/ mtha' yasam dang/ sa gam dang/ bsam pa ma dang/ rgyal ldan m dang/ gtsug phud ma dang/ nyiba'i gtsug phud mdang/ lha mo ma dang/ legs lhu
mo dang/ gnas ma dang/ dpal ma dang/ rab mchog mdang/ rab dga' m dang/ smra ngaga'am deng/ snang ma ma dang/ yul 'khor srung bam dang/ srung ma dang/ bdag po ma dang/
phunasum tshogs dang/ lus canam dang dang pam dang/ dga' madang/ ralapa mdang/ rtaba'il pa ma dang ! kun nas ralapa mdang/ don 'byung mdang khong mdang/ yidi mgyogs
mdang/ nag ldan ma dang/ khyab 'jug 'dzinam dang/ khyab 'jug dag lam dang/ A bzang ma dang/ yid ma mdang/ dpal ldan m dang/ nyan thog sdug bsngal ma dang/ las
sbyin m dang/ las 'bras mdang/ rnam rgyalaldan mdang/ ra bdag mdang/ nor ne mdang/ chosaspyani mdang/ rtsed mo sprin mdang/ 'dud mdang/ legs 'dudam dang/
snyan ldan m dang/ yang ldan m dang/ rab bzhad ma dang/ srid gsum mthar byed ma dang/ dri ma gsum mthar byedam dang sdug bsngal bston par byed mdang/ ming 'byung ma dang/ kha dog
gsumam dang/ pad+ma'i 'dogamadang/ pad+ma lngamadang/ pad+ma'i 'od mdang/ dka' bzlogarkang sbyong mdang/ dka' bzlog nang sbyong ldan madang/ 'dab gsumam dang/ 'dab bdun ma dang/
ut+pala'i 'dab mdang/ de dag dang gzhan yang gnasabastanamachen mo nyan thos chen mo dgabcomaldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'aphyir nyo bar lhags par gyur to// 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor chen podi dag byang chub sems dpa' chenapo'i rnam par 'phrulapa mthong bar 'dod nas 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te/ chos mnyanapa'i phyir dang sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa gsal bar 'dod
par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khaso gzigs nas lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang/ dngos po med pa'i
ngo nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo dang/ tshos kyang byis dus gsumalasayang dag par 'dasapar mkhyenanas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi don spyod
pa yang dag par soms shwago/ bsam pa dzalta ba bzhin du mngon par dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa la sngags kyi sbyong pa'i don yang dag par thob pa zhes bya ba'i
chos kyi tshig dang/ las kyi tshig dang/ zhiba'i tshogadung thar ba'i tshig dang/ cho ga zhib mo sgrubab dang/ rnamaparam rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa dang/ de bzhinAgashegs pa'i
stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang/ bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzinasoms shag cesaso// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsalam
thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyomasapar zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di dang/ 'jig rten

gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dagapar rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chenanges gsal bar yang byas nas rang
