rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyod pa ston te/ rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la/ nam: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a bu ba su b+ha bamung+gatAnaM/ nam: bra te ka bud+d+haArla sha de kAnaM/ na mo bi dzA satA naM/ dag

b+hum pra titeshwarANaM/ bod+hisat+tAnaM/ ma sat+tAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA nA tA dI/ dut+tAsitrad ma ka a si mu sa la pa ra shu pa pa sha dasta/ tsa tuts+tshang/ tsa turlu kha/ 'a Ta tsa ra Na/ gats+tshagats+tsha/

sa bag bsgo taka/ bikr-itanan/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+Tan dusananA da'i/ bya glu tsarmaNi pAsan/ ku ru kur/ sarba d+hamaNo/ tshan tshane/ sarba maM tan/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha par mud d+haM A k+kur
ya A kaMrAya/ sarba b+hu tAn/ narma thani rmatha/ sarbadut+tAn/ pra be sha ya pra be sha yo/ maN+Da lamad ts+tshe/ sob satrA dzib+hIti 3 kar/ ku ru ku ru mams rdza kAt+yaM/ dahang ha) pa tsa pa tsa/
sA lamAmA ba lamA/ sam yamanus+sar/ hU~MhU~MphaT+Ta/ so lnga yaso Taya/ sarba sha pa ri pU ra ka/ ha b+ha ga pakotsir yasimamasarAny+tsasAd+haya/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshamarje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/ gshin rje'irgyal po yapa'adzoms pa dang 'gugs par byed pa yin na/ sems can gzhan ltasmos kyang ci dgos/ khro ba'i rgyal po
chopos gzungs sngags 'di sgrasam thag tu semasacan thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/ 'jigs pa dang/ nyam thag pa dang/ dngangs ba dang/ yadi skyo ba dang
snying 'gas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasadang/ 'dzamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhanamod/ skyob pa gzhan med/ dpung gnyen
gzhan med par gyur te/ de nas gang sudag sa la gnasapa dang/ chu la gnas padang/ nam mkha' la gnas pa dang/ brtanapar gnasapa dang/ ma brtan par gnas bdang/ mngal nas
rgyas pa dang/ sgong las skyes pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gyi grangs su gtogasapa 'jig rten gyi khamasamany+dza' yasapa dgan rnam par gnas pa//
stadang/ 'og dang/ thang ka dang/ phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang/ yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro ba'i rgyal po chenapos 'di nyid du
bkug par gyur to/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhen/ de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am bsam par 'gyurab 'i phyir
bo dam tshig la dmagis par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchobartenanam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur nga 'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bzlas par bya'o/

yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjodapar bya ste/ gang de dang de dag dun brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ltas ngan chen podang/ myan chen po dang/ bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir
yo/ thugs rjemchog dang ldan basangasargyusabatsom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' semasadapachenapo ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes kho na'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub cing bstanab dang/
sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang/ chos kyi tshul yang dgapar gnasabar bya ba dang/ sams can gyi khamasamatha' dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob b.rebya ba dang/ bstan pa
med pa dag tu bstan pa dang/ lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma bcad pa dang/ sngags kyi stod pa bstanapa'i phyir dang/ thugs rje chen po'amathu'i rgyu mthun
pa thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnonabadang/ bgags chen pornam par gzhig pa dang/ rgyalabom rungs parnam par gzhom pa dang/ bdag gi stobs rnam bar 'phel bar bya ba dang/
gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhag bdang/ rengs par bya ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ ma snang bar byabadang/ rab tu bstan pa dang/ nyi bar bsgom pa dang/ dga' bar bya dang/ rang ga sngags
kyi spyod pa rab tu bstanapa dang/ tshadang/ nad med pa dang/ dbang phyug mngon par 'phal bar bya ba dang/ myur ba'i las rjes su bslab pa dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/
btang snyomasachen bo dang/ dga' ba chen po'i labadagapa sdom pa laMganasapa dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan du rtogosapa dang/ rnamaper rtog thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so//
de nas klu dang/ klu chen po de dag dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin chen po dang/ srin pa dang/ srin pochapa dang/ shu zadang/ sha za chen po dang/ srul pa
dang/ srul po chan pa dang/ lus srul po dang/ lus srul po chenapo dang/ mamodang/ mamo chen mo dang/ grul bum dang/ grulabum chenamo dang/ gcan gzan dang/ gcan gzan
chen po dang/ rolangs dang/ ro langs chenapo dang/ kam po rtsa' mi dang/ kam po rtsa'i mchan po dang/ sring mo dang/ sring mo chen mo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma chen/
mo dang/ gzhib pa dang/ gzhib pa chen mo dang/ g.yongs byed dang/ g.yengs byed chen mo dang/ byas pa dang/ byas pa chen podang/ branapa dang branang chen podang nang dang/ nad chen po
dang brjed byang dang/ brjod byed chen po dang/ gdon dang/ gdon chen podang/ nam mkha'i ma mo dang/ nam mkha'i ma mo chen mo dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ gzugs can ma chen mo dang/
ngu 'bod dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dang/ grib gnon dang/ grib gnon chenapa dang/ srong gtong dang/ srod gtong chen po dang/ mngag gzhug ma dang/ mngag gzhug ma namo dang gnod sbyin
mo dang/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo dang/ sha za mo dang/ sha za mo chen modang/ rimasanang dang/ rnams nang chenapodang/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa chen podang/ rtag pa'i rimos
[p ]dang ramisadang/ rams bzang padang rtagapa las byung ba'i rims dang/ yud tsam las byung ba dang/ rlung las gyuradang/ mkhris las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur ba dang//
'dus pa las gyur padang/ gcong chen podang/ grub pa dang/ grub pachenapo dang/ rnal 'byor dang ldan padang/ rnal 'byoradang ldan pachen ba dang/ drang srong rnams dang/ drang srong chen/
bo rnams dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ ma 'am tsachinadang/ brang 'grodang brang 'gro min pa dang/ dri za dang/ driza chen po dang/ lha dang/ lhachen po dang/ ma dang/ mchin po dang/ yul
mdang/ yulam chen dang/ rgya mtshodang/ rgyamatsho chenapo dang/ chu bo dang/ chu bo chen podang/ ri deng/ ri chen po dang/ gter dang/ gter chen pa dang/ sa dang/ sa chen po dang/
shing dang/ shinge chen po dang/ 'dabachags can dang/ 'dab chags chen dang/ rgyal pa dang/ rgyal po chenapa dang/ brgya byinadang/ brgya byin chen po dang/ nor lha'i bu dang/ ngu zhig dang/
'byung po'i bdagapo dang/ dbang ldan dang/ gshin rjedang/ tshangs pa dang/ tshangasapa chenapodang/ lha sna tshogs bzo bo dang/ nor sbyin dang/ yul 'khor skyong dang/ 'phags skyes pa dang/
mag mibazang dang/ lus ngan pa dang/ gang pa bzang dang/ nor bu bzang dang/ lngasartsenadang/ dzam+b+ha la dang/ stam+b+ha la dang/ kuts+tshA lad/ sngon po dang/ sa sngon po dang/ song ge dang/
'phrog ma dang/ sar skya mdang/ dga' byed dang/ nor byed dang/ chu dbang dang/ 'jig rten dbang pa dang/ nyi dbang dang 3 gsangob pa dang/ gsang ba pa chenapa dang/
g.yo ba dang/ g.yo byed dang/ chu na spyod pa dang/ g.yung 'dang zla ba'i ro dang/ 'bo tshanapo dang/ brtsegasamagudang/ mgo bo gsumapa sta/ de dag dang gzhan yang gnod sbyan gyi sdongabon

chen po gnod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byin gyisabarlabs pa'iganas gtsang ma'i gzhal mod khang gi 'khor gyi ngakyil 'khor chopo der N+Da

'phrul gyi stobs bskyang pas 'dus par gyur te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyire'akhod do// gang yang srin po'i rgyal po chen po dedagaganod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa khro bo'i rgyal pa
chen pos bkugapa la 'di lta ste/ sasgrog dang/ nor ldan ng/ rnam par 'ju byed dang/ gzer rnadang/ bum rna dang/ kun nasorna ba dang/ gshin rje dang/ rnamapar 'jigs byed dang/ 'jayi
byed dang/ mi bzad pa dang/ sngag ldan dang/ dbang po rgyal dang/ 'thab pa dang/ lags par 'thab pa dang/ mdung dang/ mdu rtsa gsumapa dang/ mgo gsum pa dang/ mgo mtha'

yas pa'ang chos nyapa'i phyi 'dus par gyur to// gang yang sha za chen mo sha za'i 'khor bye ba khri phragabargya stong du ma dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'diltoste/ pa lu dang/ zheba'i pA lu dang/ pA la bzang po/
dang pa mtha' yasadang/ bsam pa dang/ bsam pa ma yapa dang/ gdung ba bzang podang/ 'byed dang/ galidzade bzang bo dang/ ma rngad pa dang/ mi bzad pa'i gzugs canang

chosamanyan pa'i phyire 'dusapar gyur to// gang yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phrul gyi stobs
kyis bkug pa la 'di lta// dga' bo dang/ tadaga' bodang/ la bodang/ taba'i la ba dang/ nor ldan ng/ mtha' yas dang/ 'dzegapadang/ pad+madang ! pad+ma chen po dang/ 'dus pa
skyongadang/ dung dang/ dung skyong dang/ kar koTadang/ rigs ldan dang gsamad ldan dang/ ngargyal canadang/ bumachu canadang/ ngortecanadang ma tog tsam pag las byung ba dang/ nor
ldan kludang/ nga rgyal 'dzomosadang/ mtshon dpus dang/ naba'i dbus dang/ dbyogapadang/ dbye ba chen podang/ dkar bo dang/ dkar pobazang dang sngo ba dang/ chu sbyin sngo ba dang/

'oma'ichu dang/ sog ma mdadang/ rgya mtsho dang/ nyaba'i rgyu mtshos/ de dag dang gzhanayang klu'i rgyalapo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang chosamanyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to// gang yang drang srong dang drang srong chenapo de dag la 'di lta ste/ rgyun shes kyi budang/ gnas 'jog dang/ go'u ta mdang/ b+hagA re ba dang// /
dzashudang/ ang gar sa dang/ am ti dang/ pu lasnyi dang/ ra byi dang/ rgyas pa dang/ nag po dang/ go'u tu mnagapa dang mdang/ mi'i rgyung dang/ dzamartagan dang/
yod pa pa dang/ thub pa mchog dang 3 gos canadang/ sham pa ya nadang/ rtsib logasasnyas dang/ dgra stadang/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang/ shing papa la gnasapo dang/ shang pa pa la za ba dang/

grog mkhar skyes dang/ nyim ges te/ de dag dang gzhan yang drang srong chen po brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nye bar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya/

thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas sngags spyod pa'i don byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mnyanapa'i phyi'i dang/ rjes su yi rang ba'i donang 'khongapar gyur to// gang yang lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de ngag kyang 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor chen mor chosamanyan pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs te 'khod pal 'dulta ste/ er N+Dadang/ teraNA dang/ 'od zer gyi bu dang/ 'od zer dang/ snang ba dang/ snang ba bzang po'o//

tshal gangayang namamakha' ldange gi rgyal po de dag kyang nam mkha' lnga brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dusab la 'di lta ste/ 'od bzang dang/ 'dab dkar dang// rkang mang 'gro
dang/ 'dab 'gro dang/ 'dab bzang skyes dang/ 'dabamad skyos dang/ yid ltar mgyogs dang/ kla rnams 'jig dang rnam 'bud bu dang/ b+har dwa tsa dang/ bya dang/ bya chen po dang/ 'dab

ldan tshogs te/ de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus par gyur to// gang yang ma 'am ci'i rkyal poma'am ca'i 'a khobargya stong phrag du mdang ldan pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyila'akhor der 'dus
bal 'di lta ste/ ljonapa dang/ nuba'i ljon dang/ ljonababazang po dang/ ljonabamatha' yas dang/ 'jig rten ljonabadang/ ljonapa braladang/ brang rgyas dang/ brang rgyasachenapodang/ gzib ji
chepodang/ rdzu pa'aphrulachen padang/ khyadapar sladang/ skad snyan dang/ yid du 'ong ba'asams skyedapar byed pa dang/ rigs mtho dang/ mthosgradang/ btang snyomasab dang/ snying rje ldan dang
chu lha dang/ dedag dang gzhanaya ma 'amaci'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul bam 'amaci'i 'khor ba stong phrag dum dang ldan b chos mnyanapa'i phyir 'al gyidakyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin
du mi mjed kyabadagapatshangs pa dang/ tshangs pa chen po dong/ 'od gasaladang/ 'od kyi dang/ dag pa'i 'od dang/ bsod nams 'od dang/ michab dang/ mgadung ba dang/ 'og minadang/
'og bzang dang/ ci'ang mang ba dang/ ci'ang med minadang/ namamakha' mtha'ayasadang legs ldan dang/ legs mthong dang/ sngal bzang podang/ yosasu sbalapa dang/ gnas
gtsang ma dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thab braladang ) sum cu rtsa gsumadang/ tshulapo chen po bzhi'i ris dang/ rtag tu myos dang/ 'phrang zegasodang/ gzhong thogs dang/ ba tseng gsum pa dang/
ri bor gnas pa dang/ khang brtsegs gnas pa dang/ rtse mor gnas pa dang/ lcang cananaganasapa dang/ grong khyer gnas pa dang/ gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang/
bar snang la gnas pa dang/ sa laganas pa dang/ shing la gnas pa dang khyiman gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tu tsham byed dang/ stobs ldan dang/ thags bzas
yongs dang/ sha tu bkradang/ bde bkra dang/ rig byed bkra dang/ sgra gcanadang/ lagapa dang/ de dag lasogs pa lham ya na bye ba 'phrog brgya stong du mar 'khor dang ldan pa 'gros sna tshogs
dang nor sna tshogs dang/ lha dang 'thabapa'i lha ma yin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa blta ba dang/ phyag bya bang/ bsnyan nga ku byab
phyir 'khor gyi dkyila'akhor der 'dus par gyur to// gang yang gzigasa' dang gza' chen po de dag 'jig rten gyi khams su spyod pa bar snang laspyod pa la 'di lta ste/ nyimadang zla bdang/ mig
dAm dang/ gza' lhagapa dang/ phur bu dang/ pawas sa dang sbapa dang/ sgra gcanadang/ sa 'guladang/ mjug ringes dang/ gnam lcags 'byin dang/ skur ma dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/
mi bzad pa dang/ ngung ldadang/ dud pa dang/ rdo rjed/ 'byor ba dang/ char 'bebasadang/ nyaba'i char 'bebs dang/ nor 'jig dang masnang byedadang/ dgod ldan dang/ rtang par ldan
0 dang/ 'dod pa dang/ malus pa dang/ 'jig rten mthar byedarang/ rnam par ltung byed dang/ kun tu ltung byedadang/ rtogopa dang/ bla sgang canadang/dus kyi mtha' dang/ dur khrodadang/ sha khrag
ldan dang/ dkar po dang/ byabazhinadang/ byi bzhin gyi bangang/ byams ldan yong dwagazer bu dang/ gzig bu gsum pa dang/ sngon pa dang/ gsang brom dang/ brtanab dang/ 'jigs byed dang/
stobs ldan dang/ mi bzadapa dang/ skya rengs dang/ rnamasar dgod pa dang/ 'chi ltas minadang/ samabyedadang/ kun baged dang/ cha ba'i kun bged dang/ gzhon nu dang/ rtsa mad dang//
gongabyed rang/ rab tu rgong byed dang/ sigs par byed pa dang/ gar byed dang/ 'phreng podang/ gzugs ngan// gatha' chenapodi dag kyang rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du ma'a'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor dang/
lta ba la 'di la// gsangadang/ bra nyadang smin drug dang/ snaram dang/ mgongang/ lag dang/ nab so dang/ rgyal dang/ skag dang/ mchu dang/ gre dang/ dge dang/ ma bzhi dang/
nagapa dang/ sa'i dang/ sa gdang/ lhamatshams dang/ snonadang/ snabasadang/ chu stong dang/ chu smadadang/ globazhinadang/ mon gru dang/ mon gredang/ khrums stod dang/ khrums smad dang//
namagyudang/ lha mo badradang/ byibazhinadang/ punarna ba dang 'od dang/ ang gas dang/ rgyus dang/ zheba'i grodang/ gre ldan dang/ 'jig rtenarab mchog dang/ rab mchog dang/ dpal
@#/ ldan dang ! 'jig rten mgonapo dang/ chang ldan ng/ rgyal byed dang/ nor ldan dang/ lha don te/ de ltar rgyu skar gyi rgyal po de dag kyang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal mang khang

du rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus te 'khod por gyur to// khyamasum cu rtsa drug la 'di lta ste/ lug dang/
glang dang/ sbyor bdang/ sbal pa dang/ sang ge dang/ bu mo dang/ srang dang/ sdig pa dang/ gzhu dang/ chu srinadang/ bumang dang/ nadang mi'u thung dang/ zhiba'i bum pa dang/ 'bring ga ra
dang ral gri dang/ glang po chadang/ ma he dang/ lhadang/ mdang/ dge ltas dang/ dra za dang/ 'jig rten dang/ g.yungadrung rgyal dang drag pa'i gzi brjid dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ sa dang/
mun pa dang/ rdul dang/ nyeba'i rdul dang/ sdug bsngaladang/ bde ba dang/ byang chub dang/ so so gcig dang nyanagles dang/ dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ gab+ba b+hAdzId chen po dang/
tshu gzi brjid chen po ldan dang/ dung 'gro dang/ yi dgasadang/ lhamayanangasha [”]ldan dang/ sha za dam gnod sbyin srin po dang ! 'byung po thams cad dang/ 'byung bopa dang/ phyogs kyi glang podang/
stong 'grodang/ thad kar 'grodang/ kha bye bdang/ bsam gtana'agro dang/ rnal 'byor 'gro dang/ rab tu gnas dang/ mchog dang/ bar ma dang tha ma ste khyim chen po de dag kyang

khyim brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhalamed khang gang nabar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btung nas
rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to// gang yang gnod sbyin mo dgaganod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dbacasapa la 'di lta ste/ mgo ba'angasamadang/ sminabazangasamadang/
sa bzangs mdang/ sang snyan ma dang/ blo bzang ma dang/ dgoldan m dang/ sna tshogs mag ldan madang/ rdzogs byedamadang/ gsang bamadang/ bzangapom dang/ sarags bzang pom dang/
par ltar sla ba dang/ 'jigs byedamadang/ mi'ajigs sbyin m dang/ rgyalam dang/ rnamapar lamadang/ nam gru mdang/ snyagacanam dang/ sum bar byengam da rlungam dang/ yid 'phrog
mdang/ yang ldan m dang/ ma tog ldan madang/ me tog gi grong khyer la gnasom dang/ sor skyemadang/ 'phrog ma dang/ dpal ldan m dang/ dang 'among/ pa' bzangamo dang/ na tu mi bzad
mdang/ mi bzang ldan m dang/ lhamasamadang/ robazangam dang/ gsang bdamalamang/ shing lamul gsam dang/ tsunganamadamadang/ mun bar mdzesam dang/ snang bar mdzes ma dang/
'ong ldan m dang/ lhag par ldan m dang/ gzugasamadzesamadang/ dkaramang mdang/ zhibam dang/ phyogasamatshamasam dang/ stugam dang dga' byedamadang/ rkaba'i dga' byedam dang//
'jig rten las 'dasam ste/ gnod spyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khoradang ldan b 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang nga pa nyeng nas bcom

ldan das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhinge 'khod par gyur to// gang yang sha za mo dag sha zamo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen podir rgyang ring po nying nasabcom ldan
'das shAkya thubapa la phyag 'tshal zhing mchod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ sbyang m dang/ phyag dar khrod kyisha za mo dang/ sha za mo drag mo dang/ sha zamosar mdar ma da/ shaza mo bar ma dang shul
bzam dang shazamadang/ dug ma dang/ bung bam dang/ rmongs byed mdang/ sdig mdzub ma dang/ dmar ldan madang/ gang mar mdang/ 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang/ thal bar nye gnasam
deng/ shang pa lu dang ldan m dang/ mang ldan madang/ mang ma dang/ gangul dka' ma dang/ de la ma ngang/ mtshon byed pa dang/ ngub la gnas ma dang/ du ba ma ste/ ba za mo chen mo 'ang ngag

'a sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang lospyirakyi bang chen/ 'dus sharirab tu zhugs par gyur to// gang yang ma mo dang/ ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam
par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tsho bar byed cing/ gtor ma dang/ ma tog ngamanam la spyod par byed pa dag la 'ang lta su/ tshangs pa dang/ ngabang phyug chen po ma ngang khyab
[zo]'jug mdang/ gzhonan mdang/ rgan byad ma dang/ phag mo dang/ ngabang mo dang/ gshin rje mo dang/ maphyogs ma dang/ nyi ma'i bu modang/ 'jig rtenam bar byedamadang/ chu lha ma dang/
dbang ldan ma dang/ rlung phyogs ma dang/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang/ mgo bregasamadang/ byamadang/ byam chen mo dang/ srulam dang/ lus srul mo dang/ sam byed ma ste//
ma mo chen mo de dag kyang mamo' 'khor byeb phrag brgya stong du mdang bcasapa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chenapa der sang rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cang 'khod par gyur to//
de bzhin du ma dang/ mi ma yin pa bye bakhri phrag brgya stong du ma dang/ sems canadang/ sams can ma yan pa nas/ dmyal ba chen po mnar med panas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang
skabs 'di'i namamakha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to// sems can gyi ris na srog chagasasu la'ang phan tshun mi mthunapa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang bsams/
dpas mo'aphrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pasomasacan thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pas thams cad ng ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasasusangasargyus kyi spunabyas rnamapar gzigasanas/'jamabala gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'ostsalapa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngagasakyi spyod
pa'i don rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byams byang chub sems dpa'i snga stong gang 'kheshad pa'i dus la babapa sems na shod cig/ de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na ) nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje 'thug cing srab 'irgyud bkodapa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa desnyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpagatshang brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'angoN+Di rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par
gyur to// gang du gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dra zi dang/ rlung lhadang/ sha zadedag dang/ mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis gzhalamang khang de dag

rdzo'i nor bu rinapo che lta bu r gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 'atshabar byedapa med do// de nas 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'kher chenapodi 'dus

chal par gyur par shesanas/ ldeba'irgyal po gshin rje'i gshed lasmras pa/ kye khro bo chenapesangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ marasapa gdul bar gyis shig/ sems can bdag sad par gyis shig/ sems can

thams cad dad pa gyis shig/ ji srid du nga'i ring gi sngags kyi spyod parjesasu skabapa byang chub sems dpa'asdo snod rgya che bdag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog 'chad par byed ba de srid kyi bar
du 'dareg ga phyi rol tu song srung ba gyis shig/ de skad ces smras dngo/ khroba'i rgyal po chenang ngosabaka'amanyan nas khro bo chen po gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang/

rjesasubastanapa'aphyir 'khor gyidakyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjegashed khropo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun ngang/ stong dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad
pa'i slar b tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to// de nasasems can de dag zhi ba dang/ yid dang/ sam sa bzang po dang ldan par gyur te/ bka' las ma'od ' bar byed par gyur to// 'di lta bu'i/
sgra'ang thos par gyur te/ gangadamatshig de las 'da'abar byedapa dngag ni a ljaka'i dogapabazhinadu mgotshal pa brgyar 'gasapa 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'ibyin gyi rlabs kyang de yin no//
denas 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig yang dag par bsams na byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par
'gyur te/ gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnamapar rjesasu mthong ba'o// byang chub samasadapa' sems dang 'an po chos gnyis la ratu gnasan sngags
'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhen/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nying dang/ sams can thams cad lasems mnyam pa'o// chos gsum dang ldan na sngags
kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur to/ gsum po gang zhin/ sems canathamasacad yongasasu ma gtong ba nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung bdang/ rang gi sngags
yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhidang yang dag par ldan nadang po saMms bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chubs masadapa'i sngags 'grub par gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na// rang gi/
sngags yongs su ma gtong ba nyidadang/ gzhan gyi sngags rjesasu gtsed pamang pa nyid dang/ sems can thams cad la bums pas gnas pa nyid dang/ sIng chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i
sems pa nyid do// chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan n dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub soms dba'asngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sde snod la 'jug
cing sngags kyi spyod pa grub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// lcapagang zhin/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par ston pa nyidadang/ bas mtha'adagon pa ston par byedapa nyid dang/ semasacan/

gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang/ 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang/ tshulakhrims dang/ thos pa dang spyod nga la gnasapar byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod
[4 ]pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drugapogang zhen/ dkon mchog gsum la dang brjesasu mi
gcod nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'al dang brjes su migacodapa nyid dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i sngags la kun tu dgarab nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs spros pa med pa la lta

banyid dang theg pa chen po'i mdo sngazab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba mod pa'i sa dus nyid dang/ sngags kyi spyod pa yongasasu btsal ba dang/ dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/

chosadwagang po 'di dag dang ldan n rigapa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag bar sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro// chosabadunangang ldan n rig pa sgrub pa'i dusakyithabs thob par 'gyur zhing/ sngags kyi
spyod pa larjesasu spyod pa nyidadu 'gyur te/ bdun po gang nan/ theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa dang/ 'dodadu 'jug pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa la mos pa nyid dang/ dusadang/ phyogs dang/ nges par sdom pa dang/ bzlasapa dang/ sbyin sragadang/ maslabadang/ dka' thub la gzhol ba nyidadang/ rtogs
padang/ blo dang/ dran pa dang/ shesarab dang/ btsun pa la bstanabanyidadang/ byang chub kyi tshogs dang/ theg pa chenapo dang/ zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang
rang dga' sngags dgug pa'i bya nga la mkhas pa nyid dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ btang snyomasachen pa dang/ dga' ba chen po nyidi yongs su slom pa/
nyid dang/ sbos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyingesakyi de bzhin nying la'ajug pa gnyis su med pa'ing bo'i thims cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'tshol ba nyid dang/ sems can/
'gaM thams cad yongs sumagatong ba nyid dang/ theg pa dman pa la dgar ba med panyid de/ chos bdun pa de dgags na rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par gyur ro// chos brgyad dang ldan

nan ga padang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyudapa gang zhen/ mthong ba dang ma mtheng ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems

ba'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tsom med cing dang ba nyid dang/ phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa ni de dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chubs/

tshal dpa' zhing kyi sngags dang/ rgyungadang/ spyod pa bstanab mis bzung zhing bdag ba thamasacad yongasasu gtong banyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingaganas dang gnas ma yinabarmi lam namathong ba rab tu ston
pa la mkhasapa nyid dang/ ser sna dang/ gnyid dang/ rmugasapamatha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed
[ze ]pa nyid dang/ mdor bstan dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mis go cha chenangob gos pa dang/ bgegs thams cad rab tusal bar 'dod pa nyid dang/ byang chub kyi snying po gnon bdang/ longs spyod/
chenapo dang/ dbang chobarogrags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang/ dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang/ dge ba'i bshesaganyenadang ma 'bral bar bya bdang/ byang chub sems/
dpa' 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub
kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum la dad padang/ mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshulakhrims nyams la yang ma skyong ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab
'byamasamathams shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun po'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du shesapar bya ba ma yin no// rnamapar rtog pa med pa'i
yid du byas nasanyams sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrubapar bya ba yin no// denasathams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ) rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa

nyan thos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig rjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// sngags spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes su
'jug pa dang mthun zhing/ chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don phyir ro// des na 'a[E]da la gzhen nar gtu[cu0f7c ]sa: mang tshogal
bstan pa dang rjesasu mthunangosngags kyi spyod pa dang rjesasumathun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do// rgyal po chen pogang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'ang klog par 'gyur ba dang 'dzinapar 'gyur
ba dang yade la byed par 'gyur ba dang/ g.yul gyi thog mar gang de'i stang du gzhag pa dang/ me togadang/ bdug pa dang/ drid/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa
byed na/ de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed ci phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhigapar bgyi'o// glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim
du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'am/ rgyalape chen po'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ rgyalamtshan mo'am/ dge slongam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge

bsnyanamangag la srung ba po dang/ longs skyong chen po dang ldan pa dang/ tshe ring ba nyid dang/ nad med pa nyid dang/ longs spyong rtagatumangon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad ces smras nas
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang ma skabar gyur to// theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen mo las)byang chub somasadapa' 'jamadapalaga'on nur gyur pa rnam par 'phrul
pa'ile'ub 'byams rtsa ba'i tshog zhub mo' sa 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/// /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi nga'i 'kher labaltas
gsems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la skyes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzanalasnyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lceba'i
dkyil 'khor gyi phyogasanas 'od zer bye bab: stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyungasta/ semasacan gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas sar log ste/ gnas gtsang+gan 'i gzhal
mang khang snang bar byas nas 'khong par gyur to// denasabyang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo phyag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa// soms can thams cad kyi ngamatshagal

rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'abyams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa/ rems can thams cad kyi thunamong du gyur pa// khyod kyi sngagasakyi tshogs gang du sams canayang dag par zhugs na
'jig dang 'jig rtenalas 'dasapa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang reg par thob par 'gyur bas sems dpa'achen po byung smos dgismos shig/de skad ces smras pa dang gsang pa'i bdag pe
gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la/ 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud saso// rigang thams cad yang dag par bskul bzhin bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'khrul
pa ston par byed de/ lag pa g.yasapa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la stonapar byed de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po byi ba khri phrag brgya
sto dumabyung/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsangama'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang bachenapos gnas par gyur to// denas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rje
gshed kyi sAng pa las thams cad byed pa dang/ ngang 'bo gcig pa dang/ nadrangang dang/ gshegs su gsol ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ rgyusapa dang/ mngon spyod dang/ mi snang ba dang/ nam
mkha' la 'gro ba dang sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang/ chu lam nu par 'gro ba dang/ dgug bdang/ []mapar dbyeb dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ dra thams cad dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mar ma dag kyang

rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin nga ra byed de/ mnger na ji lta tshe ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byedapa nayi ge gsum zhes bya ba stobs chenapa donathams cang sgrub par byed pa khro ba'i rgyal po'i sngags smras
paT degang zhin a AhUM/ 'dzen khrobochenapo ba'isang nga : las thams cad byedapa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi sdong po la mas dpa'achenapo 'jam pa'i
dbyangs kyis slas de/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur nga sa lag pa g.yasapa btig so khro bo'i spyi bor gzhog pa byas so// 'di skad du'ang smras te/
sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyusabcom ldan 'das rnams dgongasasu gsol// gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamapar gnas shing mtha'akhas mu mdapa'i

'khrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyalang tsho po btang
pa thag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tusong nas/nga tsag tsan gyis gangadag sdang ba'i bas ma pa dang ldan ng risams can rdzu 'phrulacha bdag tshadabacad tsader bkug b.ragyur nas/
sa kyi dkyila'akhor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dgapar bcugaste/ nas ji ltab bzhin du gnas par byas nasasamasarnyanam rungs bdag la'ang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i
tshogasasubyas shange sa la yang dag pa gnas par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonanur rgyur ngas 'khor gyi dkya'i 'khor de la'ang bltasanas/ sems can khyed cag na nya cad nyon cig/

gang rang dam tshig 'di 'osa'adus par gyur na de 'bro bo'i rgyal po 'jisachadapagacod par 'a ra te/ gang ga ri'i na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yate/ sngags kyi don
gyi tshig gas babyang chub sems dang 'a 'apal chenapo ngangaldan pa rnams kyisamador bstan pa brjodapar byayas/ de legasapar rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// oM AHhU~M/
nam: sarlabud+d+hanaM/ o ra ra smar a pra ti ha ta kAsan/ ku mA rar parU ra NaAhU~M phaT phaT swA/ grogasapa dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngagasayin te/ 'phags pa'adzamadapalazhes
bya ba rAno/ phyag rgya nagatsug phud lnga pa zhes gragasate/ de la rab tu rab r bya'o// rtsa ba'isngags 'di ni sa thams cad pa zhes bya'o// sAng po'i sngags las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin
oM bA kyi dam 'dir phyag rgya 'gyurab n gtsugapudagasumapazhisokhyabaya ri te/ longs spyod thams cad mngonang ra 'phel bar byedapa'o// 'dir chub 'isnying por 'gyur ba na/ bukyi daM/ 'di
phyag rgyur 'gyur ba zhigatsugapung gsum pa zhesagrags pa yin te/ sams can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yanino// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur ba'i ma/ 'dir phyag rgyur 'gyur bani rma bya'i gongan
zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad ngabang du byedapa'o// gzhan yang phyag rgyu thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog tu byed pa//
ngag byed chen pa/srid pa gsum gyi chos bar gcodapar byed ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed nga nib thams cad byed nga/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'dasapa'i bde ba thob par byed
pa sa ngas rgyus mngonasum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyide ba'an du bar gnas pa/ sems can thams cad gyi donagyi phyi mchog
tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnasapa ye shamasacad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// gang du ngun pa tsam gyis mtshams mdapa lnga'ong yongs su sbyong bar byed na/ bzlos lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de'ang
gang zhe na/ oMA bA ra hUM khe tsa ra gregs po dga' ngan yogi brgyud pa dpa' bo cher bo zhes bya ba gsang ba'i snying pa ringag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu bar gnas pa yin no//

mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod na bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'di phyag rgyu'ang stobs po tsho zhes rnam par gragasapa/ re ba brams da yongs
su rdzogs pa'o// spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ o ye ku mA ra bi hAr pa[E ]/ saN ba la b+ha sha pra bordzun/ e tshe hadab ban e khyehi ku mA ra/ ANanut+pa la d+har na maN+Dal la rgyu tit+tatiltas ma ma
nuts+tshar/ a pra ti ha ta shAsananAnAhU~M/ mA ba laM ba ku ruphaNasA hA/ 'di na bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thamasacad dang/ byang nubasems dpa' thams cad
dang/ rangasangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thosadang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yinadang/ thamakha' lding dang/ ma 'am cad ng/ lto 'phye chen padong/
sha za dang/ srin podang/ 'byung po thams kyi'ang yin no/ datsand gyi chur byas te na bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhi dang/ stong dang/ gangang/ thams cad du gtor nasangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa'od ng/ 'jam dpalagadonanur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dasapa thams cad dang/ sngags
dang ri bzhin du 'byung po' tshogs dang/ sems can thams cad 'gugasapa 'gyur ro// na ma: sarba bud+d+ha nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ o d+ha d+hu ra d+hur dz+ham bas/ snum ra tsa sha hUM tu/
'tsha san ya ra nu smarasAhU~M/ bdug ba'i sngags so// tsanangan dang/ ga pur dang/ gur kum gcig tu byas te bdugang sa bdugasanade bzhin gshegs po rnams deng/ byang chub sems dpa' tham
cungadang soms can thamasacad bdugapas tsham zhang dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dir ang phyag rgyur 'gyur ba// pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa// tham sa cad 'gugs byeng zhi ba
wis spyan drang ba yi sngab sa la yang// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag rgyu 'di nyid de// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang ra thams cad dang/ sams can thams cad phyon
rgya la mchod yonadabul bar bya// ga pur dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum chu dang sbyar nas ma rtog su ma dang/ ma lakangang ) ngabyar gyi me tog dang ! ma tog bu nag dang/ mi rtog pa ku la dang me tog
[']d+d+haM ta ga ru'ang ngag gang yang rung ba'i mi rtog gam/ dus ji ltaba'i me tog dri zhim pa bcugs/ sngags 'das mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maH sarba bud+d+hanaM/ apra ti ha ta shAsan d+ha na

tang g+ha ho he ma hA kA ru Ni ka ba shA ru pa d+hA ra an+d+haM pra tits+tshapa ya/ sam ya ma nu sma ra ti ta/ maN+Da lamang+ge pra be she ya pra be sha ya/ sarba tanu kaMpa kagragadaM/ oM pa ra ba tsA Na hA/ 'dir yang
phyag rgyun gang ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjesasu mthun zhing brtanapa'o// 'dir ya nga 'dri'i sngagasasu 'gyur ba ni/ na ma : sa ma nabud+d+hanaM/ na ma sa man gan a ba b+has

shAya/ ta tsA ga tAya// dbu gan d+he gnad+he gi ngud/ gnamor te// pra titsapralaM/ ga ng+his ma tan tsa ra Nigu nA/ 'dir phyag rgyur 'gyur ba ni'i ma zhes bya ba'i ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byedapa'o/
'dir ngog sngags su 'gyur ba/ na mas monubud+d+hanaM/ a pa tig tashAsanAnaM/ namasaM ku sum ta ra dza s+ya/ ta tha ga ta spya/ tad+ya thA/ kusu me ku su me ku sam rgyu/ ku su ma rabs ni/
ku su ma ba ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang gong du bostanapa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya'o// sku na rmad byung bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// rdzogs sangs
rgyas kyis gsungs// garama'i sngags ni bshad par bya// nam sarba/ ]apa ti ha ta shAsanAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bI/ ma hA satAsan+dA ba lo ka ta sa mo ba 'grot+tA pa ya grong pa ya hU~M
sarba bi shwa ra ra Na Ta phaT swAdA 'dasin bshes dbul bar bya// 'byung po thams cad kyi gter ma yang bya'o// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur bani mdung zhes bya bam rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o//
na ma samanabud+d+hanaM/ a taha ta shAsan naM sarba ta man d+ha kA ra btso sAnaM/ nam saman dzo tu rgyu b+ha sa shA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya// tad+yathA/ he he b+hagabA

[D] tshu tir sha ta sa ha sra pra timaN+Di ta sha rAri bku rlabakurlam hAbadz+has tAsamanadzalong dro tamu rti khud/ khurda/ a btsoka ya/ a ba loka ya maM/ kaM sarba satA nAny+tsa swA/ mar me'i sngags
te 'dasamar ma dbulabar bya'o// kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyun sems can kun gyisamathong ba'o// nam samanabud+d+han/ a pra tiha ta shAsanAnaM/ dang thA/ dzA la dzA la/ dzul yudzAl ya/
yUb b+hod kang ni kro'u pad+ma las hA/ ma nga bya ba byedapa'i sngags so// 'dir yang phyag rgyur 'gyur ba'i// sems canakun la'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags byang chub
sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa mchog gis sngonabashadapa'o// de nasa'ajamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dang 'a phyag na rdo rje la smras nga/ gsang ba pa'i bdag de sngags
ga 'di nagasang bdang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/ khyed bu 'jig rten rnam gragasapa'i/ mibazadab ni gang yin pa// sngags rnams dgan thams cad kyis// mkhas
pa rna ra sa kyis sgrub pa snyo/ spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes gragasapa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yan// de ni rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir// rig pa 'dan yang dag brjod// na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM

a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA naM/ pa) ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru 3 ma ma kI b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba brgyud ha dA sarma badzrab nApa kaMmurdzu ka Ta dzib ShAn+ta ka ra mngu bkI ta ru pad+hA ra Ni/ pa tsapatsasarba duhU~M mdwag pa

dza ba tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha banad+d+hasarba gra hAn/ 3 ka mu kha tharta bu dza/ 'a ra tsa ra Ne ru dra ma nA yaM/ ba mnAya/ bstsang de ba man mA ba lam ba/ la yul hum N+Da lam d+me pra be sha ya sa ma lta ma nu sma ra hUM
shu pAhAhUMphaT phaT swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di na 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i gas chen pong/dong drung dang zhes bya ba yin te/ bro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad
'jig par byedapa ste 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub semasadapa' yang 'jig par byed pa yin na/ bgegs mngasapa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di brjodopa
tsam nyid kyis bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyur 'gyur ban)/ nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegasa rnams thams cad zhi byed pa'o// 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyalape'i
snying po ni/ a bkra'anahU~M sarba sha tAMnAsha ya n+taM b+ha yaphaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad thug gzer chen po dang/ rlung chen po dang/ zhi ba'i pa'i rims kyis thebs
par 'gyur ro// rtagitu dgarangamad po dang/ byamasapamod pa dang/ snying rje'isoms thob par ma 'gyur te/ bzlos pa zin gyi bar du ge'al bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dkenamchog
gsum la gnod byedapa dag labya'i/ zhiba'i soms yodapa gzhanangagalanam yin no// phyag rgya nitso gsum chenapo zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir rtsa ba'i sAngapar
'gyur ba na/ o trakA lar pahU~M khaM hA/ phyag rgyunatsagasumachen po zhes bya ba nyid sbyar ba bya'o// ma rus thams cad la gang 'dodapa de byedapar 'gyur ro// snyingepa'imchogasangs
rgyas thams cad kyisabyin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya'o// 'odin las thams cad byedapa'o// phyag rgyu'ang rtse gsumachopo zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o// phung krolothams
cad zlog par byedang/ 'byung khrims tsa dbang du byedapas/ mdo nakhre'i rgyalapo 'din 'o sa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad
ba du 'thagasapar 'gyur ro// 'dir gshegasasu gsol ba'i sngagasasu 'gyur ba na/ nam sa bud+d+hanaM/ oM pra ti ha ta shAsanAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ dzaya dzaya sudza ya/ mahA kA ru Ni ka ba tA rApi

Nigats+tsaM sarba bud d+ha shu bsardzayas pa ri bA raMprab+habanaM tsaprakheshayasamaya man smar sarbany+tsa A:/ sid ts+tshan+taman pa du mno ra shrI tsi/ mopa ri pA ra yAn sU/ 'di gshegs su gsol ba'i sngagasaM
Sha lasakhrams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag rgya nibazang po'i gdanazhes bya ba yin te/ 'disogadanala'ang sbyar bar bya'o// yang kyis bzlos bo bdun byas te gshegs su gsol/ 'jig rten
dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ sngags dang/ sngags 'grub padag dang/ ngamatshig dang/ bzlas pa dang/ dus dang/ nges bar sdom pa dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la'ang bltas te/ 'khor gyi de la 'khor chenapo dang/ rang gi rigang 'i tshogs kyi de sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams smras so/
nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ apra ti ha ta gA dra/ oM ra Ti pisA hA/ 'ang ni 'dzamadapal gyi rjesas 'brang pa sa canam zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug pang lnga zhes
bya bdug gi las thoms cad la sbyang bar bya'o// na ma: sarba bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA san naM/ o na ti 3 'dzan ni ba'i sgecanamazhes bya ba'i rigapa yin taM las thams cad byed pa'o// /

phyag rgya ni kha byeb zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las laspyar bar bya'o// nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tInAlan/ rigapa 'di nipad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o/
phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan ngs gnod sbyin mo nges pa dgug par bya'o// na mo: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a tsitang b+hu ta rU pA/ o wa tI sA shA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsngags pa yis//
mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed// sangs rgyas dgan thams cad kyis// thams cangagazugs canarab sngogasab// rig pa thod can zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyisabashangapa yin/
na ma saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta tsA rAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyug rgyu gtsugabud gsum dang ni// dpalany+tsa byed pas sbyarab r bya// gzugs mang 'chang ba
lha mo ni// myur du 'phrosaspyod srung byed pa'o// nam saman+tabud+d+hanaM/ a tsitad b+hu ta ru pi NaM/ oM d+hu ri swA hA/ phyug rgya mdung rtse yang dagagyur// thamasanod thams cad rnam 'jigayon//
na ma: sam bud+d+hanaM/ atsitad b+hu tarU pa/ o tAresahA/ rigapa phug ron zhesakhyob// lasarnamasaM kun la rab tu bsngags// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'dzomasapar
byedapa yin// nam saman+tabud+d+hanaM/ a tsin+d+he tung b+hu tir puNaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lokani swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya'// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin

byed pa// gdong gi phyagargyu sbyar bar bya// na ma: saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ atsitab+hu ta ru paNaM/ tad+ya thA/ o bshAbinusalhatshe bapishA ru pA Ni kang ka be shas ma mnu sma raru ra tits+tsha sA/ rigapa/
postobs chen 'di// 'jigana'adren pas bstanapa sgo/ mtho phyagargya ldanobasan// soms thams cad 'bebs shing dgo/ 'byungapa kun lamchog sbyin pa// thams cad ces
yang dag bsgrags/ ma saman+tabud+d+hanaM/ atsitud tar pANaM oMshAtogi bsus// rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis// rnamadagod lasan thamasacad byed// dkaratshochen mo zhes bya

[ba rmad byung bsam med gzugs can te// 'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed// skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur// na ma samanabud+d+hanaM/ a tsa rkyang b+hU ta ru pA k+Sha/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha 'di khari b+ho
khu ra sa sha hUM hUM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya mo ya shamA na ya swahA/ rig pa 'di ni rig chenApo// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan// phyag rgyu gdong gsum sbyar byosan// marangasasems can 'dul bar
byed/ namasaman+tabud+d+hanaM/ e pra ti ha ta sha ka ti pra tsar/ tad+ya thA/ og/ rig 'dzin dpal chonamo/ 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa si// phyag rgya khasbyar sbyar byas nas// rgyal
srid chen po sbyin byed pa'o// nam sam bud+d+hanaM/ sasatA b+ha yaphred yinaM/ o adziti kum ra ru ba si ngur A gats+tshamam kAruM kuru su// rgyal byed bzhes rnamagrogs pa// gzhonanu bdud
rtsa las byung ba// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// ngagra rnams thams cad zlog par byed// namaM saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ atsanang b+ha ta rAdI/ dadabyA/ oM ya sdur/ adza ti sA/ a
par dzatisAhA/ sring mo bzhizhis rnam grags pa// byang chub sems pa'is 'grob// sa rnams thamasacad kun 'grozhing kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o// ming po gtumabu ru zhes
grags/ 'di dag gi ni rjes su 'brang// gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas// rgya mtshol ni gnas pa yin// khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis// bsamapa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na tshas
dman bud+d+hanaM/ lakA grwa ru pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ram na ku ma ra TaDa/ sha mu kha bod+hisatA su[]ta/ yur san/ shat+tod+hi te pane/ rak+tag t+taM ga d+hA nu le panapra A ya/

kha kha khA hi khA hid+d+haM de bya/ rakapa tsa pa mun+ti sa ma ya ma nusmar/ b+ham b+hAm/ lha ma ya b+hAm ya/ lasu la mA bi laM ba sin kim Ni tshaku ru gyur/ ba cing turupad+mar Ni/ tipUtits+tshashusarba bud+d+han dzA ta sA/
slob pa byang chub sen sapaNAnaM) 'jam pa'idabyas kyis bshad pa na// sa rnams malus rnamajug tu// kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi don phyir dang// mar ngasasams/
can bzlogaba'i phyir// mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su/ gdul ba'i don du 'di'i skyes te/ ma byeng dang na mig dmar gyi phyag mtshan gyis mtshonapa// sAng rjes thugs ni brlan pa/
man// 'jam pa'i rag gis gsungs pa yani// sems dpa'i nang nabadag nyi'o// byis ba rnams la phan byed gang// sems can khrod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la rnam par stod//
phyag rgya mdungadang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid chen pos sbyaranani// tshangs pa sogs nga 'ang 'gugasakhyed na// mi rnams la smos cingagos// gzhonanusemasas mtha'adag ni// bsdus nas
mo sasubashad par bya// smin drug bu dnga'ajamadapa' byed/ sngagasasu 'diniyang dag bstan// sems can rjesasugazuba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpar 'dir ston te// yi gosum
zhesabya'i snying bon/ 'dis sngags su brjod pa yani// sems rnakun l phama'iphyir// longasaspyod 'drenapa'i mchog de yani// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bkong na las kun
byed yin// o sngags 'ad mdor bsdu byas n// mi rnams ni don byed do// na maH saman bud+d+hanaM/ saman ngo mun+tinaM/ ob kr-ita gragashAyaNasA/ 'di yang zhiba'isnying
ngo sa de bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas// 'byung po thamasacad 'gugs byed cing// de bzhin gza'adang mamor bcas// phyag rgya kun gyi phyag rgya la// bkod na'abrasabur bcas par 'gyur//
'byung po rnams ni dngangs byed cing// mtshungs 'jug pa rtogang ra byed: 'a[E]mdab gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gab zhes bya ba 'jamadapala gzhon nu na rjes su 'brang ba ste/ las
thams cad byedung sa/ bany+tsas pa tsam nas las thams cad byedabar 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang/ sag par byed pa dang/ 'gugs par byed pa dang//
dbang du byed pa dang/ skoms par byed pa dang/ 'jig ra byed pa dang/ rig pa 'dzan pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa 'o kam man bud+d+hanaM apra ti ha ta shA sa nAnaM/
tad+ya thA/ obra glu brosgrubar tsas shAn+taMku ru sa/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste/ byang chub semasadapas bshadapa yini// 'byung pos gyur rab tu thob// skad cig nyid la bsil
bar gyur/ phyag rgyagatsug pung lnga sbyan// myur du dge legs thob bar 'gyur/ mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la// sridi srung gnarog byed 'dod// 'di ni
mdor bsdusabastonapa ste// 'di yi tshig bsdus payani// nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra tihatu shAs nanA/ tung tho/ og ruNA gAha na tsakra pA Ni/ tsa tusmyudzahUMsam ya ma nu slar//
bod+hisatA Apa ya tisA hA/ 'jam pa'i dbyang sakyis bka' stsalapa// zhiba'i donanamyurabyedayin// 'byung po rnamasani rnam 'jig cing// khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus canaAni// phyag
rgyugatsug pung gisum sbyarin// las rnams kun byed brtanapa yin// gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud las// bya ba rgya chen bstan pa dag/ thabasakyis gdul bya'asamtshan ya// 'jam pa'i=

kyis bshad pa yin// nam saman+tabud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA naM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA mahishA rab+hu tAd+hi pa ti ba 'a b+ha d+hA dzapra laM badza rA mu ku Ta duraNe/ si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ri Ti mAtihUM hUMphaT phaT/
po d+hisat+tA dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'dibadag gis sbas pa ste// phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar na// 'byung po thamasatsang rnam 'dzag pa'o// bdag
gis sngonanigang bstanipa// 'di yatshog sngonabyug/ sems canasastong gnas pa la// zhib pa zhes brjod pa ste// yon tanasna tshogs rgya che ba// zhiba'i rgyud lasang yas bstan//

nam: sa man+ta bud+d+ha naM/ aprati ha tashas nAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ o 'a ku nam shAkan/ pad+ma ba dItapa kAsam+bapAnA shu ga kha kha khA hi khA hi samayaman smar ti bo d+his tAA dzA pa ya ti swA hA/ sngag/
'dra mthun minapos// namamakha' lding zhes rnamapar grags// gdul dka' 'dul byedanamasakyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'dzoms/ phyag rgya che dang sbyari byas n// phung krol
shin tu mi bzad 'joms// gnasadang 'gro ba'i dugadan// gso bar byedapar the tshom med// sems can gdul bya'i thabs su ni// byang chub sems dpa' yang drug dkal/ namamakha'
lding gzugs sa la spyod// 'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan// ji srid namamakha' lding rgyud du// tshog rgyu tsher bstan de dag/ sems can rnams la phanapa'i phyir// thams cad nga
yis bstan pa ste// byang chub semasadapa' nam mkha'alding// gdul ba'adon du 'ad bstan to// gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir// 'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu// 'jag
rten sngagasan dzi srid// mog 'di ni bstapa na// semasacan gdul bya'i don du ni// de lta de ltar rnamapar rgyu// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang// rdo rje pad+ma'irigs dag pa/
nga yas cho ga rab 'byamasadang// mdo dag kyanabastan pa yani// ji ltar mamo mang bo ni// 'bad pas byis ba rnams srung ba// de bzhin byas pa'i bocan la/ sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yas
bshad// sngonan stobs bcu ldan bas bstan// de na ngayas bstan ni// sngagasargyud don ma lus pa// 'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yan// rgyal ba mchog gis
gang gsus dang// stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang// rmad byung bsamamakhyab tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dgage/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad
dang ldan pa'iganas gtsang ma'agazhalamed khang dang/ 'khor gyidakyil 'khor chen pa la gzigs nas dmchog thams cad yang dgapar bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyomasapar zhugs so// gang du
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sams can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pasemasalarag tu zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs m thag tu thams cad dang

ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu chen po sna tshogs pa'i rgyanabakodapa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul par ng
sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'bagasapa nyams dang/ byang chub semasadapa'aspyod pa la zhugs padang/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dgyila'akhor de brib 'am 'drir 'jug par mi
nus na/ so so'i skya bor gyurapa'isoms can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/// 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pasagazigs nas/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyus thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur
ba thams cad dang/ sbyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad 'jamadapala gzhonanur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
pa'i mdzad pa bsam gyisam khyabapa'i rgyu mthunapa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// sems can
so so'i bo'i yong kyis kyang de dmigasapor mi nusan/ bra ba 'am 'drar 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ngenas 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur ngas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang pa de la rab tu zhugs
pa'i sems can de dag la sbas pa/ grogs pa riganyon cig/ 'di nade bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'a rnams kyis bzlobar bya bam yanan/ sems can gzhan 'phags
pa 'phags bamaya pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje las+sas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras na las 'das pa'i
dkyil 'khor dam pa yidi las byung ba ni bstan to// ma rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'angasan sa can rnams gang du yang
dag par zhugs na'ang sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs n/ 'jibe/rton dang 'dzin rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang
ba pa'i bdag pa lagan jo rdzas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyalaba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shesan gsungs shag gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge mgonapon// yongs
maM su mya ngan 'das 'ogan// sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid// sa stong khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed// mthong tsam gyis 'jig rten na// sngagasan rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//
mishes cho ga nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// bdag nyang chenapo tshangs yong// sngags rnams 'grubapar mi 'gyur ro// sngagasaladang pamed pas ni// 'bad pa du ma byas
kha gyur kyang// sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ma rungs ngamatshag ma bostan te// ngamatshig sbyor ba nyamasapan// rab 'byams brgya byinaAnanayang// sngags rnams 'grub
par ma 'gyur na// mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// sngags rnams thams
cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor na// las kun byed la rab zhugs na// bostanapel ni gzhananu bzhin// sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin//
ngonasagasang pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjes/ sems dpa' chen po de gsol ba btab pa/ kyi sems can chen po sems can chen po/ sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor
gsungs shig ces so/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa// 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pasasems can gyi don gyi phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smas pa/ re zhig deng pa tsho'aphrul cha phyed dam
dpyid zla 'bring po'am/ dpyid zla tha chung ngam/ zla ba yar ngo'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang/ gza'abazang po la bltas te rgyu skarab zang padang ldan pa yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang/ zla ba nya ba dang/
dus gzhanA la dbyar gyi dus sbangs la/ snga dros byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chenapal brten pa'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen per

'jug pa'i gnasasam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang rtsa ba grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cangayang m bar dkyil 'khor gyi slobadaponasong sta/ lama'i spyil bu byas
pal zhag bdunanam/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya sta/ gang gnas de dag tu'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdzob mad pa/ gyomo dang/ thal bdang/ sol ba dang/ phub ma dang/
rusapa sangasapa/ shin tu gtsang ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba'i sa phyogasasusrog chagasamadapa'ichu la ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ tsan danadang/ ga pur dang/ gur kumagyi chus bsros pa khro bo gshen
gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen bodang ldan pasas phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang/ stongadang/ 'og dang/ thad ka dang/ phyogs
mtshams thams cad du bsang gtor 'o/ de nas phyogs der kun nasagru bzhir 'u bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyadapa byas te/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o// 'bri'i
ni ru bcu gnyis pa'o// chung ngun khru brgyad pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'dananimapa gsum// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs payan// rgyal po 'dodang sa chen pa ste// 'bring na lengs
spyod 'phar byed pa// chung ngadam tshig yid g srung// las rnams kun byed zhib yin// de nga las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ning las phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der rje
bdang/ sol ba dang/ thal ba dang/ rus pa dang/ sgra lasogs pa dang/ srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthongan sa'i phyogs gzhan du skyo babyas n/ gnodapa mad pa dang 'tsho ba med
par 'gyur ro// ri bo'i rtse mo dang/ chu bo'i rogs dang/ rgya mtsho'athumadang/ chu bo chen po' ngogasas phyi ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags ni/ shin tu gtsang ba dang/
srogachags mang par byas l bri bar bya'o// sa phyogasade'ang srog chags med pa'i che ba'i rnam lnga bsros te/ chu bo'i klung gi sogatsang ma'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i/
[n ]sanges dgang bar bya'o// bkang nasakyang legasapa bcu kun nas mnyam par byas la/ dkyil 'khor rnamapagasum gang 'dod par bya'o/ seng rje yabu yang wakhri bergyal ba'i
sngagasalan bdun bzlazhing phyogs bzhir gdab pa// tshonastsalta'askud pa la khro bo'i snying bolanabadunabany+dzas byas tedakyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin dudabusakyi
gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhir bya'o// dbus gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dponagyis rang gi rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po
bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogasapa dang bdag nyid bsu bar byas la/ sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogasasu
bltas te kuka'i stan la 'dug pa bya// sangs rgyasadang byang chub samasadaba'athamasacad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shasabasorazhing dgramapakhya'o// de nyid kyi phyi

la cu'ang b rnams zhagagacigaganasabasakhasAlang dbyung bar bya'o// de ladakyila'akhor gyi slobadapon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyisags la mkhas pa dang/ sems can gyi don gyi thabA
kyi spyi theg pa chen po la mos pa dang/ zhag gcigeslakhar byas pa dang/ grogs bzang po dang ldan padang/ bstanabacos snatshogasakyilas mthobasatshon sna lnga'i phyom zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs
par sbyarab byas l/ ya gi drug pa'i snying pomangoparab zlas pa'aphyi mdakyil 'khor gyi dbusasu gzhag par bya'o// parol tu'ang rgyal mtshanadang bdag bsang ba dang//
rta babasabazhis brgyanapa/ chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogasakyis g.yur thab dang/ rdzakhotshadang/ rdza rnga brdung ba dang/ dung gi sgra dang/ dga' ba dang/ bkra shis pa'i sgrog nga dag bya'o//
zurab g sa chos mnyan po dag labashadapar bya'o// phyogs bzhi'i theg pa chenapo'amado sdebakag par bya ba la 'ad lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang lho phyogs su bkag
par bya'o// 'phags pa sgrub sgrolama'i ting nge 'dzazhinub phyogs su bklagapar bya'o// 'phagasapa sdong pos brgyanar byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'amangosde
shar phyogasasu bklag par bya'o// grogasabamadag mang namang ba'i shes pa'i gang zagachos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyi bskul babya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon langs nas
tsan danadang/ gapa dang/ gur kum bsres pas rtog dra'om pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bak+khas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du rtsal par dgram par bya'o// mngon b.rab kramapa byas
nas phyirol dubyungs/ zhag bdun gyi rang 'dodapa'i'abasabastanapa'i ri mo mkhan gnyisasamagasumakhyang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nyobar bstan pa mkhas bdag btsug ste/

[z ]rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsud pudabacing ba byas la/ de nas gsoradang/ dnguladang/ zangs dang/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshonasna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phyi ma zhib mo rab tu
blangs te// longs sodachenapo dang ldan pa dang/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dga' dri'i gzhug pa byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub thob pa yin/ sngags sgrub par byed pa
lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'irgyas mchog 'das gyur nas// sems can bsod nams chungab la// 'di 'dra'i longs sod ga la yod// de bas tshoga'adi bstan bya// 'jam dbyangs 'od
chenaldan pa yis// skye bo'aphongs par gzigs nasan)/ nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstanapa yin/ 'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu
zhib pa'i tshon sna lngabazang po dkar ba dang/ sor bdang/ dmar ba dang/ nag po dang/ ljang khu dag gis bsgyur te/ snga bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phyam slobadaponarang gis bla sanas gtsug phud lnga'i

phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas ba byas nas phyi ma de la phyag rgyu cing ngo// skabapa'i grogs maMchog gi slobadapon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su chog

mthong ba'i las kyi thang khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la zabs su khru gangab kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i zo ba 'dra ba/ byaril yang pad+ma' khri ba 'drab// shing pa la sha'i yam shang gis mo sbyar bar/ shing
bal ba'i yam shang mgrog tsam rlonapa latshig dang/ sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa 'am/ snying bos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te mo lha spyan drang

la bar bya'o// sbyin drang nas sngar bstanapa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pas phyi'i yang rgyu rtsa brgyad sbyin srag bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang 'tshog chas byas
nas/ bdag nyid dang ra momakhanayang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid l bya ste/ sngar bstan/
pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sums dpa'athams cad la rab tu btung nas/ 'aSha ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phyam blangs nas sku'i gzugs

kyis bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chog 'dadig gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas nga ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/
gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'drib la 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag gis slob dpon bdag nying bsrung

ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngag kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtong bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang/ stongadang/ 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te thab khung du 'bar song nas gos

gtsang bgos te/ gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur kum dang bsres pa'im gyi sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khris la 'dug nas bzlas pa byas te re zhing du gnas par bya'o/

nyungs dkar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngonapar bsngagasal kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o// bgegasakyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can/
ma zad nga 'i sgra rnams dumarlung dang/ char dang/ yul ngan gzhan dang/ gzhan gang yang rung ba mthongan khros pos zungs kar chang yar bcangs te/ lan bdun sbyin srag byas pa des ni bgegs rab
tu 'joms pare'agyur ro// mi'i bgegs la nilan lnga chang pa nas sbyin srog byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa mdapar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ sang gi de nyid
la ma ma yin pas zinapar 'gyur bal nams kyang the tshom med de brgya byin yang 'chi bar byedan/ ma lus pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ma 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dges/ khro bo gshin
rje gshed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bres shing ma snang bar 'gyur ro// denas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gas de da du ku sha'i bres la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshedakyi
bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// denas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkyo thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su rang sangs rgyas gnyis kyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/
par bya'o// de gas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chenapo gnyis chos nyan pa bya'o// de dag ga'ang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugargyan thams
cad kyis brgyan// stonakari'adamabu'i mdog ltar dkab/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pan pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom
ldan 'das yum gos dkar mo/ phyag g.yonapa na pad+mabasnams pa/ phyag g.yas pasabcom ldan 'dras shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalab/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyagan gser gyi cod pan
'chang ba/ dar ladakar po'i na bza' mnabs pa/ dar la'i bla gos mnabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can yang rang rang ga gnasasu spyod lam/
dgagasaganas par bya'o// de dag gi snying du na bcom ldan 'das yumashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinam dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyanadang/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// dobazhin du
byang chub sems dpa'abacu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang/ sa'i snying podang nam mkha' mdzod dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang/
byams pa rma yab lagan thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bltab dang/ drim med par 'gro bdang/ dri ma med pa'i togadang/ nor bzang dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ dri mamed par grags pa
dang/ nang thams cad gso bar byedapa dang/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang/ 'jig rten 'gro ba dang/ blo chen po dang/ blobazang po ste/ somasadapa' chen po 'di dgan lus
ni tu zhib dang/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bar bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang/ rigapa'i rgyalamadang/ pad+ma'a'ogis gzugs dang/ phyag rgya lung ji ltab bzhin du gnasaji lta
bam lus pa dag tu brib bya'o// mtha'igrubazhi'i gnasadag tun gnas rnams gzhagapa phyagopad+ma' mo tog legs par byas pa dang/ rig pa'i lhagangadzAn pa'ang de dag tugazhag par bya'o//
de bzhin du lha phyogasasu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni spos kyi ngad ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid lta ba dang/
thamasacad la'ang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su rangasangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsananganadang/ grub pa zhes byabaganyis bri bar bya'o/
de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thus gnyis ni'ong srungs chen po dang/ kat+ya ya na dri bar bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yonangu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tumadzes/
pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanang/ lagapa g.yas banaN+Dayabathogasapa/ g.yonapa khro bo'i lus kyis gnasapa/ do'i khu tshuram/ do'i lcags kyus/ rdo rje lu gu rgyun ma/
dpung thang ma/ mche byang ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdanal gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal ba thams cad dang/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang/

phyag rgyudang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o// de dag ga'angagayon du zur bzhir snatshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogasam dran pa'i gnas
'tshe de dag kyang 'di'i bzhugs shag ces brjod par bya'o// de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin padrugadang/ bcom ldan 'das yumam ma ka bri bar bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ gzugs
shan tu mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi lapo brgyud kun nas 'bar ba'i 'brang ba'i phyag rgyu bcings nas/ rang rang dag gas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su
bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanab/ de bzhinagashigs pa la zur gyis lta ba dag la 'di lta ste/ go tsug tor 'khor les sbyar ba dang/
gtsug tor mngonapar 'phags pa dang/ gtsug tor gdugs dkarapo dang/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang)gapaN+Did phung po'i gtsug tor dang/
gtsug tor mthon po sto/ brgyadapo 'di dag/gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnamasaso// g.yon du bri bani rang sangs rgyas rnams so// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya
sa/ g.yas phyogs su na 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod nga na 'chang ba/ lus zhib/ lag pa g.yon pa mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzanang/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi

blags 'dzan cing sgo la mngonadu phyogasang/ bzhin nyung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa'asgo'i g.yon phyogasasunabyang chub samasadapa' chenapo ma rgyal ba las rgyalab zhes bya ba
bri bar bya sta/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pana'achang ba/ lag pa g.yonupan dbyig pa dang spyilugs 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yasapa ni mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzinapa/ bzhin cung zang khre gnyer
dang ldan pa spo la mngonapar phyogs pa bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor la kun tu 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya/ zhi ba'i gzugs dang mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag
g.yonapa na ut+pal sngon po bsnyams pa/ phyag g.yas pa nabal ba bsnams pa/ byas pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsugapung lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa// mu tig gi 'phrang bas mchod
phyir thogs pa/ dar lA'i stod g.yogs mnabasang/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun nas 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan lanye bar bzhugs pa/
khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rjegashed la gzigs pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo lamangonadu phyogs pa blta na sngagapa bri b.rabya'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i
'og tu khro bo'i rgyalapo gshin rje gshed bri bar bya// masdugapachenapo'agazugs can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas khyab pa bka' lan cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpar chenape
phyogasaMsu bltakha/ g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tugasagatsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bugazugs can byang chub soms dpa'ilnga bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ shin tu drimadadang/ shin tu dul ba dang/
dag pa dang/ mun sel dang/ kun tu snang ba'o// de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dugapa/ rinapo che du ma 'baba'i rdo'i stangadang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs
kyi gcal bkramapa/ shin tumasam brib bya'o/ rol khor yugazhu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babasabazhadang ldan pa/ phyogasabazhinas rnam pa sna tshogasapa'i tshon sna lngas gas la bas ri mo

shin tu drang ba dang ldan panang gdikyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa'i stang du 'a mo'i dbusasu ma tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang posapad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'brangashes khyab pa/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyu dang ldan pa/ stsolamo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su gtsug tor

ba0 'khor los sbyar ba'i phyag rgya brali bya'o// g.yon du nag pod phung po'i phyag rgya braler bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyan gyi stong du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o///
bcom ldan 'dis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'apheb rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pade bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs/
can bya ste/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phrang bsakhyab pa/ de'i ang g.yas phyogasasu ni lhung bzed dang chos gos gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin
dumathar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas lanapad+ma' phyag rgyu'o/ bcom ldan 'das ma tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyalapo'i dbang po de bzhin gshegasapo'agayon phyogasasu gtsug tor gzi brjid phung
po'i phyag rgya bra ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyabang/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhinagashegs rin chen togabya ste/ rinapo che'i ri bo stong du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/btud+ma sngonapo

dang margad dang pad+mar ga rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/[– ]/de yang g.yonaphyogasasu rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
khyab pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil dang/ spyi blugs dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ bzang
po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// mthar gyis sgo'i ga nasasu rdzortsagasumapa gnyis ka la'ang kun nas 'bar babra'i// bcom ldan 'adas 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyurapa'i

'og tu phyag rgya chen gtsugapung lnga zhesabya ba dang/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgyu kun nas 'barab 'di gnyis phan tshun 'brel bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sodagan rgya sobalta ba dang/
'jug pa nimadun gyis blta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshonashin tu gsal bsna tshogasabaldan sdugapa/ zukhazhas rnam par m dzes// rta babs
bzhi'i rnam pa phyogasabazhir khru gnyis tsam/nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar byasnya/ gdongabazhi pa/ gos dkar pa bgos ba la stong g.yogs gos dkar po/
dang tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa/ kha dog gsal 'dragaralapa'icodapana'adzin pa/laganang byug pad spyi bags 'dzinab/ de'agayas phyogasasu 'od gasal gyi lha'i bu byas/ mngog gsar 'dra ba/
bsam gtanakhyadapar can gyi gzugasacan/ dar lnga'i gos bgosab/ dar lA'i stong g.yogasabyas b/ bzhin shin tu gsal ba/ ral pa'icodang na'adzinapa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pecan/ skyil mokrung/
gas 'dug pa/lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogasasu 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/lus rab tu ba/bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ dar lA 'gos
bskos pa/dar lA'agos kyi stod g.yogs byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dugapa/ lagapa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchor phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa// de'i ngos gyis dag la ldan dang/ 'phrul dga'

dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byedadang/ 'thab braladang/ brgya byin lasogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ gerams ji lta bdang/ chapyadadang dbyibasaji lta ba bzhinangu'o// brgya byin gyi 'og turgyal po chenapo bzhi'i

ris la rtag tu myosadang/ 'phrang thegs dang/ lag na gzhong thogs dang/ pa wangaganyis pa dang/ sabla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang/ chabyad ji ltababazhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs
su me ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ shan tu mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ dge chung dang/ bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta bzhin bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs
dang/ byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin te/ dedag nirimapa 'og mganyis la brten te bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba lamathar gyis phyogasabazhi'i rgyal po
chenapobazhi/byang phyogasanas 'jugapa'i g.yas ngos su gteranyibar gnas pa la gnod sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ gtsugapud nyung zad 'dud pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i g.yas

sunor bu bzang dang/ gang babazang bo gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis phra'i// de bzhin du mtharogyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma'ang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogasasu chu lha lag na zhags ba
thogs dang/ kladaga' bo dang/ nyidaga' bo dang/ 'jog padang/ nor rgyasal sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyud pa klong nas nga/ pa da len pa
[D] gyis gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/ drizadang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen podang/ drang srong dang/ grub pa dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ namamakha' ldang dang/ ma dang/ mam yan pa la
sogs pa dang/ smanadang/ nor bu rinapo che'i bye brag dang/ ri dang/ chu bod/ glang dang/ mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su na ba/ shin rjemamo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa
bribar bya'o// shar lho mtshams su ma lha kun nas b.rab 'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang/ grwa shugs dang/ 'phreng ba'aganathogs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag bri ba/ ralapa'icodapan 'dzin
paN+NaM pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchodaphyir thogos dkar po thogasapa/ mdegs sor 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang/
mtshon cha dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ khadog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bribar bya'o// thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jugang 'i sgo'i phyi ril du dka' zlogag bdag
po khyu mchog mnab/ laganamadung rtsa gsumathogasang/ lhamodaka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogasapa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ smin drugagabum bya'aganal 'dug pa/ mdung thogs/
thogasapa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos sar bo bgos pa/ gos sar po'i stod g.yogs can/ lag pagayonapa na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs
pa/ mthar gyis rtswa ngag shin tu rad pa 'dra ba dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen podang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ nag po chen po dang/ ma mo bdun pa rgyan dang/ mtshon cha dang/ kha dog dang/
dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nor lha brgyad dang/ drang srong bdun dang/ khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang/ dung dang/ da dang/ ral gri thogs pa// gdan nam mkha'
lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyudadang/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsabadunadang/ gang yang nyeb gza'abargyad sa steng gdakyil 'khoranarab tu rgyu ba'ang bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis tshes

grangs bco lnga dang/ yar ngo dang mar ngo' phyogs dang/ khyimabacu gnyasadang/ dus drug dang/ zla ba bcu gnyis dang/ lo tshigs dang/ sring mo bzhi gru lo zhonapadang ma pa lta gru la zhen cing chu la
gnas pa ste/ mdor naphyag rgyur gzhag par bya ba'ang yan no// lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la bstan te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nying phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil nas nags las
'khor de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la rten cing bya bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsumacar yang gru bzhi'i rnam par gnas par bya ba
yan no// mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sams can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
kyang nges par bri bar bya'o// rdorje'i ges 'phags pa thugan rdo rje'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo'aphags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang ngosapar bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams kyi ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ma la'ang/
shar phyogasasu nam mjed kyi bdag po tshangasapa bri bar bya'o// sgo 'dring du na smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/ gos ser pos stong g.yogs
dang gos byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa nadril bu dang ba dan thogasapa gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis dkyil 'khor la blta ba'o// shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can/

drang srong gnang nas mar gnanges par bri bar bya'o// lhag man ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyur bri bar bya'o/ shar lhor na gzhon nu ma bzhi dang/ ming pa gzhon nu dang bcasapa gru'i bzhon pa la gnas

ba/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang/ mo'i lha'i rgyal po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs sun srin po'i bdag polas ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po b+ha b+ha nan shang pa tsu marda

la gnas pa dang/ dzam+b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin phyogazugs can gyi byang chub samasadapa'angesapar ba ba bya'o// de bzhinadu mthar gyis gshin rje'i rgyalapo ya dgasardzu 'phrul chen po nges par

bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha za'i rgyalapo rnam par g.yaM nga byedaces bya ba nges bar bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltaraganas pa bzhin phyag rgyur bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du wunub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i
gtsobo dga' po dang nye dga' bongs par bri bar bya'o// gza'agatso ba 'am bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs sunadrangasrong thub pa'i mchog dang/ gcirapu pa mu snyags kyi mchog gcer bu'i
gzugs bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar 'o// nub byang mtshams su ni gnong sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsugapung ljapa dang/

mi'am ci'i rgyalapa ljon pa ngesapar bri bar bya'o// lhagam ni gnas ji lta ba dang/ dbyibs ji lta babazhin du phyag rgyur bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhapa phyi rol tu ra mo lnga bkod de/ phyag rgya'i
