'phrang bas zhebar mdzesapar byas pa/ zur bananas rta babs bzhidang/ rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ ji ltar gnas ba la 'di lta ste/ phyagargya 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ul sngon po
bri'o/ g.yas dang g.yon phyogs su nang nga/ rdo rje/ dgra sta/ ralagra/ mdung dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ gad dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sAsi kadang/ bum pa dang/ 'dang/ dudang/
gdub kor dang/ spyi blugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ zhags pa dang/ dril bu dang/ chu gri dang/ gzhudang/ lcags mda' dang/ the ba dang/

'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su kun nas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chenapo gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs
su nadakyil 'kher gru bzhi'i bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o// shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'adabyibs can byas te gzhagal/ kun nas 'bar ba'i
pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshanapa'o//lho phyogs su dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o// nub phyogs sun dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po byas te/
ut+pal sngon po sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te/ nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/
zhags pa kun nas 'bar bsamtshan pa'o// lhonub kyi mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya sta/ dbyug pas kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// shar lho'i mtshams suni dkyil
'khor gru gsumapa byas te dgras 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// byang shar gyi mtshams sunaral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o// de ltar thams cad bris nas stong dang/
'og dang/ thad kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang dbar phye mas bri bar bya ba la'ang ltaste/ na bza'adang/ rdzayabadang/ lham 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bribar bya'o// 'jam
pa'i dbyang san blo can gyis/ sems can rnams laphanabazhinganas// dkyil 'khor gyi chog rnams // 'dir mdor bsdusabastanapa yani// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang
pa nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la// dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang/ bram dang/ rgyu gas dang/ rje'u rigasadang/ dmas rigs dang/
byang chug tu sems bskyod pa dang/ theg pachen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin canadang/ theg padamanapa mi 'dod ba'i ngang tshul can dang/ soms dpa'achen podang/ dad padang ldan pa dang//
dge ba'i chos can dang/ rgyal po chenapo mngonapar 'dod pa dang/ longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang/ longs spyod chen pomangon par 'dod dang ldan pa dang/ badza' ba dag dang/
dul ba dang ldan padang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong mdang/ dge bsnyenadang/ dge bsnyan ma pa rnams yang dag par sdom pa langes par gnas pa dang/ gso sbyong
la nye bar gnas shang sdom pa la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'achinape la zhe mi sdang ba dang/ phyogs chen po dang/ rigs mthon bod/ rangabazhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang/
zhag gtsage skyang b byas pa dang/ gos gtsang ma bgos ba dang/ sku dri zhim pa dang/ dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang/ de'i nyin zhag lag par dang/ gur kum dang/
lapisha' drashisepos dri zhim bar byas pa rtag tu ni regadang ldan pa dang ku shu'i khris la 'dug pa dang/ srung ba'i tshog byas pa dang/ tshangasapar spyod padang/ bdenapa dang ldan pa dang//
yaM dus 'tshams las rgyal ba dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mitaM/ ha cang yang ma ring bar gzhag par bya'o// shin tu gtsang ba dang/ shin tu gtsang sbyadang ldan pa gcig nas/
brgyad kyi bar te/ de las gzhan ma yinab de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba rgyalapo rgyal rigs spyi bonas dbang bskur ba'i rkyal po chen po dgag bu gzhon nu ma 'am/ gzhon nu grong ga chos mi
shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ bcom ldan 'dasa gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skyo bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na/
dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhag par bya'o// rgyalaparmanapo mngonapar 'phel ba dang/ tshodang/ nad med padang/ ngabang phyug dang/ skal pa chen po mngon par 'thal ba yin te/ khyung
par dubyis pa rnams la ngesapa'osngags grub pas grub pa gnas yan te/ de dag sngarab zhagapa byas nas grogs po bag yod bo bzangapo dang ldan pas dkyil 'kher gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi
0 bdug pas bdugs te rgyab kyi phyogs bam yin pas phyi rol du byung bar bya ste/ byung nas dus dang ji ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang/ srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngag

brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par brdzus te/ gtsug phud lngar phyag rgya chenapos phyag rgyur byas pa'i chus khrusabyas la ni reg byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/ kusha'akhris
la 'duganas byang shar gyi phyogs su mngopar bltas te/ mar gyi sbyin sreg gnang gsum btsa'adang bgros pasasong rtsa brgyadabya// sngar bshadapa'i cho gsasngan drang ba dngagashegasasu
gsol babya ste/ yang dkyil 'khor du 'jugapar bya'o// ngesapar yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldapa/ gang a ma'i lo na dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa// gsar
dang/ dngul dang/ rin po che dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'brunang du bcug pagatsag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la dbul lo// gnyisapanasangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum
panibangasas rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o// bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o// lcapan byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam
dpal la'o// drug pani lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo kha lagazhagapar bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gcig nasaMmA
can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par basosanas gzhagapar bya'o// de bas na sngar bshad pa'i tshogs spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/
dudang/ mar mdang/ lhabashos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyisadabul ba bya sta/ thums cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar ma 'dzin pas mar gyi ra ra mo gakrung
bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pan 'bras sA lu'i chan 'od ng bcas pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par canagus nye bar sbar
skya ba'i mar la btsos pa'isnama'akhur gyi 'brong bu la sogs pa dang/ khan+da la sogasapa'i bza' ba thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba dang/ tsan dan gyi gleng
sbyang tsa'i snying podang 'o mabatsos pa'i bza'ab ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thosadang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'phags pa'i lha thamasacad la dbul bar bya'o//
rebazhin du gcong ul pa ka dang/ khyad par du snyam 'khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i chogs sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dri zhim
pa snama'i mi tog dang/ rgya spos dang/ klu'am togodang/ ma tog mun nag la sogs pasngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thosadang/byang chub semu
dpa' chen dang/ 'phags ba dang 'bags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegasapa'i rigs la nasnye ma'i mi togadang/ pad+ma'i rigs la ni ma tog pad+ma dngu/
de bzhin du rdorje'i rigasal nas tog ud+ma la dang/ lha gzhanangag la gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas la'o// tsanangananipad+ma'i
rigs laro// de bzhin gu gul nigasang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lhagazhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// mar gyimar mo 'phags pa rnams // thams
cad lan dbul bar bya// 'phags min lhan thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya// tshog bzhin rim bsan// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyuyas so// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri/
sngagasa rnams kun la rtag tu bya// spyanarasag zigs lagang gsus dang// gang gsungasaphyagan jo rjel// rang rang gnasngagasadag gis// sngags spyod don du sgrub pa 'o// cho ga gcig
pu blta bya ste// rtag tu rjesasu mthunopar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon gyis sngar mthong ba'i tshogs spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bdug pa lasogosang byas nas gtsor
mthun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma shamad pa/ kun nas rnga pa ha hadang/ dung gi sgra dgaba'i sgra sgrogs/
pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang/ sosadang/ ma tog dang/ 'phrang bsabargyan pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad/ stong dang/ log dang/ thad ka thams cad du dkyil
'khor gyi phyi rol du bskor ba bya zhing/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtong bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis bsosapa'i sA lu dang/ 'bras shug
pema'i sbyin srog rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drugapa dang snying pos stong rtsa brgyang bya'o// sbyin srogabyas nasadakyil 'khoralarjesasu bcug cing sngar bzhagapa'ams dpa' chen pal bsrung ba byas nas/
rgyudakyil 'khor gyi sob dpon gyis slobam nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phulab/ dngos
sgrub phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbar longs spyod pa dang/ mosasu longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i yashes kyisangs rgyas thob par byab la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rtog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lta byed pa'i sgo
bo'ang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon gyis ras nyams pha tha gams btages ma thag pa sAmod pa la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te/ dri zhim po tsan+da
dang gur kum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs par bya'o// dang par byas pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur pung lngas 'bar mdzes pa 'am/ gtsugapud gcig gis nye bar mdzes
pa 'am/ gtsug phud kyis nye bar mdzes pa sudang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan bdag nyidachenapo rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil
'khor du gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yogs par bya ste/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan/
cig kharjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dri zhim po tsan+dan dang gur kum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa lagapa gnyis su byin la ma tog 'don gzhug go/ gang du der ma tog babs pa der de'i sngags
sbyin par byaso/ sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skyob brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel ba yin te/ de nyidadage ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snyingapa laganonapa/ byang chub semasadapal/
chen po thams cad makhyen pa'i yashes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngonapar sgrub par byedapa/ longs spyod chen podang/ rgyal po chen po dang/ grags pa chen po dang/ gang zag rtsa/
gcig par mngonapar sgrubapa yin no// tshe 'di nyid la'ang chos thams cad la tsom med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgyad kyi/
bar du bya sta/ gzhan la nam yin no// gzhanadag la dza ltar sdig pa ba'i phyi'i dam tshig tsam sIn par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon gyis dbang bskur dang/

por re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang yang ma nyo/ tacang yang mi ring bar byang shar gyi sa phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab bar bya'o// rgyal po dbang bskur babo'am du
bdag zhing sems pa dang/ gcig sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la dad cing dang ba dang/ spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma 'bral ba dang 1 theg pachinapal/
zhugs pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum laphanapar bye bdang/ dbang po mtsha bamang pa dang/ ma smad pa dang/ tsho 'di ni de la sngags 'grub par 'jod pa dang/ bsamab bzang bdang/ sngags kyi spyod pa
la spro ba dang/ blta bar 'dod pa'i nga bzhanicanangang/ sadabar 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngagasakyi don la rnam par rtog pa med sa/ der gtad pa'i yid dang/ gcig la sogs pa rtas pa'i/
bar dudabang bskur bar bya'o// lhagaman spang bar bya'o// shes rab can dang sbyong ba la rmongs pa med pa'i khyadapar dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'i/ gzhan gan na an no// de nas
rgyal po thamasacod dbang bskur babazhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs ni/ slobadaponamakhan pomanyesan/ donas bla chen po bris/ rgyal mtshan dang bang mthon po bsgrung zhing/ gangags
dkar po dbu la 'dzinapa dang/ rdzayab dkar pos g.yob pa dang/ bkurasichinapos dung dang rnga bo che'i dgu ba'i sa sgrog cing rgyal ba'i sgra dang/ bkra shis kyi tshigasasu bcad pa dang/ bde legs/
dang rab bsngagasapa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pasamangonaparab stod pa dpa/ dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub semasadapa' la phyag byas nas 'di skad du/
slob dponabadagan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang ba rnamapar thar/
pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi rgyalasrid thams cad kyisangs rgyus nying rtogs par 'dod pa dang/ mdor nasas rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhesabarjod par/
bya'o/ denas ku sha'i khres la 'jug// shar gyi phyogs su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la blta zhing/ dngapo'i zhag rig pa'idabang bskur ba byin te/ phyag rgya chen pogatsug phud lta 'ching du gzhug
par bya'o// denas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang gang la dga' bgro ga'i 'dab ma la ga'u wang gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang tsan+dan dang gur kum gyi chus lag pa dang kham phor kha sbyar bkrus
la de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham phor ba sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas ba dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabu phye du gzhag par bya'o// de nas ku shade la gnas nas
rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags rgyu rtsa brgyud snga ma nyid du bzlas par bya'o// denas ku sha' khresal 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dekyil 'khor la gangasams can/

[OT]thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpo byas bsags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyus
so// de nas kham phor la sbyor te de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal tede nyid yinan na rim gyis 'bad ngas 'grub par 'gyurar// yang na ci ste gzhanan na sngags/

bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na yi ge yan lag nyamasang 'am lhag pa byin na na ngangapo sgab pa kho na la 'grubapar the tshom med do// de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum
gyis nges par 'grub par the tsom med do// de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur pa sbyin par bya'o/ dekyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ban gnyis pa'akyil 'khor du lha thamasacod labastathA

pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o// spyi bo la sngar gyi chog ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdug pa'i rtogab thams cad las grol bar 'gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas bcoms ldan 'das thams cad kyis
gnang zhing/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cang kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dmchog dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya thams cad
sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing slobadaponadu dbang bskur ba sbyin no// dkyil 'khor gsum pa la rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang nyan thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang bde

nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub seman pa rdzu 'phrul chenapo dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten du yig rten las 'dasapa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag
'don pa dang/ dkyil 'khor brab dang/ stonapadang/ phyag rgyu dang/ stod pa ston padang/ rang nyid song tsang ston par khyodalarjes su gnang zhing brjod par byang 'tsho 'di nyid la yin la/ phyi nas
ba brgyang ng dag la ni sangs rgyas de thob par 'gyurab yin no// de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyalaba'adebang bsar ba'angasngar bstan pa'i cho gas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la par phul
'a bsams kyis ka lobazhin du brjod par ba 'a khyengalarjes gnang ba yin// 'byung bo thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing/ lus can thams cad kyasam nyam pa dang/ sngags/
ba'i bum pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' laphul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po da

nyamazasarnamasas dban badzabaca'ang ra la nga na lags//denas dkyil 'khor gyislob dpon gyis re re la'ang ji ltar 'dodapa bzhin du dbang bskur lnga sbyin par bya'o// semasacan thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shog pa'o/
0 @#// rnams la lnga po dekyis bya'o// de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor 'bacugaso/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nying phul nas dkyil 'khor la
bskor ba lan gsum byas te sar gtang bar bya'o// de las gzhan pa'i nazhug lamathar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa labaslab par bya zhingesbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang
chub sems dpa' chen po 'aTamadapala gzhonanur gyur ba la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gangapa blangasanas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsumashar du mngonapar blta bar byas la bud par
bya'o// 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ kyi byang chub soms dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skya bar ma byed cing/
sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang sla bar ma byed cig/ kha ma mnyesapar gyis shig/ gzhan du dam tshig las 'das par gyur
tsha na sngags 'grub bar ma 'gyur zhing/ bsod nams ma yin ba mang por 'gyur rozhes de ltar smas logatang bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon gyis yang zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang

ar gyis/ btags pa'i sA lu dang 'bras thug po che'i srog blugs kyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying bo dang sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas lasanas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis sngar
0 bstanapa'i tshogs lhathams cad s de byadamachod yon dbulal// bdugapas sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa'athams cad dang/ rangasangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang/
lhadang/ klu dang gnong sbyin dang ) namamakharaldang dang/ dra'i dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin bo dang/ sha zadang/ 'byung pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa dang/ grubapa/
ngang drang srong rnams dang/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bdugs nas me tog gtor te/ tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i tshogs slarigashegs su gsol bar bya ste/ sems
kyis thams cad gtang ba yin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sob dpon gyis bshosadang/ gtor ma dang/ sa tshon thams cang chu bor dor bar bya ba 'am 3 srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin
par bya'o// saphyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jamapar byas te/ legs par phyogapa byas nasab lang galci bas 'brug tu gzhug pa 'am/ chus byugs par bya ba 'ame/ shan tu gtsang ba'i
sras khyugs pa 'am/ bye mas gtor bar byas la/ de nas ngeltar 'dod par 'grobar bya'o// dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'om dang 'bras chan gyi zas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i kha
zas bzabar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod chog zhib mo'i rgyal po'i bang polas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byams las/
dkyil 'khor gyi chog bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhalamang
khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chenapo 'dusapa lagazigs nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba/ dug thams cad
'joms par byed pa// las thams cad byed pa/ sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang/ las phran tshigs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras so// de yang gang zhen/
ma nam saman bud+d+hanaM/ tad+ya thA/ e dza grogs po dag 'di na 'byung po thams cad nyon cig/ sngags 'di nying na yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i chag thams cad du ngagosapa/ khru brgyad
dam khru bzhi sa' phyogs yang dgapar byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i phyoms rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/ gang de dang de dag tu'ang 'ad ninges pa med ngo// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chenapo dang por zhig bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang/ mche ba'aphyag rgya dang/ zhal

gyi phyag rgya dang/ dbyig pa'i phyag rgya sta/ phyag rgya 'ad ngag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o// de nas pad+madang/ rdo rje dang/ utu ladang/ phyag mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ gdugs
ngang/ rta babs dang/ shing rtadang/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ glang dang/ ma he dang swasti ka dang/ rma bya dang/ ra dang/ lug dang/ skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa/
bar bribar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor gsum la bzhag de ltab khri bar bya'o// de nas ya gi gcig pa'i sngags 'di kyis shar lo' phyogasakya cher ma'alas bu ste/
shing a pa ma ri yam shang zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad spyanasreg bya'o// denasamo rtog gi mchod yo nadabul la// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nying kyis ji
ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang/ lhashos dang/ mar ma dang/ bdug pa dang/ spyan drang ba dang/ gshegs su gsol ba rnams bya'o// de nas rgyal sring 'dod pas na grong khyer gyi dbus su
bri bar bya'o// longs sod 'dod pasan shang a ma'i drung du'o// bu 'dod pasanangod tsa'i shang gi drung du'o// chung ma dang ! glang po che dang/ rta 'dodapas ni glang po che'i bris skya 'am//
rta'i bris sbyar ro// nu 'dod pas na mtsho chen po 'am klu'i gnas su'o// nyin bazhi pa'i misasam/ rtag pa'i rimesasam/ rims thams cad la rtags gcig pa 'am/
gong gi g.yas phyogs su'o// srin pos zin pa la ni dur khrod dam/ khang pa stongapar bya'o/ yang srin pos zinapa la nib ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ a ra parishang gi drung du bya'o/
mamo thams cad kyis zin ba la nibazhimado'am/ sha ba'i khyim dang bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i srin posazinapa la ta la'i shing drung du'o// sbyar/
ba'i dug 'byin ba lan ya gi gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum bsngags pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blad pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bud medadam/ skyes pa grags
pa 'dodapa lani bzhi mdo'am bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o// bu shi ba lan gange 'brasabu cananam/ 'o ma can gyi nang du'o// 'brasasA lu smin pa'is dang nang gi dbus su na bumangang la bri
bar bya'o// nang rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang/ gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o// nad chen pos btab pa lan dkyul 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o//
nad thams cad kyis thamasacad du patab pa lanari'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la'ang bram ze'i ldumar 'am/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa gzhol ba'i phyogs su bya'o
de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyad dam dus thams cad du mngon pa sna bri bar bya'o// yi ge gcigapa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol la/
dkyil 'khor la chus gtor byas n na thams cad srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur te/ nad thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro// bu mod pasan bu rnyed cing/ skal med rnams kyang
skal ldan 'gyur// dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa// ngagyal 'khor mthong ba tsam gyisaso// rgyas pa'am yang na bud med kyang// thos nas the tsom med byas na// ci 'dod
rnam pa sna tshogasan// thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byams las/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba la sa dkyil 'khorogasum
nga 'a cho ga rdzogs so///de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas/ gzhan yang nga 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
chen po der 'dus ba la'ang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan ngs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das sams can thams cad l phan pa'i phyi'i sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshoga'i sgab pa'i rgya mthun pa/ chos kyi char ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i chog rab 'byams las ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod
nams bla na med pa bskyod pa// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis bonamangon par sgrub par byed pa/ mdor na bsam pa thams cade yos su rdzogs par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi
'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ don mdapa ma yin pa grub cing sgrib par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byedang/ byang chub
soms dpa' chen po'i go cha bgosapa/ bdud thamasacad kyi stobs zil gyisamanan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byedapa/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtsa/
ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas deskad ces gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pal 'ang skung
ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur ba khyod skyob ming bo la phanapa'i phyir zhugs padang/ 'jig rten lasange brtse ba'i phyiri gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'du 'du bar sems/
pani legs so legasaso// de shin tu legs par nyonal yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshadapar bya'o// khyod kyi ras kyi chog rab 'byams sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa
mthar gyis ngas bshadapar bya'o// sngonayang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da lta yang a bshad par bya'o// dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang bo rdalamang pa las ras bal yang
dag par rgyus la/ dam tshage la zhugs pa'isams can rna mas kyis ras bal de yang dag par blangs te/ yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brtsa brgyadadu bsngags par bya'o// rnam

sarba bud+d+hanaM/ bod+hisatra a pra ti ha ta ga ta ma tipA tsAri NaM/ nam so sho d+ha na du khapra shamanan+darA dzA ya/ ta thAg tA ya a h+pha te samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA 1[u0f00 ]o d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya// sarba bsgyu

anaka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku nararupad+mar Ni ba ku zla ba ku rgyu/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tig hU~MhU~M phaT phaT swA/ de nas grong ga chos mi shes pa'i gzhon num bram ze'i rogs dang/ rgyal rigs su skyes pa dang//
rje'u rigs su skyes pa dang rigasanganapa'i gnas yongs su spras pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa ) yan lag thams cad mdzesapa/ pha dang mas rjes su gnang ba/ gso sbyong byas pa/ byang chub
tusems bskyed pa/ sAng ljadang ldan ng/ bzhin dkar ba/ kha dog rnam par spangs pa// mdor nabud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa/ shin tu nyin zhag shas pa dang//
zla ba yar ngodang/ gza' bzang po bltas te/ dung dang khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'is phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon num khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/
gos kyis 'gas par bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas bsrung bar byas// tsanadan dkar po dang/ gur kum srog chags me dpa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang/ bu
mo de sngags je nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la/ tsananganadakar po dang gur kum gyi chus stong dang/ 'og dang/ phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o// nadan dkar po dang/ gur kum
dang/ ga pa gcig tubyas pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya ste/ rang nyid kyiso sbyin pa 'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchogag slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang sa
bcu'i dbang phyug la gnasapa'ibyang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ras kyi rig pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas sangs
[Di/ ]rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhesabyas nas bdug pas bdugs pa de'i sasu rma khyadang/ khrung khrung dung/ papa dang/ bzhad dang//
ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dgob thang la gnasapa 'am/ chu la spyod pa rnams nam mkha'al 'aglobar 'gyur ba'am/ dgaba'iskanga'adonan las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub
pas shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub semasadapa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gu ras skud 'ad la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skyi ba dam pa ni legs pa ra 'tshob

la ni to/ bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med pa mi'agyur ro// rdzapaT hadang/ rnga bo che dang ! rdza rngudang/ dung dang/ piyang dang/ gling bu dang/ 'khar rngadang lnga pa chen po'i spu thos pa 'am/
tshal bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo 'am/ skyes pa rnams bcos ma 'am/ bcos bam yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang/ grub pa dang/ sbyin ba dang/ byis pa dang/ khyer
cig ces byas pa dang/ dpal rang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bras bu yod pa dang/ rmog dang/ brgya byin dang/ ming dang/ de dag lasogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'donang 'am/ dril bu'i sgra dang/
dga' ba'i sgra thosan/ des na rig pa 'dzan pas shes par byas sargyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam gyi bgyi kharabs pa ni 'jiyan te/ ngon yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di'i/
zhing gzhan du ma yin nozhes so// ci ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig/ zo zhig/ zung zhag/ nyams pa rnam par nyamasapa/ kyi byung/ ring ba/ nyani
turang ba/ med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa 'am/ spre'u dang/ ma hadang/ cesbyang dang/ bong bu dang/ byil dang/ ba lang dang/ dung 'gro smad pa rkang gnyis sam/
rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/ des ni zla ba pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni mapa yin no zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul bar byazhang/ yang sngam bzhin du'ang brtsam par bya'o//
de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdunapa'i las kyi bya ba lan mtshamasamad pa lta byas pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// denas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de bsrung bar byas la ku sha' khres la
gzhag par bsta/ shar ram byang phyogasasu phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid bsrung ba dang/ lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no// sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha' khris de nyid kyi cho
gas ras bal la'ang bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang/ legs par bsgoms pa dang/ sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dgango ra blangs te ! gcig dang/ gsu ma dang/ ldadang/ brgyad
nu/ la sogs pa nas bcu drug gabar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan ng sa bya'o// de las rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhin brgyud ni bar ma ste// phran/
tshogs las la sgrub pa ni// gcig dang ldan tham ro// las rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// denas brtsams te gang cung zad// sngog pa sngagan byas pa dag/
ngogang rasems kyis dmags pa na// de yaM mong la 'jig par 'gyur// dog pa 'di dag yang dag bungs// gtsang ma'i stod du gzhug par bya// de nas bzhag pa byas nas de// gapur gyi na
bdug pas bdugs// srogachags yan lag min byung ba'am// gur kum tsan dan la sogs dang// ma tog ma la tsamapa ka/ dri zhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo// srung ba'i chog byas nas
na gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang ngag bzhug/ sngags rigs las kun shes pa yin/ kanA'i chu mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya// de nas tha ga par song nas// ci 'dod pa yis ni sban no// rang dbang yan
lag ma nyams dang// dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dang// rgamarami nang kyis gdungs pas// lung pa dbugs mi bde ba sangs// ma nang smad pa ma yin dang// 'phyo bo ma ya na dkar spungs/
kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nying ldan// rab sngags blta na sdug pa dang// blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi tshul la rten// dngos grub 'dod pas de la na// ras bslang
ba00 btags pa'i chodadu bskul// grogs pa rigs bzang rab bsngags shing// blo ldan bzo rnamakhas ba dang/ shani tu khyod ba mchog gyur pa'i// ras 'thag bzang la bskul bar bya//
'banaribatu bsgrub par bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya/ tha ma phun tshogs las lan// dmanapa nying na thams cad la// bzo bo ji ltar sgrub bzhin// der ni de ltar sbyin par
byu dang po'i tshig ni yang dag byung// bzo bo la ni sngags rig pas// de nas myur du rin byin pa// pa'aphotshongashes dri la brjod// don du gnyer med do la ni//
rin du smra byed sgrubapa po// 'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i// thas na bzang po bla mang// las kun byed cing mchod pa ste// lha dang ma yi bde ba sbyin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal 'gyur
zhes yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyus kyis gsungs// de nas rig pa 'dzan pas tha ga po la rgyu skar bzang po 'am/ cho'aphrul gyi sgrub phyud dang/ nyin zhag dgo ba 'am/ gza'adage babaltas te gso

sbyong gi tshe/ yang na dus kyi mchog dpyad kyi dusakyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing amra mo tog skyes shing/ shing gi mchog rnams kyi ya la gangang me tog rgyas pa de'i dus ratshams su snga dro'i nyi ma 'char ba la sngar
bstan pa'i bla gapa lha la dbu b.ra'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ mgo la cong banabaris nas khrus legs par byas te/ tsan dan dkarnga po dang gur kum gang yang rung bas
lus byugasanas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te/ yid dga' ba dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa mad par byas te/ thags kyi lag cha tha ga pa la sogs pa la yo byad thams cad
kyang gsar pa la sa dang ba lang gi lcabs bkrus te/ yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyi chus kyang
gtor bar bya'o// gtsang ma'i sa phyogasasu ca co med cing skya ba dang bral ba dben nga 'i gnas su bkab pa dang/ gsang bar ma togags mchod do// de nas sgrub pos yang dag par byedapa'i sngags kyis

brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i khungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi stong 'og gamatshamasazhugator bar bya'o// de nas tha ga pa la nyungs kar gyis gtor bar bya zhing phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcanges
te/ gtsug phud bcing ba byas na bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ras ras rab yanan na zur bzhir zhing du khru bzhi/ chur khru brgyad de tha ga pas de tsam la yongs su goms par bya'o//
'bring na zhing du khru do/ chur khru lnga pa'o// tha mnazhing ngubabar gshegs nga 'a mo gang/ chur na khru brgyud kyi nga ngo/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la na yu la dbus
kyis+sas bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'ad la bde bar gshegs nga 'a mtho zhes bsgrags te/ tshad ni 'das tshad du bstan pa yun no// sa ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog/ 'jig rten
ca gang zag mchog gis gsungs// thub pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// rgyal sridi 'dod la bar ma yan// longs spyod chen 'dod skyes bu dang// lha ma lha mnag dengs canan/ tha ma la ni grub
par bshad// 'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o// las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni// ras nitha mas rtag tu 'grub// rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par
'gyur// ras gsum gyis kyang bstanapan// skal 'dod ma la 'grub pa yin// brgya byi bde sogs bdag po la'ang// cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur// chog yang dag ldan na ni// mi
yasgrub tha ma larang// las rnams thams cad 'bad med par// myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed// rgyalab rgyalamchog sras dag gis// lam 'di dag ni yang dag bstan// 'phags pa mgon
mang sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can kun la legs sbyin pa'o/ byang chub lam rim lus kyang// de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste// byang chung rgyu ya chos 'di ni// sngags kyi lam gyis bstan
pa yin// 'jig rtenadakyil 'khor ma lus dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur gyi// dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis// 'bad pa med bar sngags rnams 'grub// gang zhig byang chub rgyu/
'dodapas// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// 'gro la phan sems rtag med pa// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bdag nying chen po 'jamadapalan/ gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du//
byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad sams la// ras pas 'grub par gsungs pa yin// bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin// de nas mthar gyis bzo/
bos na// ngas ni 'bad pas brtags par bya// kun zhag lnga dang brgyud dang ni// bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni// nyin zhag gcig gis myur du na// myur bar sa kyi tha ga bya/ grub pa mchog/
'aglu ni 'dod pa yas// nyin zhag gcigapa dge ba yin// gtsang sbra'isrod pa phun sum tshogs// bzo bo rtag tu byin rlabs ldan// gnas nas thag ring song nas na// bshang dang gcig yongs su
dor: de nas gos bcas khrus byas te// gosagazhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing// gos dkar 'phreng ba ldan par 'chang// yang dang yang du nye rig bya// lus ni tsan+dan dkar pos byugs/ bzo bos
lag pa gnyis kyang byugs// legs 'dzam rtag tu dri mdang// 'bad pas kyang ni the ga bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ram// gzhan na rgyal bas gsungs pa dang// rnam dpyod rang bzhin
'bad pa las// ras ni ma lus tha ga bya// rdzas kyi tha ga zin pa dang// sngar gsungs las kyis legs byas pa// tshang ldan nyams pa med pa ni// nyin zhag bzang la bltab ste gzhag/
yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po la// de la sngagasani gzhug par bya// sa ni yongs su gsal byas pa// khatshar mthar na mngung mdzes bya/ 'ong ma'i shing la brtags nasan/ denas ras ni
blangs te 'gro// bzo bobade legs byas nas ni// nor mang pos bgo bsha'abya// brtul zhugs bzang pa legs spyod pa li/ sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas// ma tog dri zhim gyis mchod de//
gtsang ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya// 'di nying kun sngags kyis su// srung ba'i tshog gtu bya// sngon nas bal gang de yis// lamang du yong sbyangs pa// bdag nyid dang na ris dag la//
de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba bya/ dpa' bo chenapo 'jam dpal gyis// sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang// 'das pa'isangs rgyas mang bo dang/ ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yani// de nyid
sngags na thams cad kyi// sngags kyi ngo bo rnamapar spyod// brtson 'grus che zhing gat+pabarjodache// sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa// cha byung rnam pa sna tshogs byed// skyob pa rnam pa sna
tshogs rgyu// 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams // rmongs pa spyod cing sems dang 'amed// ma dang phyin ci log po byed// los spyod shun tu ngarkam chags kyis// rdzas rnams
ma lus pa dag dang// sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub ma byed// 'khor ba'i mun pa'i brtson rang// de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur// gong yang rtag tu yang dag cing// dad ldan bkra
shas dag la dga'// sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang// rtag tu 'dzan dang 'chang ba dang// bdag nying chenapo dngos grub 'dod// spro ba che zhing gzi brjodo che// rgyal bas gsungs par/
sngags dgan ]'bad pa mang pa 'grub par 'gyur// dad pa me dpa'i skye ba la// dkar po'i chos rnams ma skyo ste// sa bon tsha sgor btab pa la// myu gu skye ba med/
pa bzhin// dad nga 'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos// chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste// chos don spyod pa de dag la// sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas slabs pos bzo
bo legs par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dI ba la mkhas pa sa tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta

rab de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/ sngar ji ltar tha ga pa la byas pa nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'dri'i gzhug go/ yang na bdag nyid kyi bro bar bya'o//
ga pur dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum la sogs pa'i dris mo rtsi labasgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te// de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la'ang bzlas te/
mo tog na ga ge sar dang/ panan gnadang/ ba ku la dang/ pan tsa ka dang/ dbyar gyi me tog dang/ d+ha nu ShAri dang/ mA la ti'i ma tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram
pa byas la/ shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha' khris la 'jug ste/ blo lags par gnas pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmagasapa'i sems phra mo lag par blangs
0 nas khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la brab r bya'o// dang po 'gebcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// skyes bu chen por mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyis mtshanapa/ skudang byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa/ ranang u0f7c che'i pang la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis zhe bar mdzes pa/ chos/
'chad bzhinapa/ sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// dbus na gnas pa'i pad+mang rma'i sdong bu can/ 'og nani ka'i rgyal po gse khe/dun chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzan
cing de bzhin gshegasango lalta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshalab/ mdog dkar po kha rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi dang 'dra ba/ byed sbrulakyi gzugs can/ dga' bo
dang rtodaga' bri bar bya'o// kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang/ rnam par kha bye ba dang/ chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang/ bya dang nyal sogs pas
khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'ipad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i sa la ga lasapad+ma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho bar bya'o// ga nagyi
phyogs su pad+ma'am tog brgyad byas te/ pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dang 'a chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po la re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog
bapa'i gsar bzhin du sar skya 'am/ gur kum mam/ gsar gyi mdog 'dra ba gzhon nu'am byad/ byis pa dang khye'u'i gzugs can/ sku zur pung lnga dang ldan pa/
gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyanapa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzesapa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin
tsha gshigs pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod ba/ 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shan tu gzhonasha can de bzhin du bya bar
bya'o// gsum pa la nanor bzangasaso// bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sal ba'o// lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do// drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la ni sdig med do// brgyad pa
la ni spyanabazang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can/ gzhonanu'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni byang chub sems dang 'a chen po
rtsa brgyud byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ 'phags pa byams pa na bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya// tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgoral pa'i cod pan
bcas pa/ mdog gsar 'dra ba/ ka sha ngamarapo byon pa/ dar lwa dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa/ gozugasamadzes pa dang ldan pa/ dbyig pa dang spyi
blugs 'dzin ba/ kras pa'i pags pa thal gongagayonapar bgos pa// lag pa g.yon pas 'phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas pa/ der gtong pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa
bsam gtan la dmages pa'i rnam pa can no// pad+maganyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ogam togopAyeng ku ltar sngo bsas/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yonapan
nor bu rin po chathogasapa/ lag pa g.yas pa na bal ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gzugasamadzesab dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ rgyun thams cad kyisabargyan// ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs
mdzesashing yid du 'ob/ stobs bcu dang ldan ng/ ral pa'i mtha' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shinge cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pa d+ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog
sbyin// sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o// bzhapa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na rdo rje
'dzan pa lag pa g.ya sa na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa/ mdog gsang 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes ba/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ drab dang dra ba/
phyed pas lus bar dkris pa/ mu tig ga 'phrangabs mchod phyir thogs byas ba/ cod panan po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phrob/ gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos
pa/ dar ludakar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ kun tu bzang po'i na bza' stod g.yogs kyang de bzhin du bya'o// cha byad ni ji ltar
4 bstan pa bzhin bya'o// de bzhin pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo grosarmanapo/ drug pa lani blo gros zhing/ bdun pa lanArnam par snang mdzad sAng pa/ brgyud pa lanangan song song ba ste//
byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/ bal ba'i 'bras bu dang glegs bam lagan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stong g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan thams
cad kyis brgyanab/ g.yo bdang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o// de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyus brgyud bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshanadang
ldan pa/ chos gos dmar borkyenapa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pal la 'dug pa/ chabyad zhinga' bdaganyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i 'phrang bas khyab pa/
me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog ma la ti dang/ dbyar gyi me tog dang/ d+hAnuShapa dang/ pun nag dang/ nAg ge sar la sogasapa'i ma tog gis sa ris kun nas/
gcal bkramapa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs 'phags pa 'am dpalaglu sangang 'an po che du mas zhi ba sas pa/ shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal mang pang ga dkyas//
'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shan tu 'bar mdzes par byas ba/ rin po che'i su d+ma las shan tu bkab pa/ ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar
bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che'i yi= li'od rnamapar 'phrob/ kun nas 'ong 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad+ma rA gu dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ margad/
la sogs pa dang/ pi Tarludang/ a mgar b+hu la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen pa'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phrong dang ldan pa// rim 'char kamed 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas lhung bzed
dang/ chos gos dang/ blo gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gisabazhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ nabaza'aso ra po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyadazhus sku
nye bar mdzes pa/ 'ba'agazagis pa dang ldan pa/ rnamapa thams cad kyamchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin chen gtsug tor canabri bar bya'o// gnyis ba de bzhinagashegs pa me tog yang dag
par skyes pa rim bskye bo'adog gser 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// gsum pa brlagatsug tor pad+ma 'dab ma ge sar dang 'dra ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// bzhi pa rgyun bzang par ng bri bar bya'o/[}]
lnga pa bstan par dka' ba dang/ drugapa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang/ bdun pa sman gyi bla bai rla'i'ongakyi rgyal po dang/ brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal
thams cad bar byed pa 'i sman gyi rgyal po'abar bya'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang gsar gyi mdogacan de bzhin gshegasapa'i sku gzugs su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi stong gi
phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sbyin gyi gsab nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus ma snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyus dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyud byang chub sems
dpa'i mgo la 'dug paslangs te bri bar bya bal/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan nA'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa dang/ 'od srungs chen po dang/ rab 'byor dang/ sgra gcan
'dzinadang/ dga' bo dang/ bzang ldan dang/ ka pana'o// rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta sta/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang/ dman pa dang chab 'i 'chi ltas dang/ dkar por
dkar po'i tog dang/ mu khyud dang/ mu khyud bzang po'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang shin tumadzesapa zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i cha byad canane// nyan thosachen/
po bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o// steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'abu gzhan gnyis 'bar kun nas gos gyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa shin tu mdzes ba 'dzan cing//
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ rangasangs rgyus dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi stong du lha'agos dang 'phrang ba 'dzan pabri bar bya'o// bcom ldan

'das shAkya thub pa'i stong dbu'i stong du mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ tha gu ngamar po pad+mar ga dang/ in+dan la la sogs nga 'i mngungapa byas pa'in po che'i tha gu'i tshogs bya'o// de la'ang gos kyi
re shanatu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang/ mu dgag 'phrang ba 'phyang bas mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og na pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
zhabs drung dang nye ban klu'i rgyalapo dga' phyogs su rin po che chen po 'i ri bo pad+mo'i mtsho las mngon par 'thonang/ rin po che'i myu gu dang/ phug dang/ ri sul dang/ byu ru'i yal ga dang/
rin po che'i shang gas yongs su bskor ba/ drang srong chen pa 'ganasadang/ grub pa dag gis de la brten pa/ ri'i rtse'i mo'i stang du khroba'irgyal po gshin rje'i gshed shin tu ma bzadapa'agakhrug
can/ lag pa g.yas pan zhagasab thogs pa// lag pa g.yon pa ba [“]na gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs te lta ba/
gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mgo sman nag po dang na nag po dang 'dra ba/ kha s+ya sar ba/ sonamo rang ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgul pa'i phyogs sprul
byas brgyan pa/ stag ga pags pa mnabs pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rab tu mi bzad pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chenapo kun nas 'bar ba'i khro bo'i rgyalapo ga shini

'tshakaM gangashad bri bar bya'o// ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i snying na 'dug pa/ lus sa la btung de sros kyisnod lagan thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbyibs ji ltang ba'an rtags 'dzanang/ ji ltar rjes su ma thun pa'i
spyod padang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa po bribar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang rdo bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngos su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon/

par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bostan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gsheng med pa/ lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o// ra de 'ang
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// ra de'ang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/ barma'irang bzhin rtse mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// de la rten pa'i
lha mo 'phagasopa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyisabargyan pa/ ngaradamar posaMstod g.yogs byas po/ khadegornam pa sna tshogs dang ldan
pa'i gos can bud mad kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyanapa/ lag pa g.yon ut+pa la thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can/ rked pa phrab/ ha cang yang mi snyam/ ha cang yang
ma sbom/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dugapa phyag g.yas pasamchog sbyin pa/ lus cung zad btud pa/ lamo krung gis nye bar
bzhugs// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nyung zad lta bar gyurapa/ kun nasa'abar ba'i 'od kyi 'phrangabs yongasasu bskor ba/ der yang ba rlu rinapo che'i rtsi kho la shangabun
nagu'i yalags kun nas bskor ba/ yalag dag la 'ong ma tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'dasam sgol ma mngon par bakab pa/ yol ga mngon par 'dud pa de

nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogasapa/ byu ru'i myu gu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo ba'i tshon 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shang ltab bri bar bya'o// lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus
'joms// 'jigasapasol bar byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po na srung don du// desan dam pa sbyin zhing dge/ stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rjen// bud med gzugs 'chang lha
mo yani// 'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang/ mchog sbyin byedang bri bar bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen na// gzhon nu lha mo 'di la dgyes// bgegs rnams thams cad
@#/ bsal ba'i phyir// sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur// mi yi bdag po srung donadang// dpalasgrub phyir yang ri mor bri// khro bo'i rgyal po gang yanange// ri yi rtse mor/
[D•/ ]gzhag bris pa// bgegs rnams thamasacang gozhagapa'i phyir// rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs// miba'od chen po 'khyil ba che// gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po// ma
rungasasems can tshar gcang phyir// sgrubapa lan rab tu brtags// sgrub pa po nasrung ba dang// bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// ma bzad khro ba'i ngang tshul can// sngag
lha dag 'gugs par byed// shin tu mi bzad drag pa 'ogazugs// brtsi ba med pa thams cad 'dul// sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams // dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed// mkha'
lo srongs la spyod pa dang// sa 'ogaspyod pa thams cad kyi// thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang// ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed/ las ni kun nas gru bzhi dang// zur bzhingag tu brab
tshultayin 'asakyi 'ogaNA tha maran// chu bo rgya cha'i gnas bya ste// klu yi gdengs kayan lag can// gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin// yan lag bzang po dkar po dang// lus phyed ma yi rnam
par skyes// byang ng mgo nagazhag bya ste// rtag tu thalamo sbyor byed pa// stobs chen gangangs ka bdun dang ldan// mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yan// de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta//
nor bu rin chen gyis mdzesang// legs par mdzes dang gabrugs madzrasang// rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i// 'bar ba'i 'phrang can bri ba na/ ku rgyal chen por rnam par
grags// 'jig rten kun la dzan nga' brtson// sangs rgyus bstan la rab tu zhugs// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhag phyir// chu bo la rten bri bar bya// ras kyi tshe dam pa
'di rgyal b rnams kyis gsungs pa yAn// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa// rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa// de ya bsong/
nams mtha' yas 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa// sa steng ri mo mthong ba tsam/[“]de yisong la 'byang bar byed// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang//
tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang// sdig pa kun la 'khrug pa dang// 'khor ba'i mun par srong pa dang// 'groba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag/ deng nAras ris gzhug mi bya// ras dris/
mthong ba'ang don ldan zhes// thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// mthong ba tsam gyis dge 'gyur te// de bas skad cig de tsamagyis// yid dag lus ni dag 'jug dang// rjes
su bzlas pa byed pa dang// sngags brtan nyid la rtag brtson pa'i/ ma rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos// bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyasal// mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa//
sa stang bas ris 'dri ba ya// sngags pas bsod nams de thob 'gyur// gad+ma yi ni bye mdag/ tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa// de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas/
rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems// bas ru nyan thos 'jig rtenan// lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas// ras sa mthong ba tsam gyisan// ma yas de bzhin bsod nams 'thob//
cho ga klog pa tsam dang ni// mchod dang rjesasu yi rang ba// cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa// de lasngags dngos grubanges// 'jigarten sngags rnams ji sAd pa// gang dag
rgyal ba skyes mchog dang// de'i slobabasar byang chub soms// bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa// ri mo 'di namadun bzhag na// sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo'i snga las/ 'jam dpal gyi tshig las le'u dang po'i cho ga rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkyakhrub
pas thams cad dang ldan nga'i 'khor la gzigasanas/ 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bring ga ris kyi tshig de ngas bshad par bya yaTis: legs par rab

tu nyon la ya di la zung zhig/ dang por re zhig sngar thaganapa'i dog pa dang/ sngal bstanang 'o tshog dang/sngarab stanapa 'apa blo bo dang/ sngar bya ched bar ma dang ldan pa/ ras shAn tu bzang ba dang/ 'jam
pa dang/ shin tu bkrus pas kha tshar dang bcas pa dang/ tshon ma 'dres pa dang/ sa la sogs pa rje da par byas la/ tshang ma gtogs pa dang po rje lta bde bzhin du byas pa 'aras de la phyinas
bribar bya sa/ dang por re zhig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzesapa/ 'onapo che shel gyi ring bzhin lta bu / mu tig dkarang ngos brgyamapa/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste//
na pemasang ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad u0f8bchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o// g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'am dpal pad+ma'i ge sar ram/ gur kum
mam/ nyi ma'amangog 'dra ba/ g.yonaba'i dpung pa'i phyogs su sut+pal bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba/ bzhani cung zad dgod pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs
can zur phung lngas mgo ma[Z]sapar byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngadang mgo 'dud pa 'o// bcom ldan 'dasashAkya thub pa'i g.yonalegs na
'phags pa spyan ras gakhrigs dbang phyug ston ka' mda'i rgyu'i ma ngog ltar dkarab snga mji lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das 'a rdzayab g.yob par bya'o/ de'i phyogs su
'phags pa byams dang/ kun tu bzang pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ blobris chen pa dang/ zhi bar gshegs pa dang/ nam mkha' mdzodadang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnamapar selab sgo/ 'di dag kyang
snga ma ba zhanadu brab r bya'o// dang po rdza lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bribar bya'o// 'di dag gi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyud bri bar bya ste/
nga zhengs pa dang/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin ng dang/ sku lan bza'aserapos stod g.yogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzan pa/ chos gos kyi kha dog cung zad
'a dmar ba mnabs pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan ng/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me togalang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pod/
a[% ]rin chen gtsug tor can dang/ gtsug tor canadang/ thams cad skyobadang/ log par dang soladang/ gsar thub dang/ 'od srungs dang/ sbyanabazangaste/ sangs rgyasabcom ldan
'das de dag bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jamadapal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya sta/ na thos chen po bcud dang/ rang sangs
rgyus brgyad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bris/ 'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ shA ri'ing na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubang 'a rdzas bkyis g.yob pa 'greng bag tu bri bar bya'o//
ngobazhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyidabang po brgya byin dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dag pa dang/ dri mamed pa dang/ 'jam pa
[0 ]dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ 'od gsaladang/ tshangs pam mdzed kyabadagapo dang/ 'og min dang/ de lasogasapa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ngag ma thar/
gyis brab r bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sung
ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rinapo che'a'i bo ras kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgab pa po cha byad dang ngabyibs
ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo'i lhang dang mgo btudapa/ spos snod lagan thogasapa bri bar bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de'i stang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gsheng ji lta
bstan ba de ltar bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa sa na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang nyob der rin po che'i ri ba'i stang du lha mo sgrol
ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// sa ris de'i khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bu bar bya la/ gcal bkram par bya ba la/ me tog tsam pa ka dang/ nAyod pa la dang/ pad+madang/
drin chog dang/ ma la tidang/ bar shi ka dang/ d+hu nu ra ka dang/ pun nA ga dang/ nA ga ge sar la sogs pa ri ma togags ras ris de la khor yug tugator bar bya'o// ras risakyi stong gi ma tha'i zur
@#// gsasu lha'i bu gnyisam tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam par krab/ bar snang la gnasapa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo tsam 'thonapa/ ldang bzhi/
pa/ kha dog dkar po brab r bya// sangs 'bring du gsungs pa 'ad// dpal don gnyer las yang dag byung// sa ya stong gi mi rnams la// grub pa 'bring ni 'du la rten// 'khor
bar sngan chad 'khor ba na// sdigapa cung zad gungabyas pa// 'dir ni ras pas mthong tsam gyis// deyaM mod la rnam par 'jig/ 'gre bltar na 'khor ban// sems canarmos
h+pha pas ma shes te// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras risan// 'bring po ma thong bar ma byedapa'o// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang// sdig pa'i rtogapa byeng gyurapa// sngags rnamasasna
tshogs gsus gyur pas// tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// myur du rtogasapa'ang 'grubapani// bzlasapas thob pa byed yin// ras ras 'bring po mthong bas//
rtsa nad pa dag kyang nadalas thar// dbul po dag kyang nor theb byed// bung ni da rnams kyang bu thob 'gyur// dri tsho mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bsod nams rgya chen blobang ra 'gyur// nges
par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde bam yis ston par 'gyur// skye ba gzhanangu nges pa can// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges thob 'gyur// klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin mchod dang
phyag 'tshal dang/ mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdugapa'irtog pa kun las grol// sras ngas 'angan mthu cho la// don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni// myur du skye ba don yod thob//
rjes suyarang de bzhin no// ngas samathong ba'i skyab ya// bsod nams thobapadonayodapa// bsalab bye ba rnams su ga nga// brjod paroangan mi nus so// byang
chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen pa rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dang la gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga lnga pa ras bsi rab 'byams las ras 'as gnyis pa'i tshe gi rab 'byamasardzogs
ba de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyurab labaka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa gzhan yang khyod
kyiras risagasumapa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de// gang sems can rnams la 'badapa med par 'grubapar 'gyur ba sngar bstanapa'i bzo bo dang/ tshig dang/ bde bar gshegs
pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur ba'i snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya// sngarab stan pa'atshon gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa//
snga ma bzhin du byas pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa ngos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas
pa/ rnga yab lagan thogs pa/ lag pa g.yonapa mnor bu rin po che thogasapa/ me tog pra yang gu ltar sngo bsangs sngam bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa/
'dzamadapalagyig las phyogasu 'phagasapa spramaras gzigs dbang phyug sdam bzhin rin po cha'ar la gnas pa/ rdzayab lagan thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon nang d+ma 'dzin pa/ lus kun/
yo nas 'od dang ldan pabri bar bya'o/ song ge'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'or ras kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o// sa kyi mtha'amadang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri ri'og/
g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya rgyu/ sos snong lag ma thogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma ji lta

babazhin du bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa ma tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bsam pa ma kha dbal dbang bas bri bar bya ste/zhing po 'di'i rig sor bcu drug

tshad gatshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ri'i stod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi khor yug tu ra'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o// stong ga rdzas kyi mtha' gnyis la

gsapa 'di'i stod kyi cha la lding babazhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu ngag pa dang/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing/ rdzas la me tog
05 rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa'ang bri bar bya'o// rnam gsum sa ris mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dar mibs pa las// 'di na tha mazhes bya ste// phran tshogs las rnams
ngag la shis// bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol// sa ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la grolangar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong
phrag ni// mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te// rngas sa mthong ba tsam gyis kyang// de yatshod la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba stong phrag la// blodang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas//
rasangs tham mthongapani/ bcudrug yang mi phod do/ sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni// mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa// mkhasapas bsod nams gang thob de// ras rjes
thamamathong ba'i yin// dge ba bdagag lam rnams la// las sbyong phyi yapa'ang spyad do// sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bkang dang// nam
mkha' lding gis gangabashad dang// chu lha nyim lus ngan dang// nor sbyin sogasadang srinapo dang// lha min dbang po lto 'phye dang// zlobang dang gshin rjesogs// khyab 'jug
lhachen sogs bshad pa// sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag/ bas risamadun du dngos grub 'gyur// 'diri ni zhi ba bya ba ste/ de bzhin ngu ni rgyas pa bya// 'di'i ni mngon spyod
sa bya ste// thubapamchog gsasmadapa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thalapo che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shAn tu rgyasapa las/ 'jam dpal gyi tsapa'i tshog zhib
mo le'u drug pa'i tshog rab 'byams las nas sa chung ngu gsum pa'i tshig rdzogs so//[” ] dan//denas 'dzamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa stanalas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la lan gsumabasor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legasaso legs so// rig pa thamasacad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang/ phanapadang/ bde ba dang/ 'jig

rten lasIng brtse ba'i phyir dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gropar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrubapar byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byedapa/ bdagag gsang sngags 'ang spyi bo thams cad la rgyusang ra byed par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i
dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma'angasapan de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang/ songs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyasadang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang//
0 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang/ snod kyi'ajig rten rnamapar 'jig padang/ 'phagasapa'i lam dang/ rig pa thams cad dang/ sags dang/
smanadang/ nor bu rin po che med padang/ skye bodam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang//
dran pa nyams pa dang/ mdad pa dang/ mi bsrun pa dang/ mi dge ba'i bshesaganyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang/ g.yo sgyudang ldan pa dang/ sra ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs
'di bris nas skag par 'gyur te// le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par ma 'gyur la/ 'dod pa 'tshol zhing yang ches par ma 'gyur ro// log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yan
par 'thal bar 'gyur ro// mtshamasamad par gzhol zhing shinatum bzad pa'iyang shin dum bzung pa thebapa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang/ dbang med nga ladabang du bya ba'i don dang//
dbang du gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyi'i dang/ thabasamakhasapas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngags kyi las kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen nabcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'ang 'dra bar sems
pa legs so legasaso// 'jamadapal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras kas kyi cho ga rab 'byams yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi
[O" ]ngen mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi chogar gyur pa drug pa 'di dgayag drug gisnying po'i mchog the tsom med pa de'i tshe 'grubar ra 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gdul ba'i

phyir dang/ thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhugaba'i phyir dang/ nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thobapa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing da lta yang
zlangasabashangade/ ma'ongs pa'i skya bo'i tshogs laphan pa'aphyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngasabashad par bya'o// de gang zhin/ de nas bcom ldan 'angs shAkya thub pa sasngags
gsus// o bA kye: dza ya/ o bkye shi sha swa/ o bkye bi dzaa/ obakyenAn+tiya/ oM pA kye yan ma/ ob kye rinam/ de ltar 'di ngag 'adz+dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyengargya
sngags drug dang/ ya gi drag pa mthu chenapo dang stobs mnyamapa/ snying podam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba/ sems can thamasacad kyi don gyi phyi sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis rab rtagasus pa/ dmatshag nyams padang/ ngamatshig g.yos pa rnams kyilas thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam rjes su stonapa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi
mchog tu gyur pa/ mchogangang/ 'bring dang/ tha ma gsum la ratu sbyorab/ legs par sbyangs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin nga sbyin pa/ bstanang nub pa'idus su'ang dngos grub 'thob
nga ra 'gyur ro// las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig gis don sgrubang ra 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myabar de'i tshodang/ de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro//

nyams sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyor ro// de nas ras ris kyi chog 'ang bya bar ni te/ de'i tshe de'i
dusan 'jigs pa chen po dang/ snyigs ma lasems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grags pachung bdang/ tshe thung ba dang/ longs spyod chung ba dang/ longs snod chung
bas shin tu rgya che ba'angs ris kyi tshoga' sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par ma nus te/ de dag gi phyir shinatumangor bstanapar bya'o// dang par re zhig dpa' bo'i tshong gi dog pa srang gcig gam//
srang byed kyis nyos la/ chur khru gang/ zheng du khru phyed tsam gyis kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pa 'thag tu gzhug go/ yang na sa med pa'aris kyi dum bu gsar pa gzhan stong dang 'og tu ji ltar
'dod pa khru gnyis dang/ bzhi dang/ drug dang/ ljadang/ bcudang/ brgyadapa' ris blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ma 'dres pa dang/ tsan ngan dang/
ga bur dang/ gur kum gyisabasgos te/ rasakyang tsan dan dang/ gapar dang/ gur kum gcig tu byas pa srog chags mdapa'achu rngul med pa dang bsros te[？ ]snod
gsar pa 'anang du bkras la zhag gsumagyi bar du legs par bkabalta bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas shing// bdag nyidakyang gtsang bar byas te zla ba yar

ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du sha du mngonang phyogs te/ ku sha' khres la 'dug nas sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ oM mehe da gabAn bdu rApa d+ha ra/ dbya
tsakA khe/ a ba lo ka ya/ abaloka ya/ a ba leka la/ mAs ma ya mnusmar kumAr dwapa cha ra Ni/ mahA bo d+hisatrakan tsa ya sahU~M swA te sA te swA hA/ sngags 'das bzlas pa byas 'o de nyid du nyal
bar bya'o// gnyid log pa'irma lamadu 'grub pa 'am ma 'grubapa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas la ngas nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong narang nga por ma thogs par ras rasabri bar bya'o//
gal te grub pa'i mtshanam rmi lam du mamathong na ngas de snod de las phyung la/ nyim la bsamasanas yang snying gsar pa gzhan du bcug la shan tungabenapar legasapar bsrung ba byas la gzhag go/
nge nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bungs lagang 'dod pa'i yi ge drugapa'ang yi ge 'bum bzlabar bya'o// de nas ras ma dge ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang par
0 re zhig ras de blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam/ yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i tshis grangs bzang po la/ 'phagasapa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u'i gzugs can mgo zur
pung lnga dang ldan pa/ byas pa'i rgyan gyis brgyanapa/ mngogagaser 'drakhaM na bza' sngonapo g.yo bzhinabamanabs pa/ nabaza' dar lAsngon pos stong g.yogs byas pa/ chos 'chad pa/
seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs la/ zhabs g.yas pasa'anapo che'izhabs rten la bzhag pa/ g.yonapaseng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/
bzhin cung zad 'tsham pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa po la lta ba bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rdza ma dkar po g.yob pa/ pra yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag
pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ na bza' sonapo g.yo ba mnabs pa/ mu tig gi 'phrong bas na chod phyir
thogasang/ pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bro bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon phyogasasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkarab/
na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mu tig gi 'phrang bas mchod phyir thegs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon ban pad+mangakar po/
'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rje yab gsar gyi yu ba canadakarapo thogs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad can/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ dengazhan du 'phags pa kun/

chub zangapo pad+madakar po la gnas pa gnyis ka'ang de ltar bribar bya'o// de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'ipad+magasum la dbusakyi rtsa ba'ang d+ma ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dang la kyi seng ge'i
khringang/ rinapo che'i zhabs rten no/ gnyis pa'i pad+ma la'aphagasab kun tu bzang po// gsum pa'ipad+mal rna ba na ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin
po margad 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i pa tog du ma kha ma bye bdang/ phyed tsam phye pa dang/ kha bye bdang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa/ klu'i rgyalapo ngaga'ango dang nye dga'
gnyis pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin// klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ gdeng ka bdun gyis nye bar brgyanapa/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanab/ lus kyi stong pa la sbrul gyi
gdengasakas mtshon pa/ 'phagasapa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa// nor bu rin pe che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu
sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha' zur du phags pa 'am dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la ltab/ spos snod lagan thogs pa// mgo dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/ cha byad
dang kha dog snga ma ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi stongangs kyi krung gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin pa nam mkha' la ldang ba/ sminagyi nang nas byung ba//
ma tog gi tshogasachenapo 'thor ba shinatumadzes pa bribar bya'o// ras ras kyi khor yug tu me tog nu ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gter bar bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar
bya'o// 'phags pa 'jamadapal chos 'chad pa dang/ 'phagapa kun tu bzang bo dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'a ga na rnga yab g.yobapa bri bar bya'o// yang na sgab pa pe ji/
ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dodapa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o//
dbus su 'phags pa 'jam dpal/ g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ kun tu bzang po ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o// yang n ji snyed nga 'i ras kyi dum bu mtho
gang ngam/ khru gang labadag nying ngam/ gzhan gyis sam ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa 'am/ gso sbyong mkhas pa 'am/ dad pa 'am/ ma dad pa 'am/ gtsang ba 'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am//

tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri momakhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyamapa byas pa dang/ dang pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
ninges par bya'o// de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du sngog nga 'a las can gyis na mi 'gyur te/ de ltar dad pa dang/ de ltar gyur pas bsgrub
par bya'o// sngags kyi rgyal po dang/ sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grubang ra 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog/
gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ dad pa med pa'i mi lan// dkar po'i chos rnams ma skye ste// sa bon tshag pa ra gyur pa las// myu gu sngon po jibazhin no// dad dang ldan pa'i mi dag
la sangs rgyas las ni 'grub 'gyur te// sngags rnams thams cad khyad par du// dad pa med lam 'grub bo// gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang// de bzhin 'dzag rten 'das pa dag/
dad ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur to// sngogapa dag dang bralaphyir ro// byang chub der song yid kyis ni// de dag myur du nges 'grub ste/ gzhan la 'grub par ma 'gyur zhing// bstan pa rang la
rnam par bzlog/ ngas ni chung dang chen po dang// 'bring du nye bar bsngags pa yin// las rnams kun lasgrubapa ni// de ni rab tu bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che/
theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i na de las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byams las ngas ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsalang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan par soms can de dag gi phyir ya nga

le'u'i cho ga rab 'byams 'di thabs su bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gdabye ba las rnam par 'byedapa som sa can thams cad kyi ngonagyi phyi
yang dag par ba shad par bya yis// de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurangs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang skad ces gsol to//
bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pan legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen bdag la thug
brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lagazigs te 'dzamadal tshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyis+saM
nas 'od zer sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang khu dang/ shel gyi kha deg lta bu byung ste/ 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas/ stong gsum

stong chen nge 'a'i jig rten gyi khams kyi dud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi 'od dang/ ra po'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang/ gang 'ad zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag ga 'od kyang
la gyis mnar mi gsal nga 'od med par 'gyur bdang/ rnam par mdzes par ma 'gyur zhing gsal bar cha 'gyur ro// nor bu thams cad dang/ sngagasadang/ sman dang//
rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar logs/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langasanas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzumapa yidzadan/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsalapa/ phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras ba de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu mang
padang/ rkyen med par 'dzam pa ma mdzad de/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang 'a[=]mdapal gyi rtsa ba'i tshig rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ las
bsgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byedapangang/ 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ klog pa ra 'gyur ba dang/
ngang bar 'gyur ba dang/ glegs bam la dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur bdang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ byug pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ bdugs dang/ rgyal ]
mtshanadang/ ba ngan rnam pa sna tshogasang 'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ phag rdobang dgagam/ than rjes su yi rang bdang ldan pa'i sems
rgyang la thob pa 'am/ ba spu ldang bar byed pa 'am/ rig nga 'a ma bra thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur nga 'am/ srod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogasang 'byang chub tusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/ mnargyalazad ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no// 'di'i dang por re zhig
cho ga'i rgyal po 'ang la dam tshig ga ma thong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang/ dbang bskurab thobapa rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ sIng pa'am/ nye ba'i sAng po 'am/ sngags gang yang rung babazung
nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ gang 'dodapa dgon pa chen porasong// 'bum phrag gsum bzlo bar bya'o// 'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang lo ma'i bza' babyas sngon du
bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// de nas dar rtse mor 'dzegasanas ras ras chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la/ bdag nyid shar du bltas te ku sha'i khris la 'jug nas/
pad+madakar po la tsan ldan dang gur kumargyas btags te de bcom ldan 'dasashAkya thub pa dang/ sangasargyus dang byang chub sems dparathams cad dang/ rang
sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ngos ras kyi 'og tudabul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa'ang ci 'byor pas bdugs go/ lha'i bu dang klu rnams la ji snyid pa'i me tog

ba gas mchod par bya'o// de nas ma tshan phyad kyi dus su tsho 'phrul zla nga phyud kyi zla ba 'bal/ ras dris kyi mdun du pad+ma rnam pa lta bu'i ma thab byas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i shang gis me sbar nas/
gur kum dang ga pur bsras pas srog blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras
kyi ba mo'i khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pos gur kum dang tsan dan gyis btags pa'i tsanangan dkar po'i mi rtog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas sgrub pa
nga sa ranges pa'i tshul gyis sa ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas// sangs rgyas ngang/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cang dang/ rang sangs rgyus thams cang dang/ 'phags
pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas/ sgrub pa pos bris pa 'a ris ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nasa'ajigs pa med pas dras sa gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te//
[rs/ ]sa gol gtogs patsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ gang du bcom ldan 'adas me tog yang dag par/
skas pa'i rgyal po'i debang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'phags pa 'a[=]ma dang yang na ngon du mthong ngo// chos kyang thos so//
byang chub semasadapar ngu ma dag kyang mthong zhing/ de dag la bsAn bkur yang byed de// bskal pa chen po stong du rgya ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro// bas ris kyang de na
gnas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byaregyis brla par 'gyur ro// de dag gas byin gyis brlabasang ra yang dag par shes so//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing sapa yang 'da' bar byed de// lus stong yang ston nga ra byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma'ang 'byin par byed de// 'phags pa 'jamadapalaya nga dge ba'i bshes
gtan du 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub lagazhel bar 'gyur 'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thagapa chen pa rgya che ba'i mde las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtse ba'i
cho ga zhib mo rab 'byams sgrub pa'i thabs mchog galas kyi le'u brkyang ng las dang po rdzogs so//bde nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'idapa 'di la khor sngags sgrub
