'jig rten gyis mchod pa dang/ bzlasapas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed pa mkhas cing lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud padag tu gang byas pa'i sdigab de thams cad 'jig par
byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlasan lus rgyun rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba
dang/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogasakyi rgyal po nyid dang/ rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sngasnod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo/
las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams las sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang/ nges par sdom pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/
bsam gtanadang gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang/ las thams cad kyi chog sgab pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das kya
N+NaM/ thub pas thums cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs naso/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ khyod
kyirag pa'i sngags rjes su sbyong pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa// sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang/ gang gis zlos par byed pa dang/
de'i 'phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'dzam
mawa dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang/ sngags
thams cad kyi spyod podang/ dmatshig la zhugs pa rnams kyisams can rnams kyi sAd du de bshad dugasol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ rnam par dbye brgya char bshadabar bya sta/ sngags thams cud kyi spyodab la mngon
par brtson pa na sems can thams ca kyi ngan sgrub pa byed/ dang po ra zhig sngags su 'gyur bde gung zhen/ na ma: sarba bud+d+hanaM/a tsan rkyad b+hu tar pa/tad+ya thA/ oM
ku ru ku/ sarban+tAn sAd+ha ya/ sarbadut+taM bamo da ni/ ga gnA ba lam ba she d+ha ya// sngags 'dis 'phreng ba thams cad la las bya'o// sbyang ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ blang ba
dang brgyupa' sogasang 'alas bya'o// dang po 'phrang ba'ishang lan// sngags kyis lanagrangs nyi shu bdun/ mngon par bsngags pabyas nasan sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung
babya/ mtshan gcig de na nyalabyas na// rma lam nas nga des mthong ba// mam yin gzugs grub pa ni// ma sdug mche ba gtsigs pa 'o// sngags pa lan des snasapa// nor
rma @#/ nici'adod khyer cig ces// sgrub byed nang pa ra langs nas ni// shing de lasanaragrobar byed// sngags pas shing de bor nas ni// gzhan dag tun 'gro byed
na/ mi sdug gzugasan 'jigs byedapa/ rmi lam duyang mthong mi 'gyur// dang ra dkAyin te/ an du kAnaganyisapa yan// tham bod tsayin la// gzhan yang
sbyo 'bras bu yod pa'o/ shing la legs par 'dzegs mkhas pa'i// grogasadang lhan cig 'a tshegs par bya// grogs po mang par gyur na ni// rang nyid de la 'a rdzogs pa bya//
stong gsalaga' 'bras gnas su// sdom brtson brtul zhugs can 'tshogs te/ rtag tu de labag yodapas// stong gi yal ga la byung nas// yal ga'i snying gi 'bras bas
ti stong galas la sbyar bar bya// ngag grub pa mchogaM nga ni// gang zag mchog gis gsungs payin// bar ma bar ma'agrub pa ste// grub pa tha ma'ang tha ma yin// rtag tu srog
tsham chagasam zesapa'i// 'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya// rus kyi ma lag las thob pa/ rdzas kyi rgyur na grub pa yani/ byang gi gnod sbyin la sogs dang// lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs
par byed/ skad cig 'gugs par byed sun pa'i// 'byung pa bam sa cad zhi phyir dang/ lhadang lha min dri ba dang// mi'am ci dang srin po rnams // dbang du bya ba'i las byed de
ba00 'byung po kun yang rgyasapar byed// dodayon las byedapa ste/ de las rnams sna tshogs ma lus byed// shar phyogs yal ga las skyes shing// yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni//
de tshe 'bad re da byas gyur nas// tshe na ring ba'i rgyu yang yin// rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni// rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig lhor na 'gro ba yin// a lag
le mar nga ldan pa// sngagasapas de ni 'bad de sang// sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// lhor snyan pa yi yal ga dang// 'bras bu gang dag spos pa ni// blangs na
gdung khyed dag rnams kyis// srogani 'jig par byed pa yin/ zlos pas 'bad desrang bar bya// bsod nams ma yAn mang pa'i rgyu// malag 'og tu 'phyang gnas la// 'bras bu
gang zhig 'babasags pa// lha man bu mo gnas pa yi// sa sa 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi 'bras bur 'phrang ba ni// blangasanas 'og tu 'gro bstan pa// sa ya 'ig tu gnas
paran// desanade na 'gro bas khyod// der bzhugs lha ya bde ba ni// zlos pas thob par 'gyur ba yin// lha min bu mo chagasabazhin du// bskal par de naganas par byed//
ma tog 'phreng ba kun blangs nas// denasazlos pa slar logabya// grogs dang lhan cigabasrung byas nas// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas nas thag ring song nasan// de bzhin gtsang
@#@#// phyogs cho ga bzhin// de nas sngags pa rtag tu 'dug la rjeng ba yongs su sbyang b.rubya// brtson pa'i 'phrang ba'i 'bras bu sa/ kun nas yongs su dag byas nas//
sngags pabazangapos 'phreng ba dbug/ gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni// nyi shu dang ni rtse gcig tu// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru// sngama'asngagasakyis rtag tu ang
zlobadun nam brgyud du bzlas pa bya// de nas de dag dag par 'dod// de nas dag pa ra ya nga dag ladod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag dag lasan/ bu mos bkalaba'i skadabadag/ gsum dang lnga
[– ]lcab byas pa la// sdom can gyis na 'phrang skudabya/ sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu// 'brun phra zhing shin tu zlug/ rtag tu srog chags bu ga mad// legs 'jam smadapa'ang
mang pa yin// mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang/ de bzhin gas mad pu ga mad// ru dra kArung bo de tse// anang klu yi 'bras bu nyid// rtag tulung tang mdzes pa dang//
gzhan yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag/ 'bad pa yis ni 'byung ba dag/ sngagasang sabartson byas de tsho brgyu// gser ram yang na dnguladag gam// nor bu shel las byus pa dang//
dung dang mus ra dgadang// mu tig las kyang bya ba yin// byu ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// 'phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin// gzhanayang rin chen bzang po yis/ 'phrang ba legasang ra
rab tu bya// san rab zlum ril bu dag mnyamangar bzhag nas skud pas brgyu// gzhan yang ral du nyung zad grang// 'bras bu 'byung khungs dag las bya// ku sha'i rtse mo'i/
mdud pas kyang// sngagosang sa 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyadangam shu 'am// lnga banu nyidan bar ma yin// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas ni// tshad 'dis 'phreng ba
brgyu ba yin// rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba na// 'phrang ba'amchog tu bya ba yin// 'phrang ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang// sngags pas rtag tu brgyu ba yani// de ltar brgyu ba byas nas
na rim pa gsum mam gnyisasu bya// lcags thad+marang bzhin gang bur bya// de bzhin gsaradanguladag dang ni// de bzhin zangs ma'i gdu bu yos/ 'phreng ba kun yongabacing
bar bya// de nas yang mag kun mthar ni// kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya// 'bad pas dam du bcas byas// ji ltar dam por 'gyur ba'o// yongs su gsal bar
byas nasan// dkyil 'khor lta bu r mthong ba yin// de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar// yongs su 'khor bas brgyan ba yani// mu tig 'brang ba 'dra ba yas// mgul pa brgyan pa/
@#/ 'brang ba rjesasu blangs nasan// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// de bzhin saya phye ma dang// chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te// dri zhim dag gis rjes byugasacing//
de rab tu bsngags pa'i kha deb kyang// tsan dan dkaradang gur kum mo// de nas de bzhin gnyis ka'agro/ 'bad pa yis rab tu bkru// de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni// gang naras
blo ris bar ma de// rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni// shAkyaseng ge ma yi mchog/ de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs// sa stong rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can// de ya mdun du 'brang ba ni//
de dang nye bar gzhug par bya// de dang nyobar bzhaganasan// de yi mdun nga nyar gnasanas// stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang// krin zhag
gcig ni sbyang byas te// bdun pa thubal 'phrong ba dbul// ljopa de bzhin bsabyas nas// tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya// de nas 'brang ba la bzlas nas// de yi mtshan mo/
nyal b.rabya// ku sha bting ba'i sa lan// sngagasabashesader ni skul bar bya// gal te desan rma laman// dge ba'i rmi lam ma thong nan// 'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste//
[/]de la grub par bstan pa yin// sangs rgyasanyan thos bso ru ni// gal te de yas rmi lam mthong// sngagasapa de ya bya ban// 'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur//
gzhonanu'i gzugs can byis pa na// rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba// gal te rmi lam des mthong dang// 'thung ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te/ don yod de 'grub 'gyur te/
sngags kyi don rnams grub byed pa'o// byang chung ni mas dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mad las/ 'phags pa 'jamadapal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las ras ris bar ma'i cho ga
rab 'byams las 'phrang pa'i cho ga rab 'byams bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas
gtsang ma'i gzhalamed khang la gzigasanas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal khyod kyisngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad nga ra gyi chog dang/
sbyin srog gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de/ ma la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi tshoga'i phyi'i/ gangagasajigapa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngonapar brtsonapa' sems
canarab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di lta ste/ o ut+ti'u ha ra pa la lo ha takA/ nge hid du pa ya hU~M phaT sarba
bgru banA sha maswA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di nama'i sAng pa'i mchog las thams cad byed pa// 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin// dang po ri zhig sgrub pa pos ma'i snying po
'di la lan cig bzlos bas srog blugs gsum gyis ma la sbyin sreg byas na tshe spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhing dang/ rgyas pa dang/ drag po'i
las dag la yam shinge rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ myangon mad shang zhi don du// rlon pa nying na rib tu bsngags// mtho gang ngom na khrugang tsam// sor gsum srid du bya ba yin// !
zlo snamapa'irnamapar pa tu bsngags// tshogo rang ni bya ba yin/ dbu gu mad cing nang stong pa na// de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang/ ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// kha dog nag
bospong bar bya// sran bu rnams kyis zos pa 'ang spang// bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog/ gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min// tham nyidakyang rnam par spangs// ha cang
skamaman rlon pa'ang min// tshig min las nibartsamang ra bya// rul ba dang na yo ba'ang min// shin tu range ba'ang spakhar bya// de nas mi thabarlab ni// kun nas gru bzhi bya bas
a: 'og nyid du yang brko ba// 'bad pas khrunibazhi ya tshad/ khrugasum dang ni khru gnyis dang// de bzhin khru cag tshad du bya// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang// byems

legs par sbyar ba gang// de nas pad 'dra'i lan kanani// kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o// yang n 'bodapas khrur bzhi yang// de bzhin lan kanangabyibs su bya// debazhazhi khru cig dbya// de nas mi thub bya ba rnam par sbyangs// gsang
jarje'i rnamar rodra ba ya/ rtse mo gnyis su'ang gsum bya// ma thab kyi na thad ka la// khru gnyis thad kar byabayani// gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas// chu klung de bzhin chu dbus
dang/ shange gcig ga na phyogs dag dang/ dur khrod dang ni khang stong du// s+sanasrog legs par yang dgu brtsam/ de bzhin ri bo'icu dag tu'o// rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang//
dgon pa chen po'ang de ngazhin no// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu// gang zag mchog gas rab gsungs/ spyin sreg gnasan thams cad la// gnas de dag ni thamApad gsud/
kusha' khres na khru gang tsam// de la 'jug pa'i byas nas ni/ sngags shos de na sbyin sreg las/ khyadapar du yabya ba yin// gnas de dag la 'dug na ni// myur du 'grub
par the tsomamad// sharang byung dubaltas pasakyang// 'a ba dang ni rgyas par bya/ lhor bltasanan drag po las// sngags pas don spang bar bya// shar du bltas pas zhib 'grub//
byang du bltas pa sa rgyusapa 'o// 'di yas sngags pa dus rtag tu// sngags kyi bloyang dgabartsams// bal ba ga sha n+ya gro d+has/ brgyus pa'ilasani yongs su bya// ma ngen
spyod nga las bya ba ni// dkar dang tsha dang skyur dang no// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag/ zhi dang rgyas pa'i las lan// shing rlon dag ni rab tu/
bsngags// drag po'alas 'a shadzesnyam ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs// ya mngashing de dag med na ni// thama' shing dag kun tu brtag/ gnyis
[Y ]ka'i rtse mor bya ba na ku shas kun tu yang dag dkwa/ sngodang snyam pa 'dra bo dang// rma bya'i mgranang 'dra ba dang// de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu na// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya// ma rgyud
rnam pa 'dra ba dang// rtswa skam gyis nartag tu yang// sdig pa'i las rnams bya bayani// 'dir nasgrub pa mchog gis bkag/ dri med chu na yongs dag pa// srogachagasadag gis
Nag spangs nga// des ni kun nas gtor byas nas// g.yas phyogs sun bskor byas te// sdom brtson gyis nam sngar bya// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang ba'i rtswa yartsa bas na//
ma sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas chang par bsanan// 'bad pas men sbyar bar bya// kha yi rlung gsi ma bya ste// rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang ma nA// sham thabs
gos rnam pa spangs// gosagazhan dag nangekag ma yin// shin tu drag pas de mi bya// gnod par dga' bsam yanan// rlung yabagatsang dang de bzhin gel// loms
kyang ni rlung yab bya// rlungags khyad du mgasod pa// men rab tu sad byas nas// sngags shis pas ni mi spar to// sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag/ lag pa de/
nagayonapa yis// lan gsum bar du nusag tor nas// der ni ba ya mar gyis ni// srog blugs gsum na des sbyin bya// de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste// sangs rgyus kun
dang skyob pa dang// rangasngags sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o// de tsho mi yi sAng po yas// sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i// drizhim mo
tog dag gis ni// sdom brtson men spyan drung bya// sngagasashes rtag tu spyan drangasanas// mkhas pas gnas na sbyin par bya// gdun dngaganas ni sbyin byed na'ang// de nyi
sngags yan gzhan pas min// zhadang mor gyis sbags pa dang// sbrang rtsi'i brtags pa'i yam shangags// rgyus pa'i las ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags kyis kun tu sbyin sreg bya//
mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am/ yang na 'od ng ldan pa ya/ Amashong rdzas dang ldan pa yi// gnyis ka la gnas de tsho bya// stong ngam yang na 'bum maman// yang na brgya
rtsa khargyud du brtag de tshe sngags pas sngags bzunganas/ lan re bzlasashing ma la do'o// 'bar ba'i ma yi 'phreng ba 'am// de bzhin ma rtse gcig gyur la// zhi ba'i
las kyi sbyin gabya// ngung pa mong lo rgyus nga rang bya// dud bcas drag po'i las la bya// den rgyal bas smad cing spangs// gal te ma ni mngog ldan na// sbyin sreg las
narib tu sbyar// na la kha dog dkar po ni// rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu nga sngags// gal te ma dkar sbyin sreg byas// der na sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/
de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la// rgyas par grub par 'dod pa yani// nag dang du ba'i kha dog dang// ser skya la ni sdig ldan sa// kha dog rnam gsum bstanangs na// rnam/
gsum grub pa 'di dag yan// mdog gzhan smin gyi kha dog gam// rnam pa sna tshogs ma ngog ldan pa// sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni// grub pa yod pa ma yin no// de 'dra'i
kha dog 'dra ba 'am// rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i// mo na bar ba de mthong na// las kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsamang ra bya// gal te sngags na grub 'dod na// phyici' ra nar
bar bya// chog mthong ba'i las kyis// phyir yang sbyin srog rab tu bya// ma yasngags na zlos nga yiso// gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid kyang bya// dkyil 'khor 'di ni
tsha ga sbyin// sngar narab tu brtags pa yis// de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya// gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang// de nyid kyan las dag gis// las rnams thams cad
nyid kyang bya// mo yi las dang de bzhin gzugs// ras ras mdun du brtsam byas n// der ni sngogs rnams 'grub 'gyur zhes// sngon gyi bde gshigs rnamasakyisagasungs// rgyal
bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag/ der ni rnamapa kun tu byas// sdig pa dag ni khyad par du// gang yang rgyal bas smadapa dang// 'jig rten 'gro bas smad pa dag/ gzhan gyis
smadaparangabya bamani// 'khor los sgyur bzung nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thobadang// de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob dang// de nas lha nying thob pa'o// bas ris la rtag
brtson zhingashes// sbyin srog las lo 'jigasamangangang// sa 'og ga ni bdag po 'am// yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur// sa bdag lha ngang gnod sbyin nyid// rtag tu gnod
sbyin mo 'gugs byed/ rgyul srid dag pa nyid dang ni// yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang// rig pa 'dzinadang lha mamanyid// sam sa can thams cad dbang du byed// bdag nyid
tshadang sems can che// 'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas// sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na//
sa stong ma rnams smos cingagosaM/ snga dpon ngag dang de bzhinadu// khyadapar 'jig rtenangabang phyug 'gyur// dbang 'gyur cig car 'byung po kuno// de bzhin ma yi dbang nyid
sems can kun l dbang don dang// yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin rtag tu las kun l// sbyin sreg gis ni kun tu bya// thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid//
las kun las na bstan byas na// denanges par 'grub 'gyur te// las dge'i donan dam pa yin// bar ma nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// thama'i las kyang
[D] de bzhin no// rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du// grubadang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum// 'bras dang bcas par grub snang ste// sbyin srog las la rab tu bstan// phyag rgya gtsug
ts+tsha bud lngabatsangs nas// sdugs kyang sa can masabyas nas// las rnams kun ni bya ba dang// sngags pa bdag nying bsrung bar bya// sbyin srog las la rab 'jugapas//
denas sngags 'di brjod par bya// bdunanam brgyad du bzlas pa yis// las 'di la ni rtag tu bya// namasarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi saMtAnaM 3 a pra ti ha ta ga tig tAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ odza la tiSh+Tha
na ngu ngashAsaM b+ha ba saM b+ha be sA/ sngags kyi skur ba' yas// yang dang yang du share labazla// gnyis sam bdun du bzlas pa yis// sngags rdzogs des ni sbyin sreg bya
ma tog bdug pa dri yang rung// ma lus thams cad dag dang ni// nul sngags rnams bzlas pa la// 'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya// las rnams kun gyi rgyuya phyir// de nas chogA brtsam
par bya// lasarnamasangagan thams cad la// snga ma'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bya// sngama'i gtsug ngang lnga bcings te// phyog rgya chen por grags ldan m// snga ma'i gtsugapung lnga bcing bya//
ska can ma nyid rab bzlas pas// des na bsrung ba byas par 'gyur// grub pa'i rgyu la 'dzigs mdapas// las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// gal te la 'bazangape 'am/
rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thosan// de lasngagasano don yod de// ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur// drang po'i las la rab sbyor dang// sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na// thams
cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang// de la grub par brjod pa yin// rgyalasgra nyid pa Ta ha// rnga bo che yis dag ni// brtsonabyas grub pa ma lus 'gyur/ sbyin sreg las la yang
dag bstan/gzhanayang la nyi bzang po dang// 'dab chags dgo ba'i dgadang// rnamapa sna tshogasanges pa'i sgra// rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang// bkra shis
bzang por ba bsregs dang// rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ongs// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang// bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang//
mthong na thub pa'i rgyu rnams yin// rnam pa du ma'i kha dog gam// 'jig rten gyis mchong rab bsngags pa// de dag mthong na grub 'gyur ba// sngags rnams du ma'i spyod tshul
yani// byang chub semasadapa'i sde snod phal po che thegapa chenapag tu rgyusang 'a ma ngolas// 'phags pa 'dzamadapal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga banu gsum pa ste sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byams
rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhanayang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsalapa/ 'jamadapal khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de/ sngags thams cad kyi slab pa po'i thabs de bzhinagashegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes
rgyu su gnang ba/ chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/ chos kyi spyin gyi rjes su zhugs pa/ nam mkha'ango bo 'ang 'jig stonadang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag
lha na tu gtso bor gyur pa/ gzhon nu dzi ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nisams can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod de/ shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes
dbu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs yin no// gzhon nu de bzhin du rigapa'i rgyal po 'di na sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/ de bzhin gshegasang
ba'i sma gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen togagi snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ kun nas bkra
shis pa'i 'dodapa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyisaya nga dgapar bstod pa/ rab tu bsngags pa/ sems can thams cad yang dgapar dbugs 'byin pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab
rta 'jig par byed pa// 'dod pa thams cang sbyin par byed pa/ re ba yosasu rdzogs par byedapa de'angagang zhen/ bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas smin mtshams kyi mdzod
nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyungabar gyur to// gang 'di phyogs bcu stong 'og thams cad du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab
par mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi yid tsham par mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can bltabar ma nusapa/ sems can thams cad kyis ma thub pa/ 'od chonapo yang dag par 'phags pa//
'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan// rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rag pa'i rgyul po ya gi gcig pa zhes bya ba
byung bar gyur to// byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thamasaM cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ rig pa du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong
'byin par byedab/ yi gagacigapa'i sgra 'don 'od zer chen po 'bar rab tu 'byin// stong gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa la mngon du bltapadang/ thams cad dang ldan/
pa'i gnasagatsang ma'i gzhalamang khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chenapo'ang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/
yi gegacig pa'i rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tig ces bya ba'i snyang pa mchog tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pazams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis yang dag nga ra thobapa/ sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ 'od dapag med dang/ bsnyen par daka' ba dang/ rgyun bzang dang//
tog bzangadang/ me tog dbang po dang/ gnyid mthar phyin dang/ 'jig rten thub pa dang/ gsor thub la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegasapa de dag gis gsungasashing rjes su yi rang ba
ts+tso dang/ 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de'ang gang zhen/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+haM/ 'jam dpal 'di ni sing po dam pa/
[: ]de bzhinagashegs pa thams cad kyi mchog/ sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ya gi gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po'ang ying dag par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad
'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu gang yang khyod kyi tshoga' rgyal po'imchog la sngags thams cadedong rjes su mthunapa/ mchog tu gsang ba mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba/
las kyi slobapa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa/ dwang po'i zhig sgrub pa ngas nges par 'bum phrag gsumabazlas brjod bya'o// de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'di'i
gzhon nu khyod kyis choga'i rgyal po la 'jigarten dang/ 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i sngags dang rgyuda rnams bsgrub par bya'o// 'dis bsrung babusan 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugA
par ma 'gyur ro// 'jig rtenadang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis non par ma 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dras shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu song bas sa/
gyi stong chenaba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam padrug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ngur snang bas khyab cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cad kyang
'khor gyi dekyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ gnas gtsang ma'agazhal med khang du 'khodapar gyur to// sa bcu thob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyus thams cad dung/ rdzu 'phrulachenapo dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dung/ rig
pa' rgyalapo rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to// 'jig rtenagyi khams mtha' yas mu med po dganarnamapar gnas pa'isaMms can mang po dbang du gyur
@#/ to// dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang pas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyud
la gnas pa yang shan zhu bde bas tsham zhing skyob mang par gyur te/ nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de lo
sgyu[]gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di 'phrul che ba/ dpa' bo gcig pu las thams cad
byed pa/ rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor los sbyar ba/ saMms can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogasapar mdzadapa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad yongs su rgyas
pa/ khyod kyi sngags dang/ rgyud dang/ chogarab 'byams la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngags thams cang sgrub par byed pa/ thun mong du gyur ba/ grags pa che ba dang/
spro ba che ba dang/ sems can sgrub pa po'i khyadapar gyi thabasadang shes rab lamakhasapa/ byang chub kyi lam thums cad yongasasu sbyong bar byed pa// mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu
'jug par byedapa/ bdud zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byedapo/ dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o// 'di nyid
sa mdor bsngan chog zhib mo rgyas pa rasaras kyi cho ga'i dekyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs sngon gyi sngags kyi spyod pa rjesasu skyodapa gang larab tu gnasan/ sems can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor
lasosgyur nge chenaposgrub par gyur te/ smad du byung ba chen posags thamasacad kyi ba phyugadamab/ 'od byedapa thamasacad kyi bsam pa yosasu rdzogasapar byedapa/ rnam par 'drenapa//
'grobawaMms cad la phanapar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sumadu nyabar bzhugs pa/ rang byung du gyurapa/ mchog dang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i las thams cad byed pa/
shin tu bde ba dam pa/ shis pa dang zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byedapa'o// lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de// thub pa rnams kyi thub pa mchog/ sangs rgyas
nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa// dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags// chos kun rang ga ngo bomakhyen// yang dag mthar gyur rogang tshang de ya cho ga mchog bshad bya// 'byor pa 'dod/
pasamanyanapar gyis// re zhig dang po ras bzang po skyon rnamasadang ma 'dresapa gsar pa phrab 'i khyad par dang ldan pa kha dngabacasapa nyid labri bar bya'o// churan khru do'i tshod yin la//
nang du khru gang tshad du bya// de 'dra'abazang po khon la// dri med bstan sdug pa dang// bcos bu dkarapod bzhin du/ phra dang legs bkrus ras bal spangs// phyagadan dramamed
pa yaTi du gu la yarasanyid la// rgyu ni shange kun nying dang na// dga' rgyud ni rnamaslangs pa/ chungan lasan bkrus minadang// skya nges zhal mthong phul ba'ang
min// ma gos pa dang de bzhin du// gzhanayang nyung zad dam pas bsngags// de 'dra'i risanubazang po la// gzhal med khang na dri bar bya// 'od kyidakyil 'khor 'phreng ba
lcacan/ ston pa'i gzugs ni yang dag bri// de bzhin gsar gyi mdogacanani// 'od zer 'phrang ldan bu bar bya// gcig pu phugan bzhugs pa na// ri bo la gnas grags pa che//
'a dar la'ib re bre ba na// rin chen 'phreng ba 'chang ba 'o// stangadu lta naganyis ka yang// 'dzin pa dag ni yang dag bri ri rnams kyi ni stang dag tu// rin chen 'phreng ba rab tu bya//
bla ra khor yugamu tig gi/ dra ba dra phyed dag gis brgyan/ ra rgyal steng du 'bad pa yis// 'ad dag thams cad bri bar bya// ri bo dag ga rtsa ba yang// rgya mtsho chen por chung par bya/
ras ris mthar yang ma togan/ kun nas 'khor ba yang dag bri// nA ga ge sar panaka/ ba ku ladung zhu tika/ snama'i mi rtog pri yang ku// de bzhinaku ra ba ka dang// ut+pa la
dang dri mchog dang// de las gzhanayang pad+ma dkar// mo tog rigs stsatshogs dang// de bzhin gzhan yang dri'i ldan pa'i// me tog dag ni 'di dag nyid// gang yang rung ba rtag
00 bganas// ston pa la na mchod don du// yid du 'ong ba'i mchod yon dbul// sngar bstan cho gas ras ras na// mchog dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang// dog pa tha ga pa dag dang//
mo mkhanayang de bzhin 'dod// tsho'aphrul gyin zla phyed kyi// nyi mdage bdagalan/ dus ni de ltar gyur pa la// bzlas panyingakyang bya ba yin// 'di la sems can thams cad
kyis// sngar bstan bzhin du yang dag spyad// tshon gsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// ston pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya/ rnam pa du mar ldan pa yi// dong ka' ma tog mdog
'dradang// tsam pa kayi mdog 'dra dang// gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar bri// de lta'i rnam pa ldan pa yi// rin chen rigs skyes thubapa// chags pa chen po ranarkyen
tog gtso bo thub mchog dam pa ni/ chos rnams thams cad yongs thob pa'i// sangs rgyas dkon mchog de brabya// rin chen ri bor gnas pa dang// rin chen phug gis
mdzes shing// skyil krung gsan bzhugs pa dang// chos nirjes su 'chad cing stsol// cung zad 'dzum zhing brtan pa dang// thugs na bsam gtan la dmigasadang/
phyi la thugan yang dgabri// 'og dang de bzhin khorayug tu'o// ras mtha'izurangu sgrub pa pos// pus mo'i lhang yang dag btsugs// bdug spos lag na thogs bzhin du//
lus na cung zad 'dud pa dang// ba gos gcig tu byas nas ni// cha byad lta bzhin du yang// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs kyi// 'og gi rgya mtsho
chostong du// sngags pas dge ba'i don gyi phyir// sdom brtson rtag tu bri bar bya// las kyi chog 'di dag ni// 'jigarten gyis bsngags bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor de ya lha
zludag kyang// de ni rab tung rjod par bya// de tshe sngagasapa rig pa'i sngags// de tshe sngagasan rig pa des// sngagasal rtag tubasnyanabyas dang// bzlas pa phun sum tshogs mngon shes//
'jam dbyangs cho ga 'di la ni// de tshe sngags pa dbang bskur ba// dkyil 'khor rnam pa la mkhas shing// rtag tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang// sngagasa rnams kun la dbang bskur dang/
dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jigs pa med// rig pa'i sngagadang sngagasabacasadang// bdag nyid bsrung dang phan 'dogs dang// grogasadang de bzhani bsrung shes dang// yongs su legs
mi brtags 'od chen ldan// slob dpon legs par yang dag rtsom// rtsom zhing sbyangs yon ston pa dang/ shes rab che zhing legs 'jamadang/ dpal ldan sAng rjer rtag tu ldan// grogA
pa dag ni thams cad kyang// mtshan nyid de bzhin kun tu bstan// gcig gnyiso gsum dang de bzhin du// gzhan yang de bzhin brgyad kyi bar// slob ma legs par byang brgyu// mngang
dganang bar bya// sngar bstan chog ji lta bar// dkyil 'khor 'di la'ang yang dag sbyang// stobs bcu ldan pas dang po ni// dkyil 'khor gang dag rab bstan pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs/
las gzhan min dang// rgyu gzhan dag gis bri ma bya// dkyil 'khor 'od chen ldan pa yi// tshad ni rab tu bstan par bya// khru bzhi 'am khru ni gnyis pa dang// de bzhin gzhan
yang khru brgyad par// gtsang ba'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam// khyadapar dun ri bo'i rtsor// tshon sna lnga yaMphyi ma dang// sngar bstan pa ya las kyis so// gru bzhi sgo ni
bzhi pa dang// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang// zur bzhi mnyam zhing bzang bangang// lha ya rnam pa 'dra ba'i mdog/ tshon rtsi gsal ba sna tshogs dang// mdzes
pa'i kha dog legs mdzes dang// drizhim bzang dang gzugs bzang dang// grogs bzang dag gis yang dag brtsam// thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag spud/ yan lag brgyad
pa'i brtul zhugs snyan// nyon mongasamasams zas tshod rag/ chos ldan rtag tu zlos par byed// sdig med las dang yongs srongs byed/ de bzhin zhi dang rgyas pa shes
de nas ngokyil 'khor dbus bzhugs n// bstanabacos las gsungs bzhin du bri// rin chen lha tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i// ra mo dang por bri bar bya// der zhugs gzi brjid chen
gapo ma de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ skyil krung gis na legs bzhugs pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'o// ras ris la nAji lta bar// bstan
bcos la sngags thams cad br-i/ ri mo'i 'phronganagasum dgadang// phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa dang// gsaramajog rim pas khor yug tu// yongs su bribar phyobaya na//
gsal dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang// drang po de yi rnam pa 'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i bdag po che// de yi dbus su bya ba yan// nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang// gur kum rnam
na pa 'dramadog can// 'khor lo chen po'i rjes 'brang ba// 'bad par gnas pas kun tu// rgyal po chen po mnyam 'drab// gzhalamad khang bcas rgyan gyis brgyan// sems
dpa' chen po'i cod pan can// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan// dar lamadzes pa'i smad g.yogs can// sna tshogs dar lus stod g.yogs shing// 'phreng ldan zhi ba'i
la/ kha dog 'od// gos dang 'phreng bas brgyan pa dang// mo tog 'phreng ba ba kul// lag pa g.yas pa snom par byed// bzhin nicung zad 'dzum pa'i lha// mthu chen 'ong dang
ldan pa 'o// gzugs bzang gzugs ni ra dzes pa dang// byis pa rgan po rnam par sangs// lag pa g.yon na 'khor lo ste// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba can// de ni yong
ba su bskor ba dang// skya'il krung phyed kyis gnas pa bri// gzugs bzang gzugs la brten nasan// lha yi gzugs 'dra bri bar bya// ri bo 'od chen ldan pa'i stong// mi chen
du ma'i stong du gnas// sngags rnams kun la che ba dang// rtag tu mchog sbyin la 'jug byed// 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra ba dang// 'od kyi dkyil 'kher gyis mdzes pa// rlung
gis sbar ba'im bzhin du// kun nas ma ni 'bar ba'o// de bzhin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag ma yis 'bar bar byed// stobs chen de dang 'dra ba yi//
sngags kun rab tu snang byed pa// gang gis bdag nyid chen po mthong// sdig pa kun las yongs su grol// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang// tshul 'chal blo ni chung ba
dang// sdig pa kun po 'dzud byed pa// khyab bdag ma thong ba tsam gyis grol// lha yi lhan 'khor lo'i bdag/ dkyil 'khoramathong ba tsam gyis ni// gzhan yang sdig tu yong
bstan pa// de yi mod la grolangar 'gyur// sngags pas rtag tukhyab bdag gis// denas shar sgo yang dag sbyar// rta babs kun nas yongs bsgrang ste// bdan dag gis
nyer mdzes bya// mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa ya// dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas/// bshos dang bdug pa dI dang ni// rtag tu 'phreng ba bzang po yis//
tshog snga ma khen ltar// de dag thams cad gus par bya/ dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni// 'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod// de bum rnam par rgyal zhe sa bya/
sngags shes pas na de ma gdag/ cho ga mthong ba'i las kyan// mo thab snga mabazhin du bya// sbyin srog cho ga yang dag btsam/[”]chog sngags ni gzhan pas min// sbyin
zla srog kyang na brgya rtsa brgyad// seng lding bud shang ma la ni// pa la sha dang bal ba'i shang// b.lib u dum arka dang// 'bad pas las rnams kun la ni// a pa margas
sbyin sreg bya// til la mar gyis btags pa 'am// zho la sbrang rtsi bsres pa yis// las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni// stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya// dusags ma dus na kun
bstanapa// khrus dang gos ning rje ba dang// dkar gsum rgya dkar bzang po ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ las rnams sngar ni bstan pa yin/ bzlos dang
y+Ya sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan// sngags dang yang dag ldan pas sem// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya// las rnams dag na kun la yang// mi so gcig pa'i sngags kyis bya//
de ni mthu chen don ldan te// dpa' bo gcig bu rtag pa mchog/ de la rtag tu zlos byedapa// sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod// 'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod// cho ga thams cad
'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa'i brtson 'grus cho// rig pa'irgyal bo dka' thub che// sngags kun 'grub par 'gyur ba ni// chog 'di las gzhan pas ma na// thub
ba rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang// de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sras dang 'gan skyong ba brgya byin sogs// khyab 'jug dbang ldan tshangs pa dang// zla ba'am de bzhin
gzhan// gnod spyin dbang posrin po dang// lto 'phye tshadang mi 'am ci// de bzhinas steng drang srong mchog/ nam mkha' lding dang rlung lha dang// soms can mang ldan
'jig rten gzhan// gang gis bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni// 'dar yang grub par 'gyur ba yin// sngags rnams kun la 'gugs byed dang// las rnams kun la ston byed
dang// 'byung pokun gyi sngags rgyud ni// rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed// ya go gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni/ sngags pa kun gyi rab byed pa// bzlus pa tsam gyis
don ldan te// lha rnams kun na gugs byed la// choga rnams ni dpang du byed// yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin// dam pa rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i// rnam
pa sna tshogs byed ba yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'dasapa'i sngags// yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed// ma lus mthong dzes pas// ras ris gsal byas ni//
[~ ]/ gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs// ri bo'i rtsor yang gzhag par bya// snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis// nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan// cho ga mthong
nga' u0f7alas kyis ni// sgrubapa po ni pishar du blta// dur ba'i khris la 'duganasan// 'du 'dzamadapar bzlas par bya// sa ni drag min dal bas min// gzhan la ngan soms
med gyur na// sangs rgyasaMm lus kun gyi yang// 'di la myur du 'grubapa yin// rtag tu 'jig rten byams sams dang// sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan// mgon
med soms na dman pa dang// 'phongs pas nyam thag stobs chung dngo// mi bzang 'khor bar ltung pa la// snying rje'i sems ldan 'grub par 'gyur/ 'bad pas ras ras
mdun dag tu// ma chong pa chen po rtag tu gzhug/ dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul// bzang po sems las byung ba dang// rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mon// bsam pa
'am yang na bya bas na// de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// de nyid du nam thab bya/ ma ni'on tu 'bar ba la// sgrubapas srog blugs sbyin sreg bya// tsan dan dkar dang ga bur dang//
gur kum gyis bsres mang pon/ brgya na rtsa brgyad srog blugs kyis// sngags rig mo 'bar sbyin sreg bya// sang ldeng pag sha rgya grod+ma// pa la sha ni gang yin pa// de dag las
byung shing dag gis// me chen rab tu sbyarab r bya// shing de dag na med gyur na/ shang gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya// pi tshu mjatsha dang sgyur// po son ca las byung ba'i shing/
tsher ma can sogs spang bya ste// sdig pa'i las la rab tu bsgrigs/ yig gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis// zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na// de na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
sdig pa las na spyadam bya/ sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la na/ las rnams tshog rgya chen kun// rnam rtog med pas rab sbyar na// rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba
yani// de tshe sngags ni 'grub 'gyur zhing// mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yan// yam shang pag na u dum bur// yong na pugashargya gro d+ha/ mar gyis btags
dang sbrang rtsir ldan// zhi dang ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas// sa stangargyal thabs 'dod pa yi// sngags pas dus kun sbyin srogabya/ lhaya rgyalapo 'dod pas na// gur kum
tsanangan sbyin sreg bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dag gi/ bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum a phrag na// sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas// spyi na srog
mthar ni ma chod yon yang// bstan bcos las 'byung bzhin du dbul// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i ras ris mchog/ der na kun nas yongs su 'bar// de la reg pa tsam gyis na)
tshangs pa'i 'jig rtend gdangs// 'og man gyin bar dag nas/ nangan sa 'og ma bar 'gro// bar skabs 'dir na grub rnams kyi// den rgyal por
rtag tu 'gyur// stobs chen brtan zhing pha rol gnon// 'byung po rnamasan 'byer bar byed/ rtag tu rig 'dzin rgyal por 'gyur// las rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed// de ni
dus rang ratsho'agyur to// bsal ba tsam du'ang gnas pa yin// gang tshe lus nipig 'phos nas// nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// gzhan yang las ni 'di dag kyang//
mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya// pad+ma dkar po yongs blangs nas/ tsan danadakar dang ldan pa ya/ sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas n/ des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur//
rgyul ba dam pa de mthong na// de tshe mngon shes lnga 'thob 'gyur// bskal pa chen por rang 'tsho zhing// sangs rgyas rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur// mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa/
sangs rgyas de nas mthong bar 'gyur/ de dag la ni rtag mchod cing// de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas// rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams// gcig ni bcom
ldan de bzhugs pa// sgrub gtsamchog dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegasang nachen tog/ dal de ni rtag gnas te// sngags kyis dgapar the tshom med// gzhan yang
las ni 'dod pa dag/ gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa na// nA ga gsar ga bur dang// tsanangan gur kum cha mnyam pa// sngags pas de tsho gcig byas nas// sbyin
srog 'bum phrag bdun cu brgyud// de tshe lha ni spyir srog mtha'// 'khor lo can de 'dir byon nas// rtag tu drages nas mchog stsol te// sgrub byed spyi bor byugs par
mdzad// de tshe theg pa tsa ma gyis ni// sngagasang sa bdun bdag por 'gyur/ rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa byang chub sems dpa' de brjod do// nges pa'i
byang chub sems dang la yang// den lung bstan 'gyur ba ni// dre nas brtsams nas cung zad gang// shes dang shes byargyal ba'i sras// shis 'gyur sngags rnams ma
lus ni// rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin// de la reg pa tsam gyis ni// mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur// rtag tu bdag dang ga zhan bdag nyid// rnam ba
sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yin// mchod pa'i las la rtag tu dga'// skad cig de nyid khon la// byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur//
detsho skad cig tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyasazhing de 'gro// 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu// thams cad du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' ni// de tshe sbyong bcasamathong bar 'gyur// de las chos ni thos padang// mchodapa'i las la brtson par 'gyur// rgyal ba 'khor los sgyur gsungs
ba'i 'dzar ni las rnams gzhanayod de// mar mayon du dbul ba na// marab casaAng bo gtsang bani/ gser dang dngul gyi snodadag dang// thangs ma sa dag nyid yin
na'ang// der ni mar ma rab spyar te// skyes bu grangs 'bumadag gi/ grangs kyi tshad tsamanges bzhag ste// brgya phrag stong las lhagapa min// bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa
mis: kho ra khor yug mar ma 'dzin// mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni// ston pa'i ras ris sku la dbul// sngags rnams re re'ang 'don bzhin du// thams cad
mnyam par rang zhugs nas// stonapa lan 'bul byedan// de yi mod la grub par ston// kun nas skrun sgrog byed cing// rngabo che yi sgra yang sgrog/ gang phyir lha tshogs
du ma/ (]legs so zhes nga 'i sgrar 'dod/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang// de tshe namamakharalabazhugs nas/ shes rab can khyod legs so legs/
legs byas 'a sa na yongs su byas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa dang// sdug bsngalaang ni mthong ma 'gyur// bdedang zhi ba mya ngan 'das// 'jigs med sangs rgyas
0 nyid kyang thob// laman dge dang dri ma med// mnalag brgyad la legs par spyod// yi ge gcig pa mnyes byas nas// sngags kyi ngo ba'i mgon po mnyes// gzhan
yang lasan 'di nyid na// dam pa'i 'gro ba la gnas nas// mthu chen po ni rnam shes pa'i/ rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// nam pa'i rang bzhin
shang khrungs nas// rtsa gsum rdo rje gnyis mthar bya// dbus kyi phyogasasu bya ba ni// rdo rje rigs te ma bskyod pa// de nas sngags kyis dag byas nas// de na u0f7aras ris
mngon du gzhag/ de nas sngags pas lag reg nas// sngags ma nyam par bzhag nasabazla// rtsa brgyad 'bum phrag bcu drug ni// yongs su rdzogs nas grub par 'dod//
de nas rdo rje gcig 'bar te// kun nas de ni rab tu 'bar// de nas rdo rje de blangs nas// 'di ltard na stong 'gro 'o// de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nam// gzhan dang lha
gnas gang 'dod 'gro// de nas nam mkhar 'gro gyur te// grub pa kun gyi sngon du 'dren// grub nga 'a rig 'dzan la sogs kyi// bdagang nyid kyang byedapar 'gyur// lha yi
'dus pa mang po yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// bdag nyid kyi no sbyad pa yang// rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// bar gyi skal pa bcu yi bar// yun nge gnas
tebar chad med// bde ba la brten rtag mchod// rtag tu skyes bu dam par ldan// byang chub sems kyis yang dag spyod// skyo ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par spos/
grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba ste// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de la 'phos ma'i skye zhing// bde ba mang la rab tu gzhol/ 'gro ba ma lus skyi byas nas// byang chub
yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas// mang po 'jig rten de mchod pa// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjodab// tshog rgya chen tshogar bcas// sa bdag
brgya byin nyid dang ni// 'khor los sgyuranyid yang dang yang// rig 'dzani rnams dang de bzhin du// lha nyid dang na bdag po'ang byed// rnam pa du ma'i ngo bo'am// lasan gang dag 'di
gsungs pa// thams cad grub pa thob 'gyur te// sngags pa legs par sbyor byedana'o// mtshanAtsho skyal mo krung bcas te// sdom can den da bzlas byas na// thor ngas grub pa theng
gyur te// zlos pa mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur// dur khrod rol 'duganas ni// sdom can 'gul med blos pan/ lagi gcig du don chen te// b.rangs grub par 'dod pa la ni//
gi pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// gal te dur khrod gnas nas bzlas// zla ba drugags grub thob ste// ji ltar 'dodang 'a'i khras bu byed// gang yang rung ba'aganas dag tu// rdzu 'phrul chen/
wa bo zlog byed na// der gnas grub pa thob 'gyur te// sngags pa legs par sbyor byed pa'o/ gdugs dkar de bzhin ral gri dang// nor bu'i rtser dang gdung skor dang/ mu tig 'phreng ba da dung
rgyun dang// gdu bu dang na sor gdub dang/ 'go pa gdang nadi bzhin ges/ so shing dang na spyi blugs dang// mchod phyir thogs dang 'dang gi khrab dang gom nyid dang ni// g.yang gzhi dang
ni'il ba dang// 'phreng ba dang ni mtshale lhan dang// 'jig rten ga sa na 'dodapa ya/ rgyan gyis gtso bo thoms cad de// lha dang mi dang de bzhin du// gzhan yang rgyan 'gyur 'di la brgyan// de
dang thams cad theb 'gyur te// a'isi pa tun du zlos byed pa'o// rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khungs dang/ rgyan dang nor bu rnams dang ni// mtshon chatshams cad du ma ni// sa ras mdun du
bzhag nas ni// dag byas cig car ba zlas khu ba// 'bum phrag brgyadakyis g.yo ba dang/ [E:]sa cad bcas te 'bar ba dang// zlos pa'og pas khyen du 'gro/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs
ldan pa/ sems can rang bzhiniyAni yang rung// rgyan dang mtsho cha yin yang rung// ngo banyid dmas rang bzhin// rang tshul spyod dam bcosal dang// 'dab chags sna tshogs tshogs kyang
bung// bzung dag 'byung po kun la grags// bcos ma'am bcos ma m+mon pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam 'du shes med// sngagaso ba mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas
bzhag dang/ rked pa sna tshogs khams las las// rang byas byed du bcug pa dang// 'gro ba'i skyes gnas dag na bsngags// sngar bstan cho ga bzhin du ni// ras gis
mdun du rnam par gzhag/ rdzas ni drug gam bdun dag gas// sngags bas reg nas bzla bar bya// bzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar te// grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// de na de la regatsam
gyis phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni lha yul pheb nas// ring du 'tsho'ang bde bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po ragi rgyal la// ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba// de lta de ltar dga' 'gyur
pa[& ]zhing// rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur// gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba// las rnams dus na yun ring ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// de nyid kyisanomyur 'grub 'gyur// gtsang zhing
rgyusems nag tsang ba dang// gtsang ba'i las rtag tu dga'// gtsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes nga// gtsang ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur// las gang byed pa de 'bras thob// mchog gis mtshog
tu 'gyur ba dang// 'bring gi las kyis 'bring du 'gyur// tha mas kyang no thamar ro// ma bsgrubs lus kyis grub par yang// cung zad tsam gyis 'bras 'byin te// bu mo'am nor mang po
dag yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur// rtag tu bzlas pa tsam gyisan// lengos spyod che zhing stobs kyang che// rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid// rtag tu bzlas pa byed par 'gyur// sngags
kyi rgyal po lan cig bzlas// de yi sdig pa rab tu 'jig/ gnyis su bzlos pa'am bdun bzlas pas// bdag nyid srung ba chen por 'gyur/ lan ngargyad de na khe zlas pa yin// grogs po tham
cad srungs bar byed// gos la lan gnyis mngon bsngags na// sngags pa dag ni rtag tu yang// nad rnams kun las shin tugrel// gson gnyis ka la bsngags nas// gas dag la
nireg byas n// lus can nad ni med par 'gyur// gdong dang mag gnyis dag la ni// 'bad pas mnopa'arab bsngagasan// khros pa rnams kyi khro ba ni// sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis
'jig/ gang yang 'byung tshogs ma rungs pa// 'tsho byed sdig pa'i las can la// sngags rgyal sum cu rab bzlas te// de dag gdong la blta ba 'am// rang lag nyid la yang dang yang//
mngon par bsngags pa byas nasan// de dag thal mo brdabs nani// sa ba' dad pa la pas mkhas/ lus can kun n grol bar 'gyur// byis pa la ni rtag bya ba// khrus dang bza' dang bcung ba
la// sngags mchod drug cu bzlas nas ni// lha yid m pa mchog byas na// sha za mamo dag ga gdon// ma rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur// sngags kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs byed cing//
rtag tu byas pa gtong bar byed// de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las// sa steng myur du rtag 'jig na// mi rnams la ni di bzhin byed// gang dga' byung po sdug sbrul ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba//
dug bcas duganamed nyid// sngags kyi chu yis 'jig par byed// gang dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang// gang dag tshor ba thams cad/sngags kyirgyal po bzlas pa
sa: myur du zhi bar rab tu 'gro// rnam pa sna tshogs gdon sdug bsngal// mang po'atshab 'go ba'i nad// sngags kyi rgyal po drug brgya bzlas// myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur// sbyin
srog las ni phyob la// 'o dang lags thams cad bsres/ tshul sngon po'i dri bzang ni// rtsa brgyad stong gis rgyas pa bya// zhazhing 'byung po rnams song nas// 'gro ba rnams ni bde gnas
thob// de ltar rnam pa du man// mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung// sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na// myur du thams cad byed par gyur// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed pa ni// dgra rnams /
ni khrib sal// sngagasa'adodono dar ldan gyur pa// chog mang po rgya tsheg/ de dag cho ga mthong bas// de dag 'daren grub pa yin// 'diren sngags rnams zlos byed pa// phan tshugs
las kyang don yod 'gyur/ thams cad las kyang bzlas pa yis// myur du don nas rtag tu byed// 'byung po rnams ni debang byed 'dod// dusagasum du na bzlas pa yin// rtag tu sna//
ma'i mi tog gis// spyi galas kyang bya ba yi// tsan dan dkar dang ga bur dang// gur kum gyis kyang bya ba yin// bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing// rtag tu 'bras bcas byed
par 'gyur// rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg bya// yid la 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed// ga pur la sogs ldan pa yis// rtag tu sbyin sreg rab tu brtag/ ji ltar 'ded par yengs brtags pa'i/
rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga sgrub// za ma lasan tha ma dang// chen polas ni chen po 'byung// bar ma bar ma'i las dag las// rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin// de bas las rnams kun la ni//
khyab par dun sbyin sreg bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen bo shinatu rgyas pa'i mdalas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtse ba'i rtog lasale'u bcu bzhi pa 'khel las sgyur
ba'i res ris kyi tshig dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byam rdzogs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po lcagan rdo rje'akher gyi nang der 'dusashing 'khod
par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las 'das nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das legs so legs so// legs par rab tu bstan pa dang// mchog tu legs par gsungs pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba chos chen po'i sprone las nges par byung ba//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ rig pa chenapo'iskyel bo 'khor los sgyur ba/ cho ga chen po rgya che ba/ don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub
par byed nga/ byang chub kyalam bla na med pa bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang/ bzlas pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ rig pa dang/ spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi
lam 'bras bu bstan pa'alas kyi rkyen/ baspyod pa'i rgyu dang mtshanam/ rmad du byung ba'i stobs bcu/ gnod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ byang chub kyi snying pa gdonapar byed cing nges par pha
rol tu 'gro bar byed pa de bcom ldan 'das de lags so// sngags sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su mthunapa'i rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshanam de ston pas bshad du gsol// gang gis rig pa
thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshanama'i las rtsom par byed bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i roge pa thams cad kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o// de skad ces
klu gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye ba med
la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ sku ba'i tshogs chen po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyi'i legs
so legs so// de legs par rab tu nyon la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyed la bshad de// dang po ra nagi las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gan sa su song ste/ ri bo'i rtse 'am/ chu bo'i
'gram mam/ bug gnang ngam/ gtsang pa'i phyogs su ma'i spyil bo byas la/ de nyid kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin du nas ras gzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la/ las thams cad la'ang/
yar 'i zla ba phyed dam/ rdzo'aphrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mtshanama'i thun dang po la tsan dan dkar po dang/ gur kum dang/ ga pur gcig tu byas la/ tsan dan gyi

shari gas lo rab tu spar zhing/ ras ras kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshod tsam gyi mi thab la du ba dang sol ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// denas yang sbyin sreg gi
mthar pad+ma'i me tog tsan dan dkar po'i chus bsang gter byas pa'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang po'i gdan dang/ gdong bkab la rang gi lha la rang gi sngags

kyis spyan drang bar bya zhinge sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o// namasarba buts+tshanaM a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnaM/ tapya// o ku mAr rU pa Nidarayu dmu ya/At+tano/ b+hu ma chud b+hu ba swapa ni ma na be da ya wa
glu taMhu hUM hUMphaT phaT spahA/ sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas shing sbyinesrog gi las thams cad la las bya'o// de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyisakaphyi lo du bstan ti bting la ku sha' khris kyi sngasabyas
taM rnamagashar phyogs su bstan la saras kyi mdun nas ha cang yang ma 'onge ha cang yang mi nya par nya bar byago/ thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'a rnams la phyag byas nas sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la/ de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid

kyi dengang du 'gro bar bya'o// dang po'i chunagyi rmi lam gang// bad kan las byung shes par bya// gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste// 'jig rten la yod snyad pa yani// gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya//
bzhi ba bden par 'byung ba yin// bdakAn rmi lam dang po ni// 'di 'dri rtag tu mthong ba yin// nor bu shel gyi khang pa ni// kun nas mu tig 'phreng ba can// am pa'i shing tshogs pa mang
bo lta bdag nyid tshunang 'bying bar mthong// kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang// rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang// gang du bdag galus gnas pa// de nyid du ni mthong bar byed// gdadu phyogs
@#/ der rdzong dag gsi// kun nas yongs su khyab pa dang// spudang chu ni 'thung ba dang// gtung ba'i khang pa khang pa dang// kun nas yongs su 'khor ba ni// chu chen gyis 'khyer bar mthong// kha ba
nyan byas pa/can na byas pa dang// chu bo chen por shel gnas pa// shang dang ra yi rgyal po dang// shel gyi sa yongs su bcings pa dang// mu tig dra bas legs g.yogs dang// mu tig phung po byed
rtsa gnas ga/ ba dang// char chen 'bab pa chu la tshogs// mthong na bad kan las gyur yin// gdugs na dkar po dag dang ni// rgyan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang// ba glangadagan dekar po'agazugs//
00 bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod// rnga ma dkar ram skyes bu 'am// yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am// lan tshwa la sogs reg ba// kun tugasal te mthongab ni// sa bal btso ma'i gos dag
gam! ra gan dngul dang a ka ru// reg dang za bar byed pa nyid// bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dodo// mon sun gre 'u za ba dang// til btags bu ram 'bras chan dang// mon phran rnam
mang zla ba ni// bad kan rmi lam da ga tu 'dod// sAste ga dang u le ba// kr-i sar dang 'o thug dang// de dag za byed rmi lam// bad kan rmi lam bya ba yin// 'breng bu sa bcud bza' ba
sogs// rnam pa sna tshogs snum 'khur na/regadang za bar byed pa nyidi// bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin// snyam 'khur rnam pa du mnA/ bza' dang spyad nga ra rjes 'ded dang/ khris
dang reg par byed de dag/ bad kan rmi lam shes par bya// gnas dang gnas mal theg pa dang// bzhon pa sems can las byung ba/ dareg dang 'dzeg par byed pa nyid// dang po'i thun
la mthong ba nyid// gal te rmi lam snang gyur na// thams cad bad kan can du brjod// rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang// chu la 'byung dang spyod pa dang// rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod//
mthongan bad kan can du brjod// de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong// bad kan can gyi spyod nga lani/ rmi lam ma lus dum ni// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin// gnyis nga 'i phunal
lus canagi/ rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin// 'bar ba'am yi gzugs mthong dang// sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang// mes 'tshig skar mda' ltung ba dang// ri
la dang phyogs na reb 'bar ba/ skye gang gis rab mthong ba// danamakhris par gyur pa yi// rin chen pad rag dung// gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa// gang du rmi lam mngon ni// lus
sgra canamakhris pa lasagyur yin// mi drang tshab ston pa dang// reg dang za bar byed pa dang// rnam pa sna tshogs ka ga ser/ rtsi'am mkhris pas brgyal ba yin// rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang/
nyi ma rtag tu 'ong ba ni/ gang gis lam mamang gyuran// lus namakhris pa las gyur yin/ nam mkha' gsar gyi mdog gyur dang// sa yi steng na kha dog ser// rmilamanan gang gis
k+Sha mthog/ mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin// men kun nas 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i sunar ba gsal khar// rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni// mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yani// sa
dang de bzhin ra ba dang// gnamathon po'ang gser gyi mdog/ shing chenade bzhin theg bani/ rtag tu thams cad ba sa'i rang ba ni// rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na// mkhris pa
las gyur rmilam ni// thig pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang// snoda rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang// stan rnams dang na gnas mal rnams // sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la// reg dang 'gro/
par byed pa de// rmi lamamathong na mkhris gyur min// 'phrad ba ser bo thogs pa dang// ser po'igs kyis nyer mdzes dang// kher po'i 'od dang nga yis byugs/ ser po'i mchod phyir
thogos pa dwang// bdag nyid ser po rnam pa dang// gang gis rmi lam la mthong ba// gnyis pa'i chen du mthonganan// ma dris pas las gyur shes par bya// de bzhini rnam pa sna tshogs pa//
gang gzhan rmi lam dag tu bad// snapa sna tshogs ser por snang// rmilam mkhris las mang dag byug/ mkhris pas lus can rab gnon ba// gnyis pa'i tshun la bstan pa yin/ rnam pa
du ma'i gzugs canan// sor por snang ba yang dag 'byung// 'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni// rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung/ gang yang rlung byung rmi lam na// gsum pa'i
thun du bstan pa yin// khor yug tu na'od 'phro ba// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu snang/namamakha' lana'agro ba dang// nam mkha'i dkyil du thad drung 'gro// bar snang nam mkha'i dkyil du ni/
kun nas 'kher pa rtag tu 'gro// chung byung rmi lam zhes bstan pa// 'di lta bu la bya ba ni// brdul dang mchong dang de bzhin du// shing rnams la ni mngon par 'dzeg/ bstan bcos ma lus
danob dang// khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang// bshad dang rjod par byed pa yang// phal cher yang narlung las gyur// shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang/ kha ba dag kyang za ba dang//
na/ @#// bza' ba na lus tshad dang sgyur// zos pa rlung las gyur pa yin// gtsor yang rlung ni yang dag 'byung// shing thog rlung na re ba skyed pa// de dag za bar rmi lam mthong//
la rlung las byung ba yang dag bstan// dngos rnams rlungan skyod pa yin// bza' dang bca' ba khyad par ldan// de bzhin skye bo so mas 'khrugs dang// rig par byed dang sna bar byed// 'khyud
po rnams ni gir khyed dang// bdag nyid dang ni gar byed ba// gang gis rmi lam mthong nani// de'adra rlung nad can du shes// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug
dang sna/ rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad gzugs// rmi lam rlung nad can gyis mthong// de la sogs pa'i rmi lam na// 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ rnam gsum sbyor/
b.rab ldan pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug yin// chags can bad kan can zhes bya// zhe sdang las byung mkhris pa can// rmongs pa rlung las gyur pa yin// 'dres pa'am rnamaM
par 'dres pa'o// grong gi chosanamathong ba las/ rmi lam chags pas sa bon 'byung// der ni bud med la chags pa// bad kan las byung rmi lam yin// rtsod bcas ngang tshul zhe sdang
can// mkhris pa las byung rmi lam yin// ma rig las byung rmongs pa rnams // dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin// rnam 'dren rnam par 'dres pa ni// rmi lam na ni rtag tu mthong//
de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis// rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs// bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid// de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin// sems can bad kan can gsungs pa// mdog ldan
snyan par smra ba dang// tshering yid na gzhungs pa dang// kha dog snuma'adi 'jigs pa med/ drang tshod rang zhing dkar ba dang// budamed la phrad rtag tu dga'// chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba/
dang ba tung ba mang la rtag tu dga'// rgyal rigs su ni bstan pa yin// ser sna ldan zhing mtshon pa med// de bzhinis yi bdag po dang// dmag dpon don du gnas pa ste// lod/
spyod chen po skyo 'gyur zhing// rang gi lus kyis nye bar 'tsho// rang gi las 'bras bstan pa// las kyi sngags ni stong ba mne/ las min sngags ni gtso bo zhes// rnam par
'dren pas gsungs pa yin// de bas sems can bad kan na// sa steng grub pa khyedang na// sa bdag 'dod pa byed pa las// de la grub pa thob par 'gyur// zlos pas bad kan
can gyi zas// ma lus bstan par mi bya'o// gang phyir shin tubastan gyur na// rmi lam don gyis stong 'gyur bas// grub pa'i don du ma brjod pas// sngags pas de tshe de me bstan
mkhas pa rig pa ldan pa yis// de yi dus su gnyid log min/ mkhris pa can gyi sems can gyis// rtag tu spyod po brjod par bya// zhe sdang gis ni rnam 'khrugasan// la
dego nag dang stobs chung dang/ (drag pa drug pa'alas dang ni// rtag tu yon bor byed pa mne/ dpa' dang bab col rtag tu byed// stobs dang blo dang ldan pa dang//
ba mang du sna zhing grogs po mang// bstan bcos ting 'dzin mang po rtogs// chos ldan las kyi mtha' brtan zhing// zhe sdang slong ba rjod par byed// yid ldan dgran mang ba dang// zhe sdang
zlo mtshonabaskye bar 'gyur// nor mang dpa' ba la sdang dang// 'jig rten shes shing mthong na dga'// nges grol chags pa med pa dang// brtan zhing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod// nga rgyal
phrag dogo ma rungs pa// bud med rnams la dga' bar byed// sngo cha brtan dang blonapo dang// longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur// shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i sems can
tshe zer gyis mnan nas spyor// sngagasan srog la gnod byed pa// de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur// mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don// myur du sgrub par byed pa yin// sems can gnod
phyir byed pa'i las// lus can de la grub par 'gyur// cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang// sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar nas// spyod po des ni 'grub 'gyur te// gzhan las
la sems can de las min// sngags pa zhe sdang can dag la// sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang// de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa// sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur// gzhan gyi
rdzas ni 'phrog 'ded dang// gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la// khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te// sngags gzhan dag la sbyar ma bya/ zhe sdang ragis kyisams can 'di// bdag po nyid kyang byed bar
'gyur// mdog nag pa'am sngo bsangs sam// dkar ba'am yan 'dres ba yini/ mi no ldan gser gyi ma dego/ rnam pa sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur// min rnyeb mdog duba'i mdog/
sor skya'i mdogog tu'ang skye ba yin// dpa' dang de bzhin drag pa dang// chags ldan sdig pa'i khyim las skyes// gza' ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas// bad kan can la phur bu'i bdag/

skye 'gyur chung du za ba dang// tshadang skur ba'i ro snyan cing// de yi tsho ni rong 'gyur zhing// dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur// spyod pa dang narjes spyod pa// rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya//
mdegomi sdug dang rtsub mdego dang/ bong tshod med cing shin tu rdzud// blonyams shes rab med pa dang// mi brtan gnas pa mod pa dang// lus ni 'gul dang 'khor ba dang// skyug rtser
bshang gci mang du 'byung// mang du za zhing rtag par za// do dag gang phyir nad mang 'gyur// 'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing// dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur// de ni sa stong/
'di dag tu// tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te// mi snang ba yi sngags dgan/[u0f38]de la 'grub par bstan pa yin// gang zhig rlung nad la zug byed pa 'di/ zas la de na dga' bar
'gyur// zlos pa lasanagrub 'dod pas// de ni yongs su bstan mi bya// sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la// gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang// rmongs pa'i rigs can
la gsungs pa// rmongs pa'i sngags rab sgrub pa/ rtag tu dedag rmongs pa la// rmongs pa dgun grub par 'dod// rgyu skar khyiman chu skyes dang// gza'an bdag po smin par blta//
rlungand skyes pa'i sems can ni// dge ba'i las la mi spyod de// 'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed// de bzhinirmongs dang rengs pa'o// rlung nad can gyi sems can la// gti mug
cand sdig par byed// rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni// mtshan nyid 'di deg gsud pa ni// sems can rnams kyadon sgrub pa// thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o// lug glang dang ni
de bzhin gzhudang chu srin dang/ bum pa nyadang glang bo dang// lha dang spre'u lha ma yin// grub dang dri za gnod sbyin
sogs// mi rnams gang gis rab bsgrags pa// sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po// gang zagamchog gis gsungs pa yane// rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don// rnam pa sna tshogs las
ban ga/ dedag las ni thams cad l// yon tanargyan smin par 'gyur// las las gol ba med par n// lus can yin tan mi smin te// yon tan khen las ldan pas// skye bar

0 gang na byed ba ni// yon tan chos don ldan pan// sngags la 'grub par skye bar 'gyur// zlos pa sems can yon tanashes// yon tan yon tan min las 'ching// yon tan med la bya min gang// de yi lasan bya ba med/
gang phyir bya ba las byed de/ byab yon tan med pa yin// bya ba las dang yon tan nyid// yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur// tshog sngon 'gro bya ba'alas/ stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to//
rdzas dang sems caspyod pa gzhan/ bya ba lasadang yon tan yin// rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul/ las las 'byung bar snang ba yin// de bas rmi lam mtshan ma yis// rgya chenalasal
rab sbyar bya// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang// yide'ang bstan sdug pa dang// bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs mid pa// rmilamargyur na snang ba yin// mthu che spro ba che ba ni// mini
grub pa 'ded pa yin// mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni// de dag la ni grub par brtag/ drag cing las rnams ma rungs// rmi lam rtag tu 'phral du mne// bzang po bstan pa las dag ni//
yunarangs su grub phyir ro// 'jige na'ajig rten 'das rnams kyi/ yon tan skyed par yang dag 'byung/ rmi lam rnam bsna tshogs snang// zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/
mi 'grub don du sngags rnamasan// gtid dang snyoms pa rab tu brtag/ bgegs 'joms byed pa'i sngags rnams ni// de yi dus su rab tu brtag/ de tshe sngagasan riges tshul/
gyis// zlos pas de tsho rab tu sbyar// khro ba chen po phyag drug dang// zhang drug nyid du brtag par bya// sdugs chen yi ge bzhi pa ni/ dwa gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas/
pa yin// drag po'i gzugasan gzugs chen po// phag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung// bgegs kun rnam par gzhag bya'i phyir// dus mtshan den lha yi rgyal// stag gi pags
pa'irisham thabs can// sbrul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang// lagin ral gra sems dpa' che// gzi brjide chen po shin rje'i gzugs// bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed//
leg 'dren rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// 'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig/ mi bzad sngags ni bshad par bya/ 'tsho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun// ma rungs sems can 'dzag par

byed snga gas rnams kun ni sgrub byed pa lha yi tshogs rnams nga la nyon// na mas man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shos nAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ hahe ma hA b+ha Sha Na mu khat+tA tsa ra na saja big+habag+ha ta
ka hU~MhU~M ki+ir yas bi nA ya ka dzA ba na kar du slab ni min sha ya/ la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT sItA/ khro ba'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang leg 'dren thams
cad 'jigs shing nyam thag nas snying gas te yi de shin tu skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la gnas
ca0 par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la ga zigs nas/ka khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
te/ kyakyalha'i tshogasan bo dag khro bo'i rgyal po 'don de jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams 'don par byed pan// gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi
gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'das ni rigs brgyud thams cad 'dul bar byed cing srog [“”]kyang 'dzin par mkhyid de/ yongs su gdung bar byed cing yongs su
sgom par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba 'jog par byed cing zlos ba dag la'ang srung pa dang/ sba ba dang/ sbad ba la gnas pa la 'jog par byed cing rjes su 'phel bar byed pa dang/ gang
zhig dmatshig 'dilas 'da' bar byed pa dang/ khro kho'iskyelapos sgrub pa po bsrung bar byas pa la rnam par mtho'atsham bar byed na mge bo ardzaka' mdog pa bzhin durnam pa bdun du 'gos par
'gyur ro// thub pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshagasungs// gzhon nu khyed kyi sngags rnams la// ma lus don ni rkyechenadono// sdugs rgyud don dang
ldan pa dang// sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du// bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi// rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin// 'jig rtenamagon gyis sngon 'di ni// de bzhin dun yang
@#// dag sbyar// ma lus bgegs rnams 'jige ba'i phyir// dgra rnams kyisan khri ba sog/ zlos pas rtag tu 'di dag ni// mtshan mo rtag tu gdan byas la// sems can
rnamasan srung don dang/ rmi lam nganab sel bar byed// sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la// 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// skyes bu'i mtshan
zlonyid bzang po ni/ gang la sngags rnams grub 'gyur ba// mchog dang tham bar ma'o/ gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang/ gser mdog gsus pa che ba dang// dkyus ring mig
dang snum pa dang// chags chung bro ba rnam par spangs/ mig rtsa dmar zhing snyan par smra// de la grub pa mchog 'gyur la// pags pa srab cing sngo bsangs mdag/ ha cang ring min yan lag phra//
blo kloba'i zhing gzi brjid che// chog shes kun nas dge ba byed// skyeganas bzung ba dag pa dang// 'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/ las rnams kun la snang ba// de la nges par 'grub
mtsha pa mchog/ yan lag thams cad ma tshang med// dur ba sngo bsangs gzi brjid che// nyon mongs med sems shes pa can// rtag tu gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod// phra ba'i gos la rtag
du dag// chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shes// grogs mong rtag tu btang ba dang// zas tshod ragi dag rtag gtsang ldan// bshes gnyen tshul khrims spyod pa dang// gtsang pa'i sbyor/
la rtag tudaga'// bden par smra zhing snying rje can// de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang// rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan// pha dang ma la gus pa dang// bram ze
lan mchod pa byed/ (shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan// de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang// rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung du smra// bkod pa'i kha zas la
dga' zhing// gtsang ba'i spyod pas mngon par 'gro// mang 'dodosams can 'jig rten shes// de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyug/ ha cang ring min khung ba 'ang min// sku ni mig
sman bzhin du nag/ mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum// gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'// dkon mchog gsum la shin tudad// de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// mchog gi las ni
rab ston cing// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shos// bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang// rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu dga'// de tshe'aji+ig rten 'das pa grub/ de la 'bras bcas
grub par 'gyur// sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che// gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che// longs spyod che zhing sngags rnams shes// sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig/ rabs
kyi mchog ni rgyal rigasasam// bram ze shes dang ldan pa dang// bud medal brten de la chags// de bzhin gsar gyi mdog dang ldan// bong tshod che zhing dkar ba dang// snan mtho zhing lag
pa re/ stodapa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang// rgyal po tshel mngon par 'dod// rgyal ba'i sras la dad pa dang// bud med men ldan lha la mchod// dkon mchog gsum
'i la gus pa dang// byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin// lhag par snying rje brtan bu dang// cung zad bre no de cung zad rmongs// longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che/ gzi brjid rmi
zhing thul bar dka'// bud med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'// de yi grub pa mchog yin no// shin tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'// rtag tu bud med la chags dang// gsur gyi mdeg
klu dang byin pa phra/ tred pa che zhing gtsang ba dang// brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa// yon tan mang 'ded 'jig rten shes// rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gusu// rgyal ba la ra srog kyang
gtog/ de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang// bso ru la yang rtag tu gtong// stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso ba dang// rigs na gzhas pa bzang po yin// yan lag thams cad
ma tshang med// ma rungs rtag tu bab la byed// gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las rgyal// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed// ha cang sbom min rdzud pa'ang min// ha cang ring
min thung ba'ang min// bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te// de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur// son mo zangs mdeg logs snum dang// lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang// rkang/
[p4]pa'i mtha' dmar snum pa dang// 'khor lo hAn+ti kas brgyan dang// rgyal mtshan rta babasanya dang ni// ba dan pad+ma thob dang// mi gang rkang pa la ba pa la// mtshan ni 'di dag yod
gyur pa// de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la// grub pa mchog tu brtag par bya// mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang// mtho ba'i'i bdang 'dra dang// snabazong mtho zhing mig dkyus
ring/ smin ma stug cing ko sko bzang// ba yi rdzi ma 'jig rten mno// nag pa'i lta ba'i mig 'bras mtshan// dpral pa'i dbyis gang rgya che zhing// mgo 'i gdugs 'dra'i
rnam pa bzang// mogo ba gtsug tor 'dra ba dang/ rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin// rtag tu seng ga'i 'gram 'dradang// ma mchu bam pa smin 'dra'i mdog/ gang gi lcanarab snang ba//
pad+ma 'da' ma dma' 'dra'i mdog/ mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang// thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags// mchan khung thong ka bzang bo mchog/ de bzhin btsani rgya che dang//
lte ba'i phyogs kyang chung ba dang// rked pa rgya mo bzang ba dang// lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil// kun nas dkar med ba spu dang/ de lag rang lag na ri ba dang// rked ba seng
ge 'dra ba'i mtshan// gang gi brnyan zlum pa dang// gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang/ dbyin pa er+ya ya lta bu r/ zlum pa'i nang na zlum par grags// rkang pa sha dang ldan pa dang//
sor mo rnams kyis rang ba yin// dmar zhing sen dmar snam pa dang// sha rgyas pas na snyam pa yin// nang stong ma yinamathil mnyam gnas// dge zhing mthong na dga'/
ba dang// 'jam zhing kha dog drug pa dang// rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang// de dag gi ni steng ngag tu// rtswa yi dra ba mngon pa med// bshang ba 'byung ba'i lam dag tu// ra mi zab
cing g.yas su 'khyil// mtshig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung// rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin// ma 'brel dum bu ma yin dang// gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin// gang tshe skyes dbang
gtsang ba dang// rtse mo danar la yang dag gnas// skya nga nyal khar kha zasani// ra ni rtsa ba byed pa lnga// bshang ba kha dog sngo ba 'am// gal te dmar por rab snang zhing// mang po ma yin snum
pa dang// dge ba'i mtshan gyis rab mtshan pa// de lta'i sems can gang yin pa// grub pa mchog tu 'ded pa yin// lan gsum bshang zhing sdigs drug dran// gtsang sna'i phyed dka'
yongs su gtsang// gang zhig thunan rma khar nyal// tho rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams // da pa grub pa rtag tu mchog/ las kun byed par snang ba yi// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang//
phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la// mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang// mtshan nyid kyis ni ston mtshan pa// rgyu skar dag la'ang byas pa ni// rgyal dang nam gru ge dpe dang/ mchu dang lhu
0 mtshams dag dang ni// nag pa snar ma smin drug dang// nus pa'i ga za'i rnam sa kyis mtshan pa// de dag la ni skyos mkhong dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char kan// tshor ngag dus su/
gang skyes dang// gang tshade yi dus su skyes// de la grub par rab tu snang/ nyin phyed dang ni rangs dang// nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po// dkar ba zlag wasangs// ser
ba gza' lhag khur bu yin// skye ba rnams kyis mtheng+ganani// 'bras bu grub phyir nus pa yin// min gang zhig dag las kyang// 'di skyes par gyur pa yi// sngags don ma lus
grub pa la/ de dag 'bad med 'grub par 'gyur/ nyi ma phyed na 'das pa dang// rtag tu nyim nub pa dang// lus can rnams kyis rtag de la// ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa/
ma'us nyi ma mig dmar dang// mjug 'a ngas sgra can sbyin pa dang// gang yang gza' nagatso bo dang// las ni sa 'dzoms skar mda' can// skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid// de
bzhin nag bo'achi ltas dang dus min 'chi ba sa la ni// mi bzad de tshe snang ba yin// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni// gza' lhag gnas rnamasamathong/ gnya'angashing gang
tsam tims phyin// phur bus sa de mthong bar 'gyur// de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam// pasangasanor gyis de mthong// nyin phyed na yongs rdzogs na// zlubs lus can ma/
sha/ lus mthong// gzu' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob// phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed// pa sangs nor ni nges grub dang// rgyal srid tshe dang longs stod ldan//
zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing// dbang phyug dang na 'bras bu bcas// de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni// nyin phyed du mnyam par mthong// rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na// khrims phyog namathong
zla/ bar byed/ chung gyur nyi ma gnya'ashing tsam// byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni// sgra gcan sngon pa nyid dag yin// mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed// de nas phar na thungs pa na// 'di
zla ltas skar mda' sa 'gul byed// li khri tshogs kyis mdeg bsgyur ba'i// nyi ma nub kar zangs ma'i mdog/ gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de// byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing// lagan/
mdung thogasamasungs pa// mag dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin// de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das// dge ba'i goza' ni 'byung ba yin// nyi mas mthong ba las skyes nga// ma rungs bang
tsal byed bar 'gyur// sngon pa mgadamar las skyes pa// khre ldan brkam zhing nga rgyal can// mjug rings 'chi ltas dud rnams la// skyes pa nad ni yang dag 'byung// dbul zhing nad/
btab glen pa dang// de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs// dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang// skar mda' can dang gza' ngan dang// 'gul byed sgra drag dmar ba'i mdego/ gnam lcags nyid kyang
[/]rab rdung byed// de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang// gzhan yang khyim srogs rab tu mthong// skye ba kun gyis sgra gcad na// mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na// dbulazhing mgon med tshul khrims
'chalo/ mno rtag tu sdig pa spyod// me ni sdug bsngal skyod 'gyur te// nad kyi gzhin skyo bar 'gyur// mdze can nad namang ba dang// long ba'atheng pashu bar bcas// tha ma ma ning mogasham
dang/ bud med mtshan nangan po dang// skyes bu bud med de bzhin gzhan/ dgaza' ni ngon pa mthong ba yin// de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dag/ 'jig rten mang po skye ba yin// dkar dang ser
ba'i gza' mchog na// de dag las skyes dge ba yin// ma dag ni dkar dang ser ba dag/ rgyal bas rab tu bsngags pas gsungs// gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa// pa sangs zla
ba bla ma lhag/ zlos pa las rnams kun la ni// de dag mthengan grub pa'i don// sems can byis pa rnamasal yang// rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang// len kun la'ang 'dod pa zhes
'jig rten mchog gses gsungs pa yin// skad cig tsam yang de bzhin du// mig 'byed mig 'dzumasaa la gtog/ 'di ni mdor bsdus skya ba zhes// 'jig rten mchog gis gsud+ma
pa yin// 'ditsam gyi na tshodadag tu// gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin// de dag de bzhin rtag tu 'char// 'di dag dusakyi de nyid yin// 'di dag dge dang sdig pa'i
sha/ gzag/ 'khor la bzhin du rtag tu 'khor// 'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed// de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin// des na de dag gang cung zad// sdig pa'i
gang skye bar 'gyur/ sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras// mang po yang na skyo bar 'gyur// gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes// des na 'di na mthong zhes gsungs// myur ldan
sgyur bcas 'ong 'gyur zhing// myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin// mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i// sa gol gag pa'i myur 'gros yin// 'di tsam gyi na tshod dag tu// bumatshes/
rnams kyis bstan pa yin// donos gzhanayang ra ba bshadapa// nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya// yud tsam dag ni bcu gnyis dang// dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu// grub pa'irgyu'am
ma gnob// 'gro min pa yang bshad par bya// 'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang// ra dang char min yang dang yang// yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang// le legs nyi ma gsal mthongag/
dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu// skye pa rnams la rtag zhi byed// mjug ranges sa 'gulanam gru dang// skar mda' da ni lho bur dang// rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi// spyod/
pa dag dang mi dge ba// 'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni// dge dang mi dge'i spyod ba yin// sha zadang ni ma mo dang// drag po ma rungs nyera'ajoms byed// sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni[“ ]/de
[bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod// gang du lha la rab dad dang// rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang// dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan// byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang// legs par spyod
pa'idon ldan blo// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag la sems// sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs// sman gyi don du kho zas spyod// gang du mtshan nyid la banapas// spyod pa rgya cher bstan
pa yin// gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni// mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin// lhanI mchod pa zhes bshad de// lha min nga rgyal can gyirgyus// gnas der gnas pa'ong rnam pa gnyis//
rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin// de yang der ni rnam gnyis te// grags pa dang ni thun mong yin// de yang der ni rnam gnyis 'gro// dge dang mi dag 'gro ba lnga// der gnas rnam gsum
'gro ba ste// ti shu sum cu grangs med pa'o// lha dbang dang 'og min bar// garamis ji bzhin sa med pa'o// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa// dge dang mi dge'i 'jig rten
yin[}]'khor spyod sems can ji snyad dang// 'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// de yi thugs las skyes sras dang// byang chub i
sems dpa' sems chen po// sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// sems can skye gnas yang dag rten// byas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi// 'gro/
ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang// rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang// tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang// rgyarer rab tu bshad par bya//
