sngags dang rgyud na rig bcas pas// 'byung po kun n dgug par bya// dbab dang dgugapa'i sngags shes pas// gzhan gyi lus la yang dag rten// dge dang mi dge'i las shes shing//
bag yod rigs ni bzang ba dang// mi blun spyod pa'isoms can dang// tshar gcad rjes ga zung spyod pa dung// 'jig rten sa ste 'gugs byed pa// mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag/ de dag
grub pa'i mtshan mni// de nyid thams cad bshod par bya// mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus na// dodag gi ni lus bzung nas// rtag tu shin tu chos don dang// thar pa'i den du rnam par brtag/
ma rungs rnams ni tsher gcad dang// rnam dag rnams ni mchod pa ste// tshar gcad rjes gzung nyid la// sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag/ rlung dang bad kan mkhris canan/ ]rnam gsum dag
la spyod pa'ang gsum/ de dag zhi bar rab brtag la// rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod// mi rnams kyi ni gsol ba la// sdugs dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya// 'byung ba chen por rnam brtags
pa 'byung dang 'byung min la sogs shes// 'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang// lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod// skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin// de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur// 'byung
dang 'byung min rnam pa ni// rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag/ rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che// sems can ma yin rab tu brtag/ mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung// gang gzhan rnam pa
tshogs byos// 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni// lnga pa dgan nam mkha' brjod// chu dang me dang ldan pa dang// sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang// sems can min
pa'i grangs su bstan// 'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang// 'od chen ldan pas gsungs pa yin// sems can ma yini grangs su bstan// sems can grangs 'gro mi ma yin// blomchog
smra ba dam pa yis// mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs// mi ma yin dang me dag kyang// rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do// sams can rnams la dge don du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
gsung yang yin// 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang// de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis// drug pa'i las kyi las 'byung phyir// las 'du dgan yongs su gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams /
kyis gsung dag pa// las ni don mad mi byed de// de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang// grub pa nyid du rab snang ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i me shes dang// bde zhing na la rtag tugatsang//
mthar thug bdag dang bdag med dang// den dam thar par 'dod pa bstan// de nyide chos ni btsal bya'i phyir// rgyu 'di yongs su bshad pa yin// rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po/ bka'
ni yang dag gsungs pa yin// byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gi/ bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags dang// 'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med// rtag
tun dang shes pa'i gnas// 'dani thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung// de yi gi 'phang mchog gnas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung// ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yine//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang// sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga la// grub pa kun gyi bstan pa yani// des na 'di nyid thub dbang gas// cho ga'i rgyal
por gsungs pa yin// lus can rnams sngags tshul gyi// 'di nyid kyi nolam gyis 'gro// zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs// mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur// mya ngan med dang
rdul med dang// rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes// gang 'di bstan pa dag la na// sngags kun 'don par byed pa na// kun mkhyen shis dang shes bya yin// las kyi rgyud ni 'brel ba
dang sngags zlos pa ya tshad du ni// rgyu rnams mtha' dgas stang gsungs// sngags rgyud ma lus don dgan// byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yashes
dag tshoga'adare rab tu bstan// sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten kun la rab tubaskor// gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod// thub
mchog thub pa'i sras dag gis// gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa// sngags rnams thams cad 'di la yod// des na chog rgya chen yin// de nyid phyir na thung dbang gis// lus can kun l/
gsungs pa ni// gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis// dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa// sa steng 'jig rten gsum 'dan// rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min// thub pa'i zla ba rab nub/
cing/ sa yi dkyil 'khor ston pa na// cho ga 'jig rten 'di gnas pa// bstan pa'i donan byed par 'gyur// 'jam pa'i debyang sani rtag tu dag/ 'byung po kun la gzhon nu na/de tshe
sangs rgyas mdzad pan// 'jig rted bstan la byed par 'gyur// cho ga'i rgyal po'i mthu la ni// yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams // lan cig thos kyang grol 'gyur te// rtag tu de la
grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni// rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur// sngags rnams kun la bsngags pa na// bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag 'ded pa'o// dus gsum dag
tu shes bya la/ mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa// de bzhin 'dal 'jug byed pa// cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa// sngagasasu rab gnas/
de 'dir gsungs// sngags de rnam par mi rtog par// cho ga de 'dir gsungs pa yin// don dang don min sems can gyi// dge dang mi dge byed par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro baTe
bzhin du// 'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ de nyid cho ga 'dir spos pa// de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med// 'jig rten 'dus pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten
phyir ni 'di gsungs so// las rnams kun las shAni du lhag/ 'jig rten las las rab tu 'das// chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed// 'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags//
sngogs rgyal la sa lu brtson bar byed// de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan// gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni// sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// de don yon tan nges grub
dang// 'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ bag med mi bskul ma yin te// bskul nas ngas chos bshad do// sems canam lus phan nyid phyir// sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yin/
'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang// bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir// bdag gis kyang n bshad pa lani// sngags pa'i las rnams kun
lan[}]kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o// kun mkhyen ye shes rab 'jug la// 'a sa rnam sa gcig tu bsngags pa yin// 'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te// de ni de ltar
su da// de bas las rnams rab tu bya// tshe 'dir dka' ba legs spyad cing// las ldan tshe na'idal yang// 'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub// lasan 'dala'ang
snad gyur na// skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur// de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ las de tsho gar ldan pa ni// den 'a da la myur du 'grub/
sems can byis pa rog nyams// rab tu rmos pa'akhor bar 'gyur// de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni// las ni gcig pu rab bsngags yin// cho ga lasan yang dag ldan/ (sgrub pa bos
ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las// shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub// bsam gtan med par thar pa med// thar ba med par bsam gtan med// de bas
bsam gtan thar pa ni// yang dag ldan ba byang chub brjod/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa' mdelas/
las thamasacad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'khyam btsa lnga pa rdzogasaso/// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs/
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi den thams cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'bam/
'khor gyi dkyil 'khoragyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no// sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi// rmi lam dgadang ma dag yin// des nazhar la 'dakyen ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa
yin// gnod sbyin bdag po yide dga' nas// thal star bar byas nas ni/ ston la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas// de tshe tshegan 'od skad zhus// 'jig rten rjes su/
ba gzung don du// blo mchog rnams kyas gsungs pa dang// bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse dang// se mas can rnams ni bde don du// zlos pa'i sngagasan thams cad la// rmi lam dge dang mi dang
dang/ rtasams can mchog dang tha ma yi// spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher bstan// bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang// rgyudang thos pa'i rnam pa spyod 'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang//
dge dang mi dge daltar gyis/ thams cad kun 'gra'ongashes pa dang/ kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang// snang med dmigs pa med pa dang// smyos mad rab tu spros pa yin/ rnam pa kun
martog ldan pa dang// shis ba zhi bu bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi ma bu rnams ni// blomchog gis ni bstan pa yin// khyad par du ni zlos pa la// sngags rnams don dang ldan par
bshad// las dang las 'bras sems can gyi// bya ba dus dang de bzhin du// de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni// cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs// gnod sbyin bdag ngos thub mchog
ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa la// gang zhig bskal bzang sangs rgyas pa// shAkya'i skyas mchog bdun pan// shAkya'i sangage dgra las rgyal// 'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags
dus kyi tha mar rdzogasasangs rgyas// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che// thub pa mthun chen po theb// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag/ byang chub sems
dwapas phyag byas te// rang gi gnas su 'dug gyur nas// blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che// de tshe thub pas dris pa ni// gos sangs rgyus la bskul ba
ni// thub mchog dam pa tha ma la// legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas// btsas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste// dge dang mi dge legs tshulaM
bshad// las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i// sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs// mchog dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang// dgeba'adzin dang ldan pa dang// zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan
ma dang// bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags// 'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du// 'jig rten dbang phyug longos spyod 'dod// rgyal bo khyad par can 'dod dang// rig pa 'dzin pa
grub 'dod dang// thams cad kun 'gre yi shes kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol// rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas// thubapa mchog gis gsungs pa ni// blo
ldan ka la bing ka'i skad// lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni// brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra// 'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis// thub pa bdun pa'i tshigs bcad nas// sangs rgyas gsung
ni dag pas gsungs// gzhon nu 'din dngos den khyab gyur cing// ma byung 'jig rten phan pa sgrub byed la// bge ba kun la phan pa bde phyir ston// thar pa shes
nga dag pa'i gnas su 'dug/ bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang// gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'// de dag rtag 'grub pa thob par byed// kye ma gzhan la'ang
grub pa yod ma yin// rtag tu sngags mchog lan dga' dad dam// bstan dang 'khor la 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang/ de nabadud 'dul tshes kyi 'kher le bskol/ 'khor lo 'dzin/
par 'dir ni'igs ba yin// gang gi gsung ni bzang po 'di 'ong zhing// rtag tu byis pa'i skye ba rnam grangs yin// yid 'ong bzang po rnar na snyan pa dang// dga' skyong snyan pa dang/
ni rjes su mthun// sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin// 'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas yong dug gsungs// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad pan gyis// gang gi ma
ni mkhyen par mi spyod de/ de dag gi sras de bzhin ser zhugs pa// 'dzagi rten 'das pa de bzhini bcu yi grangs// khyod kyang lha yi dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis// thub/
bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no// gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang// 'dod ldan lha dang ma ni yid las skyes/ tsArnal 'byor grub ba thob dang 'jig rten
0 na// khyad par can kun de bzhin ma yi gtso// de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur cig/sems can gang de yod bam yin te/ khyod kyi che ba 'don yongs shes pa// 'jam zhes bya bar rab shes
sangs rgyas yin// 'jam dpal zhesakhur yongs su btags pa ni// khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad// khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar btags byas pa// 'as dwangamakhyon da ltar
sangs rgyas kyis// gzhan du ma yongs rtse gcig yid dag pas// khyod kyi mingana'akhor kyi nang du thos// des 'di la shas dang zhi ba thog/ srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par theg/
sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur ba dang// 'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog na reb theb cing/ rtag tu tshes mchogalani yang dag gnas// bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob//
'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par byed// byang chub shing dbang drung du myur bar 'gro// song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed// song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug
lta sangs rgyas byang chub 'khoralerab tu bskog/ de ltar rgyal ba'i gtsigasalen tan gsungs/ 'jam dpalazhes na khyod kyi ming dran dang// yon tan bsam mi khyabacos
rgyal bas gsungs// rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis// rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni be stan pa ni// gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis sngags rtogs pa// bskal ba grangs
med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus// 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa na// sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad// gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro// nga yi
po bstanal khyed na mi mchogabastan// dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skya ba rnams // 'dir ni ma lus mtha' dwag zhi bar 'gyur// khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur// 'phags pa 'jam
sgyu dpal gyi rtsa ba 'tshog byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mde las// tshigs su bcad pa'i le'urab 'byams bcu drug pa rdzogs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyirnam par 'phrul pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma
thag tu smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi 'deg lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas
tshal shing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' drang rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur te// bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la
yang dag par sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyi'i 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bkug nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du ma snang bar gyur te// gza' dang/ rgyu
skar dang/ skar ma thams cad kyi 'od mad par byas nas nyam thag pa dang 'jigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par gyur te/ de ltar rab tu
'dar zhing yang dang yang sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur te// denas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang/ rgya skar dang skar ma thams cad la mkhas pa rnams dang/ byis pa'i skye bo'i
blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dgakhyod cag nyon cig/ 'jig rten sna tshogasanilas nyid la sems can rnams
rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i skurang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khorazhing 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa
chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rtenarnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'brel ba las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po'am/
dbang phyug gam/ gtso bo 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni gang yang med de// las las skyes pa na ma gtogs te/ de'ang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la
ltos po yin te/ de'ang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa'o// de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rkyen pan tshun du byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni/
'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de'ang ma 'ongs pa'i dung ba gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing/ skyes nas kyang 'gro ba dang yul gzhan rgya che ba'i
rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhanan lugs las bzlog ste 'gag pa dang ye shes kyi mas bskul te/ las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par bsregs nas/
theg pa rnam gsum mnyam zhing smras pa mad par yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po na dus ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang/ dus bar ma narang rgyal

bas rulta bu rang byung gi shes rab reb tu 'byung ba dang/ cigezhon gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan thos ni dus thung ngus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o// chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur bani ma yin
byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa de dang/ ci phyu'ang 'jig rten sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dung cha byad zhig nand med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa rdul
tsha med pa las kyis 'jig rten grub pa la ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las
gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing/ las dang las ma yin pa las rnam par grol te/ spros pa med pa las nye bar gnas pa yin no// theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las//
nib gzhan yang yod min te// sngags kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags// de 'as rnam zlog rnam gsum las// rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang//
rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni// sngags rnams kun gyi bon yong yin// rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang// rgyud dag lanA reb tu snang// rnam pa gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste//
sngags rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ dus sa rgyus rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs// rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'dus// yan lags sa da nyid las// sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan/ 'jige
na skar mkhan yan lag gi/ grung pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtags// de nyid ban lag las yin te// rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug/ ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni// mu gur rnam par shes
par byed// de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes// ji ltar kha deg dkar pon// tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtag/ de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni// tha snyad
danadu rab tu brtag/ thamu da ni thams cad ltar// las ni gcig bu rab tu bsngags// las rnams ma da par ma rlon pa med// gang na'ang lus ni yo da ra yane// rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod
nga dang// skye ba dang ni rigs dang gnas/ rtag tul rten tshogs pa// las de las ni nye bar dmigs// las ni gang du'ang lus can min// nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ kun
nas skye bo rgas pan// rnam par 'gyur la sa nye bar dmigs// de bzhin lus la brten nas ni// lasan lus can dag la snang// 'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i
rtogs// skye bar yang ni'ib brjod dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs la nyebazang/ las rnams snyatshogs dag las byung// dus tshod de bzhin 'grebo dang// rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags/
sgra grub dang ma grub mtshan mnA// rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin// rgyumtshan spyod dang mtshan man// rkyen la mngon par rab tu brtag/ de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni// rkyen la
rag las bya ba yine// zlos pa'i sngags rnams rtag tu ni// grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin// 'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag/ lasan bdag gir byed pas mtshon// mi mtshon sngags/
rnams thams cad na// bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur// de bas 'di dag thams cad kyi// yan lag tu ni thub pas gsungs// sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen// byang
chub snying por ting 'dzin thob// sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na// bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu 'jige/ rmi'am ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam pa
'dzems// kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi// de thugs byang chub la zhug pa/ ma rungs bdud kyi sems kyis// bgegasachen 'jig par ga la 'gyur// de nas 'jig pa/
[6 ]chen po na// des na rgyu mtshan med par snang// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams // de la rgyu mtshan med par byung// des ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa// yun ringes dus su yongs
su bsags// de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni// de tsho bdud na bcom par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che// de ni 'od chen ldan par 'gyur// de yi sngags kyi ma
yis na// byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur// rmi lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa// sngags de 'dir na bshad par bya// gang dag sa la spyod pa ya// 'byung po' tshegs kun rab nyon
cig/ rmi lam ngan pa bzed dka' dang// ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa// rgyal bas la'i dbang po yaso/[” ]/sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs paM/ wA yAtshigs dang gza'
rnams dang// rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams nyon cig/ gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams // ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni// 'byung po rnams na thams cad kyang// zhi ba'isamasani rab
bskyed phyir// gang dag sa la spyod pa dag/ rkang med rkang mngag dag dang// rkang gnyis dang ni rkang pa'i dang// mdor na sems can thams cad na// 'gre ba dang na gnas pa yi//

'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/ na masarba bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnaM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la pra dzAl/ tib+hUti liphaT phaT swAhA/ gtsug tor
'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa// sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog/ gang zhig la sa rnams stong phrag ni// dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni// bkra shis thams cad
'dodo ba gi rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ las rnams gzhan yang byed pa// sngags rnams kun gyi
zlu bdag po yin// 'byung po kun la dbang byed ba// bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyisani// sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sel// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa

tsha/ ter zhes bya mthu ba tsho// mchu mnyam mthu nicinabo ste// brgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni// de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun// gtsug tor dbar/
por rab tu bsgrags// de ltar gras dang grangs medani// gtsug tor rgyal po dag ba yin// de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// 'phags pa'ajam

cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'atshig khyed cag thams

bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la'ang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can

'jig rten dang// rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// dus kyi tha ma'adal/ 'di dag gi nus pa yod// tshogargyala'adi bde don du// detsam shes par gsungs

sa skar ma med// lha dang lha min 'jig rten med// dang po'i dusan dus mchog yin// ming mod rages kyang yod ma yin// tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med// skyung ba mod cing sngags kyang med//
dag dang mi dga' las kyang med// 'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste// bza' dang bca' b.rakhu ba'ang med// 'di dag nad med dag blta// rtag tu sams tsan rnam ra nga nga/ de nas dus
ni 'bri ban// 'jig rten gnod min rab tu 'jug/ sngon gyi las kyis drangs nasan// de nas sa yi steng du 'gro// sa steng lta gnas gzhal med khang// lha dang lha min yang dag 'byung/

du rab tu bstan// lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na// mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur// de dag mi yi 'jig rten 'dir// skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yir// mi mayin pa 'jig
rten 'dir// phan tshun duni 'byed par 'phyur// de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang// phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu// lha dang lha min gtso bani// gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa//
detshe mi yi 'jige rten 'dir// nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yine// mjug ranges las dang skar mda' dang// gnam lcags dung ni rdo rje dang// dud pa phyogs mi mtha' dag tu//
du ba mjug ringes rab tu snang// zla ba nyi ma'i dekyil 'khor la// mun nag gis ni khebs par gnas// nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ bug pa yod par snang ba dang// de ltar
rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnam mang yang na snang 'gyuran// mu ge tshani nyams pa dang// de bzhin yul 'kher 'jig pa dang// mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang// sdom brtson 'jigos
'jigs pa chen po 'byung// 'jig rten dgan thams cad la// der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung// mchu dang tha skar dag dang ni// nab sa la nas 'gulanA// de
tshadabus kyi yul dag tu// rkun ma bab col byed par gnod// lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi// rgyal po chen po rnam par 'jig/ bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni// gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo/
gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che// de la dgos pa rab tu 'byung// nub phyogs nan gnas pa te de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur// gang yang mtha' 'khebaganas pa yi// kla kyi rku bas
ra 'tsho byed dang// de bzhin 'bages byed steng gnas dang// nang du ma yo debang phyug gnas// de yang de yi dusadrag tu// nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur// de dag la ni dgra rnams
'byung// gcige la gcig na yula'aphrog 'gyur// rgyu skur lag dang rgyal dang ni// skag dang de bzhine gre dang dab// 'di dag las 'gul na// mi bdag kun n mamathunanas//
sgyu ban tshunu gnod pa byed 'gyur ba// gsadu dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang// mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung// ma bzhi nag pa sa ra dang// de bzhin lha mtshams smon nyid la/ snod kyi
'jig rten sar gyur pa// 'di le gang tsho 'gul 'gyur na// kha ba canaganas kla klo dang// rkun ma kun nas gnas pa dang// thal yul gyi ni bdag po dang// kha sha'ilung par
gnas pa yi// der nim bdag ma lus pa// phan tshun du na ma mthunanas// thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar// 'dir na the tsam med pa yare/ rgyu skar gang yanasnabs
dang na/ rgyun stod smad gnyis ka la// sa yi steng du 'gul b.ran// 'di dag la ni rab mthong na// shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang// pon dra o dra ka ra ru// bang ka labadag
rgyal po na// 'chi bar 'di la the tsom med// gtsA'abadag po dpal dang ldan// yul 'khor gzhanagyis yongs bskor ram// 'phral lan bar gyur pa dang// la lar yang na
'dribar 'gyur// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i rigs gnas dang/ gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas// chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am// nad rnams mang pos kur non byed// gre la
khan dang ni mon gru dang// mon gre dang ni chu stod dang// de bas du na chu smad dang// gal tenam gru las skyes ba// rab tu 'gul brten phyed la// snod kyi 'jig rten yang
dag 'gal// sa rnams thams cad rab 'gul ba// ri bo dang ni gnas su khacas/ rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba// 'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung khyed na// byang phyogs kun
yul dag dang// nub phyogs lani yang dag gnas// lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang// phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i// mi mchogosan mang sbyo da pa/ phanatshun
du ni gnod pa byed// sems can rnamasan snod chen ldan// mu ges yul 'khor 'bye bar 'gyur// tho rangs sa 'gul gyur na// lus can shisadang zhi bar 'gyur//
po de las cung zadaphyi dus na// drag po'i 'gul ba rab tu skye// denas cung zad phyir 'gul na// yul ni ma ga d+har gnod dang// u0f00ga' lul du gnoda'agyur te// ma ga d+ha rgyal debanIn/
klun/ dranas cung zad nyin phyed dam// phyi dro'adus sugyurapan// gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur// sa steng malus nyid dag gi/ rab tu byung ba thamasacad la/ rtag tu nad ni
'byung ba thob// rims dang yi ge 'chus dang ga zer// de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis// nag mdun btab par gyur nasan// de nas de dag sos par 'gyur// de nas nyi ma yang 'das
nasaM sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na// rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa// bram ze rtswa des ma 'thung// nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po na// 'chibar 'gyur bar the tsom med// mdunan
'dan chos dang ldan// blon po'am nam 'bring byed pa na// gzhan yang sdomacan gco ben// sngags rgyud den la mkhas pa dang// bram ze dang ni rgyal rig dang// de bzhin dmangs
rigs rje'u gis dang// brtanab mkhas pa dag dang ni// bstan bcos de nying don lugasaldan gsod dang rab tu nyams pa 'am// dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes// sngon byung
0 ba nasaMms pa dag/ myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te// gnam lcags rdordzis shing la bzhin// de nas nyi ma nub pan// de nas yang ni song ban// phyi dro dus kyi mtha' lam// gal
des na rab tu 'gul// de bzhin sams can 'dres pa dang// dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang// mi yi 'jig rten gartse ba dag/ de tsho 'gul dang rnam par 'dzagi
la/ (gal te sa ni'agul gyuran/ sems cana'adres pa sna tshogs dang// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas rnams su// mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su// char
mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po2 3 ba dan can 'dra parnalngags dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams spyan// ma na 'jig rten gtsa rnams

nim bozad pa// nub phyogs ma yi bdag po yi// pha roladamag tshogs 'byung bar shes/na// de tshe rtags de snang gyur na// rlung dang chur pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung// de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar// 'gul snang las//thunani gnyis pa dang po la/

tshogs nad dang 'chi// kheng pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung// mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad// skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te san 'gul 'byung gyur// gzhan gyi dmag/'byung po rnamasan skyo 'gyur zhing// de tshe phyogs
dang phyogs su 'gro// de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du// sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na// rlung chen 'byung bar shes bya ste// shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur// yang klog ra ba ra rnams
kyi/ rtse mo 'jig par the tshom med// gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang// khang pa dang ni rta babs dang// dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang// sa la
myur du ltung bar 'gyur// de nas mtshan phyedadus dag tu// gal tes ni 'gul ba byung// de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag/ mi mchog gtso ba'achi ba 'am// de 'u 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/
mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston// bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas// tha mar nye la 'gul 'byung// sa rnams dag ni ma lus la zhi zhing nad mad nges par ston/ denas mtshan phud/
mthar gyur la// gal tisani 'gul bar snang// gsher che yul gyi dbus dag tu// mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod// phan tshun mi mthun gyur nasan// sdug bsngal ma bzada'achi
bar 'gyur/ thun na gsum par phyin nas 'gul// byas pa rnams la bde ba 'byung// sbrang bu shasbrang phu lab dang// rkun po rnams na 'jig par 'jug/ the rings 'gul bar gyur
tsha/ nAn tshe ring nad mad lo legs byed// grong khyer gyi no khor yug dag/ ma yis 'tshig par shes par bya// cha me 'char ba'idus dag tu// san rab tu 'gul ba 'byung// dbus
kyi yul ni thams cad du// rkun mas rnam par 'tsho bar 'gyur// de tshe zhagan bdun dag las// rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yine// gang du stobs ni rab che ba// sani 'gul bar gyur pa
[4s ]yin// de tsho gnas ni de dag tu// dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang/ skar mda' gnam grums 'gul// skar mda'adakar po 'bar 'gyuran// des na sngar bstan sel bar byed//
de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu// dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin// mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar// mo yis 'tshig par nye ba ston// dud kha'i mdog nag nag pa na//
rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin// ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am// 'dres pa'i mdog ni snang gyur na// de tsho 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba// skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/
gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni// gar 'byung de ni ston pa ste// gal te dbus na de tshe dbus// yul nyid du ni rab tu bstan// sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni// bde ning nad med
ston par byed// ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du// rnga sgra yis na dge ba sbyin// 'jigs dang 'dzugs rung shin tu sgra// der nem gi ston pa yin// de la sogs par
sbyor ba ni// rtag tugaza' rnams 'dod pa yin// rgyu skar 'di dag mthong ba la// grub pa'i las ni de tsho bya// tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni// rgyal dang khrums na stod smad/
gnyis// nam gru dang na lha mtshams dag/ bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags// 'di dag la ni sngags rnams 'grub// grub pa'i den yang ster bar byed/ skar ma dag
'di dag la// dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya// gza' ya res kyi gtso bani// sar dang dkar bar snang ba yin// tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste// rtag tu zla
ba nya ba yin// yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang// dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya// dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang// bcu padang ni bdun pa dang// bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar//
mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag/ skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin// chas shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag/ sngags rnams thams cad m 'dri'i// 'de
dag lan sngags mi 'grub// bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin// 'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la// tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan// phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang// gza' lhag
mchog ni las kun la// gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni// bzhi pa tshe dang ldan pa ni// sa stang 'jig rten kun tu ni// 'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed// ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba
yi[y]nyim la ni brtag par bya// yud tsam bcu gnyis khan na// de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni// mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ drag po dbang
chan dag pa dang// byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang// 'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid// dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin// zla ba mchogani sbyin pa nyid// 'di dag bcu gnyis
mtshan nyid yin// yud tsam dag tu bstan pa na// nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o// bcu pa char ni 'baba'agyur te// bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/ brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang//
bzhi pa nyid ni sngangabar bya// myur la sogs pa'i thengs dang ldan// mar ngo lan mtshan mo yin// lhag ma bgegasan byed pa yang// leg 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o// 'di deg grangs/
na ldan pa la// dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan// mig ni 'byed dang 'dzum pa dang/ sa gel myur ba'i 'gros dag ni// 'di dag dus kyi tshod dag ni// rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya//
se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la// rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yine// rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstun// chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya// thun bzhi lani nyin par te// mtshan mo dag kyang do
bzhin bstan// de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la// nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtag/ mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu lani// skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags// skad cig bcu zhes bshad/
pa ni chud tsam du ni yongs su brtags/ yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces// sngags rig pas ni yongos su brtags// 'di tsam dus tshod la ni// gsum gyi grangs su
yongasu ba rtagA/ sbyin srog dus dang bzlas pa yi// grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bu/ 3nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang/ rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs btung la// nyin dang mtshanan nyomanyes
de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin// nyi ma bco lnga nyid la ni// zla ba phud du rab tu bstan// zla phyed gnyis la zla ba nas/ rtsis shas 'jigs pa med par bastan/
de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis// sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yine// de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la// le ya sgrar ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas lo na bcu gnyis la// lo chen zhes de labya/
( ]gza' dngargyu skar phyin ci leg/ lha min dbang po thams cad kyang// de nas len bcu gnyis la// 'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed// gang tshe yar nger lha minadabong// sgra gcan rab tu snang
'gyur zhing// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma lus rab tu zin gyuran// mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen pa yang// sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ de la sogs pa chen po// dus dang
dus su rab sbyor 'gyur// rnam pa du ma mang po yi// bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur// dus kyi tha mar phyin pan// 'jig rten snod ni ches ra la// rgyu skar snabs la gnas pa
la zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing// mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid// zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang// gal te nyamanyin par ni// nub bzhin du nu 'dzin gyur dang// nyim
dang ni zla ba nyid// mtshan phyed dag tu bzung gyur nas// lha mne dbang po'i grobem yis// gal te 'jigasashing nub gyur na// shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal pon// sdang bas gsod par/
ca the tsom med// rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pasasam// gzhanagyis de ni gsod par 'gyu/ka ke yin bdag po nyid// shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed// ot+tA'i yul gyi rnams dang
detshe dzi nas bdag kyang// gal te tha skar snar ma dang// de bzhin duni bra nye dang// smin drug dag lanyi zla na// gang tshe 'dzin par snang gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang//
mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang// de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni/ gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung// buse pa dag ni thams cad la// rnam pa du ma'i ded rnams 'byung// gal te
rgyu skar mchu dang ni// gre dang de bzhin dbazhade dang// ma bzhinag pa sa ni deng// sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni// de la nyi zla shar ba na// 'dzin par the tsomamad 'gyur zhing// nyi zla gnyAne
shar phyogs su// sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na// shar phyogs mi yo bdag po dang// lA Na yul gyi bdag po dang// ang ga maM ga d+ha rgyal po// mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/
bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am// de rnams 'chi bas nyir 'dzagis 'gyur// dgra rnams sdung ba'i sems ldan rnams // tshogs kyang de tsho'abyung bar 'gyur// mgo dang lag dang
nab so dang// de bzhin rgyal dang skad nyid dang// nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na// ma ga d+ha rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing// de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod//
dran de nad 'jigs shes rab bya// 'ching dang nyen mangs grong khyer 'gyur// lha mtshams dang ni snon dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang/ da
tshanadi rnams kun tu 'gro// yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung// gsad dang 'ching dang nyen mongs dang// gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung// 'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs//
skye ngo'i gtso la de dag skya// chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang// de bzhin chu skad kho na la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang/ zla ba la na dmar bar snang// gza'ani 'dzin
par snang gyur pa// rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// gre bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang// de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang// gang tshe man gre dag la na// gal tenyi zla gzas
zin te// gza' di byung bar shes gyur na// kha dog nag pa la brten nas// mya ngan chen po nyan mangs dang// mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni// yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang//
rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung// nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni// gang tshe khrums smad dag lan/ zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// shar nas sgragacan 'dzin pa na// nub
Daphyogs nas nyim 'dzin// ma ga d+hani mi yi bdag/ sems can rgyal po'i thobs nyams par// zla phyedagacig gis snang bar 'gyur// rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yin//
mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yare// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogasani gang nas thon gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs dag tu// dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur// gang
nyed sa steng 'gul ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der/ de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya// khug rna sor ba mjug ringasan// nyi ma
lnga yi bar du yod// de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung// ngogs la spyod cing gnas pa yin// yul pa thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing// nad kyigazhi ni 'byung ba yare//
byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram gyi ni// rgyalapa dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus// bgred dka' khrad khrod la gnas dang// sa yi bdag pa la gnas
dang khe ri yugan rtse rje dang// byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram dag na// de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag/ mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis// skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur//
rgyu skar gang la sa 'gul ba// de la khug rna yang dag bstan// phyogs rnams ma lus khug rnani// ma bzad 'dan stengs pa dang// nyin zhag lnga yi bar du yang// rtag tu
nizhag mang por ni// phan tshun chos ni mi mthong dang// mi yi spyod yul mthong ba mni// mi rnams dgan phan tshun du// der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yano// der ni 'jige/
rten 'byung bar shes// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te 'jige/ skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni// gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa// phyogs kyi mthar ni rab
snang ba// gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yad// mtshan mo dbang po'i genu nyid dang// bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar// dkar ba'am yang na kha dog nag/ yang na dkar dang nug par
mthong// phyen lag 'dab chags kha dog dang// phyin ci legag dus sgra dang// phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod// gang du de ni 'jigs chen 'byung// rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyode dang//
rkang mad dang ni krung ungs dang// 'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams // phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen 'byung// khyi ni rgyan du gdeng b.las te// yang dang yang du zugs 'gyur ba//
tshe nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru// gang du der ni 'jigasachen 'byung// de ltar rnam pa du ma dang// rnam mang gong du rab brtags pa// der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal po'i
sna tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig/ dza ltar skye ba'i skur mni// dgu dang mi dge'i srog chags yin// de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa// dge dang mi dge byed pa yin// sngon gyi rgyun ma yin
pa[}]rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste// rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i// bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
ma la po ni theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las// skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'a'e 'u rab 'byams las bco brgyad pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das/
gshAkya thub pas/ gzhan sa nga gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar ma dang/ skur mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa// kyi kyi gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs rnams khyed cag thams
cad nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ sngags dang/ rgyud dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ dkyil 'kher dang/ ro
ga rnams dang/ bzlas pa dang/ nges par sdom pa dang/ rig pa grub pa la 'jug pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang/ rgyu skar gyi sprod pa dang/ rtsis mngon par
shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgags ma byed cig/ bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha' tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung ba gyis shig/
sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/ bstan par gyis shig/ thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi
bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnasagatsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par
gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyabang sangs rgyasanye bar lhagasapa rang rang gon gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// 'jig rten
rnams la'ang banapa'i phyir// sngags rgyud chog ji lta bar// sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir/ shig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul cho/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// gtso mchog
yagagag pa na/ dus nyams rtsod ba'adus dag tu// sngags rnams kun gyi rab marogan/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// gtsug tor rgyal bo stangs po tsha/ 'byung
bo kun n zlogabar byed/ gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams // ma rungasasems ldan 'gog par byed/ 'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang// de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems
ldan// soms can rnams ni rjes gzung dang// zlos pa rnams ni bde bya'i phyir// bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog/ stobs chen 'khor las sgyur ba yin// gtsug tor rgyal po ma
bo tsha rdakun la dadad phyag dam pa ni// gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa khyed kyis gsungs// de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams // mi gsung bar na bzhugs/
par gyur// de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis steng gsum gyi stong chen nge 'a'ajige rtan gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la//
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis snyams can gcig la'ang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang
ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang
sangs rgyas thams cad dang// / bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
rgyus thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/ yi ge gcig pa 'di de rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
gang nas gang du gnas pa/ bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnonapa/ bcom ldan 'adas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor las sbyar ba'i cho ga'ang
ngas bshad par bya'o// bstan pa nub pa'idus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di'i srung ba gcige pur 'gyur
po zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thamA cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'ad nyide sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon te bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro//
yi ga gcig pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshag pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyur ro// kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig/ hUM/ bcom ldan
'dis ni thams cad ma khyen// sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas// ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan// sems can kun la rnam par spyod// sngags rnams bdag
bo dpal dang ldan// gtsug tor las byung bstan pa yani// snying rje'i dbang la brtan nas ni// 'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas// chos kyi dbyangs la brtenanas ni// 'di ni
blo sna tshogs gzugs la gnas// ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams na// skye ba rnams la sku gdung gyug 'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas// zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du//
dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan// 'jig rten zang zing mad pa'irgyu// skun zang zing bcas par gsungs// thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med// zang zing bcas dang zang zing
[o ]mad/ 'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni// thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la// 'jig rten mgon po 'ad byed pa// sngags kyi
tshul gyis bzhugs pa yi ne// sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen// sa steng 'dul snang ba yin// sems can rnams kyi sngags sgrub pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
gsungs pa yani// sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na// rang gi cho gas 'ad bzlas na/ sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rtag tu 'bras bcas byed por 'gyur//
'di yaM tsho ga mdor bsdus nas// dus su yang ni bshad par bya// dus mthar thud mchog 'jig rten du// de bzhin gshegs pa nub par// de yi dus su cho ga 'grub/ !
sngags 'grub par ni gausungs pa yani// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor les sgyurab na de bzhinagashegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyi sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/
margyal ba lasargyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyabadag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi den du gnyer ba/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya chen
bstan nas/ yang na der na re zhig dang par bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'bur bor 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad
kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po'a'aded pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas
par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi grub pa'aphrog par byed cing/ gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang
zlobcom pa dang// phur bus btab pa'ang thar par byed de// bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha sngon po chang pa gang blangs pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa degacod par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis sang ldengag phur pas snying la
btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro// lebagon du bcos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa b.ro na bcings par 'gyur ro// kham phor kha sgyur gyi nang
du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro// mtshon chasasnying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su gas par 'gyur ro// sa tsha la dug dang khrugagis btag
pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur re/ ka ra wA ra'i lcagams kun tu bsdebs na gnod par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya btsoregar byar rung ngo// /
sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o ma'i khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas nas bar 'gyur/ mar gyi sbyin sreg gis na thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyamasabartan pa byas par yang
'gyur ro// khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsams pasabakral bar 'gyurar// sngags sgrub pa ra 'dod pas kyang 'ad
nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o// cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya ba dang/
yang sar gshegs su gsol bar bya ba yin no// gang 'dod kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ra// gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam lan ma theb na 'de nyid dang
lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na myur du 'grub bam lan theb cing/ gal te ma grub bam lanam byin na de ring por ma rdzogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro// sngags gang la dmag
te zhe dang sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis til la btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing/ gang brjod pa de'i las byed par
'gyur pa 'am len thob par 'gyur ro// lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yum shing gas brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya
bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// dra zla dang dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing rtsa na med pa dang/ pri yang ku' ye ma shing ma/
ma rtog gis sbyin sreg byas nadabang du 'gyur re/ gnad sbyin mo dang klu mo'i gdon rnamasal ni ske tshes bya'o// rgyal po rnams la ni yungs kar gyis bya'o// bram ze rnamasal na ma
b+h+yAtog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ rje'u rigs lan zhidang/ 'o ma dang/ mar gyis bya'o// dmangs rigs la na bub ma'i rdul gyis bya// bud mad lan lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o//
gdol pa la'on sanagre'u dang dza buli kA'i sbyin sreg bya'o// bu mo gzhon nus la na 'bras yos kyis sbyin sreg bya'i// sems can thams cad la rnamar dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas
nadabang du byed do// thams cad du'ang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal ba'i mchog can cang mi gsung bar gyur te// grub mchog bdun pa sa sngags 'di ni//
tsha detshelha yi tshogs la gsungs// 'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang// de tshe de nu tshegs bral blos// de tshe thub pa mchog gis// sangs rgyas sras po thu balha/ byang chub
semasadapa'ardzu 'phrul cha/ 'jam dpal la na de tsho gsungs// ltatshalhan blo ldan pa// mgon po 'khor le'abadag ngo ya// cho ga'adi ni rgya che bas// gang gi bskal pa'i
0tshad du yang// rgyal bas kyang bshad mi nus// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// chog yi ni phyogs gcig tsam// mdor bsdus nas na bshad pa ni// de tshe de skad gsungs
nas ni// dpal ldan 'jam dpangs rdzu 'phrul gyi// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed// gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' ba tshe//
rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dus mthar 'jigs pa'i dus su ni// ma rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir// mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste// gzi brjid chen po 'di
yin ras rasaji ltar grub par 'gyur// myur du rasAris 'grub pa gsungs// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa
chan pashani tu rgyas pa'i mdelas/ yi ge gcig po 'khor las sgyur ba 'byung pa'i le'u rab 'byams las bcu dgu pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig/ mdor na yi ge gcig pa
'kher las sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen pa'i res ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to// da ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhinge shes
rab chung ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dman pa'i phyir nas ris kyi red rgya che ba'i sbyor bsgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas// sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas
zlos pa posaji ltar dngos grub mchog thab par 'gyur ba de ltar samadog bshad par bya sta/ sgrub pa na tshogo byed par 'ded ngas nas ma nyams pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skudang bral bdag
la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dri'i gzhug par byaste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi'akhor lo rab tu bskor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis
rnams kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya brgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o// 'og tu ni rengs pa dang 'phags
pa phyag na rdo rje/ stong dun 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lto'abu gnyis/ 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ka ru srog cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las su bya ba
ni dang po'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor 'jus te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyang la bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar
dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// tha mar zlab nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas zung ste/ ji sride rab tu 'bar ba'obar du
bzlas pa bya'o// de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i gter las sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdugs sgrub par
'ded na gdugs kha dag sna tshogs pa gsar pa byas la/ gosar gyi 'khor los mtshan pa/ kashi ka'i gis 'phyang ba de nyid kyi cho gas mge la gdugs bzung ba byas te/ ba zlos
pa byas na rig pa rang nyid lte bar zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs te 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas
la tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji sride rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de thogs na 'ge pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor las
sgyur bar 'gyur ro// zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed lta'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro//
mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba stong ga geyog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas
gtsug tor 'khor las sgyur bsgrub par 'dod na gsar dang/ dngul dang/ zangs ma dang/ nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyig pa khru gang tsam byas la/
ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas dablangs na nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ci sta bum
zlopa bzang po sgrub par 'dod na gsar gyi bum pa bzang po bus la 'bru thams cad dang/ rin po che dang/ sman gyis yongs su bkangal ras dkar pos bcings te/ de la sngags
'dis bsgrub par bya ste cho 'phrul gyi zla phyud gcig la brtsams naganyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lag pa rab tu bcugan ci 'dod pa de blab cing mi zad par yang 'gyur
ro ci ste nor bu rin po che sgrub par 'dod na gsar gyi dbyig pa 'am/ nor bu bzang po dang/ shel gyi nor bu byas te gos 'phyang bar byas la/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubu
kha na gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i nang du 'ad thogos pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bsgyus pahUM
babyas n rang gi lus kyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar lha'i lus thobacing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gzhanagang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po
la sogs pa de'ang 'dase bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcubazlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyura'o// de ltar thegs pa med pa de bzhinagashegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog
pa 'i tshogs ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po ma thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas/
na thams cad la 'grub pa 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor las sgyur bar 'gyur ro// caste derdza sgrub par 'dedanotsanadamadamar ngo la rdo rje rtsa gcig pa 'am/
yang na lcags bzang po 'byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi po'i re bco lnga la ras rAsi kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgyad sbar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nying phul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'a'akher ran/ gzi brjid phung ba las/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags
'dis bsrung ba byas l/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grags la'ang bsrung ba bas nas rdo rje 'a ga pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pal nye bar 'dug ste/
sams rtsa gcig pas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// skabs 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin:
pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyapa'ong bar 'gyur ro// de dag rig pa'adzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du'agrobar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar
'gyur ro// lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro// skadacig gis reg man gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ra/ bskal par ganas
(par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro// shanas gang du 'dodapa der skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te phyagan jadza' zhabs drung du'ang sa bar
'gyur ro// cis ral gri sgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i rel gyi blangs nas nyin zhag gcige smyung babyas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pachenapa byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du
@# bzlas pa bya'o// de grub dgayog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ Doka rna cha gdub kar dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang/ la bcu drug pa'i che byad can dang mi mthun pa'i
phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang/ bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ci sta ldong nges sgrub par 'dod na dpa' de'i tshongags nyos te rgyal dang ldan pa'i
dus su nag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ dge slong bzang po'i dge 'dun labashes drangasanas bka' lung stsal bar bskul la// sgrub pa po la der rjes su gnang nas rang gi gnas su rang
[ro/ ]du zhugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sngar nas zhag gsum sbyang ba byas la// sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdagated phul ti 3ldong
res blangs nas ! ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dong/ du ba 'bul ba dang/ 'bar bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/
dra bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung pa thams cad dang/ sha thal sogs pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i glingen garas pa'i sems
cani bran du 'gyur zhing/ gang cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur re/ le stang gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar
'gyur te/ gal te 'dedan lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthang bar 'gyur/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam la snang zhing shang ma snang bar 'gyur ro// ma snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por
'gyur zhinge la sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ 'bar bas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzane
pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing/ lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te bskal par yang gnas par
'gyur ro// dus byas nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyo bar 'gyur// ci ste mdung rtse gsum sgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang de las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas
te le'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyis mchod rten khru gang tsam gyi tshod byas te/ de la mchod pa chen po byas shing gter ma rgya chen pa btang la/ lag pa g.yas pas
mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byason/ skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar
'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad ma tog gi char 'bebs pa dang/ lha thams cad kyang pa tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de nas de thams cad kyis yongs su
bskor nas gang dag gis mthong ba dang/ gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen
pa gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'i// rig pa 'dzan pa thams cad kyis phyag byas shing/ bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
ltung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar
[z/ ]'gyurar// ci ste re langs sgrub par 'ded na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i re blangs te seng ldeng gi phur pa zhigabatang la/ brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/
de'ilce'i rtse mo lanor bu rin pe ro snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ra// mtshun gang dag yade la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar
'gyur ro// 'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyur ro// 'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu'ang
rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang dra mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// re langs gnyis pa sgrub pani/ rnamed pa'i
lus kyi re blangs te rgya shug gi shong ga phur bus btabal/ de'i khor lcags kyi phye mgater zhing byin na de'i lce'abyin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang nam mkha' la 'gro
bar 'gyur/ bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ gang ga tshe 'du ba de'i ri phyogs gcig ga rgyal por 'gyurar// ci sta lcags
klu sgrub par 'dod na rtswa ku sha'i rang bzhinagyis lcags kyu byas te/ 'thab me pa mdeganag ngo 'o leg pa'i me thal gyas ba'i rnam las bkrus te mtshan mo gcig snang ba byas nas
lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar me brgya sbyar bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags kyu dang bdag nyid la gdugs dkar
pos bsrung bar bya'o// gzi brjid phung pos nadakyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o// phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtar la phur bus btab na/
'og tu bcing babyas shing gnas yongs su bzung babyas par yang 'gyur ro// de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil mo krung bcas la lcags kyu la pa tog dang/ dradang/
bdug pas mchod na de bsrungs ba byas pa yanan// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas// skabs 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du
dmyal ba'i sems narnamasa'atsho ba nye bar zhaba'i bar du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nanam mkha' la 'gre bar 'gyur ro//
pa'adzad pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lagu nu thugs pa/ lha thams cad dang/ klu drang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa'ang thag ring po nyide nas mthung na phyag 'tshal
bar byed de// bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// gang ga tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phug na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te ras ris sgrub par gyuran/
de'abar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod kyang de'i sngags kyis ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing/ de nas nub gcig snang nga bus te mchod pa rgya chen po byas la//
nga aja'i ma rab tu sdur te til dag la no dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ong nas nar gang 'dod pa de ltar bar 'gyur zhing/ mngag
gzhug pa dbang du byedapa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ci sta dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed nga ra 'dod na dbang phyug chen po la mchod nga rgya chen pabyas la/ lha
phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing arga' mo rab tu sbyar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa naha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyuran 'jigos par mi bya/ de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/
bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyurar// dbang phyug chen po'i rog pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang/ mchog gang 'ded pa de ster/
bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cog ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'ang 'gugs par 'gyur te/ mchog
gang 'dod pa de'ang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba'ang bya'o// ci ste gnod sbyin ma dgug par 'dod na do'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du nga/
bya// mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na'ang nang mchog ster bar byed do// zhag bdun gyisam dang/ sring mo dang ! chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i byed du ngas
par 'ong ngar gyur// castam 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis chog 'dabanyen du bya'o// srid pa dgug par 'dod ra zla ba
gsum du nod 'bras chan gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig lcang ba byas la bcom ldan 'das lamachod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma chan rnams sbyin par byas shingaganod
phyin dbug par bya'o// zhes yod la byed cing a ma'o shang g.yum shing zha dang/ sbrang rtsodang/ mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad spyone sug bsan/ skabs 'di'i lus nganapol
sogs pa 'gared sbyade'ang bar 'gyur la/ de dag la shing argya'i me tog gi mchod pa nabyanen de dag cazhog bya zhes smra bar 'gyurar// des brjod par bya ba ni nyin razhing gnod sbyaralung
bzhin du byed pa dgas sa zhes brjod par bya ste/ des gnodawan re re ster bar 'gyur ro// desalung bsgebar bya ba ni deng ga tshadabargya nas dud mod rnams 'dir 'od bar gyasal b.rangs
kyi de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang/ 'khor brgya la'ang 'bras chan byon cig ces brjod na rgyab tu khur nas gang du'aded pa der 'gro zhing 'khyor bar 'gyur ro// lung stsal ba thams cad byed par

'gyur ro// ci ste phyag na rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na bzhi 'gyur dang bdun 'gyur gyis sdod du bsnyen pa dus la/cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji sridi zla ba nya ba'i
bar du ste/ zla ba ltang 'bar du mchod pa byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun byed par nan dag bshes gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje'adzin kho na la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go/ de nas
mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thuna'adas te/ gnyis pa 'thun laskye' mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o zhesasems la kun tu brtags te/
gu gul gyi ril bu rgyashug gi 'bras bu'i tshad cad gyis ma tshanamo thun gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing sa 'gul ba dang/ sprin gyi
sgrasgrog par 'gyur ba dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi rtser rab tu 'babs par 'gyur/ skabs 'dire bcom ldan 'das phyaganardo rje rig pa thams cad kyis yerjes su
bskor ba dang/ rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pas yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang/ klu thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin thams cad
dung D+ha dri za dang mi 'am cis byang chub sar sa dpa' yongs su bskor ba phyin par 'gyur ro// de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag nga 'i tshor ba'i sdug
ta @#// bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te 'dug nga ra bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa'i mchog ci zhigaphyin/
kyi bar bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid nas sa 'og tu 'gre ba 'am/ rgyal srid dam/ ri snang bar 'gro ba 'am ganga'adod pa de nyer bcom ldan 'das las sgrib pa
'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang//
bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan thamasacad 'byung bar 'gyur na// bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe de rdzo'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
rig pa 'dzin pa gnyar dgagi'ang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phugan rdo rje'i che ga gang yin pa dang/ 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi che ga gang yin pa dang de bcom
sgra ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i re ga gang yin pa dang/ tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang/ dbang phyug chen pa'i tshe ga gang yin pa dang/ mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rtanalas
'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'do da kyis bsgrub par byas na 'grub par 'gyur re// snga gos gang ga bsgrub pa byas kyang ma grub nani 'das lus la bzlas pa byas nub
[rs]bdun gyis nges par mthong basbyin par byed de// ci ste ma sbyidanan rnam par nyams par 'gyur re// dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du gal te zlos pa byed na dung bdun gyis nang
du mthong nga sbyin par byed de// gal te spyad par mi ngan mgo tshal pa 'dul drag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur// zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa dmar dang/ shu dag dang/ mig sman dang/ dag
byed dang/ soshang dang/ mchod phyir thegosadrang/ ba bla dang ldeng res la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o// ci sterdzas rnams sgrub par 'dod na ldeng res blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang por byas la
ro'i bu lngar byazhing/ a ka ru'i snod basbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba dang nya me gzos 'dzin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi
tshe yungs karatsi ti tsi ti zhes sgra 'dan pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te/ skye ba thams cad dbang du 'gyural/ de'i tsha'adi thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te/ gang mas pa de
thams cad byed de// ci ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ra// bar gyi bskal pa ra 'tsho bar 'gyur ra// gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa
de'i tshe lha gzhon nu'i gezugasu 'gyurazhing/ nyin 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du ga'u/
zung dang ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste mig sman sgrub par 'dedan lag bu mge dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ ru rta dang/ tsan dan dag
kyi gcig tu byas te zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/ zla ba gzas wanipa'i dus su ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// des mgo la bskusanamasnang ba 'gyur te// ji
ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyirgyal por 'gyur ro// tsan+ti ral grisgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la mar ngo'atshis brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras pas la/
mchod pa rgya chen po dang gter ma btang zhing bsrung ba byas la/ ral grilag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ gal te 'od 'phrin ni
rig pa 'dzin pagacig pur 'gyur ro// 'barabs na de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang/ stobs dang pha rol gnan pa thogs pa med pa dang/ gang gas mthong ba
dang ! gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur re// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i ring bzhin las rdo rje byas te/ sor bcu drug pa rtse ma gnyis
ka'ang rtse gsum pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs la/ mo'aphrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshos nas brtsams nas ras 'ase la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing/ tshis nas nyi ma re re
ring re res kyang bskyod pa'i dge slong dgal bshes drang bar bya'o// tha mar nub gsum snang ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdud du ras ras rab tu bzhag cing mchod
ba rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu sbar zhinge ku sha'i bres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o// log pa gnyis kyis rdo rjebazungal dza srod 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlasapabyas shing
de bzung nade'akher dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur rdzagan rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur [: ]pha rol gnon par 'gyur/
bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mdung rtsodang ! 'khor lo dang/ mda' dang mdung
la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang/ mchil lhamadang/ so shing dang/ mchod phyir thegs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bye bas bsgrub bar bya zhing thams cad kyang grub pa
rnam pa gsum yin no// zhi ba byed par 'dod pal pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thang khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yid 'gags me rab tu sbyar la blugs gzar gyis zas
mchog dang/ nadang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad zhig gsum byas nabadag dang gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdunagyis ni grong ngam gleng
khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i zhib 'tsho bzhi bar 'gyur re// shinge sha ma'i yum shing la zhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad
kyang bya'o// yang na shing u dum ba ra'i yam shang la zhe dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o// char mi 'babo pa la na mngar gsum
gyis sbyin sregabyas n thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba lta'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la/ zla ba
lcags zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtswa dur ba'i'ajag ma la no dang/
sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan dang dung
la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na/ mthong ba dang thos pas pha grol gyi sde dpung gis mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro// bum pa gsar pa 'bru thams cad dang spos
chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas lag 'dren gyis gtsos shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dis dbang bskur
dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyis rims dang/ mig gi nad dang/ gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar byed do// srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thums cad las
gral bar 'gyur ro/ phyag rgyudang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa' sngags kyisang lding gi lam shing lta ni dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad

byas na lham mam gsa'am sang ra byed do/dus gsumadu nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras rgyugapatshal zhodang/ sbrang cad ng/ ma gyisabatapa'i sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyud byas na mos spyod thob par 'gyur ro/lha dbang du bar 'dodan a

ka' 'a'i ma ril dang sgrung dang/ ma gyisabatagapa'i sbyin sreg dus gsumadu nyin zhag nyi shu rtsagacig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o//'bras sdug po tsho la dang/sbrang ring ]mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin srag byas na zas
mazadabar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dbang du byed du gu gul gyi ril bu la zhe dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyore srog stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// shing mya ngan medakyi
lam shang gis ma gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o// rnams la naglu shing gi ma tog gis bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lani a ka ru'i yom shing gas bya'o// rig
pa 'dzin pa la ni pa sa 'cha'ashang g.yam shing gis so/ daa ka ru'i yum shing la du ru ka'a'abru mar gyis btags pas na dro ze la sbyin sreg bya'o// 5 dgas
rnams la ni bal ba'i shing gi yam shing gsaso// mi 'am ci rnams la ni sra chu pog gi sbyin sreg gsaso// leg 'dren thams cad lan zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyud
zlobya'o rgyal po'i bu lan yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhug bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing/ nyim khamangon duphyobs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas r/
tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis spyad srog byas nas 'o ma' khrus byas te bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing/ a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas pa
byas par 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lan gnyisabazlas pas gnyan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lad gsum bzlas pa byas pa/

rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lus chad pa dang/ nom pa dang/ dug gas rig pa dang/ phur bus btubapa rnamA 'a lta bar byed par 'dod nasmanau shir lce gzugAbarnyan du byas te ma tog dkaranges yachen la//
gegatsug rogyi rgyal po'aris 'asekyi mdun du yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zhe dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags la snyade srog stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rig pa nye bar dmigs
nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du bzlas kyang gi pa 'bras bu med par shesan ga'i wang gas gu pa la bris te grab de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas
bcom ldan 'das la marjod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyadabazlas la ku sha'i rtsen de nyide lug na milamadu 'angs te/ 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston
par 'gyur ro// tsa ste mi rtag pad+ma sgrub par 'dod na tsan dan dmar po las pad+ma byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ pad+ma lag pa g.yas par
bzunga' ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na g.yoga'akhor nyi shu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzan po' 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ thegs pa/
madra par 'gro bar 'gyur// gangag tshi 'che ba de'i tsho bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur ro/ ci ltardo rje sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang bya ma bosras nas ri rje byas la/ bslangs

pa'i kha zas kyis 'tshe zhingam smra pa'i deka' thub dang/ lama'ageg par byed tsang/ do rdzobazung ste myur dubazlas po 'bumabya'o// de ni rtsigacig par byas te/rdo rje de yungs kar rgya nang dubazhag la/
'a// yungs kar de ji srid du ci ti tsi to'i sgra sgrog pa de sride du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te// rdo rje de dngasanas las thams cad byed par l gyur te/
rtsa ma'ang phyi mar byedal/ ku'i shing yang skem par byedacing chu ba'ang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed de// klu rnams 'byor bar byed do// dug rnams dug med par byed do/
rgyu srog chags thams cad rengs par byed de// rmongs par byed de// ltung bar byed de// sngags du mar byed de// shing rta la sogs pa'ang rengs par byed de da
la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa 'di nyide rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgags byed par ma nus so// 'di'i cho gas rtag tu
bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sngags kyi thog ma dang tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byas na de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur nang grub pa'ang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rje
nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo'i yi ge gcig pas pad+ma 'bum der nadapal rang 'ongs nas mchog dang rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed do// ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i/
pad+ma 'bum phrag gsum dar na sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// lnga 'bum bzlas na 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag por 'gyur ra/ sa 'og tu 'jug nga sa:
bzhag ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas degs pa med par 'gyur zhing/ zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro//
ci steng nyid du 'dug nas yang khyab 'jug gi 'khar la'a'ajigs pa med par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'khor la nad byung na'ang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro// bsams pa
tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so// nam yang phyir rab tu 'jug par yang ma 'gyur re/ yar ngo dadang de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan
cage bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe po'i drung du bzhag pa byas nasaji tsam na zhabs kyi mthe dung nasa'od zer byung nas sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par gyur kyi bar
dungs na/ de'i mod len la skra'akhyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro 'de rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por la pa'agyur ro//
bskal par yang gnas pas 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras se nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ klushang gis me rab tu smrar nas rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing game
tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas n rgyamatsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jiges par mi bya'o// ji sride rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis
cama' @#// 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya 'os sna ban khyed nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces bya ba smra bar bya'o// de nas gang ca besgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur/
[/]sa la pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i stang du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad+ma de sa las 'phagasanasagayog 'kher stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar
'gyur// bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'irgyal par yang 'gyur ro// lam gcod par byed par yang mi nus so// 'od dpag tshud ltar snang bar byed par yang
'gyur ro// cho 'phrul chen po'i sme ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pa re res bzlasashing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi steng du'angum phrag gcig phul na ji srid gtsug tor nas
'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mad khon la mngan par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na nga lta ji
tshu ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa skye bar byed na de nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// mngon sum du
bzlas na'ang 'bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mge'agrwa pa skam par 'gyur ro// yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan tsazhig yade te/ gtsug tor 'kho sa sgyur
bde de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod mngon sum yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sngags dang dge ba thamasand kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de// gdugs dkar
bye bo dang gzi brjid phung bo la sogs pa na 'di'i g.yog 'kher yin te/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yare te cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la spyi bar
bya zhing/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o// cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'du bsgrub par bya'o// dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang gnas
ma yin par sbyar bar ma phye'o// gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur ba ma yin zhape mdor nalha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do/ de nas gter
'byin par 'dod na gang du gtir yod pa der song la rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan dan dkar po dang rgyus nang du bcug ste
stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas na/ gal te gatrer yod na sa de rang byebar 'gyur ro// gal te gter de ni gong tsam na yong na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang
bar bya'o// ci ste seng gi sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang ga'u wang gi lde gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji sride 'gul ba de/
srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyur ro// rgyab tu zhen na rna cha gdub ker dang 'dra zhing 'khyil ba'i sku
po dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'kher lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 'gre bar 'gyur ra// tshangs pa ji lta bar la stong phrag brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad/
kyis ma thub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du glang po che dang ma ha bsgrub par bya'o// gang gi tshe sang gsong ge'i sgra sgrog pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/
pad+ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad+ma 'bum gyis mchod nas kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wA ra'i me tog la ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bur byas na rgyal pa'i bu mo
theb par 'gyur ro// lcama' me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la sngogs dang bcas pas gtor na gang 'dod nga 'i bu pa thob par 'gyur zhing/ grung pa ga
thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyurar// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ong ba der dbang po'ang de la stan stobs par 'gyur lha'i rgyal
bo thams cad kyis kyang ring panas mthong na 'dzags pas dga' b.ro 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du'ang 'gyur ro// deltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya
sAng ga ma mchog gis gsungs pa yin no// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtse ba'i cho ga byang chub sams dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i med las/
yagi gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i las kyi tsheg dang sa rjes bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byams lasanyishu pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gziges nas/ de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/
rang sangs rgyus dang/ nyan thos dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal bstan pa 'ad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ner du gyur pa//
chos kyi mdzod/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bu r gyur pa'o// dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'dasashing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs pa nas dum pa'i rtsis kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags
mdzod yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi tshe ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te/ sems
