ba kasumabargya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni tsanangan gyis dkyil 'khor byas ta/zhun mar gyi mar mas kyang machod nus stong phrag brgyad bzlasun 'grub par 'gyur/ma grub kyang gloka brgya nyimarer la 'dzin
bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bstan pa 'disam grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lngalus bdag kyang ded 'dra bar mtshamasamadapalnga byas par 'gyur ro//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis
smod btsugasapa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//ka @#// namomany+dzashiya/ ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi sa twAya/ ma hA satwAya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/
ka/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ra dzebi ra dze/ shudab+he/ ba shudab+he sho d+hani/pisho d+ha ni/ a ma le/bim le dza ya ba hini/ru ru tsa le/hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ gang gis gzungs 'di 'chang bar
ga byed/ klog par byed/ston par byed pa de ni blo rnob dang ldan par 'gyur ro//lan cig bton na gzungs brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro//bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa byang bar 'gyur ro//
'bum phrag gcig bzlas na rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phragagasum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi sku mthong
[bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// 'phags pa 'a jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bA kyi te dza
la/ oM dAkya puSha sa/ o dAkye kha na dzAya// o bAkyaniSh+Tha a/ oM bAkyes nam/ 'phags pa 'jamadang 'a gyimtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams mdapa lnga'i
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byung ngo// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzashib+haTar ka s+ya
pudza bud+hibar d+ha na nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ rjebatsun 'phagasapa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phal pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkenamchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo many+dzabri

ye ku mA ra b+hAtAya/ tat+ya thA/oM a ra dza bi ra dza shud+d+habi shud+d+he sho d+hani bangesho d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/bi ma le dza ya ba ti ru ru tsale hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de
zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig bklagason bsal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyabakyis
phyogs par 'gyur ro// bcas pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlasan mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phragagates pa zlasan rig pa 'dzin par
'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'azam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lta byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyid
yi mtshan/samadapa lta byed nga yi ni zhing/ nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngasus par gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang ngo 'phal ba zhes
bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//1@#// 'phags pa 'jamadapal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga/ tang glu/ o T+Thi/ gsang
sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba sta/ den thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ ra ba/
thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa// sopashing la bstags nas bcas naso na ba mi 'byung ngo// mig na ba la rgyam tshubatags pa la 'an bdun bsngags te mig bkang dmig
nang sol to// mi'i kheng dumatshon gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mar rnying pa la lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ blud pa 'am rma khar bskus namatshon gyi dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
zas ma zhu ba dang/ sngos te gsudapa dang/ tshad pas 'khru ba 'a mu rang tshu 'am/ rgyam tshwa 'am// yang na lan tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la 'a na bdun bsngags te bros nad de 'das
[z/]grol te nga nyid kyi nyin par sos par 'gyur ro// kud pa na ba la bya rog gi sgal lan bdun bsngags te byabs na nad de sos par 'gyur ro// 'jamadapal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs
rdzogs so//! @#// rgya gar skad du/ AramaN+Da shrInAn asha kan/bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpa la gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu dang ba'i sams kyis su// thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ta/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsags pa yi// mtshan rnams
'dir ni brjod par bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzug dang ldan pa sta// gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na na da// mtshan rnams brams cad kun tu rdzogs// 'dzam dang 'gyis ni dam pa lags//
bsam gyisami khyababasam dang bral// mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung// sku gsupa'aphrin las bsam mi khyab// de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab// stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag
nyid can// stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan// stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// sridapagasum po stong par ston// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag/
dang ldan// sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// sams can kun gyis phyagabagyis pa// 'gro kun dnged bzhin du// mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms// phas kyi rgol ba tshar
da// gcodang// smra ba'i gang ge ma yinatog/ dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang// sgrib pa drin kun mi mnga'// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob//
grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa// ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs// bgrang nor thegs shing phyag 'khar bsnams// dag cing
skyo dag la rnams dang ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs canamanga' bdagamadzad// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i spyan// pad+ma'i ze ba'i khadoga'adra// bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma' gas/
lta gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnanas// bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing
ma 'dabang brnyes// bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po// 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'// khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag/ khyod ni zhi ba'i sams can rnams //kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan
gtso//khyod ni khyu mchog skya dgu'i gtso//thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs gos// ma par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa//rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid la 'khrungs// 'od zer stong ldan ni mkhyod// zla ba dang ni
phur bu'ang khyod// rnam thos bu dngachu lha'ang lags// dbang phyugachekhyod khyab 'jug khyed/ klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod// dbazhin sde dpon skemabyed lags// lha min dbang po thogs
babs ris// mig dmar gza' 'a ga pa wa sangs// sman pa dang 'belha kun lcags// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral// khyod ni 'jig rtan gang
thagamchog// 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig/ ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa// dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs// bdud kyi las kyis yongasami brdzi// kha na ma tho mi mnga'
zab// dag nga'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags// khyod ni sman pa zug rngu'abyin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog/ blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan// blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa/
'a gas// khyod bsod nams dpag bsam shing// byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// yid du 'ong zhing
yid 'phrog pa// sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par sdod// khyod 'jug rings gza' mchog lags// khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog/ khyodazhirgyalatshabadabang bskur ba// sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso
lags// ded dpon 'bro ba rnams kyi gtso/ mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin// khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu // khyod ni yi de bzhin nor bu ltar//sems can/
re ba kun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis nga// rin chen khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gyis nibaka' stsal pa/saMmA kye daM na ma swAhA/di skadasmos pa'i mtshan rnams dang//
rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni// sdig gyur rnam dgarab tu thob// brgyalasartsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa
dra'adod bsam dgu yid bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran nani// mtshams med bskal pamatam nga gi lasa rnams
mi bzad gang byas pa// de dag thams cad myur du 'byung// 'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang// 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtse// sams can dag pas dran byas na//
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang shob par 'gyur/ blodang ldan pas dran byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog pa// sas rgyas nyid ni 'dod nas nga/ thob 'gyur 'di la
the tshom med// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
go brgyad zhugs
rgyud
